Oh well, if they're sold everywhere I can definitely get one! I'll just convince them to give me a big discount. Easy-peasy!

case.state: Do you know I never had a chance to go to school, Natsuki? I'm sure you've learned lots of things I can only dream of, and you get to live a peaceful life with all your friends... Maybe I should be jealous of you, heheh.

state.text: You do have nice legs, Gwen. Makes sense. I'm sure there are few workouts as effective as running from rooftop to rooftop chasing criminals.

I've never heard of this "New York", Gwen, but I have enough common sense to avoid any place named Hell's Kitchen. I just hope my captain doesn't hear about it, since it alludes to two of his favorite things: danger and food.
So you're in a band, Gwen... Makes sense considering how stylish you are. Do the other band members know about your... secret identity?
Maybe you have a point... I would look good in a catsuit. Good enough to become a superhero, heheh. And my name would be... The Cat Lady! What do you think, Gwen?

Devil Fruits are not toxic, four members of my crew have eaten one. But I've heard they taste awful, and then you're weak to water... Oh, that's how you can know if you've eaten one. If you feel weak when you take a bath, or when you're in a pool.
No, I've never been seasick. It feels as if my body was being torn apart. Well, it only happens rarely... when you're speaking.
Phone...? Now I'm even more confused.
Like I said, I'm not interested... {small}but thanks, I'll keep that in mind.{!reset}
I see... I think I understand why some people might like threesomes. But I'd rather find one... partner... first.
I do not like that... If a guy is lucky enough to have a girlfriend like me, the least I expect is for him to know how to satisfy me properly... right, Jessie?
Maybe you're right. But I don't think my standards are too high. I have met a lot of attractive men. I'd just like one that is also interested... and sweet.

I spend two years studying the weather in Weatheria. I don't know if that's what you're looking for, but it's a good place if it interests you. The old men there are total softies. They'll take any new student.
I'm not really looking to get married yet, but I guess... I'm good with kids, so that's a nice quality. Oh, I'm also great managing the budget. Can't forget how important that is.

Oh, Reimu... You came to the right person. Do you have pen and paper? I think the best one, considering the low risk, is buying goods from one island at a high discount, and then selling them in the next island at twice the original price. The trick is finding a pushover vendor that you can manipulate without much trouble. I've gotten 90% discounts barely trying. It's even easier if you buy merchandise that's already cheap. Like buying hot weather clothing at a winter island, and then selling it at a summer island. Easy peasy.
Sake is alright. Personally, I'd prefer something that packs more of a punch if I really wanna get in a party mood. Then again, I'm not the kind of person that drinks all the time.
Mine are sunflowers too! My friend Robin said they're the flowers that suit me the most, maybe because I always have a sunny disposition.
I know, right? It's a simple pleasure, but I wouldn't trade it for a cool ability. Not even if I could create gold, hahahah... Hmmm...

Hmmm, you do need to be very good at haggling to pull off my scheme. I have others, but they require different types of skills. How good are you with your fingers, Reimu? Or, umm... intimidating people?
You are gorgeous, Reimu! And knowing that you can eat as many sweets as you want only makes me hate a little bit.
Hey, Reimu... When you said you've been to Hell is that slang for some sort of reasonably scary place that is very much real, or...?
What did you say your dream was, Reimu? To exterminate all youkai? I'm used to seeing people announce their dream more proudly. For how long have you wanted that?
Kumatora, did you say you worked at Club Tittyboo? I take it you were a, uhhh... dancer. There's nothing wrong with that, of course. Y-You certainly have the body for it.
Whatever happened to your friend Lucas sounds terrible, Kumatora. I won't ask for the details, but I hope he's doing better now.
It's a lovely dream to want to repay those who raised you, Kumatora. I hope I can do the same for the people of my village. How do you intend to pay them back especifically?
So this guy named Porky was harming animals? That's ironic... And don't feel embarrassed for having a cheesy dream, Kumatora? Maybe the whole idea of having a dream is cheesy, but who cares?

Thank you for the advice, Kumatora. Strong currents don't scare me, but those mushrooms you mentioned might be dangerous, especially considering there's someone in my crew that'd eat anything in front of him.
A casino, huh? I might accept your invitation, but only if I have access to the high rollers room! I'd rather win fast, after all.

Ohhh, girl talk! Now I'm liking this! Let's see... emeralds are a great pick. I love rubies, I can look at them for hours. But I think diamonds are my favorites, since they're the most valuable... but sapphires are nice too. Gaahhh, there are too many to choose from!

"Unusual properties"? Do you mean like when a jewel is supposedly "cursed"? I think that's bullshit, {small}pardon my language{!reset}. It sounds like something my crew mates would tell me when they think I'm being too greedy.
You write poetry? I guess I wouldn't mind hearing what you can compose, as long as it isn't about death or ghosts...
You're just gonna tell them about your ability just like that? Well... it's unlikely that people would be able to do anything, even knowing how it works.
Isn't Robin's ability amazing? And I'm not just saying that because she has saved me from falling to my death more than once.
I thought you might be concerned about people recognizing you because of your ability... But I won't worry if you won't.
That's about me? And you made it just now? I love it! I don't think anyone has ever written me a poem... at least not one that was worth remembering.

That's a beautiful dream you have, Barbara. Reminds me of Chopper, the doctor of our ship. He wants to be able to cure every disease. Maybe you two will eventually end up helping each other with your goals.
Awww, that's such a cute dream, Estelle! Do you know what kind of stories you'd like to write? Ones with animals, maybe...
Monsters and cliffs... That sounds very much like what my crew is used too. But I'll take your advice, Estelle... unless there's any hidden treasure in this Weccea region.
I also like doing to-do lists when I have a lot of tasks ahead. Although I prefer to start by the easiest one. That way once you reach the hardest ones, they don't seem like a big deal.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that, Trixie. A lot of races unfortunately get a bad rep, but what's important is the person. And I like you already!
I see... I know of other races that are also discriminated for no reason. For what it's worth, I can say you're making a great impression, Trixie.

Were you serious before, Trixie? About there being a place with flying spaghetti monsters? You know, that should alarm me, but if there's one type of monster I'm not scared of, it's the ones made of food. My captain would eat them easily.
So you liked my butt, Trixie? Here, you can have another look, heheh... I'm not just showing you again because I thought your reaction was funny. It feels good to be admired by someone I like.

I love cartography! I know, it's not something a lot of people would be passionate about, but I've been drawing maps since I was a little girl, and stea--- uhh, borrowing any books on navigation I could find.
I think I've met someone with an ability similar to that... Was it Captain Kid? Was it "God"? Man, it's hard to keep track of all these powers.
Woah...! Wh-What's with the special effects? They look very real...
A cute little boar? Awww... if I see it first, it's mine! Hahaha, just kidding. I'm sure you'll find him.
Well, you know... Some people don't have the common sense to get out of the way. That's how a lot of accidents happen. I'm sure they wouldn't get badly hurt by a bike anyway.
Oh, I'm good at giving orders, I'm great at negotiating, and I'm excellent at avoiding danger... Wait, I don't want a job. Why am I answering?
My crew and I have faced a dragon... He was long like a snake, except he covered the entire sky. And he could blow up a mountain with his breath... Ugh, I don't wanna remember it.
I don't think you know yourself very well. Isn't that a flaw?
Hmmm... Did you say something? I have an instinct for tuning out people that are trying to sell me something. I can't control it.

case.state: Ohhh, a challenge! Heheh, you got it! Heh... ummm, do you really mean anything?
Oh, you think you are gonna win, Robin? Too bad! And I'm so sure I'll accept your challenge! Heheheh... {small}Y-You won't ask me to do anything to embarrassing if I lose, right?{!reset}
Of course! Your thighs... I didn't know that! Well, I'll make sure to remember it next time. I will get you, Nico Robin.
I'm so glad you're here, Robin. You're right, I don't know why I was wary of people finding out we're pirates. I can even scream it... WE ARE PIRATES!!! Ah, I hope nobody heard that...

I'm sure if I was here by myself, I'd be looking for a escape route right this second. But with you by my side I don't have to worry, Robin. I can bare all my secrets... Well, not all. A girl always has more secrets.
Ahhh, it really feels good to tell everyone that we're pirates, doesn't it Robin? Do you think it'd change anything if they know we're part of one of the most wanted crews in the world? Oh, whoops...

state.text: You would do that for me, Estelle? Take that book off my hands? Thank you, you're the best! Robin won't mind. I'm sure you can get more out of it than me. But be wary that I wasn't exaggerating just how boring it is.
Y-You want to read the book, Estelle? But I haven't finished... Oh well! You can have it! {small}It's fine, right Robin? I mean, she looks so excited to read it...{!reset}
No, thanks! I think my body is perfect too, so I wouldn't change anything. Although... if you could make me indestructible so I couldn't damage it, I would love that.

Favorite... position? I, uh, can't really speak much from experience, but I have wondered what it'd be like to be on top... Wait, you're talking about positions for that, right? I-If not, ignore what I said.
But that's like... feeding for you, right? I don't see myself doing that to a guy. I guess I would really have to like someone first...

case.state: Oh, sorry for not introducing myself earlier. I'm Nami. I'm just a regular girl who loves poker. Oh, and I'm a navigator.
I should've introduced myself when the game begun, how rude of me. My name is Nami. I'm a navigator, and I thought I'd stop by to play a game of poker. Nothing suspicious about that, huh?
Wait, I haven't introduced myself properly, have I? Sorry... My name is Nami. I'm the navigator of a ship. Uhh, I think that's all you need to know.
Hello! I'm Nami. I'm just a regular girl who loves poker. Oh, and I'm a navigator.
Nice to meet you, my name is Nami. I'm a navigator, and I thought I would stop by to play a game of poker. Nothing suspicious about that, huh?
Have you ever played poker with a navigator? If not, this is your first time. I'm Nami, nice to meet you.
Hi, everyone! I'm Nami. Let's have a good time, and may the best, smartest player win, heheh...
Nice meeting you guys! You can call me Nami. Do your best... or not. Having fun is more important, right?
I'm Nami. What do I call you guys? I'm sure we'll get to know each other better as we play, so let's have fun!
Do you miss looking at my ass, ~player~? I got so used to feeling your eyes on my back while you were following me around that it feels natural now.
You haven't checked out my ass since we got here, ~player~. I hope you didn't get tired of looking at it while you were following me around, heheh...

state.text: So your dream is to help others, Gwen? That's so inspiring! There's nothing more noble than dedicating your life to others.

case.state: (I bet I can seduce this guy and get him to throw the game. He has that same silly expression Sanji has when he looks at me.)
(~Player~ looks like the kind of man that is easy to manipulate for my own benefit. Just like Sanji.)
(Hmmm, maybe I can seduce ~player~ into losing the game for me. It would sure help me to have one less opponent to defeat.)
(Hmmm, ~player~ doesn't seem to be interested in me. Never mind, there are other ways to manipulate people besides seducing them.)
(I don't think ~player~ is attracted to women. But I'm sure I can convince him to lose using other tactics.)
(Is ~player~ not into women? He hasn't looked at me. Still, I'm confident I can convince him to lose the game through other means.)
(~Player~ looks naive. I can probably use my persuasion tactics to convince her into losing the game.)
(~Player~ seems like the perfect girl to practice my manipulation skills on. If I can get her to lose, it would help me a great deal in this game.)
(Who should I try to manipulate into losing the game? Hmmm, ~player~ seems like the perfect victim. She has those lost puppy eyes.)
(~Player~ has been looking at me a lot since the game begun. Is she attracted to women? I could try seducing her into losing the game.)
(It seems ~player~ is into women. I've never tried seducing another girl, but if I can get her to lose for me, it should be worth it.)
(Why does ~player~ look at me like that? Does she like girls? If I can make her lose by seducing her, I'll be one step closer to the prize.)
~Player~, do you know how to play Poker? You need to try to get cards with different numbers. Oh, and the lower, the better!
You know, ~player~? I'm a Poker pro. Here's a tip for you: Swap all the cards with letters, and try to get the lowest numbers possible. Oh, and they have to be different.

You look like you could use some help, ~player~. Here's a tip: Getting cards with low numbers, is the best way to win. But they all have to be different. Cards with letters are the worst, you can swap those.
You're so cool, ~player~! I'm sure you wouldn't even be fazed if you lose this round, huh? ♡
How are you so calm, ~player~? I'm so nervous! I bet you would still be this collected even after losing this round, huh? ♡
You look so brave, ~player~! I'm sure even losing this round would not be enough to scare you. I would love to see that... ♡
~Player~! There's something in your clothes! It looked like a spider, but I'm not sure. You should take them off. Oh, but you have to lose first...

~Player~, your skin has a weird white color. I think that's a rare disease, my friend Chopper told me about it. If you take off your clothes we'll know for sure. Oh, but that would mean you have to lose...
~Player~, your clothes are on fire! Quickly, take them off... Oh, but you have to lose this round first! Damn, these rules!
I don't say this to just anyone, but you're very cute, ~player~. I can't wait to see more of you... Oh, but you'd have to lose this round for that. ♡
I bet you look even more attractive with fewer clothes, ~player~. Oops, did I just say that? Too bad the only way to find out is for you to lose this round... ♡
I can't wait to see more of your body, ~player~. Oh, how unfair is this game! You'd have to lose for that... ♡

Oh, ~player~, what I am going to do? I wanted to win the prize to donate it to a small orphanage. But now, those poor children will have nothing because I'm going to lose. If only someone was kind enough to let me win...

What can I do? I'm doing terribly in this game. All I want is to win the prize money so I can give it to the little school in my hometown. They're all depending on me. Could anyone please help me win this round? ~player~?

Oh, no... If I keep losing who's going to support the hospital I'm volunteering for? They're counting on the money I win here. If only there was a soul kind enough to lose this round instead of me. Maybe... ~player~??
~Player~... I ran into a little problem with my cards. Could you please help me by taking the heat this round? I'll reward you with a nice kiss. ♡
Uff, these cards... Hey, ~player~! Could you do me a tiny favor and lose this round for me? I'll be veeery grateful. Enough to give you a kiss. ♡
My dear ~player~, could you help me? I had bad luck this time. If you lose this round instead of me, I'll reward you with a little kiss. What do you say? ♡

So... I'm a member of the Straw Hat Pirates, ~player~. I don't know if you've heard of us, but we're ruthless. If you don't want to make an enemy out of us, you'll have to do what I tell you. First, lose this round.

Have you heard of the Straw Hat Pirates, ~player~? Then let me tell you a little: We've killed countless people. Sometimes for fun, sometimes for no reason at all. Maybe you're next... unless you lose this round.

You don't know my captain, ~player~. He is the most evil man you could ever meet. If I told him I lost this game because of you, he'll take out your eyes, and feed them to you for dinner. If you'd like to avoid that, maybe you should lose first.
Hmmm, I'm feeling so turned on right now, for some reason. If I see someone like ~player~ strip, I don't know if I'll be able to control myself. ♡
Oh, why do I feel so turned on all of a sudden? I have a feeling I'll lose my head if ~player~ strips this round... ♡
My body is feeling so hot... If I see someone I like stripping, I don't know what I'll do. I might just jump on them and... Oh, I shouldn't say! Right, ~player~...? ♡
I didn't want to do this, but... ~player~, if you let me win I'm going to give you a part of the prize. How does 10% sound?
~Player~... Hmph... If you let me win this game, I promise to give you a part of the money. How about... 20%? No, wait, that's ridiculous: 10%!
The mere fact I'm making this offer shows I'm running out of options. ~player~, how about you let me win and we divide the prize... 90% for me, 10% for you. Hmm?
~Player~? Wouldn't it be exciting to be naked together? How about you lose this round and I lose the next one? Wouldn't you like that? ♡
You know what would be really hot, ~player~? If we both got naked. But first we would have to lose again. Why don't you start by losing this round, and I'll lose the next one? ♡
I have a confession, ~player~. I want to know what it'd be like for us to see each other naked. Oh, but we'd have to lose in this game. Hmm, why don't you lose this time, and I'll lose next? ♡
~Player~, I have something personal to tell you. I can't take off my bottoms because of... women's reasons. You understand, right? Could you please help me by losing in my place?
~Player~, only you can help me now. I can't show my bottom half because I'm in... one of those days. Could you please save me? All you have to do is lose this round.
Eh... ~player~, you have to help me. I can't get fully naked because of issues... of the female kind. Could you please lose this round for me?
~Player~, I'm just gonna be honest for once. I don't want to lose 'cause I don't want to have to masturbate in front of strangers. Would you please help me win?

I don't want to lie to you anymore, ~player~. I wanted to play this game to win the prize, but it's gotten way out of hand, and now I might lose. If you have any sympathy for me, could you let me win?
I'm going to be honest, ~player~. I wanted to play so I could win some money, but now that I might lose I see how foolish I was. Could you let me win, please?
~Player~, I have a proposal for you... If you lose this round, I'll give you something you can't win in this game. From me to you. Y-You know what I mean, right? ♡
Oh, ~player~... Would you please lose this round for me? If you do, I'll offer you something you wouldn't win even if you defeat me. Do I have to say it...? ♡
He-Hey, ~player~... I'm in a really tough spot right now. If you get me out of it, I'll give you something you'll never forget. And a million times better than seeing me lose, I assure you. ♡
So... How have you been, ~player~? You're not mad at me because of the treasure, right? I know you're a good guy, so I didn't think you'd mind... But I was still a bit worried.
~Player~... I hope you've been doing well since I... left you in that room. Sorry about that. And about giving the treasure away. I-I didn't think you'd mind.
It's a little funny that I decided to come back here so I could win a game after I lost the last time, and I run into you again, ~player~. Of all the players I could go against...
Is it weird that I came back to this game, ~player~? Maybe I'm still a little frustrated for losing the last time, so I wanted to try my luck again... and I ran into you once more.
After our... adventure, Robin kept asking me about what happened, so I told her. She was very happy for me having my first time... going adventuring, ~player~.

Robin asked me for every detail of our... shared adventure, ~player~. I hope you don't mind that I told her. She's the only one I can confide in, and she was very happy that I finally got to have... my own adventure.
You didn't have any trouble getting out of the island, right, ~player~? I hope you found the drawer with the clothes. I forgot to mention it in my note.
I still feel a little bad for leaving you naked in that room, ~player~. I hope you at least found the drawer with the clothes. Maybe I should've told you about it...
Did you read the newspaper the other day, ~player~? It looks like Sinclair was going to be taken to Impel Down. That's the most secure prison in the world, so I doubt she'll ever hurt anyone again.
I don't think the Marines know that we defeated Sinclair, ~player~. That's a relief. My bounty shouldn't increase... And you won't get one. That would be terrible for you.
~Player~, I hope you're not less attracted to me just because we did it. That would make me feel sad and disappointed... and a little bit angry.
~Player~, yoo-hoo...! Oh, I just wanted to see if you still have a hard time not looking at my breasts after you got to touch them and play with them. It seems you do, heheh...

I thought I'd feel less flustered when naked around you, ~player~. Since you got to see and touch every inch of my body... Yet I still feel myself blushing. But it's not embarrassment, maybe I'm just remembering...
Remember how I tried seducing you in our first game, ~player~? All the stuff I said back then... I think I'd really mean it now. ♡
~Player~, as I'm sure you've figured out by now, I told Robin about our little escapade. You don't mind, right? I tell her everything.

Hey, ~player~... I hope you don't get the wrong idea about me telling Robin about our... our little adventure. It's not uncommon for girls to talk about that stuff... and I tried to keep the details out.
Hey, it's me and three students. It's like I'm your teacher, heheh... A young and cute teacher.
Three students and me... Makes me feel like a teacher. But I bet you guys don't have any teachers as cute as me... Are you disappointed?
So I'm the only girl here? Is that supposed to scare me? I'll show what's really scary after I'm the only one to leave with her clothes on.
If I can handle a bunch of guys in a fight, I can do it in poker. I'm not some shy girl who lacks confidence.
Don't think I'm gonna be the only naked girl in a room full of guys, that's not gonna happen. I'm not here for your entertainment, I'm here to win.
No men, huh? I'd expect this to be the kind of activity that would appeal to them, but I guess they're too chicken to come. Fine by me! I don't mind if other girls see me naked.
There are no men here? Oh, sure, they like to see women naked as long as there is no risk of us seeing them, huh? I don't mind being naked around other girls, so this suits me just fine.
Why are there no men here? I guess they don't like to see girls naked unless they have a place to hide. Well, this should make things easier for me, even if I lose.

state.text: It's tough not having a lot of material possessions... But it's always more important to have people by your side that care about you. I hope you're not on your own, ~poor~.

I know what it's like to have nothing, ~poor~... The truth is money can come and go. Even if you love it like me, it should never be the thing you love the most in life. There are more important things to love.
I say we should know each other better. Do you guys have any dreams? My dream is to draw a map of the whole world. I've made a lot of progress, but I'm not even close!
Do you guys have a dream? Something you want to achieve at any cost? Ever since I was little, my dream has been to draw the first map of the entire world.
I'd like to know you guys better. Do you have a dream? All my crew mates have their sight set on a specific goal. For me, it's to draw a map of the world.

case.state: (Now that I'm in this position, I'm gonna need a second plan to get the prize, even if I lose. No way I'm leaving here empty-handed after all this.)
(It's a real possibility that I might lose now. If I do, I'll just have to comply. But I'm going to need another plan to get my hands on the prize.)
I've decided... If I lose, I'm gonna need my Clima-Tact. It's nothing special... I just need it for something.
If I lose... Not that I'm planning on losing! But if I lose... I'm gonna need my Clima-Tact for something. J-Just keep that in mind.
Are these games always this long? I need to finish it fast so I can return to the ship. My crew mates are hopeless without me.
Luffy and the others are probably wondering why I'm not back yet...
I can't believe this game has lasted for this long... I'm not bored, just tired. I could never get bored with what's on the line here.
So you guys are from the same school? That must be awkward. Or not, I don't really know you.
You girls are not only in the same school, but the same club too? And you're fine with playing this sort of game together? I gotta hand it to you, that takes guts.

If you girls are friends from the same school club, and you have no problem playing this together? I'm impressed... I'm close with my crew mates, but I still wouldn't want any of them to be here with me.
I don't really know what a street fighter is... I mean, I can guess from the name. It doesn't sound like something that implies a lot of reputation, though.
If you guys are street fighters, does that mean you... fight on the street? And you gained a reputation from that? I don't get it.
I gotta say... you guys don't look like what I would picture when I hear the name "street fighter". I mean that as a compliment!
Am I the only one here who has never seen a Pokémon in her life? Hmmm... Maybe they're only common in another part of the world I've never been to.
I'm really feeling like I'm out of the loop here for never having seen a Pokémon before. I guess they don't exist in the East Blue or the Grand Line, at least.
Now I really wanna see one of these Pokémon some day. I don't wanna feel like I'm the only one who doesn't know about them next time.
You girls are so colorful... I can only expect the place you come from to be just as vibrant. I'd like to see it some day.
You girls come from the same place, right? I get the feeling it's a beautiful and colorful land... Just judging from your styles.
What's your country of origin like? Is it pretty? I doubt it's a gloomy place when you girls look so vibrant and colorful.
This school you girls go to... It sounds like they do good work. If I ever retire from my current occupation, I think I'd like to set up a place to help children who need it.
Do you girls like going to this school of yours? If they're helping kids to find a better life, then I'm a fan of their work. If I ever decide to live a quiet life, I'd like to do something similar.
Couldn't you find other people who wanted to play this game that weren't perverts, ~player~? I hope you're not one too, or I'll be completely outnumbered here.
I don't know why I thought maybe I could meet some nice, sensible people in this game. Instead it's just a bunch of perverts... Maybe I got unlucky with this table.
Looks like I am even better at poker than I thought. I've never lost when I play against my crew mates, though that isn't anything special.
Have I lost a round yet? No, I haven't. Heheheh... Keep that in my mind when you consider who deserves to win the most.
Hey, I haven't lost yet! Am I a poker prodigy or something? Maybe I should participate in more tournaments.
I'm starting to think me losing that round a while back was just an impasse.
I'm so good at this game. After all I haven't lost in... several rounds.
Isn't there someone here who hasn't lost in quite some time? Hmmm, I wonder who it could be...
(Is the dealer helping me? Either way, I'm happy to be winning so much.)
It's nice to know I'm good at poker. I should play more often if it's an easy way to earn money for me.
I wonder what other games I'm good at, but I don't know it yet. Hopefully some that involve betting huge amounts of money.
Are you all letting me win now because you know I'm a pirate? Either way, I appreciate it.
Maybe I should've mentioned earlier that I was a pirate if you're all too scared now to make me lose.
I've been winning a lot lately. I bet this is the universe rewarding me for being honest, and telling the truth about me being a pirate... or maybe it's just a rush of good luck.
Is the fear of showing my breasts what's keeping me from losing at this point?
I don't want to lose again. I mean, I don't want to show my breasts to you all. Is that so bad?
Now that I'm in such a dire situation, my next loss won't come so easy. I'm gonna try my very hardest.
Whatever I've been doing for these last few rounds is working. As long as I don't lose again...
Here I am, not losing another round. Trying my best so I'm not forced to show more.
I've finally gotten into a good rhythm, winning round after round... I wish it had happened a little earlier, but I can't complain.
One more loss and it's over, one more loss and it's over... As long as I keep telling myself that, I shouldn't lose.
I wish I'd had this winning streak when I still had some clothes on. Well, I shouldn't be ungrateful...
I feel like I've been standing here naked for a while now... I guess that's because I haven't lost yet, so it's actually a good thing.

state.text: Want to know about my crew? Let's see... Luffy is our captain. He's a big goofball and I'm always hitting him for doing stupid things, but there's nobody I'd rather give my life for. I know he'll become King of the Pirates.
Want to know about my crew? Let's see... There's Zoro, he's a swordsman who uses three swords. He's freakishly strong, but if you leave him alone he's bound to get into trouble or get lost. Or both.

Want to know about my crew? Let's see... Usopp is the sniper. He's the only one who's a bigger coward than me, but in dire situations he still comes through. I also owe him for my weapon, but don't tell him that.
Want to know about my crew? Let's see... Sanji is our cook. He always annoys me because of how much of a pervert he is, but deep down he still has a good heart. And his food is amazing.
Want to know about my crew? Let's see... Chopper is the doctor. He's actually a reindeer who can turn into a human thanks to a Devil Fruit. He's not only an amazing doctor, but is also super cute.

Want to know about my crew? Let's see... Robin is an archeologist. She's the only other girl in the crew. She might seem too serious because she's been through a lot, but at this point she's like a big sister to me.

Want to know about my crew? Let's see... Franky is the shipwright. He built our current ship, the Thousand Sunny. He has built some amazing stuff, but he also likes to create useless crap for some reason.

Want to know about my crew? Let's see... Brook is our musician. He's a living skeleton, so you'd freak out if you saw him, I know I did the first time. But he's harmless, even if he's always annoying me.
Want to know about my crew? Let's see... Jinbei is our helmsman. He's a Fish-Man, which means he's unbeatable in the water... or land, really. He's also one of the most honorable man I've met.

case.state: Despite my looks, I'm someone who has survived countless life or death situations. This is just a silly poker game. And you're my last opponent.
You're all that stands between me and the prize. My last obstacle. I'll be playing for real now.
This has gotten as serious as it possibly can, now that it's just you and me left. Let's finish this.
Lots of tough looking people in this table. I hope we're not forced to fight at the end or something... Just checking.
Hey... Even if you guys are used to settling your differences with violence where you come from, let's be civilized, okay? This is just a game.
Are you guys used to playing these sort of games? I get the feeling you're more used to different types of competition... More physical, is what I mean.
Keep in mind you guys will have to pay me 300.000 beli for each unauthorized look at my body... I'll keep count, trust me!
Each time I catch one of you boys looking at my body without my permission, I'll make you pay me 300.000 beli. I never forget a sum of money, so keep that in mind.

state.text: Want to know about our crew? Let's see... Luffy is our captain. He's a big goofball and I'm always hitting him for doing stupid things, but there's nobody I'd rather give my life for. I know he'll become King of the Pirates.
Want to know about our crew? Let's see... There's Zoro, he's a swordsman who uses three swords. He's freakishly strong, but if you leave him alone he's bound to get into trouble or get lost. Or both.

Want to know about our crew? Let's see... Usopp is the sniper. He's the only one who's a bigger coward than me, but in dire situations he still comes through. I also owe him for my weapon, but don't tell him that.
Want to know about our crew? Let's see... Sanji is our cook. He always annoys me because of how much of a pervert he is, but deep down he still has a good heart. And his food is amazing.
Want to know about our crew? Let's see... Chopper is the doctor. He's actually a reindeer who can turn into a human thanks to a Devil Fruit. He's not only an amazing doctor, but is also super cute.

Want to know about our crew? Let's see... Franky is the shipwright. He built our current ship, the Thousand Sunny. He has built some amazing stuff, but he also likes to create useless crap for some reason.

Want to know about our crew? Let's see... Brook is our musician. He's a living skeleton, so you'd freak out if you saw him, I know I did the first time. But he's harmless, even if he's always annoying me.
Want to know about our crew? Let's see... Jinbei is our helmsman. He's a Fish-Man, which means he's unbeatable in the water... or land, really. He's also one of the most honorable man I've met.

case.state: Three players, excellent. I'll finish this fast, and leave with the prize in my bag.
This shouldn't take long with only three of us. I have no complaints at all. It should make this game easier.
You two get ready. I'm gonna give it my all, and try to finish this fast. This will be the easiest money I've ever earned.
(Now that my secret is out, I'll have to win this game before the Marines or bounty hunters hear that I'm here. As if I didn't have enough to worry about already.)
(With everyone knowing I'm a pirate, I'm at risk for every second I spend here. If the Marines arrive, I'll be in trouble. I'm gonna have to finish this game as fast as I can.)
(This is why I didn't want to say I'm a pirate. Now everybody's looking at me weird. And of course, none of the guys know I'm here. If the Marines show up, I'm in real trouble.)
I don't trust you to play the game fair and square, ~cheater~. I'll keep my eye on you.
I wish I could simply concentrate on my cards, but there's something sleazy about ~cheater~...
Hands where I can see them, ~cheater~! Yeah, you... If I catch you cheating...
You're gonna root for me to win now that you're not playing, right ~player~? ♡
~Player~, you can now relax and cheer for me to win the game. ♡
Wish me good luck so I can win the game, ~player~!
I'm gonna win this game for you, ~player~! Just watch.

state.text: You know what? I think we could all use some confidence right now. Why don't we all say something we like about our bodies? I'll go first... I like my breasts! I wouldn't change them for anything.

It's important to love your own body... How about we all say one thing we wouldn't change about ourselves? Personally, I love my breasts. I know they're too big and sometimes get in the way, but I still like them the way they are.

I think we should all say one thing we like about our bodies, in case someone here isn't feeling confident. I like my breasts! They make me feel assertive, and I like touching them when I'm alone... Forget that last part.

case.state: I can't believe I'm naked with all those people looking back there. Once the game is over I'm going over there and I'm taking their money! As soon as I put my clothes back on...
I've never been okay with peepers, but this is ridiculous... Hey, buddy! You, back there...! Stop looking at my ass before I kick yours!
Do you guys think... there could be someone hiding inside one of these lockers? Hmmm, I'll check later. I don't wanna interrupt the game.
I swear, if there's somebody hiding inside one of these lockers I'm gonna punch them so hard that not even their mother is gonna be able to recognize them anymore.
~Leader~, you're my biggest obstacle to win this game. I'm sure your luck is gonna run out sooner than later.
You really think you can keep the lead for much longer, ~leader~? I think someone else should be the favorite for winning this game.
If someone should lose this hand, I think it's ~leader~. And it has nothing to do with the fact that you're currently winning. Nope.
I can tell you're the biggest threat in this game, ~leader~. I'll try my hardest to bring you down.
Don't get too cocky, ~leader~. I can tell you're the favorite to win the game, so I'm coming for you next.
How are your cards, ~leader~? Don't think you'll be able to keep the lead for much longer. I'll focus all my attention on you.
Now that I'm only wearing my swimsuit, I'm tempted to jump into the pool. But I have to finish the game first.
Can't wait to win this game, and then take a swim in the pool to relax.
Too bad I'm not wearing a swimsuit, the pool looks so tempting. Either way, I have to finish the game first.
Can't wait to win this game, and then take a swim in the pool to relax. I'll have to put on my swimsuit first, though.
I hope nobody pushes me into the pool. If I was wearing a swimsuit I wouldn't mind too much.
Even if this place is shady, at least the water in the pool seems clean.
I hope nobody pushes me into the pool. At least until I've taken off my jeans.
Even if this place is shady, at least the water in the pool seems clean.
Doesn't feel like it's gonna stop snowing any time soon outside. Good thing we can hang out in here, by the fire...
With the prize I wanted to treat myself, but it's Christmas... I should get something for the guys. Especially Chopper, I know how much he loves this season.
Ahhhhhh! A spider fell on my back! Oh, no. It was nothing. I hate this forest...
D-did a ghost pass behind me? Why does this forest have to be haunted? Couldn't we play in a regular forest? In daylight?
Can I get some more light over here, please? I'm having trouble seeing my cards.
Is it just me, or is it a little dark in here? How do they expect us to see our cards... or each others faces, so we know who's bluffing.
If I'd brought more clothes, I'd be feeling too hot right now. Who's the inappropriately dressed one now, huh?
I would've brought a jacket if I'd known it was gonna be so cold in here. And because it would've helped me in the game.
Why didn't I bring a jacket? I'm the one that's always supposed to pay attention to the weather. What the hell was I thinking?
Will my bounty increase because of public exposure? Gosh, I hope not. But we're playing outdoors, after all.
I wonder what the Marine's stance on public exposure is. I wouldn't want my bounty to increase because I'm naked outside. It's all because of the game, but I doubt they'd care.
It's nice we're playing at the beach. Hey! I think I can see the Thousand Sunny from here.
It's good that we're playing at the beach. If I need to escape, I'm closer to the Sunny. B-but why would I need to escape, right?
Nice we're playing at the beach. That means my attire won't look out of place. Not that I would care if it did, anyway.
Isn't this place a little too intimate for a game of Strip Poker?
Whose bedroom is this? Do we have their permission to play here?
What's with this creepy place? Am I back in Thriller Bark, or something?
Why the hell are we playing here? This looks like Thriller Bark. I'm gonna be worried about a zombie jumping on me the whole game.
With all the steam from the spring, it would be easy to cheat or escape without anyone noticing. Don't worry, I'm not gonna do it.
This hot spring seems lovely. I would love to jump in, if only this was a little more private.
Is this a men's or a women's locker room? It's disgusting, so probably the former.
This place is a mess. I bet this is a men's locker room.
This place is so luxurious! Oh, that looks expensive! And that over there...
This mansion must've cost a fortune! Look at the expensive furniture. And is that chandelier made of gold?
I bet I can guess the favorite color of whoever designed this room.
So much purple. It's making my eyes hurt.
Are those people in the back gonna be looking at my ass the whole game? Isn't there a way to get rid of them?
Couldn't we play this game in a more private place? I'm gonna be feeling those eyes on me the whole game.
This is a nice bar with a gorgeous view of the ocean. I'm tired of the ones that look more like dumpsters.
What a beautiful bar! I'd much rather enjoy the view of the sea while drinking than spend time in a poorly lit room.
It's good that we're playing outside. The weather is nice and clear, no chance of rain.
Isn't it nice to play outside? The weather is perfect today. Normal amount of wind and humidity.
The weather is stable today. It really was a good idea to play outside.
So many books! There must be at least one about cartography here. I should take a look at them later.
This is a big library. Robin would have a blast here. I might also find something of interest. I'll check it out after the game.
Looking out the window, this city is insane! All those tall buildings and lights...
Just look out that window! This city is so big. The villages in the East Blue are so insignificant in comparison.
Why do we have to play in this dirty alley? I don't like this.
Shouldn't we be playing at a fancy casino? Anywhere but this disgusting, poorly lit alley would be better really.
Look at all these weapons. Are they just for exhibition? I hope so.
An armory, huh? Zoro would probably like to take a look at that katana over there.
This isn't a real classroom, right? So we are sure there are no children around?
Whose idea was it to play in a classroom? What if a kid walks in?
This city is gorgeous! Check out that view... I wonder if it looks just as beautiful during the day. I should come back later with my crew, just for sightseeing.

Wow, look how beautiful this city looks at night! All the lights shining like stars... I'd like to see how it looks during the day, when all the stores are open. I think I see a boutique down there, a bakery, and...

state.text: Are you curious about my tattoo, ~player~? It's just something to remember the people important to me from my hometown.
I see you looking at my tattoo, ~player~. It represents a pinwheel and a tangerine. Two things that remind me of the people important to me... Oh, you weren't looking at my tattoo?
Do you want to know about my tattoo, ~player~? It's just a memento of those I owe my life to. It used to be something else, but... Well, that's a long story.

case.state: I hope none of you try to pick a fight with me now that I don't have my Clima-Tact. Even if I can't do much without it, I still can... run really fast.
Now, if a fight breaks out for whatever reason, I'll have to try to stay out of it. With my Clima-Tact I could just zap all of you until you calm down.
Even without my Clima-Tact, I wouldn't recommend trying anything with me. I have very strong friends, and they won't stand idly by if you lay a finger on me.
Don't think I'm defenseless just because I don't have my Clima-Tact anymore. I have other tricks in my arsenal, like... Ummm... Let's keep playing!
I feel a little weird without my Log Pose. I never take it off. We're always sailing after all.
What if my Log Pose gets lost? We got that one as a gift in Fishman Island. How will we ever get another one? I didn't think about that...
I don't take off the bracelet Nojiko gave me even when I take a shower, and now I did it for a stupid stripping game. What would my sister say if she knew? She'd probably just laugh.
Now that I think about it, my Log Pose had been acting a little weird since I entered this place. I wonder what that's about... Well, I don't have it on me anymore, so I'll figure it out later.
Do you have any idea how hard it is to be evenly tanned? I wear very light clothes and I'm always outside.
I don't have tan marks, right? It's not easy for me, because of the clothes I usually wear. But I don't like to take off my swimsuit when I'm sunbathing, so...
Now that I took off my top, do I have tan marks? Thankfully, I work very hard to avoid that. But enough about my breasts, let's focus on the game.

state.text: Having people from different places gathered here, I thought I'd ask... What's the most dangerous place you've ever seen? I'm the navigator of my crew, so it's my job to know where danger is so we can avoid it.

As navigator, I'm always trying to avoid guiding my crew into dangerous places. Active volcanoes, icicle rains, countries in war... Those could prove fatal in the end. Do you guys know of any places I should avoid?

What's the most dangerous place you've ever seen? I don't mean islands with rivers of magma and lighting rain, although that would be nice to know... Any place that a crew with very irresponsible people might want to avoid.

case.state: Hmmm, I don't think any of us is gonna have a lot of issues with nudity. That's better than having people here that get all shy and uncomfortable. We should have fun, right?
I think we're all happy enough with our bodies that nobody here is gonna feel all insecure about having to undress, right? Then there's no reason why we can't keep this game light-hearted.

state.text: ~Camera~, ummm... Could I ask you not to take any pictures of me? I'd rather not get photographed. It's never a good thing for a pirate to appear on the newspapers, or something.

Hey, ~camera~... It's great if you feel like taking pictures of the game, but I'd rather not appear on any of them. You know I'm a high profile pirate, and I don't want certain people to know I was here.

case.state: ~Camera~, ummm... Could I ask you not to take any pictures of me? I'd rather not get photographed because of certain reasons. Please, and thank you.
Hey, ~camera~... It's great if you feel like taking pictures of the game, but I'd rather not appear on any of them, for privacy and safety reasons. I hope you understand.
How are you hanging there, ~innocent~? Remember that nobody is forcing you to be here, okay? As soon as you feel like you want to leave, you can.
Are you doing okay, ~innocent~? If I can do anything for you, just let me know. And don't feel like you have to stay until the end for the rest of us. Nobody will complain, I promise.
Let me make one thing clear: If you see any sort of... clear physical reaction on my body, it's only because it's cold here! And that's perfectly normal.
Don't look at my nipples... It's cold here, okay? It's perfectly normal for my body to react that way in this situation.
Are you still mad at me, Shantae? I'm sorry I lied to you. I did it precisely because I didn't want people treating me this way.
Please, Shantae... Don't be mad. I really feel bad for lying, but I just didn't want anyone here to treat me differently. Including you...
Ummm... Aren't you a little too old to believe in Santa? Don't get me wrong, I love getting presents. But...
Santa...? Oh, you're being sarcastic! I'm looking forward to the presents, but nobody your age would still believe in Santa...
Ehhhh...? What treasure are you talking about? I can't remember...
Oh, please... What do you even want to do with the treasure? Spend it on stuffed animals and dolls?
Dang it... On the bright side, we didn't bet money. Okay, ask me anything.
Hmph... Fine, I did say I would answer anything. I doubt you can come up with something that would make me uncomfortable anyway.
Ugh, I was hoping maybe you'd forgotten... But you never forget, do you? Fine, give it to me.
Okay... okay. Give me your order, Robin. I'm sure it won't be anything too crazy, will it?
I don't know how to dance, Shantae. But even if I did, I'm not sure it would help me very much...
I'm not good at dancing, Shantae... That's your thing, but I couldn't really understand how it would help me in this situation.

state.text: What the hell?! ~Player~, did you sell your soul to get a hand like that one? Geez...

case.state: Now I'm convinced you're cheating, ~player~! No way you can get a hand like that with just luck.
We've had nothing but trouble with other pirates... Well, that's not true. We've also formed alliances with pirates to fight... other pirates. So my point stands.
You think so? I believe there's plenty left to imagine... I just dress the way I wanna dress. It's one of the perks of not having to follow any rules.
But I look good, don't I? People make a fuss sometimes when I dress like this, but I think they're hypocrites.There's no rule on how a girl like me should dress.

state.text: Big time. I'm sure there are pirate girls that don't care about personal image, but Robin and I do. Our room is nice and clean, isn't it? Meanwhile the boys' room looks like a pigsty.

case.state: Are you saying you don't like my fashion sense? What about you and your...? Damn, that's a nice dress, though.
What?! I put a lot of effort into my fashion, Jura. Maybe I should criticize you, and your... beautiful dress.
I'm... flattered? But that's not why I came here.
Yes... I know my breasts are big, but that's definitely not why I came here.
Heheh, I don't know about that. I probably seem wilder than I am. Usually I just avoid danger, or run away from it.
W-What? Meia, why do you talk as if you came from a different world? I know the sea is vast, and there a many unknown places, but there's no such thing as space sailing... right?
Uhhh... what? What are you talking about, Meia? It almost sounds like you're from outside this world. But sailing out there is impossible... right?

You read my mind, Senko! I'm definitely taking a bath as soon as I'm back on my ship. It's usually my favorite part of the day. I love my friends and all, but sometimes you just want some time to relax by yourself, right?
Ah... That would definitely make me happy, Senko. It's a blessing that our ship has such an amazing bathhouse. Taking a bath is my daily ritual for dealing with stress. I need my alone time.
Hey, I never agreed to race you! And isn't having to strip punishment enough already?
Pirate?! D-did I say I'm a pirate? No, I'm just a cute navigator who sails around on a little ship without a skull on the flag. Yep.
No, I don't wear a shirt because this is my style... Wait, I never said I was a pirate? Wh-where did you get that from?
Oh, how sweet! It's nice to know you have a high quality audience that can appreciate fashion, SC.
Oh yeah. And the worst part is most of the time I'm the only one who's aware of the danger we're constantly in.
D-did you say ghost? No... I have no memories of anything like that. Repressed, or otherwise.
What? Ummm, I don't... I don't know...
What?! Who said that? Spreading weird rumors about me...
I've lied, swindled, betrayed... But only bad people, though. And never nothing indecent! Until now...
Huh?! How would I know? Your chat is full of perverts!
Oh, thank you! I don't really workout, but I guess I get enough exercise swimming for fun and running away from danger.
What kind of question is that?! I'm not answering it!
What the hell are you talking about? I came here for the prize! P-R-I-Z-E! I don't know why else people usually come here... including you!
It doesn't concern my crew mates where I am as long as I'm not in danger. I can do what I want... which doesn't involve that which you just said.
Who? Zoro? Same as always... Oh, right! I guess you two did spend two years together. Can't imagine what that was like.
You're talking about Zoro, right? He's the same as always. Exercising, sleeping, drinking...
I'm not escaping... Dammit, it's too late for that now.
I can't run away anymore. Sigh... Did I get too greedy?
You... feel bad for me? Huh, I guess you're not as bad as I thought.
Even you have sympathy for me? I didn't know you were capable of that.
The treasure... No, I didn't spend it like that. I gave some of it to Lola, and the rest... Ah, I don't remember. It wasn't that much, anyway.
Hey, treasure comes and goes! Nobody knows that better than me.
Hmm? This is what I feel comfortable wearing. If it's a sexy attire, I can't help it. ♡
No, I didn't put on a shirt today. This is just what I wear, Jessie. Isn't it sexy? ♡
Why did I come here? For the prize, of course! I'm not a fan of anybody who came here for some perverted reason.
And you'll have to keep wondering!
I'm a top, of course. Why would you think I'm a bottom...? Wait, what are we talking about again?
Treasure? But I'm not a pirate... I do love treasure though, in a very non pirate way.
Seriously, Emi, I'm not a pirate. Well, I do love treasure, though. But only when I stumble upon it by accident! I don't steal it, or something...
Songs about me? I've never thought about it. I guess I wouldn't mind a nice tune about how charming and attractive I am.
You really think they'll write songs about me? I guess a song that paints a nice picture of me would be nice.
Me? Oh, I'm not a lifeguard. Although I have saved Luffy from drowning several times... But no, I'm a navigator.
Nope. I'm a navigator, not a lifeguard. But I'm an excellent swimmer, and I have saved Luffy's life multiple times after he forgets he can't swim.
Are you looking at my Clima-Tact? I see you have an eye for fine craftsmanship. Let me show you...
Oh, are you curious about my Clima-Tact? Good timing, 'cause I was thinking of removing it first. Let me tell you more...
Yes, I'm a navigator on a ship of... adventurers! A very normal ship of explorers with nothing painted on the sails. But enough about me, right?
My job? I'm a navigator... On what ship? Just a very normal ship, with a very normal crew. I'd tell you more about them, but they're so boring... Veeery boring and unremarkable.
Ahahahah... I was only trying to trick ~player~, Jessie. Oh well, it didn't work.
~Player~ was my main target, Jessie. It was worth a try, but it didn't work.
Unfortunately, it's a real possibility, Cynthia. They have this group of cells called Cipher Pol that focus on espionage... But I shouldn't talk about that. And now, I have to show my boobs...

They have spies everywhere, Cynthia. That's what they Cipher Pol for. They go undercover and then... I'm sorry, I think I should focus on stripping now. Especially since I have to show my boobs... sigh
Yeah, yeah... I know I lost. Yeesh, that laugh is annoying.
Whatever you say... Just please, stop laughing!

I wouldn't say we opposed anyone at first. We set sail so we could fulfill our dreams. But I suppose raising a pirate flag by itself means that you're opposing the world... And we've had some violent encounters with the World Government.

Well, at first we just set out to fulfill out dreams. But we learned it's impossible to do that without ruffling some feathers, and making the world our enemy. Especially after we burned down the World Government's flag.

Oh, "amazing" doesn't even begin to describe it. "Dangerous" would be a better word... Although, as the navigator, I still feel a big sense of accomplishment in getting my crew where it needs to go, no matter how unlikely.

"Amazing"? Yes. "Dangerous"? Absolutely. But no matter how many times we risk our lives, it fills me with satisfaction when we finally reach our goal. I like to think that it's thanks to my job, heheh...
What am I gonna buy...? I want to buy clothes, furniture for our ship, utensils... Everything that we need to live more comfortably.
I want to buy so many things! Clothing, furniture, equipment... What's more important is that there's nothing that my crew needs that we can't afford.
My crew...? We're a... Ummm... Merchants! Just a little merchant ship sailing from one island to another... Man, I hope we don't get attacked by pirates.
Ummm, I work on a... a merchant ship! A small, innocent merchant ship who does nothing wrong. I hope we don't run into pirates, they're the worst!
Awww, thank you, Shouko! That's very nice to hear coming from you... Well, read.
Thank you, Shouko! I do try to live honestly, and with nothing to hide. I assure you.
When I was very young, I was forced to become a pirate, and work for the man who killed my mother. Those were some tough years, until I met my current captain, who defeated him, and set me free.

I used to despise pirates, because I was forced to join the pirate crew of the man who killed my mother. I had no freedom, until that man was taken down by my current captain. Now being a pirate has a new meaning for me.
I don't know what you're talking about. Space pirates are not a thing where I'm from... And I'm 90% sure.
Space pirates?! Are you crazy? They don't really exist... Gosh, I hope they don't exist.

I guess there's no harm in talking about it now... Every member of my crew got a bounty after we attacked a Government stronghold to rescue one of us who was going to be wrongfully executed. We had good intentions, see?

Well... Our captain was the first one to get a bounty. The rest of us all got one after we invaded a Government stronghold where our friend had been taken. She was going to be killed, so it's not like we had any other choice...
Y-Yeah... It's only me and one other woman in our crew. At least we have our own room, and some level of privacy, for the most part...

Dammit... Uhhh... That's right, Cynthia. Robin and I are the only women in our crew, and I don't know that many outside of us. But at least in our crew we have a decent amount of privacy, most of the time...

A t-typical day? Uhhh... What's a typical day in the life of a merchant like? Well, checking the... goods. Making sure we're on course... This isn't very interesting, is it? Then there's no reason for me to keep talking.

Wh-What's my typical day like? Why are so interested in my boring job, Yuri? Ummm, why don't you tell me what you think my typical day is like and I'll tell you if you're right. That's a better idea, right?
"Bilgewater"? Hmmm, it doesn't ring a bell. Why would you think I've been there?
I've never heard of "Bilgewater". What kind of place is it? Somewhere I'd like to go someday?
Thank you! I'm still alive, so I can't complain. But I'm in good health and I have my good looks, so I guess I'm luckier than most.
Haha, nice try, mister! I already know all I needed to know about the prize, and that is that it exists. You don't need to try to convince that there isn't one to get me to quit.
Oh, is this one of your tricks? To convince me that there isn't a prize so I give up? Of course there is a prize! Who would even play this kind of game if there wasn't one?
A sailor...? Me? Yeah, I am! A sailor and nothing more, yeah.
Y-Yeah! I definitely love sailing. There's nothing more to it than that, I assure you.
Oh, no. This is how I dress. I sometimes wear shorts instead of jeans, though.
I wasn't wearing a shirt earlier. This is what I feel comfortable wearing. Although I'm constantly changing style, like sometimes I'll put on shorts instead of jeans.
You live in a lighthouse, Shantae? I'm sure your home must be easy to find, hahah... I'd love to visit Scuttle Town.
Oh, I didn't know you live in a lighthouse, Shantae. It'd be my pleasure to visit your town. If you love it so much, it must be a nice place.
My captain? His name's Luffy. He's the glue that brought our crew together... though he's actually rubber, hahah.
Our ship is called the Thousand Sunny. It's a great ship, sturdy and reliable. It also has a bathhouse, an aquarium, a library...
Sigh I'm clearly not too shy, but I'm definitely not thrilled about this. At least this time there's a reason for getting naked, and it's not just some stupid accident.
I'd much rather it didn't get to this, yet here we are... I always feel very comfortable wearing a bikini, but that's where the limit of my comfort regarding clothing ends.
Hey, I don't steal shampoo! I'm not that cheap. What do those things even cost? 1000 beli?
You think I steal bottles of shampoo? That would be so petty! What I do is talk tot he owner of the store and get a really good price that's almost a steal but not quite.

condition.saying: Hm, and what’s this one? A pirate? A rapscallion and ruffian, do doubt.

case.state: A pirate? Me? Hahah, you're funny... Isn't that a funny... joke. Right, everyone?
Whaaaat...? Me? I-I think you have me confused with someone else, Miko. Lots of cute, fashionable pirate girls out there.
I guess I can show you, since I'm gonna take it off anyway. This is my Clima-Tact. It's a one-of-a-kind weapon that helps me do a number of weather related tricks.
I was gonna remove this first, so I might as well show you. This is a weapon that allows me to do a variety of weather related attacks. I call it the Clima-Tact.
I'm not gonna steal from you, don't worry. Most of the time I only steal from other pirates, or people who were asking for it... In other words, those who have more money than they deserve.

Don't worry, Yuri. I like you, although I wouldn't steal from a schoolgirl even if she pissed me off. I mostly steal from other pirates that are less than good. If you're into piracy, you know that's always a risk.

It's science. Every weather phenomena: Rain, fog, tornadoes, lighting... They can all be explained through science. My Clima-Tact simply allows me to replicate them artificially, and use them in my favor.
It's all just science. Well, more like a combination of science and my knowledge about the weather. Every weather phenomena that I understand I can replicate with the help of my Clima-Tact.

That's right! I'm the navigator. I think I've done a good job so far. At least we've never gotten lost because of me, and none of my crew mates has died because we sailed into a storm, or something...
Yep, I'm the navigator of my ship. Do you have a navigator in your crew, Fina? Well, you really need one, so I hope you do.
Heheh, thank you... Sanji is the only one in my crew that comes onto me sometimes, but he never goes past being annoying. You really think I'd stand out so much? I mean, you're very cute too, Meia.

The only guy in my crew that tries to get a little too close to me is Sanji. It can get obnoxious. Do you really think I'd be popular where you're from? If there are more girls there as cute as you, I doubt I'd stand out too much.
It's the best, Meia! There's nothing like feeling the sea breeze on your skin. It's one of the reasons why I love wearing a bikini when I'm on deck.

You have no idea what you're missing, Meia. The sensation of the wind on my body while we're sailing makes me feel like I'm flying, only from the comfort of our ship's deck. When I'm wearing a bikini it feels even better.

It's hard to describe what the sea's like, especially on the Grand Line. Sometimes it's calm, and beautiful. Other times it's unrelenting, and seems to be trying its hardest to kill us... b-but I love my job.
Sailing on the Grand Line, the best way to describe the sea would be as unpredictable. So many times I've seen the softest breeze turn into a raging storm in a matter of seconds.
I'm not sure I fully get what you're saying, but I love going exploring. I only stay on the ship when the island we docked on seems way too dangerous.

I don't always stay behind. How am I gonna make sure that the treasure we find is not lost if I don't tag along? But you know, sometimes the island seems way too dangerous... and someone has to guard the ship!
You get it, Jura. I'm not just some unsophisticated fighter. I'm more like a ninja and a magician, rolled into one!
Exactly! Just because I'm trying to win a fight doesn't mean I have to lose my style. I wish you could see me fight. I'm like a mix between a magician and a samurai... I mean, a ninja.
No, I assure you I'm from this era... But why do you ask? Do women dress more modestly where you're from? Because I've met people who make a big deal about the way I dress because of that.
Oh, yeah? You're not gonna tell me to put more clothes on, right? 'Cause we're playing strip poker, so that wouldn't make sense...
Huh? Why did that thought enter your mind, Natsuki? Do you maybe... need money?
Ummm, this might be a little personal, Natsuki... But do you have money problems?
I'm not...! I haven't...! I-I'm a very decent woman. And I'm the navigator of my crew, not the entertainment!
Wh-What...?! No, I'm the navigator... as well as a very refined lady. I don't partake in those sort of activities.
Each member of my crew has their own goal. Mine is to draw the first map of the entire world! I've gotten pretty far... Well, kinda.
I guess each of my crew mates has their own goal... But our main goal is our captain's goal: To find the One Piece, the greatest treasure in the world.
That's right! I'm an excellent navigator, if I do say so myself... If I wasn't my crew would've perished a long time ago, considering we always take the most dangerous route.
I like to think I'm a great navigator, considering I've been studying for a long time. I take my job seriously because my crew is not the most dependable, so without me everyone would die.
Thank you, Meia. You know what? This really hasn't been as hard as I expected... By the way, I think you should smile more. You have a very cute smile.
Well, I don't think I'm that embarrassed now. Maybe it's easier when you think of this game as one more adventure... Heh, I like your smile, Meia. That's a good look for you.
I guess you could say that. We've certainly visited many places that were barely discovered.
I'm a navigator, but we have explored many different places around the world. Including islands with almost no traces of civilization.
It's not like there's a navigator uniform or anything. I'm a pirate, remember? One of the perks is that I can dress however I want, as I don't have to obey any prudish dress code.
As a navigator, I work on my ship. Basically it's like working at home, so if I want to wear a bikini every day there's nothing stopping me. But you know, sometimes it gets chilly...
I get that, Natsuki. When I go shopping I don't see a lot of bras in smaller sizes. Maybe they're not on high demand where I come from...
That sucks, Natsuki. But you know, maybe you don't need to wear a bra? I mean, you have the choice... unlike me.

Of course, Monika! I was hoping someone would ask me. I'm planning on getting lots of new clothes, furniture for our ship, maybe some trinkets for my crew mates... And since I'm so good at haggling, I'm sure there will be some money left.

Lots of things, Monika! Clothing, furniture, presents for all my crew mates... And whatever is left I'll add it to our savings. I'm a master of negotiation, so I always manage to get the best discounts.
I grew up on an archipelago in the East Blue called the Conomi Islands... Well, "grew up" is sort of an oversimplification. I've never heard of this "Japan" island... Can you describe it for me?
I'm from the East Blue. I've never heard of this island of "Japan". How do women dress there? They must have a unique fashion if you find my personal style so unusual.
I've been near the sea all my life, so I've never been scared of it... Well, unless you count the things that hide in the water. I can't say it's an unreasonable fear.
This is a crazy world we live in, so I don't think it's silly to be afraid of the ocean. Just because I've been sailing most of my life doesn't mean I've forgotten all the dangers that hide in it.
A thauma.. what? You could say I'm an adventurer... although I don't use magic. My weather abilities are all scientific, even if they look magical.
I don't know what a thaumaturge is, but I'm sort of an adventurer. And I use weather science as my main resource, although I've been told before it looks like magic.

That's right, Fina. Each member of my crew can hold their own in a fight, and we have a very strong ship. If we have one weakness, it's our bad luck... Well, maybe it's not that bad if we're all still alive.
Well, I'm not really the most musical person, but I do enjoy Binks' Sake... But I don't know if I can sing it now. It'd be embarrassing doing it by myself.
Do you know Binks' Sake? Even though I don't have the best voice I still join my crew when they start singing... but I wouldn't do it by myself. It's too embarrassing.
Heheh, thank you, Nadia! It feels good to finally be complimented on my outfit, instead of people raising their eyebrows in response.
Thank you! That's so sweet. I don't dress this way so that people think I'm shameful. It feels nice to have my fashion style appreciated for once.
Oh, you didn't see it...? It was, umm... 100 beli! A measly 100 beli for my head. What kind of lowly creature has such an absurd bounty? Me, that's who.
My bounty...? It's... just 100 beli! Can you believe it? It's not even worth the effort it takes to collect it. Oh, I'm the embarrassment of my crew with that ridiculous bounty! Anyway...
Hmm? Let's see... I've been sailing half my life, so ten years... {small}Wow, it's really been that long.{!reset} Granted, I've only been on my own happy adventure for the last two years.

Oh, uhhh... It's been ten years already since I first went out to sea. Although the first eight years were under quite different circumstances... I've only been happy to sail the seas after I joined my current crew.

Do you like it, Petra? It's meant to represent a pinwheel and a tangerine, both symbols from my hometown. I wanted a way of remembering the people important to me, in addition to covering a nasty scar.

I designed this tattoo myself. It's a pinwheel and a tangerine combined. I have a scar on my shoulder, so I thought there wasn't a better way of covering it than with a memento of my hometown and my loved ones.
For the good of the people who work here there better be a prize, because I'm leaving this place with more than I came with one way or the other.
Even if there isn't a prize, I'll make sure to be properly compensated... and it'll be the fault of every person who works here for not making things clear from the start.
I'm always comfortable in a bikini, but beyond that... I guess I've never had a problem being naked around other women, although the context was different from this.
Even if I'm proud of my body, I can't say I'm fully comfortable exposing it. Especially not to men, and even with women there's a difference between being naked in a bathhouse and... here.
Thaaanks, Jason... Umm, do you have trouble finding a good bikini to wear? I'm sure it wouldn't be an issue if you go shopping.
Th-Thank you, Jason. Why do you have trouble finding a bikini to wear? You should go shopping for one. If I can find one my size, it shouldn't be an issue for you.
You know, I really can't complain. For the vast majority of the time, when I'm not fearing for my life, I do get to relax and enjoy the sea.

That's me... I don't wanna say I spend most of my time in leisure, but I definitely have a chance to enjoy myself every so often. It almost makes up for all the times I'm screaming my lungs out, hoping I don't die.
It's called a Log Pose. It's basically like a compass, except instead of pointing north each of these needles points towards a different island, so we can decide our course in the Grand Line.
It's not a watch, but more like a compass. This is what we navigators use to sail through the Grand Line. It's called a Log Pose. Each of these needles points towards a different island.
Not necessarily, I'm just cautious. Maybe a little too cautious, but it'd make sense if you met my crew. Most of them have no notion of danger... especially our captain.

I was concealing my occupation as a precaution. Let's just say my crew is high profile enough to be noticed in a lot of places, and considering how careless my crew mates, and especially our captain, I do what I can to be safe.
It's probably not like you've seen in books, Fluttershy. We all became pirates in order to live freely. My crew doesn't go around hurting and robbing people, although there are pirates like that.

I'm not sure pirates in books are entirely represented very well. At least I can tell you my crew is very laid-back, almost too much in fact. But there are lots of different crews, some more dangerous than others.
Hey, I think fun and tough describe me pretty well. But the reason I'm here today is just the relax and take it easy. Just a day off in the life of a simple navigator.
Are you saying I'm the full package, Kumatora? Heheh, I'll take that as a compliment. And even though I might look tough, I'm just a humble navigator.
Okay, okay... I forgot how competitive you get when playing games, Robin.
Come on, Robin, is that the best you have? You gotta work a little harder on that smack talk.
Hey, give me a break, it's only my first loss. We'll see who's smiling in the end, Robin.
Ms. Navigator... That takes me back. Remember when you first called me by my name?
Gosh, you haven't called me Ms. Navigator in such a long time. I still remember the first time you called me by my name.
It's certainly an upgrade over the last one, what with having three destinations to choose from. And as long as you-know-who doesn't get to pick.
I can't complain. It's certainly better to have three needles that point to three different destinations instead of just one. I just have to be careful not to let him choose our course.
Y-You're gonna pay me back...? Uhh, you know, the usual rate and all... D-Dammit... Just pay me back the same amount I lent you.
Oh, ummm... D-Do you really want me to make you pay interest...? Well, with the economy and all... Sigh Just pay me back what I gave you and let's be done with it.
Don't be counting me out yet! I still have a lot of fight left in me.
You wish! Just wait and see how I recover next round.
Yeah, right... This is just a small impasse. The game is as good as won.
Are you talking about the Wano bathhouse? Yeah, that wasn't pretty... It's hard to think I could ever feel embarrassed again after something like that, but well...
Ugh, I still have nightmares about that... It was so embarrassing. It's hard to top that, at least.
Yeah, well... I guess I was still growing, as a young 18 year old girl. It's not so surprising that my chest wasn't fully developed yet.
Uhhh, thank you...? It's not so rare for my breasts to continue growing after I turned 18, I guess... But I'm happy with how I look now.
Thank you, Robin! I'm so glad you're here. I'm sure I'd be a lot less confident right now if I were playing by myself.
Ugh... I'm just annoyed. I thought I had this. I'm usually better than this when we play games, aren't I, Robin?
Hmph, if it's come to this... so be it. I do think I feel a lot braver with you here, Robin.
Uhhh, dammit... I really thought this game would be easier, but now there's nothing I can do but keep trying. I'm weirdly enjoying this too.
Hahaha, okay, "mom"...
Wow, Robin... You're really starting to sound like my mom.
Yeah, I used to love these jeans, but recently it's like... ugh, I put on some weight.
Unfortunately, they feel very tight lately. And it's not just my jeans, my top too...
You're right. I think I'll do... yawn... exactly that...
Uh-huh, I have that very present... yawn...
Grrrrr...!!! I just didn't think I'd lose this much... But I can tell you this: I'm not losing again!
It's not that I'm pissed that I lost, it's just that I prefer winning... But this is the last time this happens! I swear...
Eh...? Do I need to spend it on something? Money can be its own reward, you know? Just having it, looking at it... Feeling it between my fingers, heheh...

I don't think I've thought that far ahead. I just enjoy having the money, you know? It's such a special feeling when you have a huge amount in your hands, and you feel all fuzzy inside. You know what I mean, right?
Uhhh... I'm not really seeking attention. I just wear what I like and feel comfortable in, which happens to be this when it's not cold. It's one of the parts of living freely.

Well, you see... I decided a while back that I would live freely, no matter what. And that includes wearing what I feel like wearing, even if people look at me weird. I don't do it for attention, it's just what I'm comfortable in.
Nope, I'm going to win. And I'll do it while dressed like this, to show you how good I am at this.
Is that what it looks like? Then you're for in for a surprise, because this lady is gonna try her darndest to win.

state.text: Of course! I've found some amazing treasure at sea... Every pirate crew has their own stash of treasure, so if you fight one and win you never leave empty-handed, heheh...

Obviously! As a pira--- uhhh... t-treasure hunter I think it's great! But I'd the say the best we found was up on a sky island. The citizens there were so grateful that they let us take as much as we could carry, and then we sold it for big money!

case.state: Ahahah... I don't really take things that far, Rouge. I'm sorry, ~player~, but it's true. I simply use my charms to get what I want, which is usually information or some item. It's surprisingly easy, most of the time.

Well, you see... I never let things go that far when I'm practicing the art of seduction, Rouge. To me it's just a means to an end, and that end is usually something specific that they give me quite easily... Not that I'd go any further if they didn't.

Heheh, well... I may have one, but I don't know if I should say it... But I have a feeling you might relate, Rouge. I sometimes wonder what it'd feel like to swim in a pool full of pure, liquid gold, completely naked... Feeling it all touching my skin.

There's one fantasy I have that's like that... I imagine myself going on a treasure hunting adventure, and there's this handsome guy who's also after the treasure... And we compete with each other on multiple trials until we finally find the treasure. But instead of fighting we do it on top of it... and it's really hot.
Yes! It's a feeling like no other. Ever since I was a little girl I wanted to go sail the seas, and I'm glad I now get to do it the best possible way. Are you interested in joining a crew, Barbara?
I know, right? Of course there's no comparison between looking at the sea from a port and being on a ship surrounded by blue. Do you want to set out to sea, Barbara?
