You mean the World Government? Considering I'm a pirate, I wouldn't say we live under it, but rather against it... Everything me and my crew hates is represented by them.

You're asking me about the World Government? They represent everything my crew hates, so I wouldn't say they're "my" government, when we're clearly enemies. That's what happens when you raise a pirate flag.
For real, Estelle?! Thank you! I love you! Now I don't have to worry about losing to you... B-But, to be honest, it's not like I need the money, heheh...
Woah, Estelle! I... I'm so touched by your generosity. I love you! Heheheh... Well, I can't really say that I need the money for anything too important... But I'll still take it!
Why, thank you, Trixie! That's so nice of you to say. But I think you're the one who has a way with words. I just met you and you're already making me swoon. ♡
Awww, come on... How did you know I have a weakness for compliments, Trixie? That's very kind of you. I hope you don't say that to every girl you meet, heheh... ♡
Awww, thank you... Wait, why are you happy for me?
Uhhh, thank you, Robin... But I don't know what you're talking about.
Y-You fought a mermaid? But they're so nice. I'm friends with one, her name is Camie... What did this mermaid do to you?
I have many stories! I once fought a giant zombie. He was the size of a mountain, and I fought him! Just me... {small}and eight others.{!reset}

A caster? I guess I do fight from a distance while controlling the area around me. But the reason I dress like this is not for fighting. I just like it. If I knew I was gonna get in a confrontation I'd maybe put a shirt on.

Bikini armor? Is that a thing? I try not to fight hand to hand. I keep my enemies away while controlling the area instead. But if I knew I was gonna fight for sure, I wouldn't wear just this top. My safety is a little more important than my fashion.
So you used to be a pirate and now you're a thief...? That's funny because I used to be a thief and now... umm, I have nothing to do with pirates. And that's funny.

Well, you know... Pirates, thieves... I'm sure the line between both is very thin. For instance I used to be a thief, and now... I'm a sailor... which has nothing to do with. I forgot what I was trying to say.
Mora? Uhh, no, my bounty is in beli. I-In fact I think 66 millions in mora is like... one hundred. Something like that... very little right? Heheh...

M-My bounty is very small! I don't know mora... Except I know that 66 million beli is like... one hundred mora! Veeery little, right? You can't even buy lunch with that, right? Certainly not enough to want to collect it...

Hmmm, I never got caught during my late years as a thief working solo. And after I joined my crew, I can always count on my friends to go rescue me. Before all that, they'd always underestimate me, since I was just a little girl, so I could always escape on my wits alone.

Well... I became a thief very young, so when I got caught as I was figuring things out they wouldn't pay me a lot of attention and I could easily slip away, or they'd just hit me and let me go. After that I became better, and once I joined my crew I could always count on them.
I get that a lot. It's a symbol that represents a tangerine and a pinwheel. They're both things that remind me of my family and my hometown.

It's not obvious, but this symbol is a mix of a tangerine and a pinwheel. They're both things I associate with my loved ones, so I designed it myself as a way of remembering then, no matter how far they are.
Hey now! I'm not that desperate. I'm not saying your plan wouldn't work, but I'm just as confident in my poker skills. Also, I don't love going splitsies.
Uhhh, I don't think so, I wasn't born yesterday. Besides, even if I love money I'm not willing to compromise my integrity for it. I'd much rather get it thanks to my skills.
My, thank you for noticing! ♡. I don't go to the gym, but I do some minimal work to stay in shape. Beyond that, I suppose I'm naturally cute.
Always feels good to be admired, heheh ♡. I can't say I spend all day exercising worrying about my figure, so I guess I'm just lucky to be this cute.
Oh yeah, I guess we're at the beach... But we're also playing a strip game, so it wouldn't help me to come here wearing less clothes.
Big time. I'm sure there are pirate girls that don't care about personal image, but me and the other girl in my crew do. Our room is nice and clean... meanwhile the boys' room looks like a pigsty.
They probably would... Too bad for them! There's no way I'd play this game with any of the guys here. It's much easier with people that you know you won't see again, don't you think?
I do...? Oh, yeah. I guess you're right. Well, I like them, but I'll let you judge by yourself, heheh...
I don't have many options at this point, do I? Heh... It's not a big deal, since I like my body. But having someone as encouraging as you here certainly makes it easier, Fluttershy.
Ohhh, you got me. Yeah, why would anyone pretend to be a pirate? Actually there are pirates that make fake posters to hype themselves up, but I'd rather keep my head than have a reputation.
I know, right? It's almost like it's too crazy to be true... I won't deny that some people create fake wanted posters to intimidate others, but I'd rather keep both my anonymity and my life.
Sea witch?! That's so rude! Someone should teach you some manners, young lady.
You're calling me a witch? Why?! That's not a nice thing to say to someone you just met.
Of course, not! What would I be hiding?
I'm not the captain. Though he's pretty hopeless, so I do most of the important stuff even when he's there.
What is wrong with you? Crazy woman...
I do like to swim every so often, but just for fun. You, on the other hand, look like you take it more seriously, Misty.
Yes, I love swimming! Well, I'd take off my jeans first. I'm wearing my bikini underneath, so...
What's that supposed to mean? I'm cute and refined... I could very well be a princess.
What do you mean?! Sure, I'm not a princess... but I could've been one! I'm polite, and well dressed...
My shirt? Oh, this is how I dress. You don't like it, Pit? ♡
What do you mean I lost my shirt? This is fashion, Pit. Don't tell me you don't like my style? ♡
Heheh, I actually like that, Saki. I love tangerines. Not because of my hair, it's more of a family thing.
"Ms. Tangerine"... I like it! It might be better than "Cat Burglar"... N-Not that I'm called that!
Magic to turn into a fish? You mean a Devil Fruit? Wait, that doesn't work since you wouldn't be able to swim. What are you talking about, Akko?
Magic that turns you into a fish? It must be a Devil Fruit, but then you still wouldn't be able to swim. It would be extremely useless, Akko.
Well, I am a girl of simple tastes. Even if I seem quite sophisticated.
I'm not wearing that many accessories today 'cause I dressed casually. I'm not even wearing makeup, but I wouldn't blame you if you thought I was.
Oh, you're getting cocky, are you? Just you wait, Saki!
Are you calling me easy, Saki? Just you wait. I'm not even trying half as much as I could yet.
Being a pirate doesn't make me a bad person, Cammy.
It's not like that, Chun-Li. I'm not a criminal or anything, I promise.
What?! You're disgusting, Juri.
You'll owe me for this.
Yes, I'm a pirate... But can't you give me a chance to prove I'm not bad?
Me? Steal? Come on, I don't think it'll come to that.
Nonsense? Are you calling me a liar? Where's your proof, huh? Wait... what did I supposedly lie about?
I'm not a liar! I was being completely honest when I said... Wait, what are you even accusing me of?
Oh, lots of them. Enough that I don't need to make up any stories, at least.
I have lots of crazy stories. If I tried to come up with fake ones, they'd probably sound more believable than the truth.
Stop talking about spiders, they freak me out! Yes, I've seen all of those type of things and more. And no, they were not cute and cuddly...
Ah, enough...! I don't wanna hear about spiders! Now, or ever! But yes, I've encountered all of that...
Alright, time to take off my sandals. What's your next question, SC? Huh...?
Big time, Cynthia. Among my crew, five of us are from the East Blue. The rest are from all over the world. I guess you don't get much more diverse than that.
Interesting question, Cynthia. Yeah, my crew started in the East Blue, so five of us come from there. The rest are from all over the world.
That's a good question, Cynthia. In long journeys I focus on my work drawing maps, so I rarely get bored. Luffy, on the other hand, is a different story.
Sailing for a long time can be excruciating sometimes. But I keep myself busy with my maps. It's probably harder on Luffy, since he can't stay in one place for too long.
If pirates were the only danger we have to look out for, sailing would be easy. There are also the Marines, the Sea Kings, thunderstorms, Luffy's hunger, etc.
Not only pirates, Cynthia. There's also the Marines, the weather, unpredictable currents... ships falling from the sky. Yes, that did happen once.
Ummm, we don't really attack innocent ships out of the blue, Cynthia. We're not those kind of pirates. Sorry to disappoint you, I guess.
We're not bad pirates, Cynthia. We've even helped save a couple of nations, I'm serious.
Hmmm, I guess I'll remove my Log Pose... But that's not too much. Might as well take off this bracelet my sister gave me.
My second loss... Not a big deal, right? I still have these small trinkets I can remove.
Me? What is it?
What do you wanna say? Is it important?
What do you wanna say? I like receiving compliments, but at least show some delicacy. And you should probably start with my eyes, or something...
Oh, you remembered... If you're gonna give me a compliment again, you better start with a different part of my body. For your own sake.
I-I know... Nothing is more important to me than my friends, it's just embarrassing to say it. But they're not here, so...
You're right... But I have an easier time talking about actual treasure. It's less embarrassing.
Gah, I have no idea why I thought that would work.
Well, it was worth a shot. I guess.
I suppose I'm not as good at lying as Usopp.
Sigh... You won't even give me that, will you, ~player~?
Hmph, that didn't work...
Was I not explicit enough?
I'm not surprised that didn't work.
You don't believe me, ~player~? It's your funeral.
Do you not believe me, or do you not care, ~player~?
Oh, so that's how it's gonna be, ~player~...
(Have I lost my touch?)
(Maybe I underestimated ~player~.)
Oh, so you don't care about my misery, ~player~? You're going to hell.
You're evil, ~player~. You didn't even blink when I told you about my sad story.
Really, ~player~? How are you going to sleep tonight knowing you doomed that school to poverty. I mean, the orphanage. I mean... whatever.
Okay. I guess you didn't want that kiss after all, ~player~.
I lost? Did you not want to kiss me, ~player~?
You didn't help me, ~player~? Is a kiss not enough for you?
Oh, so you really have a death wish, ~player~. It's your funeral...
Really? Well, maybe the Straw Hat Pirates will pay you a visit in the near future, ~player~. Maybe...
Are you not scared of anything, ~player~? Even I was trembling while saying that.
I guess we'll never know what would've happened if you lost, ~player~. I hope you can live with that.
I have a feeling you don't like me, ~player~.
Really? You're not even willing to lose one little round for me, ~player~?
You rejected my offer? Despite how generous it was? Grrrr...
Seriously? Fine! I'll just win the prize, and keep it all for myself!
Do you realize how hard it was for me to make that offer? Your loss, buddy!
So you just want to leave me naked. Huh, ~player~?
(Even that didn't work? Damn it, ~player~...)
(How did that not work? Is ~player~ made of stone?)
Wow. Yeah, I was lying, but what I'd been telling the truth?
Really? Okay, that was a lie. But that's still no way to treat a lady in crisis.
I hope you knew I was lying, because if not that's a very scummy thing to do to a woman.
I know I shouldn't, but after what I just said I'm little relieved I lost. Even if I now have to show everything.
So I have to strip for the last time... (At least I won't have to let anyone touch my breasts.)
OK, I lost. By the way, ~player~? I wasn't serious about letting you touch my breasts.
Two times in a row? What the hell?
Again? I didn't even enjoy it the first time!
It hasn't even been a minute since I stripped last! Give me a break.
Have I really lost three times in a row? Why'd things have to come to this all of a sudden?
Three times in a row? What am I doing wrong?
What is happening? Why am I losing so much? I lost count already...
Why do I keep losing again and again? Is this some kind of conspiracy?
♫ Mmmhhmm, mmhhmm... ♫ I like that song! Why does it feel so familiar?
I'm not too psyched about taking off my sandals in this disgusting locker room. Just look at the floor.
We shouldn't be allowed to go barefoot in this locker room. Just look at how disgusting the floor is. What if I step on a piece of glass?
Whoa, you're really trying to make me lose the game. I doubt it'll work.
Impressive. Well, kind of. It wasn't a great hand you beat, anyway.
Huh, this is more competition than I was expecting. Still, it doesn't matter.
What?! Seriously? Ugh, if you beat this hand that must mean you're really good at this game.
I lost? But I had a pair... I mean two! I had Two pair?
Hmph. I wish this game was a little easier.
I'm not worried. Why would I be worried? Just because this hand wasn't enough?
This game is becoming a bigger pain than I expected.
Oh, crap! This pair was the only thing protecting my dignity.
Stupid cards, why did I trust you?
This stupid hand betrayed me! Just because you had better cards?
I already lost a round? I haven't even said my name! It's Nami, by the way.
Hello, I'm Nami, and... I already lost a round. What kind of a game is this?
What the hell? I lost already? Well, it's just one round.
Oh... This better not be an indication of how this game is gonna go for me.
Losing the first round... Maybe this will teach me to be more careful from now on.
Oh, I guess I'm not invincible. But close...
It seems I can't keep winning after all. Oh, well...
I haven't lost a round in... Well, it doesn't matter. I lost this one.
If I cared about silly things like pride, I would be devastated for losing that winning streak.
I lost, huh? What do we do when we lose, again? Oh, right. We strip... Sorry, it's been so long since I lost that I forgot.
Bah, I didn't want to lose again. I was fine with these clothes.
Ugh, why...? For once I thought I wouldn't lose another time.
No! Are you kidding me?! What good was it to win so many rounds if I still lost?!
I'm still ahead, but now I'll have to take off my skirt. I don't have any other option, do I?
Since I'm winning, I'm not worried. But if I lose another time, it'll be the worst.
Hmm, okay. At least I still have my skirt...
I lost? Doesn't matter, there's already a clear favorite in this game.
Me? Were you jealous that I was the only one with all her clothes on?
I lost? Okay! No sweat.
Oh well... I can recover from this no problem.
I don't see how this will make any difference, but if it makes you happy, I'll comply.
Want me to strip? No problem. I'm still winning by a landslide.
I lost? But I'm still ahead of you, heheh.
Did I lose because you guys were wishing me bad luck? Nah, I'm not superstitious.
Okay, if it gives you a little hope, I can strip again. I'm still going to win.
Yes, I win! Oh, wait... I lost. Well, it doesn't matter. I'm still winning.
Win, lose... I'm still doing better than you all.
Even if I've lost three times, I don't really feel like I'm losing,,, Probably because you guys are not doing great.
I'm still ahead, but now I'll have to take off my jeans. I don't have any other option, do I?
Since I'm winning, I'm not worried. But if I lose another time, it'll be the worst.
Hmm, okay. At least I still have my jeans...
Oh... Well, you're about to see a cute girl in a bikini. I hope you're happy.
What good is it to be winning if I still have to expose myself?
It doesn't feel like I'm winning the game...
Am I still winning the game? I'm not sure.
Dammit! Am I really winning?
Gah... What does it matter that I'm winning if I still have to show everything now?
Am I still winning? Then why the hell do I have to get naked?!
I can't be winning if I have to get fully naked...
I can't be still on the lead if I gotta take everything off! That doesn't make any sense.
Fine, I'll strip. But remember you'll owe me!
Whatever. I'm not embarrassed to be seen in my underwear. Everybody wears it.
Oh, sure. Let's all gang up on the poor, little, innocent, pirate girl. Very mature.
Oh, I lost again. But I'm still in a good position.
I lost, huh? Let's see... I still have my sandals, my skirt, and then...
I'm losing a little more than I wanted.
I wanted to win without losing once. Meh, it's no big deal.
Whatever. It's not like it hurts my pride to lose once in this game.
I guess I can afford losing once or twice with no problem.
Whatever it takes to win in the end... Well, not whatever really. But this isn't a big deal.
Okay, nothing bad with losing once or twice. I'll just make myself comfortable.
Oh, I lost... Time to get comfortable, I guess. More comfortable.
Even if I lose now, I'm still doing well. I'm not sure what you want to see of me, but you won't get it!
Second loss. I can still afford to lose... a couple more times. Yeah, I'm gonna be okay.
Oh, I lost again. But I'm still in a good position. I'm not even a little bit worried..
I lost, huh? Let's see... I still have my sandals, my jeans, and then...
I'm losing a little more than I wanted. It's not a problem, just a little bit humiliating.
Hmmm, I don't love losing... Who does? Still, I'm not gonna let my pride get in the way of a good time.
Fine, I'll strip. But remember you'll owe me!
Whatever. I'm not embarrassed to be seen in a bikini. I do it all the time.
Oh, sure. Let's all gang up on the poor, little, innocent, pirate girl. Very mature.
Alright... You got me to take off my pants. I hope you're happy.
Sigh... Crying isn't gonna help. I guess I'll just do it.
Argh, this is what I wanted to avoid the most...
Oh, for goodness' sake... Why does this game hate me?
I don't like this... I really don't like this! B-But...
You're kidding... I lost?
Ghh... No...
W-Wha... I don't wanna...
Oh, damn... This was exactly what I was trying to avoid the most!
Why do you all wear so many clothes? Even with everything I wear, I'm already losing.
I'm already losing. And it's not because I'm dressed lightly, it's you who are way overdressed.
I started this game with a clear disadvantage, didn't I?
I'm not gonna ask you to go easy on me, if that's what you want.
Sigh... Not good. I was already at a disadvantage to begin with.
If this happens a couple more times, I'm gonna start worrying.
Damn. You're not making this easy for me, are you?
You're not gonna see me sweat. I assure you I'll bounce back in no time.
I already feel as if I'm losing by a lot. I guess it can't be helped.
How much am I losing by? This sucks.
I wasn't expecting to be the worst player in this game.
I can't help but feel like this is a bit my fault. I probably should've come here dressed for winter.
Why am I doing so badly? I thought I was good at poker.
Did you all conspire against me to make me lose first? Hmph...
There's only one explanation for me losing so badly: You're all cheaters!
But... I'm always great at card games! Maybe playing only with my crew mates made me a worse player...
I really have to expose myself? I'm getting my ass kicked!
Why is this going so poorly for me? What did I do?
What is happening?! Why do I have to undress again?
This is ridiculous! I used to be a great poker player! I swear...
I'm losing everything, including my dignity. Playing this game was a bad idea.
What the hell was I thinking when I came here? Oh, right. The money...
Damn you all! Why are you so good at this?
Are you all secret poker geniuses?! Nothing makes sense anymore...
Oh...! Uhhhh... Of course San... Santa is coming! I was just confused by your question 'cause... I'm dumb.
Uhhh... Y-Yeah! Santa is coming this year, of course...! I was just joking, but my sense of humor sucks...
Seriously, forget about the treasure. You should just learn to... t-to...
It was a pretty small treasure. I don't even know why you... y-you...

My crew is constantly sailing, so I dress according to the weather of the area of the Grand Line we're sailing through. And considering how quickly the weather can change there, I'm thankful whenever wearing a bikini is an option.

We're currently sailing through the Grand Line with my crew, so I guess that's where I come from. It's still amazing to me how quickly a day there can go from scorching hot to freezing cold in a blink. Under those conditions, being able to wear a bikini is a privilege.
I'm mildly concerned that a schoolgirl would come to that conclusion... But no. This is not a vibrator!
Wh-Where did you even learn that? Not at school, I hope... Anyway, I don't carry a vibrator with me! I don't even own one...
Saw what...? That paper was nothing important! It definitely wasn't a wanted poster of me...
I came here to take all your money... I mean, the prize money. And I'm not gonna compromise my style, no matter where I go.
Hey, showing a little cleavage never killed anyone! But my whole reason for playing this game is so I can win the prize money.
Hey, I'll have you know I put a lot of thought into the way I dress. And it's not like I'm constantly going to fancy parties, so... But it's hard to say no to a makeover session...
I'm a pira... I mean, a sailor. If I was going to a gala, I wouldn't dress like this. Although I'm always open to new suggestions...
Y-You're kidding, right? I had a hard enough time believing there was an island in the sky, and now you're telling me there are people on other planets?!
Space travel?! That's unbelievable... I have seen a lot of amazing things, but all of them are in this world! Going outside would be...
I know what you mean. I lent him money a long time ago, and he never even made the effort of paying me back. And all so he could buy a sword...

I know, right! He never paid me back for that time I lent him money. And then he gets mad every time I remind him, even though it's for his own sake. I mean, the interest by now is through the roof...
Oh yeah. He has always been the same, ever since I met him. But that's most men I know, really.
Same as always. At least when I'm there, I can knock some sense into him sometimes. But he doesn't make it easy.

state.text: Very comfortable. I know that some people consider it too revealing, and others stare at me too much. But what can I do? I can't stop looking cute, right?
Not really... Most of them are weirdos. This one invisible creep once tried to force me to marry him. Can you believe that?
Don't talk about that stuff, SC! I don't like it... Wait, what the hell is a Cthulhu?
Well, shouldn't it be ⅘ for me? I'm your interviewee after all, so...
I don't know... Luffy is the one who asks the weird anatomy questions. And Camie never answered, so...
Uh... If it makes you happy, then that's perfectly fine. Dunno if I'd go that far...
The Sunny is not that small, since I have my own room. But it's kind of hard to get any privacy in the shower. And the motion does feel nice... while sleeping.
Sanji handles the food, so I don't have to worry about my diet. I'm sure he wouldn't want me to get too fat or too skinny, so I can trust him.
Treasure...? Don't think you'll get me to reply by using words that I like.

case.state: That... makes sense! Because like I said, I'm not a pirate.
Precisely! See, there's no reason why I would look like a pirate when I am not one. That's only logical.
Haha... Why are so convinced I'm a pirate? Where's your proof? Huh...?
Good one, Emi! But there isn't anything that proves I'm a pirate! And if there is... Ah, sorry. I dropped something.
Yep! My job is boring. I'm sure one day I'll retire and I'll go live on a farm, or something. Whoops... What is this?
My daily routine is incredibly dull. I just do my job and get paid with my life never being in any danger. Huh? What did I drop?

Hmmm, my crew mates deal with any enemies, so from my perspective the biggest danger comes from the weather. Lighting rain, unpredictable sea currents, fog as thick as walls. Sometimes, all at the same time.

The greatest danger I personally deal with is the weather. It's easy to get caught in the middle of a storm, surrounded by lighting and whirlpools... I leave the rest of the dangers, like sea creatures, to my crew mates.
Of course. I wouldn't spend it all on myself. That's why I'm in charge of our money. If I didn't, Luffy would spend everything throwing one big party... again.

I know! Thank you for understanding. I wish my crew mates appreciated my efforts taking care of our finances. I wouldn't want them to starve to death because Luffy spent everything throwing another party.
At least one person here has something other in her mind than looking at my breasts. That's comforting, I guess.
If you'd rather ponder the possibility of there being a spy here than looking at my naked chest, I have no complaints Cynthia.
At least one of those sounds right up my alley. Well, if Franky ever upgrades the Sunny so it can go to space, I'd be happy to travel there.
Stealing? Hmmmm... I'm a little curious to see what cool things there are in space, but Franky would have to upgrade the Sunny to a rocket, or something, before we can go there.
Well, there's the Marines. But they'll never catch us...a-asking for their help! Because we're very dependable.
There's the Marines, of course. Though I would rarely consider them a threat... to pirates! For us merchants they're heroes, heheh... And they do the best they can.
Opposing the World Government is hardly a tough call considering all the nefarious acts they've committed. That wasn't the last time we went against them, and I'm sure there will be more.
Your friends have been in danger too, Neptune? Are they gods too? I can't even imagine what could harm them...

You guys don't use beli? I didn't think about that... Maybe they'll pay us in pure gold. I'm okay with that. And if there's no prize, I'll make sure management compensates me anyway. But I hope it won't come to that.

That's a good point... Even if they don't pay us in beli, I'm willing to accept gold. But if there's no prize, I'll have a "word" with management after the game to make sure they compensate me properly.

Luffy? Well... He can be selfish, dumb, rash... but he's also very kind-hearted, incredibly reliable and the bravest man I've ever met. Uhhh, it's embarrassing talking him like this, but at least he's not here.

Luffy is... so inconsiderate, always putting the rest of us in danger without any thought. But I know he'd give his life for any of us... He's the best captain I could ask for. It's easier saying that when he's not present...
Oh, you remember that, ~marker.nickname~? Yes, I call this version the Sorcery Clima-Tact. It's so much better than the former version because...
I'm surprised you remember, ~marker.nickname~! You're very observant. Yes, this is the third version of my Clima-Tact. I call it the Sorcery Clima-Tact, and it...
I-I'm sorry, Yuri... I'll come clean. I'm not really a merchant... I lied. I'm actually a pi-... Huh...?
Sorry... I didn't mean to be rude, Yuri. Sigh I guess I'll tell you the truth. I'm not a merchant, I... Eh...?
Oh, not at all. When I was younger and I had to steal from other pirates I'd sometimes dress in a more neutral style, just because it was easy to go by unnoticed. But I much prefer girly clothes.
Absolutely. Before I joined my crew, when I was on my own, I used to dress less girly so I'd draw less attention to myself. But now I'm comfortable enough to dress the way I want.

I've heard of a pirate paradise in the Grand Line, but it's called Fullalead... Wait, what's wrong with the way I dress? I don't look like a pirate, right? I often get confused with a model, not a pirate...
I know other islands where pirates gather, but not Bilgewater... Uh, wait... D-Do you think I look like a pirate? People always think I look like a model...
Even if I'm a pirate, the worst things I've done are still pretty mild... compared to others.
I know there are really bad pirates out there. But my and I... we've never done anything too terrible. I promise.
Not magical, Shantae. This is my Clima-Tact. It's a weapon that can do a number of weather related tricks... but it's not magic.
It's purely science, Shantae. I can do a lot of weather related tricks with this weapon. I call it the Clima-Tact.

Ugh, don't get me started on that, Shantae! Some people have no taste in fashion, and only care about stopping others from dressing the way the want. It's even worse when someone has a cute, traditional outfit like yours.

That's terrible, Shantae. I've also had people make a big fuzz about the way I dress, though it doesn't happen as often in my line of work. But I'd like to have a word with whoever wants you to change your outfit!
What did I drop...? Oh no... D-Don't worry, Shantae! I got it...
Huh? What did I...? Oh...! Don't bother, Shantae! I already got it...
Oh, no. He's a normal guy, he just has rubber powers. He's very easy to get along with, actually. You just have to give him some food, and he'll like you immediately.
We have the girls' room, that I share with Robin. Luckily, she's very clean and well-organized. The boys room is a mess!
Oh, I can definitely still get embarrassed... I mean, don't you think you attract more eyes when your breasts are bigger?
I don't think that's true, Shantae. The attention is what makes you feel embarrassed, and people always look at my chest even when I'm not showing anything.
Uhhh... Do you think this is the time for that, Shantae? I'm kinda busy right now... with important stuff.
Well... I'd like to learn how to dance sometime. But do you think this is a good moment for that?
Oh... If this is your way of telling me that you like my hair, I'm flattered. But I don't steal groceries, or beauty products! That's beneath me.
Okay... If this is your way of complimenting my hair, I appreciate it. But I'm not a shoplifter! Or a thief either. That's unconfirmed.
GPS...? Y-You mean my Log Pose? No, that doesn't match... Ummm, what's GPS?
GPS...? GPS... I'm sorry, but I've never heard of that. Are you sure it's related to navigation? What is it exactly?

For us, to be pirates is an expression of freedom... A desire to go where you want, and do what you want. But the World Government would rather people weren't free. I guess this might sound a little too romantic for you, Meia.

To be pirates is the only way for us to be free in this world, and we need to be free in order to accomplish our goals. The World Government doesn't like freedom, the same way they don't like pirates.

That's right! I'm the one on my crew that specializes in attacks that cover a large area. I can take down around 50 enemies with one attack, as long as they're gathered in one place, and not very strong.
I know, right? Thanks to my Clima-Tact I'm unstoppable when I'm fighting low-ranking grunts, even in large numbers!

The best thing I ever stole... I once stole a map of the Grand Line from a certain clown. It wasn't that valuable, but thanks to that I ended up meeting my captain, so in a way it was the most important thing I ever stole.
You know, I don't think I get to keep what I've stolen very often. Most of the time I lose it, give it away, or spend it... or someone else spends it for me, without my consent.

Oh, I see... I hope they're still alive. Uhh, you should start by learning about the most common dangers you can find while sailing, and how to avoid them. You won't even be able to navigate if you're dead.

Sounds like you've faced your own share of hardships, Fina. I've never heard of an "arcwhale". Maybe we should exchange stories. It's always better to know about potential dangers before you encounter them.
I... have never met a girl who was interested in me. At least not that I know. I'm not sure how I would react.
I don't want to disagree, but I have never seen a girl looking at me with interest... But women are not as predictable as men, so maybe I just haven't noticed.
I love taking a hot bath too. While I'm comfortable wearing a bikini, I can't fully relax unless I've taken all my clothes off... which I realize is a very ironic thing to say right now.
Certainly, a hot bath is even better for relaxing. I gotta take off all my clothes if I want to fully commit to unwinding, which I can only do when I'm away from prying eyes.
Hey hey, I'm not exposing myself! This is called fashion. Maybe the people you know don't care for it, and that makes me sad for them.
Lewd?! Me?! That's no way to refer to a lady, buddy. Especially one as refined and graceful such as myself.

I-I'm sorry you have it tough, Natsuki. I also used to be very poor. But you should still value what you have. Unlike you, I never got to go to school, or have a club... And unlike you, I risk my life every day.
I know, it's hard... I also struggled with poverty. But at the end of the day, money is secondary. There are much more important things in life, and you should appreciate those.
Oh, well... You're clearly a woman of action, Meia. I, on the other hand, am nothing but a mere, innocent... Oh, excuse me. I dropped something.
Of course, it makes sense that you wouldn't shy away from danger if you can fight. But I'm not used to it, considering I'm only a harmless... Huh? Did I drop something?

Plants? Hmmm... We once visited this island on the sky, and there was this giant beanstalk. It was absolutely massive, taller than any tower I've seen. I know that very well, considering I had to help my captain climb it.

Plants... On this archipelago there were these mangrove trees all around, whose roots reached all the way to the bottom of the sea. They also produced a substance like resin that would create bubbles all over the islands.
That's right. I sometimes wish in those situations I could just grab onto a wall and scream until it's over... But I'm the one that has to take charge in the middle of a crisis, or we all die.

Exactly. Imagine the danger is coming from the sea, from the sky, from under the sea... It's terrifying, but I can't just sit down and cry. My crew relies on my navigation skills to pull through in a crisis.
That was a joke...? Well anyway, my breasts are not that big. See?
Oh, I didn't notice you were making a joke. But I don't think my breasts are too big. If you really think so, you should see some of my friends naked...

The Grand Line is by far the hardest part of the world to map. Regular compasses don't work there, so most of the time you can't even tell North from South. But it wouldn't be my dream if it was easy.

If this game gets even one player smiling more, I'd say it has been worth it. What is it about it that makes you smile, Meia? Is it the casual atmosphere, the competition, the naked players, heh...? Wait, is it?

Even if it was this game that got you smiling more, I'm just glad it's happening. What is it that did the trick for you? Do you have a fascination for card games... or for cute, naked redheads? I'm just kidding.
We're a top pira--- a top crew! We also got a doctor, a cook, a musician... {small}well, that doesn't count for much...{!reset} a shipwright, an archeologist...
Now that you mention it, our crew is definitely well structured. How many of them have a navigator, a doctor, a musician...? Even an archeologist! Uhhh, forget I said musician.

The One Piece is supposed to be the great treasure of the former Pirate King. I picture it as a mountain of jewels of unimaginable value... but I'm sure Luffy, our captain, will be happy if it's something edible.

Our competition is the entire world. The existence of the One Piece is what started the Great Age of Pirates, so almost every powerful pirate is after it. And then there's the Marines who are trying to stop us...

It's like magic, isn't it? That means I'm a... magical girl, just like you! Should I also scream magic words when I use my attacks to scare my opponents? Like... walla walla bing bang! How's that, Lux?
I know! I'm regular magician... magical girl? I don't know what you call yourselves, but I've heard you scream magic words when you attack. Maybe I should do that too... bibbidi-bobbidi-boo!

It's a big world, so it's fine not recognizing every island you hear... Well, not for me, since I'm a navigator. But I've visited other places with rich cultures... Like Wano, with all its samurai, ninjas, and geishas.

I've been all over the world and women dress differently everywhere. Personally, I like dressing this way. It's not like I need to avoid drawing attention to myself anymore, like back when I was on my own.

The best negotiation tip I can give you is to always remind the other person that you have the advantage, and their position is not great. Eventually, you'll be able to convince vendors to give you 90% discounts.

Negotiation is all about which party has the most advantageous position. Sometimes people forget that, so you have to gently, or not so gently, remind them of that... and then you ask for a 90% discount.
That's right! I'm the one in my crew that always reminds the others to take things seriously, but I still have no trouble getting into a party mood when I'm surrounded by cheerful people.
I can't argue with that. Believe or not, I'm completely different when my crew is partying than when we're in a tough spot. There's a time for everything, after all.
War machina...? No, this is all I use to manipulate the weather. I know it doesn't look like much, but it can still be scary in action.
N-Nothing that convoluted. This is my weapon for manipulating the weather. It might look just like a baton, but I can do some amazing tricks with it.
I do try my best to take care of my skin, since as a navigator I have to be always on deck. But it's easy to forget about ultraviolet rays when everyday I'm facing lightning storms, or worse.

It's part of my job to be exposed to the elements every day, so I gotta take care of my skin. Having said that, it's very easy to forget that the sun can be dangerous when I'm constantly dealing with much more pressing dangers.
Yep. That's all the evidence you need to prove my point. Besides... wait, let me pick this up.
You never know when your good luck is gonna run out, and that's a scary thought... what's this?

Oh, I'm a navigator on a... a merchant ship! Yep, a very luxurious merchant ship. We deal with precious stones of all kinds. I get to touch them everyday... And I make money out of it! Sure sounds like a dream job... d-doesn't it?

I-I'm just a humble navigator in... a merchant ship! It's a huuuge ship. I'm also in charge of the trading of precious stones. I get to handle them daily, heheh! I love my job... m-my merchant job, which is very real.

I did have a lot of practice using a staff for fighting in the past, so this is more of an upgrade on that than anything... Heh, I wonder what kind of weapon you'd use Robin. I can't picture anything.

Even I'm amazed by how easy it is to use this weapon. I don't even need to practice when it feels so natural. But what about you, Robin? Do you ever think about wielding a weapon? Not that you'd need it, of course.
I don't mind being confused with a cheerleader at all. It's the other people that get on my nerves! The ones that think I'm carrying a... you know, "adult toy". What, do they think I'm a porn star?!

Being confused with a cheerleader is sort of flattering compared to the people that think my Clima-Tact is an, umm... recreational... adult... toy. Wh-Who would carry something like that in a belt, I ask?!
Uhhh... You know, it's the weirdest thing. It just keeps slipping my mind. Oh well! If it's so important to Usopp I'm sure he'll bring it up again... unless nobody reminds him, right?
W-Well, I have actually try to pay him... repeatedly! But every time I try he just seems so busy that I don't wanna bother him. You didn't remind him, did you, Robin?
I don't blame you for forgetting. It wasn't anything special, you just came to me and said "Nami, dinner's ready". But I still remember it...
I was working on my maps, and then you came in the room and said "Nami, dinner's ready". I don't know why, but I just remember it so clearly.

I'm so exhausted of fighting with Luffy each time we pick a destination. At this point I just hope that he forgets to ask me about the Log Pose... But I do like that this model isn't shaped like a big glass bubble.

On the bright, it seems like Luffy mostly forgot about how this Log Pose works. Now I just have to be careful when I speak in front of him... Other than that, I can't complain that this model isn't a big glass bubble on my wrist.
B-But... It doesn't feel right somehow. I'm used to charging interest to the guys, but you...
I do want that money... B-But I can't charge you 300% interest! It doesn't feel right to do that to you... With the guys I never have any problem.

Well, it's like... if my body is gonna be seen by other people for a good reason, then it's whatever. At the very least I could take compensation from their wallets. But of course, that was not the case then.
I'd be much more okay with people seeing my body if it was on my terms or for a good reason, but what happened then was not okay at all! It was way past what I can stand.
O-Of course not! It was humiliating being put in that position... I know I'm sexy, but that was a little too much.
Wh-What?! No...! Being on display like that doesn't feel good, regardless of how everybody responds. Gosh, there were even some kids there, I think...
Oh, well... Now I've just embarrassed myself even more than I needed. I don't know why my mind went there...
Ah, haha... As if I couldn't make this situation any more embarrassing. I-I guess I knew I had to show them now, so I thought that's what you were talking about...
Maybe I did, but better safe than sorry... This top hasn't failed me yet, at the very least.
If it was too easy for this top to come loose I wouldn't wear it... Hmph, I think I got it.
Come on, Robin... You know I don't wanna have kids yet. I'm too young.
B-But, Robin... I've told you before that I'm not ready to have kids yet. Plus, who would I have kids with...?
Oh, yeah... Well, it's just the most practical style. It's not like I'm showing that part to everyone, so I'll just go with what makes me feel good.
I guess I got used to it. I didn't even consider it, but there's no point in trying something different. It's not like people are gonna see it... well, this being the exception.

Oh, it was just a joke... It's just that if our crew was a family, I guess you'd be the mom, Franky would be the dad... or maybe Jinbei? Brook the grandpa... And the rest of us would be the kids, heheh...

N-No, it's just one of the dumb things I think about. If our crew was a family, I think you'd be the mom. I'd be the daughter, the others would be my little brothers... I guess Brook would grandpa, since he's the oldest... Oh, and the dad would be Franky or Jinbei, one of them...

Come on, do you really think he's gonna give us food that will make our bodies more...? Actually, that does make sense. He was awfully eager to try those new recipes, now that I think about it. I'll have a word with him!

You think Sanji is cooking food that makes our bodies more... shapely? Now that I said it it doesn't sound so crazy. He was bragging a lot about how his new recipes were gonna help our bodies... Unbelievable!

Well, I got up in the middle of the night to go to the bathroom and I ran into Zoro outside... He scared the crap out of me! He wasn't even on lookout duty. It was hard to go back to sleep after that.

I got up at night to go to the bathroom and I thought I saw a strange man walking on the ship. I almost get a heart attack! But it was just Zoro wandering around... at 3 AM. I could hardly get any sleep after that scare.
You got it... Oh, but I didn't bring any money with me. I guess it doesn't matter anyway, since I'm not gonna lose. So how much are we betting?
Oh, come on, Robin. You know I can't say no to a bet. So how much are we wagering?
Something I find attractive in them...? That's too hard! Plus, it's embarrassing...
Th-That sounds too difficult... Can I just say something about their personality, or...?
I-I thought you were gonna ask me something less... I can answer that if you want, but you're gonna be disappointed. I'm not a secret pervert, or anything.
Wh-What...?! Robin... I'm not some sex maniac who goes around doing that everywhere. I don't think the answer will be that interesting...

state.text: It's huge! It's a sea that goes all around the world. But the biggest obstacle for sailing is how dangerous and unpredictable it is. Each island has its own weather, so you never know when you'll go from a sunny day to a terrible storm.

It's not just how big the Grand Line, but there also isn't a map of it... yet. So naturally you never know what you're gonna run into when you're sailing through it, like all the horrible sea monsters that roam around.

case.state: I don't mind if people find me sexy as long as they're not rude. I mean, I know I'm pretty, so it'd be odd if they didn't, heheheh...
A nice, tasteful comment about how sexy I am is always welcomed. It's when people get rude that it bothers me. I know it's a fact I have a great body, but still...

Sigh... I envy you, Fina. With Luffy things get so bad that by now, when we need a plan for something dangerous, we don't tell him anything and just assume that he's gonna ruin it and do his own thing.
It's worse than it sounds. Of course by now we know Luffy, so we can take his unpredictability into account when we need to hatch a plan. But even then he finds a way to ruin that somehow.
I see... Well, couldn't you go shopping? It's so much fun! You get to try lots of different clothes, and then you take some of them with you... Most of them, if you're like me.
Oh... But you can always go shopping, right? You can choose whatever bikini you like. And you can be sure that it'll fit you perfectly.

We've met lots of people in our travel and made lots of powerful friends who've help us with supplies, so even if we don't have a stable income we rarely lack anything. As for the bigger expenses, we rely on whatever treasure we find or steal from other pirates.

You know, we're rarely low on supplies. We've helped a lot of powerful people who always return the favor. Plus, I'm in charge of any money we make from selling whatever treasure we find or steal from other pirates, and I always make sure to get the best deal.
Oh, uhhh, sure... I-I'm obviously glad to meet him again. I wouldn't say I'm happy... I wouldn't say I'm unhappy either. I am... glad.
I-I see... I'm happy, I guess. In the same way you'd be happy to see someone you're fond of again... A little fond of, like a pet. Or, uhh, not a pet, but...
H-His... penis? I haven't thought about it that much... Well, not that much... What should I say... Do I have to look at it while saying it? I meant, him! Look at him...
Wh-What...?! I didn't think the challenge would involve touching of some kind... And my nipples are... Well, I can do it slowly, I guess.
A k-kiss...? I take it you mean on the mouth... It's true, I've never kissed a girl. It won't be weird because we're close, right? Okay... Come here, Robin.

I guess it's fair to say I have no problem undressing in front of strangers if it's for a practical reason, like when there's a serious situation and I can't allow myself to be embarrassed... Huh, maybe this is similar.

If I'm in a position in which I can't allow myself to show modesty, then I have no problem undressing even in front of strangers. There are more important things to worry about, after all. This might not be too different from that, after all.
I would teach you one, but I don't think I have a great singing voice. At least when everybody is singing my voice gets lost among all the others.
Oh, I know a few, but it'd be embarrassing to sing for you. I'm not that great at singing. I only do it when everybody else is doing it.
What's wrong? You've never been confessed to? Heeheeh, I'm just kidding! I was just touched by your generosity. People just seem so greedy these days.
Well... it's not like I'm rich, unfortunately. Besides you do seem be very well-off... and you already said you were gonna give it to me. I can assure you that money will be in the right hands!

That's right... There are islands that are outside of the influence of the World Government, such as those that are naturally isolated. But those islands rarely have any sort of law enforcement, so life isn't any easier there.

The only countries that are outside of the World Government's reach are those surrounded by natural borders. But if the Government doesn't reach them it also means that there are no Marines there, which means crime can run rampant.

I have not much sympathy for pirates, I can tell you that, but... Well, they're not all bad. I used to hate every pirate with a passion, but I've since learned that there are very different crews. Some want to rob and pillage, and others just want to live freely.

Most of them are both. You gotta be at least a little crazy to raise a pirate flag and put a target on yourself. But there's also a sense of pride in that. It's like declaring to the world that you're living on your own terms.

It was gold! It was so beautiful... Oh, Rouge, you have no idea! So shiny and pure... We later sold it so we could fix our ship. I managed to get some really good money out of it... but then we lost most of it.

Oh, it wasn't like that! We slipped out in the middle of the nigh after a big party. You see, we saved that sky island from an evil regime. I'm sure they would've given us that treasure voluntarily, but it's sometimes better to leave without making a fuzz. I'm sure you understand.
I couldn't agree more. My mom always used to tell my sister and I how important it is to be smart, which I might have taken more as being cunning... but it still stands.

Oh, you would understand why I haven't slept with any of the guys I've targeted if you took one look at them... But if one was my type? Hmm... I couldn't say. He'd have to be my dream guy. Maybe I am a bit of a romantic, after all.

Trust me, Rouge, you wouldn't want to go to bed with any of the guys I've gone after. I don't know if I'm a romantic, but I don't think I'd let any physical attraction distract me from my journey. It'd have to be something more intense.

Hey, I wasn't saying it makes sense! That's why it's a fantasy... Ugh, you ruined it. Now I can't stop picturing myself burning. It wasn't a great fantasy anyway. Can you imagine the gold getting everywhere?

Ohhh yes... The lust mixed with that rewarding feeling of finding a treasure. Our sweating bodies panting on top of a pile of gold and jewels, while he thrusts his-... Ehem, I got caught up in it. This is the first time I've shared that fantasy with anyone.
That sounds like it was nobody's fault. I hope you didn't rough each other up too badly. How does a mermaid even fight? Did she slap you with her fish tail? Did she suffocate you with her...?
You would think, but we had to break his spine in order to defeat him. Ugh, it was a major pain... I don't do well with scary things, especially when it comes to fighting them.
Ha, yeah... Sometimes I'll be counting my money long into the night, and I'm so tired that I fall asleep on my desk, which is terrible for your neck because... Wait, that's not weird, is it?

Every now and then. I just love counting my money. Sometimes I'll do it a few times to make sure the amount is correct, but then I fall asleep on top of it in my desk, which sucks because sometimes I drool a bit... But I'm sure it's not that weird.

You're not wrong. Charming people with my good looks has saved my skin more than once. But it's just as common to find myself in a battle in which my enemies swing around without caring how cute I am. It's a pity.

Charm certainly has an effect, especially if I'm face to face with a couple of enemies. But in the middle of a battlefield, people just attack indiscriminately, no matter how cute I look. It really sucks.

Ohhh, so you come from a long line of thieves... I still remember how my mom would get mad at me when I stole some trinket as a kid. Well, she wasn't that mad, but it must be nice being part of a family that specializes in that.

So the Cooper family is a family of thieves... That must be fun. My mom always reprimanded me when I stole something as a kid. Not like that stopped me, but it would've been nice to be congratulated instead.
Where is this coming from...? I guess I'm not not into girls... I mean, I'm not uninterested... Does that make sense?
Oh, why are me asking that now? You're putting me in the spot... I'd say... maybe? Yes... Maybe, yes.
You think navigation is easy, huh? We'll see if you still think that after you end up in the middle of a hailstorm of stones as big as houses.
Do you really think you have it easy traveling because you can fly? Not every danger out there comes from the sea, you know?
Who would've seen me...?! Th-That time was an accident! I don't show my body willingly...
What?! No... I'm not some kind of exhibitionist. I always wear at least a towel... It's not my fault if it sometimes falls off.
Bazonka... what? Are you talking about my breasts? But this is just a normal bikini. It's not even that revealing.
I spend two years in this sky island called Weatheria, studying their knowledge of the weather. And then I... turned it into this weapon.
Impressive, huh? I can use it to create thunder, wind, clouds... It doesn't just get longer when you squeeze it. Uhhh...
My sister Nojiko? She's the best. Despite not being related by blood, she has always supported me, even when things were at their worst. I haven't seen her in over two years...
Nojiko is my adopted sister. She was my biggest support after our mother died and before I joined my crew. I miss her, but I'm sure I'll see her again in the future.
This tattoo? It's a symbol that is meant to represent a tangerine and a pinwheel. They're both things that remind me of my hometown. I used to have a different tattoo... but that's a long story.

My tattoo is supposed to be a mix of a tangerine and a pinwheel. It's a symbol from the island I grew up in. I got this tattoo to cover a different one, but I doubt anyone here wants to hear about that.
Certainly! Cultures are very diverse in the Grand Line because of how difficult sailing from one island to another is. But I suppose we as a crew have developed our own little traditions.

Of course! The Grand Line is an ocean of diversity. The culture varies dramatically from one island to another because sailing is so difficult. But among my crew, we've developed our own little traditions, heheh...

Luffy? He only enjoys going on adventures, so when we're stuck on the ship he's hard to deal with, and will find any opportunity to cause trouble for the rest of us. It wouldn't be a big deal if he wasn't also the captain.
Oh, Luffy? He mostly cares about adventures and partying, so when we're stuck on the ship he starts getting restless. And then, he starts annoying the rest of us. Well, that's our captain...
You mean the Shichibukai? Oh no, we'd never work for the World Government. Not after all the things we've seen. I know all my friends feel the same way.
Work for the Government? Never. Not after all the atrocities we've seen them commit. It would go against everything we believe in.
I do use my cleavage as a pocket sometimes. It's just more reliable than the pockets in my pants, what can you do?
Hey, it makes sense to store your valuables in your cleavage sometimes. I just think it would be harder to lose stuff there than in my pockets.
And let me tell you another thing about pirates, Cynthia... Huh? What did I drop?
Pirates are the worst, right? They... Wait, what fell off my pocket?
Really? My Clima-Tact is sort of like a magic item. It can create clouds, rain, wind... But it's really just a scientific tool.
I can't deny my Clima-Tact seems magical when you see it in action. Manipulating the weather must seem very impressive if you don't know how it works. But it's all science.
I didn't ask you, ~marker.nickname~! Oh, crap...! I dropped it.
Nobody asked you, ~marker.nickname~! Oh, no...
Some of your what, Panty? Oh... Never mind, I just got it.
D-Don't compare my Clima-Tact to your... toys. This is a sophisticated weapon.
That would be funny... But I assure you, it's not the case.
Haha, yeah... But I don't do that. They're naturally this big.

If I had to put it in simple terms, a log pose is sort of like a compass. But just because you know which is way is north doesn't mean that you know how to get there safely, so that's where my navigational knowledge comes into play.
W-What the hell?! That's no way to talk to a lady! Wouldn't you rather see my fist up close?
What...?! Don't you know how to talk to a woman you just met? You better learn quickly, or you'll have a hard time playing this game with brain damage!
Oh... I wasn't expecting that. Of course, money is a great motivation! There's so much you can do it with it.
That's what you wanted to talk about? Well... Yeah, the money is exactly why I'm here. Isn't that a good reason?
Wh-What? Why... why do you think I'd want to steal your stuff? Are you a mind reader, by any chance? You're not, are you?
Huh...? It's very rude to assume someone you just met wants to steal from you! And why are you asking me about it? Is that sword valuable? How expensive is it? Huh?
Jack Sparrow? Never heard of him. No, the Log Pose follows the island's magnetic field. It's pure science.
No idea who Captain Jack Sparrow is. But if he's even a half-decent pirate, it makes sense that he'd also have a Log Pose.
Like this one time, a spider was crawling on my... Oops, what did I drop,,,?
O-Okay, picture the biggest, ugliest spider you can imagine. And then... Huh? What is this?
Eye candy? Uhhh... I'm used to men staring at my body, but... I'm not sure how to react now. I guess it's okay?
Isn't it? Well, it's not just a staff, it's actually... Wait, I still haven't forgiven you for calling me a liar!
Oh, you like it? Heheh, I can tell you all about what this can do... But you'd have to apologize for calling me a liar first.
Wh-Where did you learn that, Moon? Wait, why are you bringing that up now? Huh? This paper...
Pick what up? Huh...? Did I drop this...?
Oh... I do feel bad for you, Moon. Wait, what paper? This one...? Crap...
I'm not strong like my crew mates, but I needed a way to fight alongside them. That's why I asked Usopp to make a weapon for me. It's all I have in a fight.
This is far from a usual sailor gadget. It's a one of a kind weapon I designed with my weather knowledge. Oh, and I guess Usopp helped too.
What else makes me happy...? I always like getting recognition for my hard work. I'm sure my crew mates appreciate everything I do for them, but they don't say it very often... I wish they did.

Well, I always feel fuzzy inside when others recognize my work. I don't do it for recognition, but getting a pat in the back is so much better than hearing them complaint. Everything I do is for their own sake, after all.
Oh, thank you, Syrenne. I don't get that very often, even though my tattoo is always visible because of the clothes I wear.
Thank you! I sometimes think people are looking at my tattoo, but they're actually looking at... Oh, well.
You don't about Sea Kings? They're huge! Some are so big that they can even swallow a ship whole. And they're fast too. It's almost impossible to escape from them.
If you think sharks are scary, you've probably never seen a Sea King. I've seen them destroy a ship with one bite. And sometimes they appear in numbers too.
Huh? What...? Come on, Robin...
Huh...? B-But... Robin!
What...? R-Robin, don't...!

All the time. A Log Pose simply points to an island. Three in this case. one for each needle. Depending on how much the needle moves we can determine how unstable the magnetic field of that island is, but that's all we have to go with.

The Log Pose doesn't tells us where we need to go necessarily, but we can be sure that there's an island where each needle points. If the needle moves a lot, odds are that the island is more dangerous, but that's all the information we have to decide our course.
Uhhh... totally! I'm very strong and skilled with this weapon, so you better don't try anything. It's a good thing for everyone else that I don't go around looking for trouble.
Me...? Yeah, absolutely. I'm stronger than you can imagine. But I'm also very nice unless people make me mad, so consider yourselves lucky.
Is that so? You look like the kind of guy who'd ride a bike, but then you'd have to wear a helmet, and mess up your hair. Personally I'm better with water vehicles and such.
I can easily picture you on a bike, Leon. But maybe you don't like to mess up your hair, I get it. I'm a natural with water vehicles, but I don't like to brag about it too much.
Clima-Tact, Akko. I don't blame you for thinking it's magic, though. It does some pretty impressive stuff, heheh.
It's called the Clima-Tact, Akko. I'm serious, I don't know magic. It's just very advanced science.
This is my Clima-Tact, and... What did you say? Dildo?! How can you have such a filthy mind?
It's not a sex toy! It's my Clima-Tact, and it's a weapon. Why does everyone think it has other purposes?
This is not a... dildo! It's my Clima-Tact! It's a weapon that extends when I squeeze it... {small}Shut up.{!reset}
You have an interesting mind, Zone-tan. And by that, I mean filthy.
I see what you're getting at, Zone-tan... You're not particularly subtle, you know?
Huh? It's a Log Pose, I use it to decide the course of our ship through the Grand Line. It has nothing to do with "magic". It's also one of my most valuable possessions along with this bracelet.
This isn't a magical item either. It's a Log Pose. It's more like a compass with arrows that point toward different islands. This and my bracelet are extremely important.

My Log Pose? It's simple, Futaba. See these three needles? Each one points to a different island in the Grand Line. The more the needle moves, the more dangerous it is. I would show you a closer look, but I'm worried it might break.

A Log Pose is essential, but very easy to use, Futaba. These arrows point to different islands, so you just follow them. The more unstable the arrow, the more dangerous the magnetic field of that island.
You're not wrong, Akko. And they're kind of low-cut, so...
Well, of course they're tight. What's the point of wearing jeans that are loose? Although they're pretty low-cut. I worry that from behind... Umm, that doesn't matter right now.
I know pirates like those very well, trust me. But my crew is different, I promise.
A bounty placed on me by the World Government... I have friends who have dreams. And so do I.
Really, Pit? Even you? This is why I didn't want to tell anyone I'm a pirate.
Pit... You don't have to treat me any different because I'm a pirate. I assure you, the one you've known until now is the real me.
Calm down. This isn't a strip search.
I'm not a real criminal, Sayaka. Well, to the World Government I am... But I'm not dangerous, I swear!
We have to take care of our skin, Futaba. But that couldn't be farther away from my mind right now.
It's... important to take care of your skin, Futaba. I always... Sorry, I can't focus right now.
Of course I'm embarrassed! I'm a pirate, but I'm not made of stone.
Wouldn't it be weirder if i wasn't embarrassed? We pirates don't walk around naked all the time.
This is a weapon, Jessie! You must have a very filthy mind to come to that conclusion.
Are you suggesting what I think you are...? This is my weapon, Jessie! It looks nothing like one of those toys.
Not a watch, it's a Log Pose. And it was a present, which means it was free, heheh...
Oh, this? It's not a watch, it's a Log Pose. An essential device for any navigator.
Oh, you know... This and that. Mostly pissing off the World Government and the Marines.
Why am I wanted? Because my crew pissed off the World Government and the Marines. It wasn't my fault, for the most part, but I still got a bounty.
I know, you don't have to remind me. sigh
I know, I know! This was a terrible day to stick to my fashion style.
So you accuse me of stealing while talking about spiders? Talk about rude. Doubly rude.
I didn't steal my clothes! I'm not a common thief. And please, stop talking about spiders. You're making this whole experience so much worse for me.
Definitely not that, Emi...
That's an example of the kind of song I don't want them to sing about me.
Come on, Emi... The songs aren't helping.
Argh... Everyone else, please stay quiet. Don't start singing along with Emi.
A picture of me? Where...? Oh, crap.
Huh? Where is there a picture of me...? Oh, shit.
You can change your size, Akko? I cannot comprehend what kind of ability you have.
You can really change your size at will, Akko? I give up trying to figure out your ability. I don't get it.
What... is a "Wii"? It's not some sort of sexual thing, right? People sometimes think that my Clima-Tact looks like an adult toy.
I've never heard of a "Wii"... It sounds like something sexual. I hate it when people tell me my Clima-Tact looks like an adult toy.
A picture of me? Where...? Oh, crap.
What? Why would there be a picture of me here? Uh... Oh no.
Well, I wasn't going to expose my breasts the first time I lost, Pit. I was counting on never having to...
Just because you saw it first doesn't mean I have to take it off first. But I still have to take it off...
D-Definitely not! Are you crazy? This is a weapon! It's not a comb with a thick handle... or whatever people use when they don't own one of those toys.
I'll remove my sandals carefully. I don't wanna show more than... whoops.
It's hard to remove my sandals while wearing this skirt. I'll just be careful not to... Huh?
I don't want any of you to look up my skirt, so I'll be careful to... What...?
Nggh, I didn't want to lose my skirt. But there's nothing I can do if I want to win.
I only enjoy trying on different clothes. Not taking them off... in front of a bunch of people.
There's no turning back now. I'll take off my skirt.
If I'm doing this it's only because I can still win.
The worst day not to wear a bra...
I'm not embarrassed. I just... don't want to do this.
Bye bye, cute tangerine panties. I'll miss you.
I won't forgive you all for putting me in this position.
If I'm doing this because I want to win the prize, does it mean I'm stripping for money? I better don't think about it.
My Clima-Tact might not look like much, but it can do some crazy stuff. If you don't believe me, you can ask ~player~, heheh...
My Clima-Tact can do some impressive weather related tricks. You remember, ~player~? I bet it's hard to forget.
I'm taking off my Log Pose. Dang, I think it got a little damaged when we fell into the whirlpool. See, ~player~? Here on the handle... Well, it's barely noticeable.
My Log Pose it is. I can't believe I was stupid enough to let that woman steal it from me. At least I got it back intact. These are not as common as you'd think.
Give me a second, ladies. Sometimes it's hard to untie this top from the back... Actually, I could use some help right now.
Ugh, I somehow made this knot tighter... Just give me a second. Or if any of you girls wants to lend me a hand, I'd welcome it.
Dang it, this knot... Could any of you lend me a hand? I'm only asking because we're all women here, so it's okay. Anyone? ~player~?
I should've made this knot easier to untie... I could really use a hand here. ~Player~, help a girl out. please?
Sometimes I worry about wearing these bikinis that tie on the side. They come out way too easy. What do you girls think?
Woah, I really didn't tie this very well today. I barely touched it and it came loose. Good thing I didn't go swimming today.
Be honest... Do you ladies think my bikini is too skimpy? I like it, but I think some people think it's too revealing. I don't know, maybe I should just ignore them.
Ugh, just my luck... Is it too much to ask for you not to look? Just the guys... Sigh I guess it is.
I'm really not comfortable exposing my body in front of men. Couldn't you guys turn around? Hey, you already looked! Ugh...
Let me ask you girls something... Do you ever pull down your underwear when you're taking off your pants? Maybe it's just me, and my tight jeans.
Give me a second, ladies... Have these jeans shrunk since I last wore them or something? Geez...
Ugh... be patient, girls. These jeans are so tight! Sometimes I have a feeling that Sanji gives me food that makes me grow only in certain areas... But there's no way I can prove it.

At least someone here has already seen my breasts. That does feel somewhat comforting... Ugh, this top can be a mess sometimes. Could you help me, ~player~? Don't worry, everyone. I want him to help me.
I was hoping it wouldn't come down to this again. But at least now there's one person here who has already seen my boobs. Speaking of which, can you give me a hand back here, ~player~?
And... up this goes. Heh, what? I just thought you were looking forward to seeing these again, ~player~.
If I have to remove my top, I might a well enjoy this... And you too, ~player~. Did you miss these?
It's so easy showing my breasts at any time... All I have to do is pull my top up, just like this. But there's only one man I'd do this for. It's a good thing he's here right now.
I can't believe this went just like last time. I can't seem to keep my clothes on around you, ~player~.
I can't help but blame you for this, ~player~. It's like whenever you're close to me, I end up losing all my clothes one way or another.
Ready to see this again, ~player~? If I'm gonna be naked around you, you might as well keep your eyes on me as much as possible.
I'll take off my belt first. Oh, that means I also have to remove my Clima-Tact. Pretty cool how it extends, huh? I have Usopp to thank for that.
My belt and my Clima-Tact come off first. Do you like it? It's a marvel of science, it allows me to control the weather... kinda.
I'll remove my belt, which means I also have to leave my Clima-Tact. It's this thing that looks like a baton, but it's actually a weapon that allows me to do a lot of weather related tricks.
I'll start with my belt and my Clima-Tact. This is a weapon I made with the knowledge I gained in Weatheria. I guess I have Usopp to thank for the design too.
As a sign of goodwill, I'll put down my weapon. Oh yeah, this is a weapon. It's not a baton, or something.
I'm gonna put down my weapon. We're here to have fun, not to fight, right? Right? Okay...
Time to remove my belt and my weapon. I'm only wearing it because I always gotta be prepared for a fight. But I guess I can trust you not to do anything stupid.
I'll have an easier time relaxing if I take off my belt and my weapon. This is not a baton, by the way. I'm not a cheerleader, okay?
I'll remove my Log Pose. Hmm, I guess I should also remove the bracelet my sister gave me. Hmmm, I wonder how Nojiko is doing? I miss her.
I'll take off my sister's bracelet. And this contraption that looks like a watch is my Log Pose. It's kinda like a compass, but for sailing through the Grand Line.
I'll take off my sister's bracelet. And so you don't complain, I'll also remove my Log Pose. They're both incredibly important to me, so you should appreciate this.
I bet this isn't what you wanted to see in a strip poker game. Welp, I'm sorry to disappoint. Nah, I'm just kidding... I don't really care.
I'm gonna show you a part of my body nobody ever sees... My left wrist! I'm serious, I almost never take this off. Aren't you happy? Heheh...
Don't think for a second that I'm gonna make this easy for you. Nope! I'm gonna make it as long and hard as I possibly can.
I'm gonna take off my sandals and... whoops. Oh, no...
My sandals it is, then. Did something fall out of my pocket? Oh...
Time to remove my sandals. Huh? What's that...? Damn.
I don't mind being bare feet, so... What's this...? Was it in my pocket? Uhhh...
Give me a second to remove my sandals... Ugh, the pockets in these jeans. I swear... Oh, crap.
I'm just gonna... Wait, who's littering? Oh, this was in my pocket? Uh-oh...
Nggh, I didn't want to lose my pants. But there's nothing I can do if I want to win.
I only enjoy trying on different clothes. Not taking them off... in front of a bunch of people.
There's no turning back now. I don't really mind being seen in my bikini, but having to undress is kind of humiliating.
Alright, alright! I'm taking off my jeans, don't rush me. They're a little tight...
I'm gonna take off my jeans, just give me a second... I have to do it carefully. I wouldn't want to accidentally pull down my swimsuit too.
Hmmm... I thought it was tough to put these jeans on, but now they're also giving me a hard time when pulling them down. There's clearly something wrong with them.
If I'm doing this it's only because I can still win. And... Th-There, I did it.
Even if I wear a lot of bikinis, I'm not used to going topless. Ugh... There!
I'm not embarrassed. I just... don't want to do this. But I'll do it.
Wearing a bikini is the limit of how comfortable I feel showing my body. From here on, it's... not as much fun anymore.
If there were only girls here, this wouldn't bother me at all... Uhhh, there, I did it.
This is probably the worst thing I've done out of greed, but I've come so far already... O-Okay, now you've seen them.
Sigh... Why me? At least there's nobody here who knows me. Ah...!
I won't forgive you all for putting me in this position. Uhhh... Give me a second to feel ready.
If I'm doing this because I want to win the prize, does it mean I'm stripping for money? It's better if I don't think about it.
I can't believe I'm going through with this... Ah...! Oh, right. I guess I shouldn't cover.
I was right. This is way worse than showing my boobs. Ugh... I can't cover myself, right? No, of course not.
Maybe it would be easier to take this off quickly... Oh...! Wh-What am I doing? If I cover myself, I'm only making it worse.
No doubt... I'm sure you'll get all the presents you asked for... {small}you poor, poor girl.{!reset}
Well... I'm sure Santa holds you in high regards. Y-you'll get every present you want! (Forgive me... I couldn't do it.)
Dammit... You'd think I learned not to carry my poster after the first time this happened. Yeah, I'm a pirate, I have a bounty, bla bla bla...
Why does this keep happening?! Maybe I shouldn't use the back pockets in these jeans... Yeah, yeah. I'm a pirate. Let's just continue playing.
I... I'm sorry! I'll return everything I've ever stolen... With interest...!
I-I'm sorry for stealing so much... I'll give everything back, even if it takes me a hundred years...
Oh, fine...! If anyone comes after me because of this, I'm blaming you, SC! You'll have to compensate me properly.

~Player~... I love your penis. It was just like I imagined... Feeling it get hard in my hands, the throbbing while it pushed inside me... It made me feel like never letting you go... Uh, and that's all I'm gonna say!

~Player~... I love your penis. Even if it's small, it still felt so big in my hands, and in my mouth... and inside me. It helped me feel so comfortable being with you... Uh, and that's all I'm gonna say!

~Player~... I love your penis. My goodness, it's so big... I was a bit scared at first, but that also made me more excited to try it. It was amazing how it filled me completely... Uh, and that's all I'm gonna say!
Maybe I'll show you my Clima-Tact in action, Chun-Li. But you're gonna have to beat me first.
If you want me to show you what my Clima-Tact can do, you're gonna have to defeat me, Chun-Li.
Oh, you don't know... Then you can say whatever you want to me, Revy. 'Cause in a few minutes I'll be walking out of here a bit richer, and you'll be a lot more naked.
I hope you know as little about poker as you do about fashion, Revy. That way, walking out of here with the prize will be a lot easier.
Exactly! Every time we have to set sail, it takes us hours to find him because he wandered on his own! And then he's like: "Where have you guys been?"
I KNOW! You can't leave him alone for a second! Even little kids don't get lost that easily... And then it's so hard to find him...!
Oh...? He's fine, I promise. The worst he gets is a punch from me every now and then, and I make sure not to hit him too hard.
You don't have to worry about Zoro. Even if he gets badly wounded, Chopper will bring him back to full health no problem.
Oh, don't sell yourself too short, SC. You're gorgeous! Although now that you mention it, you could wear something a bit less... ugly.
That's it. Tell the people in your chat (whatever that is) that if any of them comes after me, they'll get zapped.
STOOOOP!!! You're freaking me out! If you keep talking about that stuff I won't answer your questions anymore!
Oh, I see... Maybe it's for the best.
I'm starting to question the kind of people that follow SC.
Ummm, but I'd never... And I haven't... Never mind.
But I didn't say anything useful for your question... I hope I don't get taken out of context.
I don't know about lucrative... I guess only as long as Luffy doesn't spend my hard stolen money on garbage.
Well, maybe if he... No! Enough! Interview over!
You almost sound like someone I know... who's also not a pirate, since I don't know many pirates as I'm not one myself.
Uh... great. You can be a pirate if you want, Emi. Just be aware that you'll get a bounty on your head, they won't allow you to enter certain places, and people will look at you weird all the time.
Cat's out of the bag... Yeah, this is my bounty. sigh You sound like... everyone else in my crew, Emi.
Okay, okay... I am a pirate, Emi. Are you happy now? sigh Why do I carry this thing with me?
Of course I don't have tan lines! Taking care of your skin is very important, Emi. Especially if you spend a lot of time under the sun.

The Nova? Is that your ship? Well, I've been taught not to accept rides from strangers, but I am a little curious to see what a ship that can travel through space is like, so I'd accept a tour of its interiors.

Is the Nova your ship? And it can sail through outer space? I have my own crew, so I can't just accept your offer. But if I can bring them with me, I'm sure they'd all be very interested to see what it looks like.
Oh, y-yeah! That makes sense! That's why we don't like the Marines that much, even though we have no reason to fear them. They're always inspecting our ship, ugh...
Hmmm? E-Exactly! Those Marines are always inspecting our ship, delaying our shipments... Why don't they do something useful instead? Like going after pirates...
Are you saying I'm too greedy? I-I'm not...! I never put myself or others in danger for monetary reasons... unless I know that they can take care of themselves.
W-Why...? You're starting to sound like my crew mates. I'm not a money-grubber! I'm only interested in all the wonderful things I'll buy after I win the prize.
That's right. Though it's not just my work that is indispensable. Our shipwright has built an amazing ship, we have the best helmsman. And everyone always helps in times of crisis.
