Heheh, well it's not just me... We have a very strong and dependable crew, not to mention that the Sunny is built to be really sturdy and resist a lot more than just any ship.
That sounds about right. I wasn't trying to fall into the big sister role, but I guess it's easy when everyone around you acts like children.
You have a little brother, Shouko? I was the younger sister in my family, but now I'm sort of the big sister of my crew. Either way, you gotta accept the role you're given in your family.
I hate you.
Mmmmph... {small}Maybe I'll use it on you later. Let's see if you're interested then...{!reset}
Why would I want to fly...? Wait, you're not taller than me! It just seems that way because you're floating.
Taller than me? Why don't you put your feet on the ground, and then we'll see who's really taller?
I forgot I was carrying this. I guess it helps in case you don't believe me. I'm a pirate... Ignore the bounty amount, that's an exaggeration.
Oh, well... I suppose it's better to show you than tell you. I'm actually a pirate with a bounty on my head. An absurdly high bounty for someone like me, mind you.
Heheheh, thank you, Neptune! Having a goddess wish for our victory might just be exactly what we need to win in the end.
Powerful enough to want to mess with literal gods... Should I also watch out for these people?
Of course! Depending on how it goes, we might need someone to call an ambulance. I'm not a monster, after all.
Be my guest. Just make sure to stand at a safe distance. Especially if you're carrying anything that might catch on fire.
Yeah, I'm a pirate... But I'm not like the pirates you know Shantae, I swear.
I'm sorry, Shantae... I didn't mean to lie to you, it was only for my own protection. For what it's worth, I'm not a bad pirate...
True, if I was a pirate this weapon would be very dangerous. Thankfully I'm just a simple sailor, Shantae.
You don't have to worry, Shantae. There's only one Clima-Tact in the world, and I'll never sell, or anything. I wouldn't want you to get wet... umm...
Then we're good? Oh, thank goodness! I'm hoping we can be friends, Shantae.
Oh, thank you, Shantae! There's nothing else I've lied about, I assure you. I like that we're back to being friends.
Awww, I'd love that, Shantae! I wore an outfit very much like yours once, and it was the cutest. But then it was trashed during a fight.
That'd be great, Shantae! Do you really think I can pull it off? Maybe we should do an impromptu fashion show... I wear your clothes, and you wear mine.
He likes meat a lot. Wait, that's actually an understatement... He'll devour all the meat that's in front of him. Though in reality, he'll eat almost everything that can be eaten.
Robin is a great roommate. We sometimes talk at night while we're falling asleep. In the morning she gets up before me, and she'll cover me with my bed sheets, since I'm kind of a messy sleeper.
Hey, that's not true! I know lots of pirates with small boobs. Like... ummm... Never mind.
That's not true, Shantae. I'm sure I've met a lot of pirate girls with small boobs... Just let me think for a second.
This is clearly very important to you, huh? Well... I guess I could take a lesson from you. But does it have to be now? It doesn't seem like you'd give me a choice.
You're so pushy, Shantae... But if it's important to you that I know how to dance, you can teach me. Though I'd prefer it if I could have my clothes on... No...?
Hey, don't worry! It was an honest mistake. I'm sure some of those pirates are also fashionable and cute like me, heheh... heh.
You don't need to apologize, Lux! And thank you for your compliment. I wasn't fishing for it, but it's always nice to hear.

You're right. I think we both show how much we care about each other with actions rather than words. Him by letting me wear his hat, me by punching him when he's about to jump head first into danger...
I can't argue with that. I just wish he was only trouble for others. Eating our entire food reserve, pushing us into danger, spending our all our money on one party... It can get very stressful.
Is that for real? Who invented that? Dr. Vegapunk? If that GPS does exist, I should get my hands on it. Otherwise, I wouldn't be doing my job as a navigator to the fullest.
That... sounds like a real thing! But it's unbelievable... Did Dr. Vegapunk create that? I should steal that GPS so I can use it for my crew. It could save our lives if it makes my job easier.
Stop talking to my hair about condiments! Or any kind of food!
Hey! Stop talking to my hair like it's a person! I've never said this before, but my eyes are down here.
It really doesn't sound like your government is much better than mine. And yet they're the ones that label us as criminals...
The only conclusion I can draw from this is that no matter where you are, the government sucks.
Oh, that's okay. I wouldn't want to get between you and your girlfriend. But trust me when I say there's nothing wrong with my fashion sense, at least where I'm from.
I understand. I wouldn't really blame your girlfriend for getting jealous if she saw you with a cute girl like me. It's okay, I'm sure there's nothing new I can learn about fashion.
I know, right? I'm like a magician... I can do cool spells and stuff... Magic power! Is that something that magicians say?
Heheh, you're right. I'm basically a mage... magician...? Which are the ones that do spells, and stuff? Either way, I'm like one of those.
Hmm... Regardless of how your ship is built, you also need a good shipwright aboard your crew. Someone who can perform the proper maintenance. That was something we learned the hard way.
I'll gladly tell you about our adventures, maybe over a few drinks? Though it would probably take at least a day. It's been a long journey so far.
F-Flying... creatures? Are you telling me we also have to watch out for flying creatures out there? I'm gonna be honest, Fina, I don't like that one bit...
Natsuki, don't be sad... I'm sure you'll have the life you've always... Wait, did you say porn star?
I'm sure things will improve for you, Natsuki. Give it time. And if they don't... Well, you can always become a pirate, heheh.
Well, yeah... If you're a boring military guy, you don't gotta worry about what to wear. But luckily, I'm free to wear whatever I want!
You listen here, mister...! I'm a grown-ass woman. I can flaunt my body as much I want, and that doesn't make me lewd... Also, I'm not flaunting my body!
Absolutely! I can't imagine where I'd be right now if it wasn't for that... but I know I wouldn't be as happy.
It is quite poetic, isn't it? You never know what small event might change your whole life for the better. All you can do is take a chance when you get it.

You don't know Luffy, our captain... One time I had this money saved so I could buy new furniture for our ship, and he spent it all throwing one party and inviting a whole town. It was so much money...
I know, right? My crew mates know that I'm in charge of our money, so they should respect that and keep their hands off it! Sorry, I just use any opportunity I have to express my frustration...
I don't think it's weird. Why wouldn't you like women? They're beautiful, it's so much easier to relate to them, they understand your needs, their bodies are... Uhhh, ehem...
I don't really find it unusual, Meia. In fact, I do like women... W-Well, I'm not sure if in the same way you mean... But also not not in the same way... Umm, I guess I'm just confused.

Oh, I definitely don't have a problem being naked around other women. I've bathed with my friends before, but definitely not the guys. I guess for you there's no much difference, if you're not used to men...
I have no issues with women seeing me naked, but with guys... it's different. If I was in your all-female crew, I could walk around naked, hahah... b-but I wouldn't.

I don't know if this counts, but in Weatheria, where I studied, they created the Weather Balls... They're like bubbles that hold different forms of weather inside, except they can be grown like plants. I implemented them in my Clima-Tact.

If you're really interested in plants you should talk to Usopp, one of my crew mates. He spent two years on an island with crazy plants that grow from these seeds called Pop Greens. Some can grow to be the size of a building in seconds.
RV...? RV... Well, no matter what kind of vehicle it is, be safe out there. You never know what kind of danger can cross your way.
I don't know what kind of vehicle an RV is... Does it have wheels or sails? Anyway, navigating safely is always important.

At least you can always rely on the Log Pose. I still remember when I first saw that the needle was pointing up, as if there was an island in the sky. At first I thought it was crazy, but... you know better than me that it's not.

That's where this little device, the Log Pose, comes in. It records the location of the nearest islands, so even if you lose your sense of direction at least you can know where land is. Now knowing how to avoid danger is a different business...
I'm not yet done... There's also Cipher Pol, which are government agencies... Bounty hunters, tyrannical leaders we always seem to get involved with... Did I already mention the Sea Kings too?
That... would be more than a little disappointing. Oh, unless it's a tree that grows fruit made of pure gold as big as my head! Well, we can only dream...
I'm used to hearing compliments, but not when I'm fully naked... I have a strong urge to cover myself right now, b-but I won't...
I hear compliments all the time, but they hit me extra hard when I'm naked... Even though I'm completely exposed I feel more compelled to cover my face, so you don't see how much I'm blushing...
I see... I do have names for my attacks, but maybe I should put more thought into them. Something like... Shining... Lighting... Bolt! Or something completely different. I'll keep thinking.
Oh, interesting. I always call my attacks according to what they do. I've never though about giving them names with more zing and pep. Like... Thunderbolt of... Awesome! I-Is that good?
You should try it, Taka! Traveling the world is amazing. Sure, you see lots of scary and horrifying things, but the good far outweighs the bad.
Woah, relax... Maybe that's another name for it? If you're so protective of your own culture, you probably are from Wano... Japan... whatever.

For starters, yes. After that it doesn't hurt to remind them that their sales haven't been great, that their store's located in an unfortunate location, that their competitors have the advantage... Whatever works for you.

Oh, sweet Monika, that's just the beginning. After you've shown them that you have the advantage, you have to remind them that they're losing. Just remember to exercise restraint. If they start crying you've gone too far.
Good to know that it's not just me. A part of me doesn't like it when people think I'm not cool just because I take my responsibilities seriously.
She sounds like my kind of person. Normally I don't mind people thinking that I'm a party pooper, but it still bothers me sometimes.
Oh, sorry. I didn't mean to freak you out. For what it's worth, I don't think it's silly to be scared of the sea. But unless you're a sailor or a pirate, there's nothing forcing you to confront it.
Ah, it wasn't my intention to scare you even more, sorry about that. But hey, you don't have to go out to swim if you don't want to face the sea. It just means you won't become a sailor or a pirate.
Hahahaha... Wait, was that a joke? Robin...?
Mmmm, I can't really tell if you're serious or not...
I can repay him in some other way. I just wish it wasn't with money... Oh, I know! I'll let Usopp pick our destination next time. As long as I approve, of course.
Hey, maybe I don't owe him anything... I'm sure Usopp never paid me for lending him money before. And considering the usual interest, maybe he owes me! I should check my records.
Exactly...! Wait, what...?
Uhhh, Robin, how do you know so much about...? N-Not that it's my business... Let's just move on.
Heheheh...
It wouldn't be the same without you.
Ugh, it was the worst! Those things were so fragile. I knew I had to be careful every time I was next to one of our more careless friends.
Yes! It was on my mind all the time that I had to be careful. Imagine being caught up in a fight while wearing one of those things... Thank goodness I'm not a close quarters fighter.
I'm not a pawn shop, but... Okay, you got a deal! Now I wonder how much money I can get if I sell them...
Deal! You knew I love them, didn't you? Hmmm, I still can't help but wonder what their current monetary value is though...
Well... The jury's still out on you, ~player~. Just don't do anything, or say anything weird, or stare too much, and you might leave here with your wallet intact.
Hey, I still got my eye on you, ~player~... But if you behave and don't do anything to annoy me, I guess I'll let you off the hook.
Ahaha... That's kinda funny. Maybe you're right. Taking it with humor might not make it a good memory, but at least it might not keep me awake at night anymore.
Okay, that was funny... You know what? You're right, I'll just take it with humor. Even if it was a serious situation at the time, at least things ended up okay.
I really appreciate the sentiment, Robin... Wait, are you still talking about the same type of growth, or...?
Th-Thank you... I'm also very happy that you've noticed how much I've... grown...
I remember! I still use that same knot you taught me. It's the only way I can feel safe that I'll have enough support, heheh...
Heheh, I wasn't sure if you remembered that, Robin. I still use what you taught me. Thanks to that I don't have to worry, and I can be sure that I'll have good support.
Well... yeah. That would be the cutest. It's just... you know... not yet.
A c-couple...? Well, yes... I can't say I wouldn't want that. But, umm... I'm not ready to be a mom yet... or even find a partner.
Hey now, I didn't have that much hair... only as much as you'd have after 18 years of not shaving.
That's not true! I wasn't that hairy... I-I don't know why we're talking about this now.
But it really makes you think how many people that behave like children we have in our crew, doesn't it? Not counting me, of course.
I'm glad you liked the idea. That's just the dumb stuff I think about while I'm falling asleep at night.
Hmmm, I do like the way I look recently... But if I have to buy new clothes because of it, I'll make Sanji pay for them!
You think so? I have noticed I look sexier recently, but I thought it was those new bath salts I've been using... Maybe you're right.
Then he spends the entire day falling asleep every 5 minutes! Seriously... Maybe I should just knock him out so he stays the entire night sleeping.
He only endures that schedule because he takes like twenty naps a day! It's impossible to have a conversation with him when he falls asleep before I can finish a sentence.
Awww, no money...? A question you say? Well, I don't think I have any secrets from you, so let's do it... I hope I don't regret this.
Meh, not betting money isn't as much fun... But fine, let's do it. I don't think there's anything you don't know about me anyway... at least I think so.

Ugh, fine... I guess, um... Luffy has gotten surprisingly muscular recently. I didn't realize when he went from being skinny to having very nice pecs... I-I mean, it's easy to notice when he's shirtless all the time.
Alright, alright... If I have to say something, I guess... Sanji has the best skin of any man I've seen. I noticed when I was in his body... He also smells surprisingly nice for smoking so much.

Okay, just let me think... I suppose I can say that Usopp has a... uhhh, nice backside. I mean, I notice it sometimes when he's leaning forward, working on his tools. I'm sure you've noticed too, right?

Okay...! Th-The weirdest place... Remember when we went to Skypeia and we had that party around the bonfire? Well, I took a moment to go into the woods and... do it. I don't know why, I was just in the mood.

I'll answer... I don't know if it was the weirdest place, but when we reunited and we where descending underwater towards Fishman Island, I took my first bath in the Sunny in two years, and one of the first things I did was... that. I-I guess It felt nice to be back... Happy?
Ugh, yeah... Just me and all that money. And all I can do all day is count it over and over... and over again. Ahhh... What were we talking about?
It's not that bad. Isn't it great to have a bunch of money just for the sake of it..?. Admiring it and contemplating every possibility? Uhh, I'm not a hoarder though.
Oh, that would be my crew mate, Usopp. I'll make sure to pass your compliments to him. I'm sure he'll love them... maybe a little too much.
My crew mate, Usopp, designed this version of my weapon for me. I'll pass your words onto him. I just hope his head doesn't explode from how big it's gonna get.
Oh, thank you, heheh... Wait, you didn't say you like them, only that they're big. Well, I take it as a compliment.
Yeah... They're pretty big. But I wouldn't want them any other way. They remind me how much I've grown... in more ways than one.
Ahh, la la la la la...! F-Funny story, Robin! Now... How about we focus on the game right now?
Ahhh, hahahaha...! Th-That's great, Robin... Now, what were we doing? Oh right, we're playing a game. We should focus on that, shouldn't we?
Mmmgh... Ah... Th-This was a bad idea... It feels too... Ah, c-can I stop now? That should be enough, right...?
{nami}Mmmgh...? Mmmmm...{!reset}
It's exciting facing the unknown! Like a treasure chest... You never know what you're gonna find inside, but you hope it's valuable.
I do love a good adventure! Especially one that yields a lot of rewards, and includes very little danger.

I guess I might've been too harsh on him... Luffy is the best captain I could have. He cares about every one of us, he's great under pressure, and he's insanely strong. The things he's bad at is what we help with.

I did make him sound like a nuisance, didn't I? No, Luffy is the best captain i could ask for. He's the strongest man I know in every sense of the word. That's why we usually win, even when our plans fail.
I wouldn't recommend to anyone else that they live this life, but I love it. I'm sure I couldn't spend too much time cooped up in the same place for very long.
I need to be traveling constantly to feel like I'm living, so I can't deny that this is the perfect life for me. But of course that doesn't mean it'd work for anyone.
Oh, I'm plenty proud. Not too much, because I don't wanna come across as vain... But I know what I have.
Why, thank you, Shouko. I'm certainly happy with my body... I wouldn't change an inch.
Hmmm, I don't think I could live in a place that's mostly dry land. I love sailing too much. The sea breeze on my skin, the swaying of the waves... Ah, it's the best.

There's another reason why I wear a bikini, but it's not something I'm proud of... You see, a lot of my crew mates drown easily and someone has to go rescue them. It's the burden some of us must bear.
Maybe I will someday... It's not like it's dancing. Now that would be embarrassing.
Yeah... My crew mates do a lot of goofy stuff all the time. Singing isn't silly at all by comparison. But there's no way I'm dancing!
Why would I be embarrassed? 'Cause I'm not... That doesn't mean I look forward to people seeing me like this, but I'm proud of my body.
What are you talking about, ~marker.nickname~? I know I'm attractive, there's nothing wrong with that.
I... I wasn't embarrassed until you called my body erotic...
C-Couldn't you think of a word to describe my body other than erotic?
Vacuo? I've never been there. And I'm not a bad pirate! My bounty is only 60 millions, see? Although it's still a lot...
I better leave my Clima-Tact all the way over there... As far away from Panty as possible.
Panty... Please, stay away from my Clima-Tact.
Slip up? Wh-What are you talking about? I was just telling you how my very non-suggestive weapon works... Shut up, ~player~.
I know, I learned a lot! And I kinda miss those silly old men that taught me everything they know about the weather.
I'm sure I'll see Nojiko, Mr. Genzo, and everyone from my hometown again... After I've seen and drawn the entire world.
I know. I'm looking forward to the day I see everyone from my hometown once again. But before that, I have a lot of work to do. And a big world to explore so I can draw my map.
Huh, I guess it does look a bit like a musical note. It'd be very unusual if it was the same symbol, since I came up with it myself. But stranger things have happened...
The way I see it, just like this tattoo covers a painful past, you can only replace painful memories with positive ones. Uhhh... Did that sound pretentious? Sorry.
It's impossible... To think that the World Government would develop something like space travel in secret... They don't even have flying ships! As far as I know...
So it's true? The World Government really has developed space travel? How far into the future has their technology progressed?! I'm freaking out...
Hey, they're not that big. I mean, maybe compared to... other girls. No one in particular, just other girls in general.
Oh, my Clima-Tact? It's just a weapon, it doesn't have a deeper meaning, or anything. It was developed by one my crew mates, so I guess it is special in some way.
My Clima-Tact? I just see it as an instrument. It isn't a special artifact, or anything. Well, it is special, but only as a weapon.
Ugh... Sorry for lying, Cynthia. But you can't blame me, right? Look at this ridiculous bounty on my head.
Yeeeah... I'm a pirate. I guess I hid it pretty well if Cynthia didn't figure it out. If only I wasn't carrying this stupid poster...

A Log Pose is like a compass, except that instead of pointing north, these little arrows point to different islands. The more the arrow shakes, the more dangerous that island usually is. And of course, that where our captain always wants to go.

The Log Pose's arrows point towards different islands. Depending on how unstable the arrow is, you can determine how unstable the magnetism of that island is, and therefore how dangerous. And that's where we usually go.
Honestly, it was a little more complicated than that. We attacked those Marines, and then we defeated a Warlord, then we invaded a government stronghold, and then...
Let's see... First we attacked those Marines, then we defeated Crocodile, then we destroyed Enies Lobby... But we had good reasons for all of that!
Well, I don't think ~player~ would seriously try to steal my Log Pose. Right? Hmmm...
I think I can trust ~player~ not to try to steal my Log Pose. Am I wrong? Well, am I...?
There's too much to talk about, but the World Government is responsible for kidnapping, slavery, genoci... Oh, I probably shouldn't talk about this here. Someone might be listening.

Where do I begin? The World Government has committed so many crimes, like kidnapping people, slavery, murdering entire... Wait, we shouldn't talk about this right now. You never know who might be listening.
Y-Yeah, I'm a pirate... Please, don't look at me like that, Neptune. It's not as bad as it sounds, I promise.
My captain has a 1.5 billion bounty! Compared to him, I'm just a small fry. See? It's not that bad...
Hmmm, yeah. I can do all of that stuff you mentioned and so much more, Ayano! Very impressive, right? I wish I could give you a demonstration, but you'll have to take my word for it... for now.
A mother...? Me...? But I'm so young... Oh, you mean because of the size of my... Geez.
Become a mother? I-I do like kids, but I'm a little young for... Wait, are you just saying that because of the size of my breasts? Great, now I've embarrassed myself in more ways than one.
W-Wait a second, Faye! How do we know this is really me? Someone put this poster in my pocket of this woman who looks like me... and is named Nami... and is wanted for 66 million beli... Uh...
Whatever you have to say to me, it better not be about another part of my body. Or I'll zap you!
You better think very carefully before you speak again. The only reason I'm not zapping you is because you didn't say anything bad...
Yeah, we all have valuable items that we would miss dearly if they got lost. That's why it's a good thing that there isn't a thief among us, heheh...
Okay, okay... I don't go for weapons, anyway. Jewelry is more appealing to me... Hahaha, that was a joke! Wh-Why aren't you laughing?

Is there any way to cut the power on this thing?
For a moment I forgot this thing was here. And I was happy...
I was expecting to find at least one guy who's here only to look at naked girls... But how fun is it gonna be when you're the one who's blushing?
I bet pervy guys who want to look at girls are not uncommon in this place. I'm gonna enjoy it when you're the one who ends up naked and embarrassed.
H-Hey,,, (This guy isn't just weird... He's WEIRD.)
I see you pay a lot of attention to your hair. You clearly care a lot that it's looking good... so I guess it's fortunate that you can't see it from behind.

Your hair looks great. I bet you spend a good amount of time making sure it has that extra glow. What does it matter if it's a mess on the back? I won't say anything, so you don't have to worry about me.
You're so arrogant and stubborn... Is there anyone who can put up with that attitude of yours? Somehow, I doubt there's a Mrs. Twisted Fate...
You know, Fate, if you keep this cocky attitude of yours it'll be hard for you to find people who can tolerate you. I'd be willing to bet you're single.
Forgive me if I seem rude, but I haven't had many good encounters with scientists. I'm trying to figure out if you're good crazy, or bad crazy...

One thing I've gained from my travels is to have a reasonable distrust for scientists. I don't know if you're crazy in a good way or a bad way. No offense, but all the scientists I've met are crazy, so...
What a sweet-looking boy! You don't need to be so shy around me. I'm not gonna do anything to hurt you.
Such a polite boy. Are you not used to being around a lot of people? You have nothing to fear from me.
That look in your eyes... I've seen it before. I actually see it every day in my captain's eyes. You're hungry, aren't you?
Being around my captain has given me a sixth sense for telling when people are hungry. You can call it survival instinct... Either way, I get the feeling you're hungry right now.
You know... Just because you're a swindler, a liar and a cheater that's no reason for me not to recognize that you have a good body. What's your workout? Do you like to swim, maybe?
I'll admit you have a nice body, Fate... {small}for a fraud.{!reset} I'm sure you have a strict workout, right? Do you like to swim, by any chance?
I know we just met, but... If you aren't eating well, you could come have dinner with my crew later. I know our cook is always willing to feed anyone who's hungry.

If all you have to eat are those Yakisoba-pan, maybe you should come have dinner with my crew for a proper meal. I'm sure our cook will be happy to feed another starving person, even if he doesn't always show it.
Heh, you're so cute! ♡ There's no need to be nervous here. If anybody makes you uncomfortable, I'll make them shut up right away.
A guy as cute as you has no reason to be shy around me. ♡ But if anyone else here says the wrong thing you can tell me and I'll handle it for you.
Heeeey, Leon... So you work for the government, right? That's sooo cool! ♡ Nothing makes me swoon like hearing about an actions man's adventures. What have you worked on?
Leoooon...! I can't believe you're a real government agent! I always dreamed of meeting one in person... Heeheeh, I'm sure you've done a lot of very important work. I'd love to hear about it. ♡
I've never heard of someone that works directly for the government that wasn't a bad person. What do you enjoy the most about your job? Is it the killing or the money?

I still don't buy that you're not actually a bad guy... Everyone who works directly for the government is terrible. I'm sure what you enjoy the most about your job is getting the chance to take advantage of your powerful position.
Since it sounds like you have anything but a normal life, I take it you don't have an easy time dedicating yourself to have a family, right? Or a girlfriend?
I take it your job takes precedence over your personal life, am I wrong? Must be tough to have family in that case, or even a girlfriend.
You remind me a bit of my captain... You have this same unrelenting determination that defies all logic and would normally be dumb, but is kind of inspiring. Weird, right?
There's something about you that reminds me of my captain... It's probably that crazy willpower that doesn't make any sense, but is still admirable. Almost seems like you're glowing at times.
You sure love this UNO game, huh? But if it's so good, how come I've never heard of it? Sure, I'm not the most educated gal on board games, but I know Solitaire...
This UNO game must be really good if you love it so much. But I've never heard of it, how do you explain that? Is it kinda like Solitaire? I do know that one.
A thief mink, huh? It's a little surprising to meet one given how generous they are as a race... You must be a bad boy, huh?
I never met a mink who works a thief before. They gave me lots of free stuff, so I didn't think they'd be interested in wealth... Are you maybe natural born rebel? We'll find out...
So what kind of thief would you say you are, Sly? Do you enjoy the thrill of stealing more than the reward, or...?
What would you say is your motivation for being a thief, Sly? Are you in it for the thrill, for the treasure, or out of need?
I need something to distract myself from looking down there... Oh, I know! What's the most valuable treasure you've ever stolen, Sly?

I doubt you considered it'd be awkward for us to look at you when you decided to take off your pants first... Oh, I know what's always a good conversation topic: What's the most valuable item you've stolen?
So young for a detective... You probable haven't solved a lot of cases, right? Any interesting ones?
Whenever I hear of a detective I imagine a cranky older guy, but you're so young... I take it you don't have a lot of stories to tell yet, am I wrong?
I can't help but noticing that you have some... generous hips, Hilbert. I mean that as a compliment, of course. It's a nice look for a guy, but I bet you hear that all the time.
You, uhh... have some nice, wide hips, huh? It's not very common in men, but I'm not complaining. You probably hear that a lot, don't you, Hilbert?
I was right to be worried about meeting common thugs like you in this place.
Ugh... I forgot you were here too.
This probably wouldn't have happened if you weren't glancing at my boobs so much. Yeah, I noticed...
Maybe this is karma for looking at my chest so much. Don't think I didn't notice.

case.state: Oh, look at my knight in shining armor! Saving me from a loss. Heheh, thank you, ~name~.
Woah, ~name~ lost! I know this wasn't on purpose, but you still saved my butt, so I'll say you're a gentleman.
Ufff, what a relief! I was sure I was losing this one. ~Name~, you might not be the best player, but you're a good man, heheh...
You tried, and you lost. Don't feel bad... You did try, didn't you?
You shouldn't underestimate me just because I'm a cute girl. I know what I'm doing.
Tough luck, ~name~. Then again, maybe you're just bad at this.
I didn't lose! Nice! So who's the loser?
That's what I'm talking about! There's nothing quite like winning!
If you think I'm just another cute girl, you're dead wrong!
If I'm gonna play, I'm gonna win! There's no other option.
Give us a smile, and then take off your clothes, ~name~.
Hahaha...! You should be ready to lose if you're going against me, ~name~.
Alright! Heheheh... I hope me celebrating every victory isn't too annoying for you guys.
No way I can lose to you! But if you wanna prove me wrong, there's always next time, ~name~.
See? I'm more than just a cute navigator. Maybe one day I'll show you some of my other skills.
You wanted to see me strip? I'm flattered, but my answer is no!
Not my turn! You'll have to try harder, tough guy.
Oh yeah! I think this game is starting to reawaken my most competitive side.
Okay, ~name~! Let's go, time to pay. Which item is it gonna be?
Whew! That's one less round I need to win. I can feel I'm getting closer.
Nice! ~Name~ lost? Well, I don't really care. I'm just happy it's not me.
I wasn't trying to distract you, you know? But if it happened, I can't help it.
Another win! Thank you, ~name~. It's just proper manners to thank the one who helps you win, right?
That's what you get for underestimating me. You should start assuming that I have a Royal Flush every round.
I assume you wanna win that prize too, ~name~. Too bad! It's gonna be all mine.
Thank you for losing, ~name~! You're a gentleman after all.
Yay! I win! Oh, maybe I shouldn't jump. I don't wanna have any accidents.
How sweet, ~name~! Taking the heat off me for once.
So you're not that good after all, ~name~... I wonder what other things you're bad at.
Yes! This victory is mine! And the next one... Well, we'll see.
Ha! Oh, I'm not laughing at you... Not entirely. You don't think this game is funny?
Hey, if you're not that good at this game maybe you're not really enjoying it. You could just quit, and sit down in the corner until it's over. I'm fine with that.
I'm gonna keep trying my hardest to beat you, ~name~! Nothing personal, I just don't think a guy should win this game.
Your problem is you underestimated me, ~name~. Even if I'm naked, I still have my brain.
Thanks for taking it easy on me, ~name~. Unless you were trying your hardest, but you still lost, in which case you're a jerk and you deserve it.
Yeah! Nami for the win!
That's what I'm talking about! I'm down, but not defeated yet.
What a gentleman! Heheh, nah... I'm sure this wasn't on purpose, but I still appreciate it.
I'm not a sore loser, but it's still a little satisfying to see the guys lose now.
What's wrong, ~name~? Did I distract you? Serves you right, you perv.
Watching you lose will never get old now... Until you've lost everything, but then there will be something else to look forward to.
Nice! Now please go with something big... And if you can do it slowly, I'd very much like that.
Perfect timing! Using my imagination in this situation doesn't seem fair at all.
If you don't mind, I'm going to spend the rest of my time here watching you lose over and over again, ~name~.
I only lost because of bad luck earlier. I could give you poker lessons later, if you want, ~name~. But I warn you, they're not cheap.
Look who lost! My favorite player. I'm just kidding, you're not my favorite.
Time to strip, buddy. No point in postponing it any longer. Chop chop!
Oh, good! Maybe now I won't have to undress you with my imagination anymore. Oh, do you think I'm joking? I wonder...
(~Player~ has been looking at me a lot since the game begun. Is she attracted to women? I could try seducing her into losing the game.)
(It seems ~player~ is into women. I've never tried seducing another girl, but if I can get her to lose for me, it should be worth it.)
(Why does ~player~ look at me like that? Does she like girls? If I can make her lose by seducing her I'll be one step closer to the prize.)
(~Player~ looks naive. I can probably use my persuasion tactics to convince her into losing the game.)
(~Player~ seems like the perfect girl to practice my manipulation skills on. If I can get her to lose, it would help me a great deal in this game.)
(Who should I try to manipulate into losing the game? Hmmm, ~player~ seems like the perfect victim. She has those lost puppy eyes.)

state.text: You really like this Sonic guy, huh Amy? What's he like? There must've been something about him that made you get a crush on him.
I'm not sure I have any useful advice for you regarding this Sonic guy, Amy... But maybe it can help you to think about why you got a crush on him. What do you like about him?
You can ask another player to help you undress? I didn't know that.
Are you sure you wanna help her, Cammy? Mika seems nice and all, but...
Perona, calm down... She hasn't done anything. This is just a game, try to relax and...
Perona, relax. Why do you have such grudge against her? You should take a deep breath, and...

case.state: Ohhh, hohoho...! You have to get fully naked, Robin! You know what that means...
Oh, Robin, Robin, Robin... This challenge thing was your idea, but I gotta say: I really like it now.

state.text: What did you just say...?! Hmph... at least there's someone who wants to hang out with me.
Wh-What...?! There is somebody here who generates pity, but it's not me...

case.state: Don't feel bad, ~player~. Even if you lose the first round, you can still win... but you won't! Not with Robin and me here to make sure of that.
You thought I'd go easy on you because you're a girl, ~player~? Too bad! I'm definitely playing to win... and so is Robin!

state.text: You're still mad about that? I would apologize, except you were not doing anything upstanding there. Using people's shadows to create zombies is wrong, you know?
I heard that, ghost girl...
Robin is way stronger than me. Duh... I have no problem admitting that.
Uhhh, obviously Robin is stronger than me. I'm not even close to her level.
Uhhh, what...? Well, if I had to say, then I think Robin is prettier. She has a more sophisticated beauty than me.
What a weird question... If I have to give an answer, then I'll say Robin is more beautiful than me. She looks just as pretty as she does now the second she wakes up in the morning.
What kind of question is that? Are you trying to make me fight with Robin, or something?
Why would you ask me that? It's like you want to make me get mad at Robin now.
Of course we're just friends. What are you trying to imply, Ghost Girl? I hope you don't start spreading rumors...
Obviously we're just friends. Close friends. Two girls can be close without it meaning anything else.
So that is what you were doing! Why would anybody be so petty?
I had suspicion that's what you were trying to accomplish! You're the worst. Why would you want that?
Ehhh...? What are you talking about? Apologize for what? Do you know what she's talking about, Robin?
Huh...? Why would you apologize? Did you do something wrong? I can't remember... What about you, Robin?
I think he is, heheh... Too bad that only makes me want to mess with him even more. ♡
Nope, former enemy sounds good to me.
Oh gosh, there's now two of them... Stocking, don't tell me you're also obsessed with ghosts and spooky things. One creep is enough for me, thank you very much.
It's crazy how much you remind me of someone I met... Are you obsessed with ghosts and cutesy things that are actually incredibly creepy? I swear, she could be your sister.

Stocking, do you happen to have any relatives? Especifically a girl that dresses very much like you, and loves ghosts and cutesy, creepy things... Well, even if you're not related it wouldn't surprise me if you're also into that sort of stuff.
Ahhhh...!!! What's wrong with you?!
Hey, those shouldn't count if we couldn't see them... Ugh, fine!
Why do you call ~player~ professor? Maybe it's just me, but it doesn't seem like he knows much of anything. No offense, ~player~.
That's a nice looking armor, but wouldn't you rather wear something that would offer more protection? Like on your head, your arms, your midriff...
Hmmm, why would you wear armor that leaves so much skin exposed? I still like how it looks, but I'm not sure it's worth it...
Did you come here on a bike, May? I swear I always see girls dressed like you riding their bikes around... Where did you leave it?
That's the perfect outfit for biking, am I wrong? Where did you leave your bike? Somewhere safe, I hope, so nobody steals it.
Ummm, you shouldn't keep something like that on your pocket. Maybe you should talk to your friend, and figure out your... relationship.
That's... kind of a steamy picture of your friend you have there. Seems like you have some stuff to figure out.
Gah! You scared me! I thought there were no more players allowed.
Ohhh, Robin... First one to lose, heheh. I thought you were good at Poker.
Robin, I wasn't expecting you to lose first. Have you gotten rusty at Poker?
You're very confident on your running skills, huh? But this is poker, so...
(A photographer? What if she's one of those Marines who take pictures for the wanted posters?)
(She's a photographer... What if she's one of those who take pictures for bounties? I'm not falling for it this time.)
What is that thing...? A ghost?!
I could understand living with one arm, but without both of them? I'd be completely useless.
Where did the sweet, gentle Haru go?
Seriously? That was your unfinished business? Perverted ghosts are a thing, I guess...
Huh? Even something like that can keep you tied to the world of the living? Exhibitionist ghost...
You didn't know this was strip poker? Then what are you doing here? Go!
Wait... where did the other Nami go? There just a doll here.
What's with all the directions you're screaming? Sounds like you're giving someone directions, or something, hahah...
"Girlfriend"? Does that mean your boyfriend is called "Boyfriend"? That would only be fair...
What I said earlier was just a misunderstanding, okay? I didn't mean to comment on your small size...

case.state: I win...! Heheh, I win our bet, Robin... Now I get to... what was it? Ask you an uncomfortable question?
Hahaha, I won! I won the bet, Robin. How much do you owe me...? Oh right, we didn't bet money... What was it? I can ask you a personal question?

state.text: Isn't this fun, Robin? You, me and ~player~... Together again... It's, uhh... weird too.
So, uhh... what do you think about the three of us meeting like this again, Robin? You really don't find it weird.
So your friend Sunset, Fluttershy... How did she go from being bullying you to being your friend? Maybe I can learn from on how to befriend someone who's being mean to me.
I'm curious about how your friend Sunset went from being mean to you to becoming your friend. If it's an inspiring story, maybe I can learn something from it.
I have a feeling that you're about to give a sales pitch... But I won't interrupt you.
Okay... I gotta say before you start that I have no interest in joining any weird religions. Now please, proceed.
Is this one of those... naughty games? I guess it's easier playing them with people you don't know.
Okay... I guess I'll respond as long as I can back away later.
Oh, are you taking off your dress now...? Ummm... G-ghost girl...
So you're removing the dress already, ummm...? (Crap, what was her name...?)
That's an adorable witch outfit. This isn't a costume party, though.
I like the cute witch outfit. But why wear that to a strip poker game?
Why do you keep talking about magic, Akko? Magic isn't real.
I... hate having to tell you this, Akko. Magic isn't real. You probably have a Devil Fruit ability.
What kind of attire is that? (She barely looks human.)
What are you waiting for? You don't have any more clothes, do you?
You look like you come from a different civilization... or you have a very interesting sense of fashion. Either way, I like your outfit.
You were already naked before you grew those flowers. I don't like cheaters; but if you're going to do it, at least try to be subtle.
That's a nice leotard you're wearing... if a little tight, maybe.
You're taking off your leotard now? Now we'll see just how tight it really is.
That's some crazy hair you have. Did you eat a Devil Fruit that lets you transform into a hedgehog or something?
What are you doing? (Doesn't she know she has to strip now?)
You think you're so strong because you can turn your hair yellow? I'm sure my crew mates are stronger than you.
Going back to black? Did you get tired of being blonde?
You are a fighter, huh? Do you fight using kicks? (Those legs...)
Are you a princess, Elizabeth? You're so well mannered and properly dressed that I'd find it hard to believe you're not from a wealthy family.
You look way too shy to play a game like this? Nobody is forcing you to play, right? Because if that's the case...
So you're a navigator too, huh? And we have similar hair? Maybe you're my lost little sister or something, hahah...
You're a navigator, Futaba? And you're a ginger... Do I have a missing sister I didn't know about? Heheh...
Playing this game to overcome your shyness is a bold move. I suppose that means you're already making progress.
So you're a clown... I'm sorry, I just haven't had the best experience with clowns.
That's a very unique look you have, Jolyne. If you were a wanted criminal, you'd be very easy to find, hahah...
A pirate woman, huh? That's refreshing... It's tough when 99% of pirates are men, right?
Huh, so you're a pirate... I respect that you don't dress like a man just so you can fit among your peers.
(This woman is intense. Crazy even. I should avoid talking to her.)
So what does A.I. mean? Additional Interest? Annoying... Individual?
I feel like I've seen wings like those on someone. And the pink color...
Who on their right mind bring a gun to a poker game?
Are you sick? I'd give you some of Chopper's medicine, but I don't like you very much.
You really are sick, aren't you? Fine, I'll give you the medicine.

case.state: Oh, a sheep Mink! You're so cute! Garchu!

state.text: That's an odd outfit. You look like a giant... strawberry.
Are you meant to be dressed as a strawberry, or something? It's cute...
Did you say you're Dracula's daughter? You mean Dracule Mihawk, the Shichibukai?
Mavis, your look reminds me of Thriller Bark, for some reason. But it doesn't make sense, because you look like a nice girl and not like any of the monsters I saw there.
With that outfit, you clearly come from a winter island, Mei. Am I right?
So you're a pirate? This is just a guess, but are you the captain by any chance?
You're a pirate, Meia? You seem very dependable and responsible, I take it you're the captain. Not that I know what having a captain like that is like...
At last a normal, pleasant woman in this place. Nice to meet you, Misato.
Is something worrying you, Misato? Aside from having to undress...
Misty, you look like you'd know. What are these Pokémon I've heard about?
Misty, what can you tell me about Pokémon? I know they're these strange creatures, but not much more aside from that...
Why do you talk to ~player~ so casually, Monika? Do you two know each other?
~Player~, do you know this girl? It's just the way she talks to you... Sounds like you have some sort of complicity I don't understand.
(This is a woman disguised as a man, right? The outfit isn't flashy enough to be an Okama, so...)
(This is clearly a woman... I don't think it's an Okama. She's not flamboyant enough.)
That's a very elaborate... dress? Armor? Hmm, it's a little revealing to be armor.
It's true what they say about small people making up for their stature with their personalities...
You're very vivacious for your... height. I get it, you gotta work harder than everyone else to stand out.
I know pretty much anyone is allowed to play this game, but a ball of light? Really?
Are you part of that Tontatta Tribe from Dressrosa my crew told me about? You look like a fairy, at least.
You have a very graceful look to you, Nayru. Kinda like what I imagine a goddess would look like.
Nayru, can I ask you about your ears? Are they part of your native race? I don't think I've ever met anyone with ears like that.
Do you work here, ~name~? Is it okay for you to play?
Did I mention how cute that maid outfit is? Not only that, but it's also very sexy.
A goddess, huh? I've met a god before, but you seem a lot more pleasant. That said, I'm not much into religion...
I already like you more than the last "god" I met, even if I'm not really into religion.
So what are your powers as a goddess? Just out of curiosity, you can't summon lighting, can you? Maybe "goddess" is more of a title in your case...
What really makes you a goddess, Palutena? Is it more of a position in your case, or do you have actual powers? Like... summoning lightning?
A female wrestler, huh? I can understand guys being into stuff like that. The guys in my crew sure are. But a woman?
Wrestling seems like the kind of thing Luffy and Usopp would be into. But not me.

case.state: You're a fashion designer, huh? What do you think of my outfit? I know I look good, but a second opinion doesn't hurt.

state.text: Aren't you trying a little too hard to be scary with that outfit? I mean, it's not like there are real witches or...
Okay... I know I can get scared easily sometimes, but you're trying a little too hard. Now if witches were a real thing, maybe that cloak would intimidate me.
Those wings freak me out. They're scary instead of adorable like the ones in the sky people.
(I can tell this woman is bad news. And she's a bounty hunter? I should try to get along with her.)
(This woman gives me the creeps more than anyone here. She's definitely bad news. I'll have to watch what I say in front of her.)
You can stretch your arms? Just like Luffy.
So, your arms... Did you get them after eating a Devil Fruit?
Why does that thing in your uniform that looks like an eye keep moving? It's freaking me out more than the sword.
Finally that creepy uniform is coming off. I swear that eye keeps looking at me.
That sword really looks like half of a pair of scissors. Oh, it's called Scissor Blade? That makes sense, heheh...
Smoke? How is that uniform even built? I'm sure Franky would like to take a closer look at it.
Okay, I'll accept you even if you're a zombie as long as you don't try to eat me.
If you promise you won't try to eat me, then I promise I'll stop screaming... That seems like a fair deal to me.
You're an idol, right? Are you looking for a manager? I'm sure I'd do a great job!
Sorry for freaking out earlier, Sakura. Even if you're a zombie, you seem pretty cool.
White and blue... Is that some kind of weird, experimental Marine uniform?
This witch you keep talking about is just a game or something, right? If there was really a witch here, I'd be the first one to run away.
I like your energy, but... you know you're playing strip poker, right?
I really feel under dressed next to you. What do you need all the armor and equipment for, anyway?
An assassin, huh? Robin was an assassin too before she joined the crew, and she seemed a lot scarier than you. So I have no problem with that.
You're an assassin? Huh... You don't seem very scary to me. No offense.
So you're down to your underwear... Huh?
You're gonna have to show your panties... Wait, what...?
Did you say earlier you're a ship? I think you're confused, young lady. I know ships, and even if they're very different, I've never seen one that looks like a person.
A GHOST!!! Why didn't I see it earlier?!
If someone had told me that today I'd be playing strip poker with a ghost when I woke up, I'd have laughed.
Why does a ghost wear clothes, anyway? Don't you just usually put a sheet on top of you?
Heeey... So what kind of bounties do you go after? Probably some really bad people, right? Like war criminals, or serial killers, hahaha... Th-That's not funny, I don't know why I'm laughing.

You know what? I feel better knowing that there's a bounty hunter at this table. I've heard they're very strong. I'm sure you go after lots of dangerous people... and bad! Only the baddest of people, am I wrong?
Shouldn't you focus on the game instead of drinking? What are you drinking, anyway?
Are you sure you don't wanna focus on the game instead of drinking? That's not gonna help your chances of winning.
Are you used to drinking wherever you go? I'm not sure that's smart. What's the most drunk you've ever gotten, Syrenne?
I really hope you don't get too drunk here, or one of us is probably gonna have to take you home. How drunk do you usually get, Syrenne?
Even for a princess, you're a lot more... colorful than what I'm used to.
Are you a member of Germa 66? I don't think I've ever seen anyone else wear an outfit like that.
Mmmm, I definitely know how to recognize the richest person in this place. And here she is...
You seem so forward, Zone-tan... Do you work, umm, "entertaining" people? I'm not judging, but you seem young for that.
Considering how direct you are about this sort of stuff, Zone-tan, I'm guessing you work in the "pleasure" business... Did you start recently? B-But you seem pretty confident.

I've seen a lot of weird stuff sailing with my crew, but everything can still be explained. That's why I don't believe in magic. Are you sure you didn't eat a Devil Fruit without noticing? It happens.
Scary looking woman... (She reminds me a little of Robin when I first met her.)
I wonder if that hair is softer than Chopper's fur. Would it be weird if I touch it?
This is just a wild guess, but you like the color pink, don't you?
That's a fancy outfit you have. Are you rich? Perhaps... a princess?
That seems like a battle outfit, although a very fancy one... Are you some sort of warrior princess, Estelle?
Are you pretending you're a witch? Aren't you a little too old to play games? Though I guess you're not hurting anyone.
I don't think I've ever met someone who works in that kind of stuff. But you seem very easy to talk to, Jessie.
You're the first person I've met that works in... that industry. I gotta say, you're not what I was expecting. You seem very easy-going, Jessie.
You leave my emotions alone. I didn't come here to be experimented on.
Starfire is a pretty name. Suitable for such an, umm, exotic looking girl like you.
You seem really strong. It's a relief to know you're on the side of the good.
Did you say earlier you're an amazon? Luffy spent some time on the amazon's island and met the pirate empress. That's not you, right?
You're clearly used to these kind of activities. The stripping part, at least.
You look exactly like the kind of woman that I'd expect to see in a place like this.
It's refreshing to see another normal woman like you in this crazy place, Ini.
But you can still win, Ini...
Hey, little girl. Are you lost? Did you get separated from your parents? You really shouldn't be here.
Hey there, little girl? Wh-why are you here? Did you get lost? Everyone, let's stop the game. There's a little girl here.
A female warrior... You look strong. It's refreshing to see a tough looking woman for a change.
An elegant woman like you is the last type I'd expect to see enjoying this sort of activity.
You seem very classy, Cynthia. Just seeing you here, I'm a little less worried about the type of establishment this is.
For someone so colorful you're pretty snarky.
A model, huh? So they make you wear those strange clothes as part of your job?
I've met a few princesses, but none of them was quite as... burly as you.
What's your homeland like, ~name~? I imagine it must be a scary place.
What's a Video Game, Chiaki? I've never heard of them.
You lost, huh? Why don't you put that weapon down? Is not like you're gonna use it h-
Oh, boy... Here we go again.
Can't you just... not? This one time?
Again?! You nutcase...
sigh I gotta find some cover again.
What's a virtual idol? Does it mean you're not really here?
Uh-oh... Seems like one of those experiments from Thriller Bark got out of the island.
I also care about fitness, so it might be good to have someone here who can give me some tips, even if I came here to win some money.
Just because I came here to earn the prize, doesn't mean I can't learn something from you, Trainer. I'm looking forward to hear what you have to say.
Are you really a cat woman or is that just a costume?
So you're just a student, Mahiru? You don't work for the World Economic News, or something? That's nice to hear. Do you plan to become a journalist in the future?
I'm relieved to know you're just a student, Mahiru. I thought you might work for the World Economic News, or some other newspaper... Is that one of your goals for the future?
What's with the wings and that whole getup. It's creepy...
Really? A woman wearing a mask? I thought only guys were into that kind of stuff.
It's so weird seeing a woman wearing a mask. Guys are always gawking over stuff like that, but I thought women were different.
(A pirate! But I don't recognize her, so she's probably not very strong...)
Hey, no need to get violent. It's just a game.
I gotta say, your whole aesthetic almost fooled me into thinking you're a vampire. The fangs, and all... Oh, you even have bite marks on your neck! Well done, Marceline.
Okay, you were very close to convincing me you're a vampire. You went into a lot of detail, even with the bite marks! Hehehe, I'll hand it to you. Well done.
You look smart. And it's not just because of the glasses, it's also because of... Umm... It's the glasses.
Uhhh... How's the life of a bounty hunter? I imagine you make enough to eat well... As long as you're good at it.
I-Is it tough being a bounty hunter? Some of those bounties seem pretty expensive to me, so I can't imagine you live an austere life.
You fight crime and stuff? In that outfit? Interesting...
Why are you so intense? We're just playing a game.
Tights, sneakers, a headband? Were you working out and then you decided to stop for a game?
Mia, you seem like a serious respectable woman. I don't know why you'd want to pay this game. Wouldn't you rather play something that doesn't involve people undressing?
You really don't seem like the kind of woman I was expecting to see here, Mia. Why would you choose this type of activity, over something less... indecent?
So you're a defense attorney? That means you defend criminals and such, right? Could I get your info? Just in case...
You're a defense attorney, right? I guess I wouldn't mind having your information. Well... You never know.
What is that stick you're holding? If you're young enough to play with toys then you shouldn't be here.
D.Va... Oh, like diva. I get it.
So you pilot a giant robot? Just like Franky... I thought only boys were into that sort of stuff.
Where did that briefcase you were holding earlier go? I hope there wasn't anything valuable inside...
You ride a pegasus? Like that old man from Skypiea. I thought there was only one of those creatures.
You're not really broadcasting this game, right? I don't see you having a Transponder Snail, so probably not...
Aren't you a little young to be a detective? You can still be good, but...
Why can't you take off your gloves? Are you hiding something?
Oh, so you are hiding something under those gloves. Like a bunch of extra cards, or...
You act like you're tough, but in my opinion you don't seem very strong...
You're very upbeat for someone who just lost a round. I also think it's better to be that way.
You keep talking in this weird way. Are you part of a cult or something? I'm not sure what your deal is, but you really should relax a little.
Look, uhh... I'm not really interested in joining your cult, or buying what you're selling... Whatever your deal is.
You know, I'm very fond in general of people that say "justice this, justice that"... In my experience, they use it as an excuse to commit whatever crimes they want. How would you define it?
I'm sorry that you didn't give me the best initial impression. I've met others that talk about fighting "in the name of justice", before proceeding to harm innocent people. What's justice to you?
I don't say this to anyone, but those big eyes of you are very captivating, Mae. Sort of like a cat's.
You study the weather, Mei? We should definitely have a conversation after the game. I'm sure we can learn a lot from each other.
Hey... you look way too innocent to want to play this game. You didn't walk in here by mistake, right? Or because you were forced?
Ummm... I gotta ask... Nobody forced you to come here, right? Do you know what this game is?
Heh, did you know that your hair forms the shape of a heart?
Heheheh... Your hair is heart-shaped. It's cute and funny.
Saki, right? Are you feeling okay? You don't have to play if you don't want to.
Hey, don't say that. I'm sure lots of guys would like to see you naked. Well, some of them are perverts, but you get what I say.
Saki, you don't have to put yourself down so much. I think you're very pretty. Sure, you could fix your hair a little, but that's it.
I feel there's something unique about you, Zizou. But I can't tell what...
Why that monochromatic look, Blake? Is that in fashion these days.
Something wrong?
Wait, how can you be a human but at the same time have cat ears? Are you perhaps a mix between a human and a mink? Is that even possible?
Are you feeling okay? You weren't drugged before coming here, were you?
Are you okay? You seem a little... uninhibited. You're not always like this, are you?
Hey! Can't you just take it easy?! You already took off your bra!
Is this why you took off your bra first? Girl, you need a long, cold shower...
Have you learned nothing?! They already told you...!
W-Wait! The rule, remember? Oh my goodness, this girl...
I don't want to look. I know that'll only make it worse.
Of course you still haven't lost your excitement. It's only growing...
Your name really is Kim Possible? That can't be a coincidence.
Did you say you work as a babysitter? I have a feeling I'd be good at that.
Ruby is a beautiful name. It reminds me of... nice things.
That's an interesting accent you have. Where is it from?
(What kind of bounty hunter dresses like that?)
(Is she really a bounty hunter? She doesn't seem to have any weapons on her.)
(A prosecutor... Doesn't that mean she gets criminals convicted? I better be careful.)
Are you never gonna get rid of that thing you keep slapping around with? It's dangerous.
Finally a normal looking girl. Nice to meet you.
With that attire you must be from Wano, am I right?
A princess dressed in armor... Your country must be plagued by war.
Sorry, but I've seen enough crazy inventions for a lifetime thanks to Franky.
Hey, you look like you haven't been outside in a while. A little sun doesn't hurt, you know?
Uhhh... Are you not used to going outside very often, Tomoko? I just get that feeling... It doesn't hurt you to get a little sun every now and then.
I don't know what this talking butterfly is doing here... Should we wait for it to leave before we continue?
This talking butterfly... It's not really gonna play the game, right? We should probably wait for it to leave. Because, how...?
I think butterflies are cute, but a Devil Fruit that allows you to transform into one doesn't sound very useful to me, Yuelia. What if you get swatted by accident?

case.state: Butterflies are adorable, but a Devil Fruit ability that allows to transform into one doesn't seem very useful. If you get swatted in your butterfly form, you could be seriously hurt.

state.text: What's the need to be so sarcastic? Typical villain.
I'm sorry, but I just don't see you fighting horrific creatures or whatever it is you said.
You must be a student from a fancy school. That uniform looks more like a ceremony dress.
I know you've lost most of your clothes already, but you should stop with that attitude.
You're very young for a model. I suppose they need young models too.
Is that you, okama? What did I tell you last time about copying my body? Especially for this kind of stuff!
I don't think a young girl should be talking about spiders so much. It's unladylike. And gross.
Spiders are so gross, and creepy... I don't think you'd be very popular if you talk about them so much.
Do you live here, Mary? Oh, it's just that you dress the way I'd expect someone to dress when they're at home.
A schoolgirl from a wealthy family, huh? How rich are we talking about here? Do you live in a mansion?
...Oh sorry, I didn't mean to stare at your metal arm. For what it's worth, I'm sure some members of my crew would find that very cool.
I love your look, Shantae. Does everybody dress like that where you come from?
Now that I've looked at it more, your outfit really reminds me of the one I wore in Alabasta, Shantae. Is that where you're from?
All this talk about "contracts" and "targets" doesn't exactly make me feel comfortable around you.
Nice to meet you, Shouko. You're not very talkative, huh? It's okay, I don't mind reading.
Pleasure to meet you, Shouko. I see you use a notebook to communicate... Well, I don't mind reading.
Fairy Tail? I've never heard of it. I don't know what you guys deal with, but I know it's not magic. So what is it really?
I don't know what Fairy Tail is exactly, but did you say it has to do with magic? So you're like performers, or something?
Hey! How did you do that?!
So you're a lab assistant... Who do you work for again? It's not Dr. Vegapunk, is it?
I know you mentioned you're a robot earlier, but I don't buy it. I thought those Pacifistas look real, but you'd be on another level.

case.state: Finally someone here who understand the importance of money. But keep your hands off the prize, I saw it first.
Do you really make a lot of money as a shopkeeper? Not unless your prices are really high, I guess. Good thing I'm excellent at haggling, so that wouldn't work on me.

state.text: Sorry for overreacting earlier. I just have a fear of living statues... among other things.
I'm sorry for screaming. I have a crippling fear of living statues. Not the only thing I'm scared of, but it's up there.
PA-15? That kinda sounds like the name of those Pacifista things. PX... something. Then are you also a machine?
Are you finally getting rid of that gun? I feel like I'm in a hostage situation with you holding it all the time.
You're already a queen? You don't look any older than all the princesses I've met.
Are you really a swordswoman? No offense, but you look like you just came back from a study session at a library.
So where's your sword, Connie? Or swords, if you're like Zoro.
Why is that knife red...? Wh-Why is that knife red?!
That knife looks an ominous red color... Right? Is anyone else concerned about that?
That's a very unique uniform, but I like it. What kind of school do you go to, Bernie?
I'd understand wearing an extra piece of clothing so you can last longer, but a box? It's a little too much.
Isn't it about time you get rid of that box? This is getting ridiculous... Even more ridiculous.
So what does "half-genie" mean, Shantae? Is there a race called "genies"? Is that why you have those pointy ears? There's no way you mean actual genies...
I've been thinking about what you mean when you say you're a "half-genie"... Are the genies a race with pointy ears? Not like the genies from lamps, and all that... right?
Shantae, aren't you worried that with you dancing, and with that long hair, you might hit someone with it if you make a fast move?
I'm only saying this because I like you, Shantae, but you could always count your earrings and your tiara as items if you want to last longer in the game.

case.state: Why did you take off your pants before your top, Shantae? You do have a great posterior, but I hope you're not self-conscious about your chest.

state.text: What exactly are you? At least you're human... right? I can't believe I have to ask people that now...
Ummm, don't be offended, but I just have to know... Are you human? It's just that... everything about you look so... Uh... unusual.
If I remember correctly, the last time I saw you, Kuma made you disappear. Back then I thought he killed you.
Last time I saw you, Kuma made you disappear in front of me. I had no idea back then what happened.
In the end, did you abandon your former crew? Good riddance. What a group of freaks that was...
So I guess you left your crew, huh? Is that why you're alone now? Good for you. That band of freaks wasn't doing you any favors.
I've been thinking... Why are you wearing those thigh highs with a garter belt? Aren't they elastic?
Hmmm, I didn't notice before, but I don't understand why you'd wear a garter belt if you have those thigh highs that are elastic.
What's wrong with you? Just take off your thigh highs! No need to be so stubborn.
Just remove your thigh highs, then. Nobody will say anything.
Seriously, just take off your thigh highs. At least you can get more time.
You'd really rather people here see you naked than go back on your word? I weirdly find that inspiring.
So your ghosts only work on people as long as they're not already negative, right? Heheh...
I've heard that ability of yours doesn't work if you use it on someone who's already negative... Am I wrong?
You couldn't look any more different from the last Neptune I met. Maybe if you had a beard, hahaha...
Hey, you're the second Neptune I've met! But you look nothing like him. Probably because you don't have a beard.
You seem quite mature for a schoolgirl. They really develop younger every time, don't they?
Are you really in school? You're not just wearing the uniform? Huh, I seem to remember schoolgirls looking smaller.
You're part of the Literature Club? That must be nice, having people to talk about books with... Well, I have Robin, but two people is not a club.
You're in your school's Literature Club, huh? Man, I'm jealous... I'd love to be able to discuss books with other people. Aside from Robin, of course.
You're very upbeat for someone who just lost a round. I also think it's better to be that way.
I like how upbeat and cheerful you are, Yang. But are you sure you're not also a little nervous?

case.state: It's nice to meet a woman with a sense of humor. At least your jokes are better than Brook's stupid bone jokes.
I like a woman who enjoys making jokes. I think I like your puns more than Brook's silly skeleton jokes.

state.text: Didn't I see you appear out of a door in mid-air earlier? That's an interesting Devil Fruit ability.
How did you appear out of mid-air earlier? I don't think I've ever seen a Devil Fruit ability like that.

case.state: Did your friend convince you to come here? That's not very nice... This isn't a good place for a meeting.
Did you come here because your friend told you to meet her here? Why would she do that?

state.text: What's the range on your teleporting ability? Can you appear anywhere, or is there a range limit?
So... how far can you teleport with that ability of yours? Is there a limit to how far you can travel, or is it anywhere you want?

case.state: I'm not sure what you're expecting to discover by playing this game. Remember if you lose, you have to do this... I'm not hating it as much as I thought I would, but it's still embarrassing.

state.text: So have you really been staying with Dracule Mihawk for two years? Living with a Warlord of the sea?
Have you really been living with Dracule Mihawk these last two years? With one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea?
Are you seriously a goddess? It's tough to have my beliefs challenged like this... Would it be rude to ask for proof?
Are you really a goddess, Neptune? That isn't just a title? I met a self-proclaimed God once, and he was just a narcissistic tyrant.
Are you nice, Ms. Ghost? Y-Y-You aren't gonna drag me to a graveyard and twist my neck?
Are you friendly? Y-Y-You... you aren't gonna hurt me, right? Like remove the skin from my body, or eat my fingers...
You're not really a robot, right? Franky is a cyborg, and he looks way less human than you. Wh-Who made you...?
Are you joking about being a robot? You look so much more human than Franky... Where do they have this technology? Who created you?
So what can you do? Can you shoot lasers? Jump super high? Rocket punch?
I'm curious as to what you can do as a robot... Can you fire lasers? What about jumping high into the air? Oh, maybe shoot your punch like a rocket?

case.state: Bulma, you seem like an important woman... Am I mistaken to think you might be a... president, or something?
Hmmm, I have a good eye for important people, and you seem like the type, Bulma. Maybe some sort of... president? Am I wrong?

state.text: An archer? You must be very skilled with that bow. I have a friend who has perfect aim, but he uses a slingshot instead.
I take it you must've had a lot of practice to use a bow properly. My friend never misses his target, though his weapon of choice is a slingshot.
What's your forest like, Lyralei? Is it a beautiful place to visit, or is it filled with bugs, horrifying creatures and... talking trees? Ugh...
Is your forest a nice place to visit, Lyralei? By nice, I mean there won't be bugs, monsters, and trees that come to life and try to kidnap me... again.
Are you telling me there's someone out there who made a fake school that supposedly teaches kids how to become "wizards"? Who would do such a horrible thing?
I can't believe there could be a monster who'd create a fake school that teaches kids "magic"... That's a horrible thing to do.
While it's admirable that you're a good student, wouldn't you rather learn something... useful? Like science?
I respect that you're the best student in your school... Although I think it'd be better to learn something real instead of "magic". How about science?
Is that stick you're carrying the one that supposedly allows you to use magic? Did you have to pay a huge amount of beli for that?
That stick you have in your hand is the one that focuses your magic powers or whatever, right? I bet they made you pay a ridiculous price for that.
So... Where are you staying now? You're not back at Thriller Bark, right?
Ummm... Where are you living nowadays, Ghost Girl? I hope you didn't go back to Thriller Bark.
Wow, you're adorable! I'd believe it if you told me you were on your way to your grandma's house.
What an adorable girl! Did you wander in here by mistake? You look like you were on your way to visit your grandma, or something.
So, Neptune... What kind of games do you enjoy? Aside from strip poker, I suppose.
What kind of games does a goddess enjoy playing, Neptune? I can't imagine strip poker is your favorite...
That mask is so creepy! Th-That's not really blood on it, is it? Your voice sounds so kind, why would you dress like that?
A-Are you wearing that mask as a prank? Hahah, very funny and scary... Ummm, now why don't you take it off?
Are you okay, Susie? I have a feeling you've been through a lot... Maybe I can help.
How are you feeling, Susie? If you have suffered a lot, perhaps there's something I can do...
This outfit you're wearing... Is it some sort of uniform for your crew? This design is so unique. It looks... futuristic.
Meia, is your outfit a uniform, or something? I don't think I've ever seen something quite like it. It feels like an outfit people would wear far in the future.
Meia, you mentioned you come from a "planet" of women. Are you sure it isn't an island of women? I know that's where the Pirate Empress lives.
Did you say earlier that you come from a "planet" of women, Meia? You said planet, right? Not island? 'Cause I know that exists. That's where the Pirate Empress, Boa Hancock, lives.
Cough, cough...! I'm used to Sanji smoking next to me, but at least he has the decency to blow the smoke away from me, and stand downwind from where I am. Have some respect, Revy.
Cough, cough...! Okay, I've waited long enough to say something, but you keep blowing that smoke my way, Revy! Compared to you, Sanji is a model smoker.
Where does you obsession with pirates come from, Emi? I know why some people are obsessed with pirates. What about you?
You're far from the first person I've met who loves pirates so much, Emi. Where did you get that from? Did you meet someone in your childhood that embedded it into you, or...?
Cynthia, you remind me a lot of a friend of mine. She also has this dignified aura around her, and she's a huge history buff. You two could probably talk for hours.
You remind me of a friend of mine, Cynthia. History is her whole life, and she's also very sophisticated and smart. I can picture you two leaning over a stack of books, and talking for hours.
Megumin, sorry if it seemed like I was teasing you earlier. I think you're gorgeous. You don't need to have big breasts to be beautiful.
I didn't mean to tease you earlier, Megumin. You shouldn't feel insecure about your body, 'cause you're gorgeous. Having big breasts or small ones can't change that.
So you have some sort of explosion ability, Megumin? Isn't that dangerous? You probably get hurt all the time.
You have an ability to create explosions? That sounds extremely dangerous. How often do you get hurt, Megumin?
I don't remember the last time I asked someone this, but... What's wrong with you? Why are you this way?
Why... are you like this? So detached from everything... I'd like to understand.
Are there more like you out there, Galatea? Living statues, I mean. A family, maybe?
Galatea, do you happen to have... a family? Or at least, is there a group of living statues out there, like you?
Has it been hard making friends for you, Shouko? On account of... not speaking? I imagine it can't be easy, but if you meet the right people...
I imagine you've had trouble adapting to people your age without being able to speak, Shouko. But have you managed to make any friends yet? It's all about meeting the right people.
Are you famous where you come from, Cynthia? I'm afraid I haven't heard of you... What are you famous for?
So you're famous, Cynthia? I'm sorry, but I don't think I've seen your face on the newspaper... Are you a famous actress, or a model?
Chara, where do you come from? I've met people who live under the sea, above the clouds... and you're like none of them.
There's something different about you, Chara. Even people who live on the sky or under water aren't that different. Where are you from?
This Tadano sounds like a special young man, huh Shouko? My life also turned around when I met my captain. Oh, but it's not romantic... Not that I'm saying it is in your case... It's just a feeling.
Sounds to me like this Tadano is very important to you, Shouko. I also have a very important man in my life. Oh, but he's just my captain. It sounds to me like you like this young man, huh?
So you like fries, huh? I can... see that.
From what I see, you like fries a lot.
While I admire that you're trying to lose weight, Erufuda, I admire you even more for being so confident. You have good reason, considering how cute you are.
I hope you can lose weight so you can fulfill you goal, Erufuda, but I don't think you'd have to otherwise. You're already super cute, but you already seem to know that.
So what are the poems you write usually about, Yuri? I'm sure they're great, but I hope they're not too depressing.
What's your poetry style, Yuri? I know poets find inspiration in different places, but I'm not really a fan of the more depressing poems.
I really wasn't expecting to see a schoolgirl here. Wouldn't you rather hang out with your friends than play this sort of game?
What interest could a schoolgirl have in this kind of activity? If I was you, I'd be hanging out with my friends, doing normal stuff that doesn't involve... stripping.
Do you work in intelligence, Pauling? You seem to be very well informed... I hope it's not for the Government, or I'll have to excuse myself.
Pauling, you seem to be more knowledgeable than the average person here... I hope you don't have access to such intel because you work for the Government. If so, it was nice meeting you...
Is strip poker really a good way of dealing with stress? I also spend most of my day stressed... I wouldn't want my hair to turn gray by the time I'm 30.
