Do you really know how to deal with stress, Pauling? I don't know if strip poker is a good way... But I'm willing to try new things, since I also have to deal with a lot of stress daily.
I'm kinda glad that I never had a "tomboy" phase... Ummm, no offense. It's just hard to stay in touch with your feminine side when you're always hanging out with boys.
Thank goodness I never felt the need to act more tomboyish just to fit in with the guys... My style also never rubbed off on them, but it could've been worse. Uhhh, but you look good, Saki.
What's a video game, Aoba? I don't think I've ever heard of that. Must be something that was invented recently, right?
You work making video games, Aoba? I know games, but I can't imagine where the "video" part comes from. Are they some new invention?
So I know you're a fitness trainer, but what does "Wii" mean? It's a funny word...
The fitness trainer part I get, but I've never heard of a "Wii", so I don't understand where that comes from. Sounds like a weird word.
Did you say earlier that you're a Captain's apprentice? But you go to school, right? It must be some sort of military school, then. Sounds tough.
What kind of school do you go to, Leonie? You said that your teacher is a Captain. Are they training you to become a soldier? I imagine it must be bitter work.
Those ears are so cute, heheh... What animal are you, Amy? Hmmm, you seem more human than a Mink.
Hehehe, I like your ears... But I can't figure out what animal you're supposed to be. Usually I don't have any trouble recognizing Minks, but you seem like a human aside from the ears.
Are you happy being a vampire, Marceline? Or would you rather be normal? If the legends are true, vampires can't be exposed to sunlight, eat garlic, look at crosses... That could be tough.

If you had a choice, would you rather just be human than a vampire, Marceline? Sure, you have all those powers, but there's also stuff you can't do because of it, right? If the superstitions are correct...
You're basically an adventurer, right May? What kind of places have you been to? I'd like to hear them, especially the most dangerous ones.
If you've been on a lot of adventures, you've probably visited a lot of places, May. What was the most dangerous place you've been to? I'd like to know so we're better prepared if I ever go there.
Ayano, if you're getting bullied by a girl at school, that's very serious. Especially if they're doing that to you...
I know this isn't the right place for this conversation, but if a girl is bullying you at school and cutting your body, that's serious business, Ayano.

case.state: Not sure what kind of emotion you expect to find in this game, other than utter humiliation and embarrassment...
What sort of feeling are you looking for by playing this game? Humiliation? Embarrassment? Some people are into that, I guess.
What do you think you'll find by playing this game? I already lost and... Well, it wasn't bad at all, but I don't think I learned anything new about myself. And it was still embarrassing...

state.text: Smiling is not hard, Laevy... Can I call you Laevy? I also rarely smiled for a long time, but that changed when I met my friends. Just being close to them makes it so much easier.

Smiling should come naturally to you if you surrounded yourself with the right people, Laevy. Do you have a lot of friends? If you find people who make you happy and you spend time with them, smiling becomes very easy.
You mentioned you have a younger sister, Mia? What's she like? Is she also a lawyer? I could see her being inspired by you, and following on your footsteps.
What's your little sister like, Mia? Did she become a lawyer too? Must be nice working alongside your family.
You have a really nice body, Neptune. That doesn't seem like the body of someone who "plays games and eats sweets" all day... What's your secret?
Do you really spend most of the time playing and taking it easy, Neptune? How do you stay in such good shape then? You have a gorgeous body.
You're a light mage? Did I hear that right? What other kinds of mages are there? I wonder if I could be considered one, with my weather abilities...

A light mage... Does that mean there different types of magic and mages? Supposedly... Though I'd like to know what they are. My weather abilities might seem like magic. I wonder if I'd qualify as a mage.
All these light related puns are not some sort of defense mechanism because you're afraid of the dark, right? Well, I don't love it either, so I wouldn't blame you.
What's with all the light puns, Lux? Hmmm, I've heard some use humor as a coping mechanism. Could it be you're afraid of the dark? I get it, it can be scary.
A sky woman... Nice to meet you! Huh...? Those wings don't look like real wings... Do you not come from above the clouds, Angela?
It's always nice to meet a sky person... Wait, are those real wings? They look mechanical... Are you not from the sky, Angela?
I've met some strange looking doctors, but you're on a class of your own, Angela. With the way you're dressed, I would expect you to have some revolutionary method for healing people.
I didn't think I'd meet yet another unusual doctor so soon... What's your method for healing people, Angela? Somehow, I can't picture you mixing herbs or making potions.
A normal girl! That's refreshing... There seem to be a lot of weirdos around lately.
I-It's so scary... But I can't stop looking at it.
What a plain looking girl! Almost... too plain.
Are you okay? You look a little... dizzy.
A mime, huh? I could use some quiet right now, so this suits me just fine.
Oh, you're a mime. That's why you haven't said anything. It's better than playing with someone who yaps nonstop.
Hey, you haven't said anything since we got here. Are you tired...? Are you hungry...?
I, uhhh... am not sure I understand your dialect. Where did you say you're from, Derpina?
I'm sorry, but I only understand half of what you're saying. I don't think it's because you're a cat girl. I've had no trouble understanding other animal people.
So you're an average henchwoman for this organization? I've defeated many grunts like you without batting an eye... Sometimes it's easy to forget you're people too. I feel like I should apologize.
I'm the one in my crew that usually fights low-level enemies and minions, but this is the first time I've talked to one... Sorry for forgetting you're people too, I guess.
No judgment, but I wouldn't want to play strip poker with my mom... I don't know if that's common in... Alola, was it?
N-Ninetales...?
I think I'd have it easier trying to understand what an actual cat is saying than you...
What's with that suit? Hahaha...! Sorry, I don't know if it's meant to be funny.
(What is that?! No, I shouldn't judge... There are many different races around the world.)
You're so young for being so knowledgeable. Do you really know everything about everything? 'Cause if so, I might have some questions.
I can't imagine how much you'd have to study to know so much. And I thought I was hardworking... Maybe you know more than me about certain topics. Can I ask you a few questions?
Do you work out, Yuri? Surely you do more than reading and writing all day to have a body like yours, right? Especially with those legs.

Even if you spend most of your time reading, I'm sure you do at least something to stay in shape, right Yuri? I'd be jealous to learn that you can have legs like those without putting some work into it.
Wiki, do you ever get tired of people asking you questions about random facts? It's great that you have all that knowledge, but I'd understand if you sometimes wanna take a vacation.
So your job is to give information to anyone who asks for it? Doesn't that get tiresome? If I was you, I'd be dying to go on a vacation, Wiki.
What's your training routine, Connie? You don't seem that buffed.
Hey... ball. You better not be manipulating this girl into doing whatever you want. It doesn't seem like she can talk.
Ball, what are your intentions ordering this poor girl around? From what I've seen, she can't say no... or anything really.
Is it common for you to get confused with a man because of your title, Miko? You're clearly a girl, but I imagine that must get annoying.
Do people often think you're a man before they meet you, Miko? Because of the "Prince" title? You probably get used to that sort of stuff, but I still think it would bother me.
You know, Tomoko... If you want to become more popular and be sexy, I can give you some tips. Only if you want...
Tomoko, if you want people to notice you, and have more sex appeal, there are some easy things you can do. I can help you with that, if you want.
Those ice powers, do they have anything to do with your music? The musician in my crew also freezes people... but that might be because he's dead.
Where did you get your ice powers? Are they linked to your music? I'm not a musician, but I have seen something like that before.
If you have a flyer for your band, or something, I can take it. I can't promise I can go to your event, though. My crew is always on the move.
Did you bring flyers for you band, Darling? Or some way to promote it? If I have a chance I can go check you guys out. But I can't guarantee, since my crew never stays in one place for long.

case.state: Hey, if poker is not your thing, I could help you. I wouldn't want to see a girl who doesn't know the game lose because she doesn't understand the rules, even if I intend to win in the end.
Hilda, if you need my help with the game you just need to ask. Even if I'm here to win, I'd hate to see anyone lose too quickly because they have no experience with these sort of games.

state.text: Hey, if poker is not your thing, I could help you. I wouldn't want to see a girl who doesn't know the game lose because she doesn't understand the rules, even if I'm already out of the game.
Hilda, if you need my help with the game you just need to ask. Even if I already lost, I'd hate to see anyone lose too quickly because they have no experience with these sort of games.
If you're a benevolent deity, does that mean you can give me good fortune? I'll gladly make a small offering at your shrine if I can get countless riches in return! I'd consider it an investment...

So if I understand how it works, you promise to give me something in return if I leave an offering at this shrine of yours, right? I don't really believe in deities, but I can take the risk if there's a chance I'll get rich.
Asuna, what kind of game did you say you play again? I've never heard any of those terms. VRR... something. Is it some new sport?
What game was it that you play, Asuna? VRR... something? I'm not an expert in games, but I've never heard of anything like that.
Gwen, do you do your superhero work by yourself? Or do you have a team with you? I can see both options having their ups and downs...
Do you work solo, Gwen? As a superhero, I mean. I'm sure it would help to work with other supers, but maybe it's easier to not rely on others with what you do.
I bet you get a lot of attention because of your outfit, Shantae... especially with the transparent pants. Do you ever get annoyed by that?
Say, do you think one of these videogames would make for a good gift? I feel like I want to do something nice for the guys. What do your recommend, Aoba?
I'm feeling generous. I think I'd like to buy something nice for the guys, and maybe they'd like on these videogames. Do you have any recommendations, Aoba?
I've been thinking, Wiki... Is there a specific topic that you love to talk about, but people rarely ask you about it?
You clearly love giving information about lots of different topics, but do you personally have a favorite subject, Wiki? Maybe something that you wish people would ask you about more often.
Are there other gh-ghosts around? I think I'd like to know in advance. Like a ghost butler, or gardener...?
Is Tojiko the only ghost that came with you, Miko? It could save me from a heart attack to know beforehand if there's another one around.
You don't look any more uncomfortable now that you're in your underwear, Neptune. Well, that sure is some cute underwear, but do you not get embarrassed at all?
Did you forget you're in your underwear, Neptune? You look just as confident now as you did fully dressed. Are you not fazed by nudity at all?
Do you wear that armor every day, Lux? I'm sure it keeps you safer, but do you ever wish you could wear something a little more... girly? I know I would.

I don't know if I could wear an armor like yours every day, Lux. Do you ever wish you could wear a dress, or something different? I like wearing girly outfits, even when they're not the most practical choice.
Do you ever go to the beach, Shouko? I don't get the feeling you get a lot of sun, but I'm sure you'd look great in a two-piece swimsuit.
You're so pale, Shouko. You should go to the beach with your friends more often. I'm sure you'd make a lot of heads turn wearing a bikini.
Fina, judging by your attire you don't seem to be from any of the places I've visited. Have you traveled a lot?
I'd like to know about the places you've visited, Fina. I don't think I've ever visited an island where people dress the way you do.
Is it dangerous training these Pokémon? I imagine they're wild creatures who could easily hurt a person. Taming them wouldn't be an easy job.
These Pokémon creatures are dangerous, right? Then training them must be tough. Aren't you worried that you might get hurt?

I have no idea how you can wear that bodysuit. I'd feel like I'm wearing a straitjacket. Don't you like this look, Meia? I figure you wouldn't have a problem wearing more revealing clothes if you're in an all-women crew.

I think I prefer this look on you, Meia. That bodysuit looked so uncomfortable. You're not too shy to show more skin, right? If I was in an all-women crew, I'd feel very comfortable wearing revealing clothes... though it's not like I don't now.
You rescue animals, huh? That immediately makes me like you! There's nothing more noble than helping those who need it.
A lot of people can say that they like animals, but doing something to help the ones that need it requires a special kind of love. I'm sure you do good work.
I don't think I've ever met an idol before. Was there a reason that made you want to get into music? Some sort of inspiration?
Ohhh, a true music icon... It must've taken a lot of work to get to where you're now. What inspired you to want to get into music?

What is it that you study exactly, Y'shtola? I always find it interesting to learn about what people research in different parts of the world. You never know what sort of knowledge is gonna be useful.
What was your field of research again, Y'shtola? Maybe you have something you can teach me that can help me with my job, heheh... One can dream.
You seem to know more about this game than me, Monika. Just going by the way you talk... Do you have any tips for me?
Is there any secret to this game only you know, Monika? That's what is seems like to me. Care to share it with me?
Hey Fina, what's the biggest treasure you've ever found? That sky gold is quite valuable, isn't it? I wouldn't say that's the main reason why I want to go up there again, but it's part of it.
Let's talk about treasure, Fina! What's the most valuable one you've ever found? I'd be lying if I said I don't often think about that gold from the sky islands...
Let me ask you something... Do they treat you well in your organization? Good salary, health benefits, working hours, etc.? It doesn't sound like they have the best ideals, though...

Do you like your job, magma girl? I'd never heard of your organization, and they don't sound very upstanding... But I'd understand you working for them if the conditions are good. Salary, benefits, vacations, all that.
D-Did you say earlier you're the princess of Hell. Please, tell me that's the name of an island. Please...
Very peculiar for there to be an island called Hell somewhere in the world. B-But it must be real, if you're the princess from there, right? Very unusual, hahah... ha...
You know, you really freaked me out with that talk about Hell and demons earlier, but you seem very nice, Charlie. You probably have lots of people who look up to you, right?
I never thought I'd like someone who claims to be a demon from Hell, but you seem so nice, Charlie. You probably have lots of friends who admire you.
I can't get enough of how adorable you are, Sucrose! I feel a primal instinct to protect you... Heh, sorry. I don't mean to creep you out. I bet you get ogled all the time.
Has anyone ever told you how adorable you are, Sucrose? What am I saying? Of course they have! You probably hear that every day.
Hey, Sucrose... You're a scientist, right? Have you made any discoveries that could help me in my job as a navigator, by any chance? If there's one thing I trust in, it's science.
What kind of scientific discoveries have you made, Sucrose? Anything that could help a humble navigator? Science has saved my butt many times in the past.
Oh, I'm sorry, Yuri... I get the feeling you're not very used to others seeing you naked. What about with your classmates in the showers?
Sorry, Yuri. Take your time... This is probably your first time getting naked in front people you just met. But I assume you change clothes in front of your classmates after gym class?
Meia... If you're from a planet of women, I guess you're not very familiar with the, uhhh... male body, right?
Hey, Meia... I hope this isn't an inappropriate question, but how much do you know about the... male body? If there are only women where you come from, I imagine not much.
So you're the president of your club, Monika? Have you had any trouble being the leader? I'm not the captain of my crew, but I'm sometimes forced to take charge. It's not easy.
It can be tough being a leader sometimes, am I wrong? President of the Literature Club? Even if I'm not the captain, I'm sure managing a school club is similar in some ways to managing a crew.
Considering you don't look like the typical pirate, I imagine you have quite an interesting story on how you met your crew mates, Fina. Care to share it?
So how do you fit in with your crew mates, Fina? Are you the quiet one of your crew, maybe...? Or the one that keeps everyone else in check?
Jessie, I'm curious... How did you get into your, ummm... line of business? Don't think I'm interested, I'm just curious as to how that started.
Hey, Jessie. How did your career start? I can't imagine how... Oh, and please don't misinterpret my question! I'm very happy with what I do, heheh...
Jessie, is there anything you think a girl should never, ever do during sex...? I, uhhh... just to keep it in mind.
Jessie, can you think of anything a girl should never do when she's... when she's having sex? You know, just some warning would be nice.
Wh-Wh-Why are you wearing a mask...? Wait, why do you have a machete?! Yeah, that's more important!
Did they really let a person in who wears a mask and has a machete? What were they thinking?! A-And you... What are you going to do with that?
I'll probably regret asking this, but... What's your job exactly, Jason?
Okay, I'll bite... What do you work on, Jason? Why do you need a mask and a machete?

Lux, you seem to have a strong sense of justice, but has that ever been put to the test? Like... what would you do if you found someone who has committed several crimes in order to protect their loved ones?

Have you ever had your ideas of what's just challenged, Lux? I imagine it must be difficult to deal with someone who is clearly guilty of serious crimes, but has a justifiable reason for what they've done.
I get the feeling you have to deal with a lot of responsibility on a daily basis, eh? I don't blame you for coming here to play this game.
Have you been stressed out lately, Adora? I also have to deal with a lot on my shoulders, so I get it.
Can I just say how cool you look now, Adora...? She Ra? You look like an actual superhero, except cool. You know, without the goofy capes, masks, and all that.
With this transformation you look awesome, Adora! Or is it She Ra now? This is what I imagine when I think about superheroes. No silly costumes with masks and capes, just pure strength!
So, if I understand correctly, you and your friends all dress up in colorful costumes and run around all day? And... you're all adults?
So there's a group of people just like you that dress up in costumes, and hang out together? If I wasn't seeing it, I'd assume you were a little younger...
If your ability is shrinking, then how do you fight villains? You don't... shrink super small and then go inside their brains, right? That's a terrifying image.
I can't imagine how you can defeat someone by shrinking. Unless... you enter their bodies and attack them from the inside... Gulp!
You don't conceal your identity when fighting crime, right? Isn't that a bit problematic? In case the wrong person learns about what you do...
Have you ever had any trouble with someone who shouldn't learning about your superhero life? I imagine things might get awkward, at the very least.
Sorry for screaming. It's nothing personal, I'm just terrified of ghosts. Were you the same when you first met them, Yuna?
Sorry, girls... I didn't mean to scream. I never do when I meet gh-ghosts... Were you ever scared of them Yuna, or were you okay with their... situation?
Do you girls follow Yuna everywhere, or do you give her privacy? If I had two ghosts following me all the time, I'd go to an exorcist... no offense.
You girls do other things aside from hanging around Yuna all the time, right? I doubt you have more stuff to do, but having two ghosts following me everywhere would feel like torture for me.
You really are a friendly one, huh? I bet you don't have any trouble making tons of friends, Zoe.
Seeing how easygoing you are I wouldn't be surprised if you told me you have hundreds of friends, Zoe.
I assume those knights you serve must be quite lazy if they need a maid, huh? Cleaning up after yourself is not that hard.
I didn't know it was common for knights to have maids. Wouldn't it be better if they took care of themselves, and then you were free to work on something else?
You seem like quite the workaholic, Noelle? Do you ever go on a vacation? Or at least, take a day off?
I get the feeling you're busy all the time, Noelle. I hope they still let you leave on a vacation, or take a day off every now and then.
You must really love these Pokémon if you want to dedicate your life to studying them. What would you say you love the most about them?
I barely know anything about these Pokémon creatures, but there must be something quite fascinating about them if there are people who dedicate their lives to studying them. What's your reason, Dawn?
Hey, Dawn... Since you know a lot about Pokémon, are there any that could help me. I'm not holding my breath, but asking doesn't hurt.
Since these Pokémon seem to have all sorts of crazy abilities, could there be any that can make me rich? Like one that can find buried treasure, or...? I'm just curious.
Reimu, I really admire your common sense in wanting to find a partner who has the means to sustain you... But personally I think keeping my freedom is just as important as being rich.

I can't say I blame you for wanting to marry rich, Reimu. It's only logical. However, don't you think being tied to another person is a huge downside, even if they have all the money in the world? That's what I think.
What are your other band members like? You can grow very close after traveling together for a while, I should know.
I assume you're friends with the members of your band, right? It's easy to develop a friendship once you spend time sailing... uh, driving together for a while. Whichever you do.
I love cats! That already makes me like you, heheh... But I don't know how much of a cat you are. You don't get chased by dogs, right?
I already like you, Nadia... Maybe it's because of my love of cats. I can't help but wonder what other feline qualities you have. You don't have dogs chasing, right? Hahah... do you?
I really admire that you've been able to learn a whole new language, Petra. I only know the one, so I don't know how hard it is to learn an entire new one. I bet it would take me a million years.
I don't assume learning a whole new language is easy, but you handle yourself very well, Petra. I can't wrap my head around how hard studying something like that must be.
I imagine leaving your old home must've been tough, Petra. What do you miss the most about your old life?
Do you ever get homesick, Petra? Adapting to a different culture must be hard. I'm sure there's at least something you miss from your homeland.
Where did you say you're from, Kumatora? The Nowhere Islands? It's impossible not to be intrigued by such a name. Tell me everything about them.
I've never heard of these Nowhere Islands, but they sure picked my curiosity just from the name. What else can you tell me about them, Kumatora?
Do you not have a lot of female friends, Kumatora? Sometimes it's hard to get in touch with your feminine side if you're only surrounded by boys.
Are there not many girls your age where you grew up, Kumatora? If you're only surrounded by guys it can be tough for a girl to be, well... girly.
Heheheh... I'm sorry, Yuri. I know I shouldn't laugh, but you look so cute when you're blushing like a tomato.
Has anyone ever told you how cute you look when you're blushing, Yuri? I didn't know a face could get as red as a tomato. I know it's because you're nervous, sorry...
Magma girl, just because you hate water I hope that doesn't mean to avoid drinking it. Staying well hydrated is very important for your health, you know?
You can hate water all you want, but I hope you still care about staying well hydrated during the day. It would be very dumb if you don't because of your beliefs.
Fina, if you're a pirate, does that mean you have a bounty on your head? Or at least powerful people chasing after you? You certainly don't seem dangerous, but appearances can be deceiving.

I don't think I've ever seen your face on a wanted poster, Fina... which is good, of course. There are lots of dangerous people out there going after bounties. It's far better to be underestimated as a pirate, if you ask me.

So you're a thief, huh? I bet you have a huge stash of jewels hidden somewhere... I doubt you're a bad thief, right? That stash must be hidden very well... Hmmm, now what would be a good place for it?

A jewel thief... I always say that if you're gonna steal something, it should be shiny, heheh. You probably have a big stash of jewels hidden somewhere, since you're such a good thief. I've always wondered where a thief would hide their valuables...
Hey, I hope you're not planning on stealing from the people in this fine establishment... right? Because that would be disgusting. Also there's nothing very valuable around here.

Rouge, I'll be very disappointed if you ransack this place on your way out. We were invited to play a nice game, and that would be an awful way to repay everyone. Besides, I've checked and there's nothing of value nearby.

Rouge, if you're such a successful thief of precious jewels then surely you have a bounty on your head, right? There's no way the World Government would let that slide just because you aren't a pirate.
Hmmm, I wonder, Rouge... If your crimes are so high-profile you must have a big, fat bounty on your head. I can't imagine the World Government simply ignoring "the world's greatest thief".
Mari... I think I see something of myself in you, if I'd had a more normal life. Do you constantly feel like your friends would be hopeless without you? Heheh, just kidding... kinda.

Is it weird that I think we have a lot in common, even though we just met, Mari? Maybe when you know yourself well it's easier to recognize those traits in others. Do you happen to have a lot of people that depend on you, by any chance?

Do you have any other ways of dealing with stress other than playing this game? I could always use some new tips. I usually just light some candles, turn off the lights and lie in the bath for as long as I can... which is usually not a lot.
What else do you do to relax? Other than strip poker, I mean. Personally I like to take a bath, but there's only so much it can do for me when my crew mates are screaming every two minutes.
Sigh... Hearing you talk about sweets so much is gonna make me hungry. I can't believe you're in such good shape if you eat so much. How do you even do it?

I wasn't hungry when I got here, but hearing you talk about sweets so much is doing a number on me. It's hard to believe you can be in shape if all you think about is food. I don't know how you do it.

I love how kind you are, Fluttershy. I get the feeling you'll always go out of your way to help others. But I hope that hasn't gotten you into trouble. There are lots of people out there ready to take advantage of those who are too nice.

Even if we just met, I find your kindness inspiring, Fluttershy. It's always a joy to meet people like you, but don't you worry that you might be too nice sometimes? Unfortunately, there are bad people in the world willing to take advantage of the nicer ones.

case.state: I imagine you must be amazing at games to be called a "goddess"... I hope you don't blame me for hoping that's an exaggeration. I want to win, after all.
So if I understand it correctly, you're so skilled at games that they call you a "goddess"? If you never lose, then my chances of winning this game are not looking good.

state.text: Do you usually play games with your friends, Noire? Things can get intense, I've heard. I hope there isn't a sore loser among your group, or that can really sour the experience for all.
I take it you have friends who you usually play games with, right Noire? How do you deal with things when they get ugly, and the loser doesn't take it very well? Assuming that happens...
Do you have any interests other than gaming, Noire? For some reason I have a hard time picturing you gardening or cooking... But maybe, I won't judge.
So what do you do when you're not playing games, Noire? Do you have any more traditional hobbies? I have a feeling you might not be into the things most girls like.
I'm not very comfortable with death, so I'm not sure I want to learn more about what you do. It's a respectable job, but... I guess it's fine as long as you don't act creepy in any way.
Working at a Funeral Parlor is not something I'd consider fun, and I'm not sure I want to learn more about the process... Well, if you don't do anything scary, maybe...
As the Director of a Funeral Parlor you're probably quite busy, huh? I can't imagine you have a lot of competition for your business where you're from.

So you're the Director of this Funeral Parlor? If there aren't any other businesses who also handles funerals where you're from, that must mean you have a lot of work. People are always dying, after all.
I don't know much about robots, but even I can tell you're a very advanced model, or whatever. Still, this is strip poker, sooo...
My knowledge on robots is very limited, but it seems like you're very advanced. At least your voice sounds realistic. Even so, I'm not sure what you can do in this game.

I'm guessing I wasn't the first one to think you were a robot. Or do most people assume you're a man before they see you face to face? Maybe it's because it's not very common to see women using advanced weapons where I'm from.

I hope you weren't offended because I thought you were a robot. Even if I knew you were a person, I probably would've assumed you were a man. I only know guys who are into robots and technological weapons, after all.

I think I like this look on you more. It's must be hot inside that metal armor you were wearing, and having a bodysuit on top of that must feel exhausting. I wouldn't blame you if you were naked underneath, heheh...

This looks more like something I'd expect someone to wear under that big armor you were wearing before. I can't imagine how suffocating it must feel. It might even be better to be naked under it... b-but I'm not saying you should.
Jason, there's something... imposing about you that I can't pinpoint. Do you happen to have any special abilities or powers?
You have this sort of aura about you, Jason... It's hard to describe. Do you have any powers or abilities that aren't obvious?
Trixie, can I be honest with you...? I just can't stop staring at your chest. I-I mean the chest you're standing on! It's so big! I can't imagine what could be inside...

Trixie, uhhh... Don't take this the wrong way, but I just feel like your chest is too distracting. It's just so big, and... Oh, I'm talking about the treasure chest, of course! I-I should've made that clear first.
You truly look like you're ready for an adventure at any second, Trixie. I'm sure you're constantly finding hidden treasures, right? Any memorable treasure?
With all that gear you wear I have no doubt you're always jumping from one adventure to another, Trixie. For me adventure is synonymous with treasure. What's the biggest one you've found?

Is it unusual that I'd never met a goblin before, Trixie? I really didn't know it was a race. I hope that isn't a common problem for you. After all, ignorance is what usually leads to people mistreating others.

I wonder why after all my travels I'm only now meeting a goblin for the first time. Do you face a lot of people who are surprised to see you, Trixie? I hope they don't treat you poorly just because you look different.
You're up, Robin! Ugh... my hand still hurts from yesterday. I think I went too hard disciplining Luffy. In my defense, he did jump overboard trying to get a stupid floating bottle.
Ugh, your turn, Robin... Sorry, it's just my hand is still hurting from yesterday. Did you see what Luffy did last night? My fist still hurts after the lesson I gave him afterwards.
Roooobin... heheh!
Oooooooooooh, Robin...
Heh, Robin lost. You gotta be careful, right? You didn't come here wearing a lot of clothes... Well, neither did I.
Ohhh, tough luck, Robin. As far as I'm concerned, you lose your bragging rights after you lose once, even if you win the game in the end.
Robin's turn! I'm a little relieved to see you lose at least once. It would've been a major hit to my morale if you win this game with zero complications.
Knowing you, Robin, I'd say now you're gonna take off your... skirt! I'm right, aren't I?
If I had to guess, I'd say now you're taking off your skirt. It's either that or your shoes, after all.
You're gonna take off your skirt first, aren't you? Just a feeling.
Robin, you now have to, uhh... show something. Are you not embarrassed?
Are you really fine with getting to this point, Robin? There's only a couple of options left for you now, neither one good.
I'm surprised that you've been put in this position, Robin... And you still don't look even a little bit shaken.
I can't believe Robin has to bare it all... All of you better behave! She's a classy lady, so no dirty remarks, or anything.
Robin lost all her clothes...? It's hard to accept since you're always so good... You guys better be respectful!
You must've taken it easy, Robin. There's no way you would've gotten to this point otherwise... I hope none of you says anything insensitive now that she has to get naked. ~Player~?
Do you work by yourself, Rouge? I get the feeling you're a lone wolf... uhh, bat. But maybe I'm wrong.
Hey, Rouge! What's the biggest, most valuable precious gem you've ever seen? I don't have a lot of people I can talk about this sort of stuff with.

You're clearly not very shy about your body, Rouge. I always wonder what I'd do if I were put in a position where I have to choose between a big treasure and my decency... But for you that wouldn't be a question, right?

I don't think I'm very shy when it comes to my body, but you're on another level, Rouge... Say, if you had to choose between keeping your clothes on and losing a big treasure, what would you do? I think I know... but I don't know what I'd do.
So you're a doctor, Barbara? But you look so young. Are you still a student?
Are you some sort of doctor, Barbara? You don't look like any doctor I know, and you're much younger. Are you still learning?
I wanna know more about your city, Barbara. Mondstadt, was it? I've never heard of it. Is it a good place to live?
What can you tell me about Mondstadt, Barbara? I don't believe I've ever heard of a city by that name. Is there anything it's famous for?
So how do you get along with your crew, Trixie? Are you good friends with them? I hope they treat you well.
How does your crew treat you, Trixie? Do you simply work together, or would you say you're good friends with each other?
So, why did you bring all those documents? You don't plan on doing any paperwork here, right? You should relax! It's gonna be fun.
I'm sure if you came here it's because a part of you wants to relax, Ganyu. You should those documents down and just have fun, girl!
So is there anything I should know about this Liyue country in case I ever go there, Ganyu? I'd rather avoid doing anything that could be seen as strange by the people there.
What's the most important thing someone should know about your country, Ganyu? Liyue, was it? Anything that could help me avoid others looking at me weird would help.
I'm sure you're told this all the time, but you have a great body, Ganyu! You clearly work very hard. I don't know how you find the time to workout.
What kind of workout routine do you have, Ganyu? I'm sure it can't be very demanding considering how busy you are, but it sure is effective! You must be tired of people glancing at your body, huh?
Ohhh, the Ultimate Nurse! It's quite an honor to meet someone so important, heh. I hope we can be friends, Mikan.
I don't know much about the honors of the medical profession, but it sure like a big deal to meet the Ultimate Nurse. Let's get along, Mikan.

Mikan, you're a little more, uhhh... mellow than the other medical professionals I've met. But maybe a little too much... What would you do if there was a patient that needed your help, but was also very rude to you? Would you just leave them alone?

Don't take this the wrong way, Mikan, but out of all the doctors and nurses I've met you're probably the most... timid. If you ever encountered someone who needed your help, but didn't want it, what would you do?

Hmmm... I was thinking, Mikan... You're so pretty, but I don't think you're taking full advantage of that right now. If I could give you a makeover, take you shopping and to a salon, nobody would be able to take their eyes off you. Would you like that?

Oh, Mikan, I had an idea! How would you like for me to give you a full makeover some time? I think you're like a diamond in the rough. You're so pretty, but with a little help you could be a real bombshell! You'd be the main attraction, heheh.
Good for you, for bringing your pet bird... But I hope it's well trained. It's not gonna start attacking anyone, right?
That's a very beautiful bird you have there... You've trained it well, I take it. I could be dangerous bringing it with you if it can start attacking people.
I think you've been reading a little too many fantasy novels lately... I get it, they can be fun. But, umm, aren't you worried people might not take you seriously sometimes?
I'm sure you love reading a lot, Fischl... maybe a little too much. Are you ever worried that your... flowery demeanor might make it difficult for other people to take you seriously?
Hey, Fischl... Nobody among your group of peers, uhhh... makes fun of you, right? I don't understand the whole "Prinzessin" thing, but I'd hate to know it makes people treat you differently.

Fischl... {small}how do I put this?{!reset} You have friends, right? There aren't people that... make fun of you? Because of the way you behave? I wouldn't like to learn that you're being bullied, or...
I love your outfit! I think I have a swimsuit that's kinda like that... I hope nobody gives you crap for dressing the way you want.
That's a cute outfit! I wish I had one like that to wear to the beach. Hopefully, people like it where you're from.
So do you live on a Sky Island? Is it on the Grand Line? It's probably hard to tell from up there...
You must live on the sky, right Palutena? On an island? I wonder where in the world it could be...
So you study energy sources? I'm glad that it's something that helps people. Is there a reason why you're focusing on that field? Is there an energy shortage where you come from?
I gotta say, researching new forms of energy is much better than what most other I've met were focused on. Is it out of need, Heris? Do you not have good source of energy in your homeland?

I get the feeling you don't get out of the lab a lot, Heris. You even came here wearing your lab coat. I hope at least you get along well with your coworkers, if you're spending a lot of time together.
You must be so busy with your work, and you still deciding to come play this game, lab coat and all. How do you like your coworkers, Heris? You probably spend a lot of time working together, right?
I love your outfit, it's so cute! It's like something you'd wear to a play, or a show. Is that what you do?
Your outfit is so adorable! I take it you're some sort of performer, like on a play? It makes sense with how colorful it is.
Hey, Magical... Did I hear you refer to yourself as a Monster before? Did someone call you that? That's not very nice... You should teach them some manners.
Hey, why did you say you're a "Monster" before? You're not, you're a very cute young girl... If someone is calling you names, they deserve to be taught a lesson, Magical.
Do you not like your school, Miki? I get the feeling you might be a bit of a troublemaker. Well, I'm sure I wouldn't have been different if I ever went to school.

Are you the kind of girl that's constantly getting into trouble at school, Miki? Maybe your school isn't very good... If I ever went to a school with terrible teachers and staff, I'm sure I wouldn't take it lying down.
You seem like a normal schoolgirl, but I know better at this point... So, are you like a robot, or something? That's easier to believe.
This place doesn't seem to gather normal individuals, so I doubt you're just a regular schoolgirl. Because of that I'm gonna get ahead of it, and assume you're a robot... I'm right, aren't I?
You're a very proper lady, aren't you Yuna? And with that outfit you seem like who'd wear a traditional tea shop. I'm sure people who call me indecent wish I were more like you.

I like what a soothing presence you have, Yuna. I could believe if you worked as a hostess in a tea shop, or something. I'm sure you're the ideal woman in the eyes of the people that call me indecent.
Uhh... Why are you so angry? We're playing a game! You should relax and try to have fun.
I-Is there a reason why you look so angry? It feels like you're gonna blow up at any second. This is a game, you should have fun.
Man, security in this place is a joke. How else do you explain that they let you walk in with all those dangerous weapons? And, well... you.
Security really sucks here, doesn't it? I bet they didn't even bother checking your stuff. Or doing a brief psychological test, which might've helped in this case.
Why are you so hell-bent on becoming stronger? Do you have someone you want to protect? Or an enemy to defeat?
Why do you want to be stronger, Aaravi? Is there a powerful enemy that you want to defeat? Or is there another reason?
You have a sister, Kyou? Funny, I was thinking you reminded me of my own sister. She's nice and reliable, with just the right amount of bossy. I bet you have lots of people that look up to you.

It's funny that you have a sister, Kyou, because I was thinking of mine while looking at you. She was always the responsible one keeping me in check, while I was causing trouble. I bet others see you as dependable too.
You seem fairly active, Kyou. Are you into one of those school clubs they have? Going to school must be fun.
I never went to school, but don't they have different clubs with extra activities? Are you in one of those, Kyou?

Here's something you might be able to help me with, Kyou... I have some children in my crew. Well, they're not really children, but they act that way sometimes. How would you deal with them when they cause problems?

Can I ask your advice on something, Kyou? How would you normally deal with kids that constantly cause trouble? I have some in my crew... they're my same age, but it's better to treat them as kids, trust me.
You know, you're awfully rude for being so short. Shouldn't you show some respect to those taller than you, at the very least? Which would be most people.
I get that being so short you probably try to stand out in other ways, but you don't have to be so rude. Even small animals show respect to bigger animals.

You don't look like a vampire to me, but I've seen enough scary stuff to take my chances... But I have no idea what a "suckubus" is. I'm sure it was in that book of weird creatures I saw once, but i don't remember.
Vampires were the one scary creature I'd never met... You don't look scary, but maybe that's the point. I have never heard of a "suckubus" though... I don't read on scary topics for obvious reasons.
Heeey, Mari... It's not that I don't trust you, but do you have any weaknesses? You know, steak through the heart? Garlic? Crosses? Stuff like that.
I figured I'd ask, ummm... How would one kill one of your kind, Mari? Does the stuff that it says in books work? N-Not that I wanna kill you. {small}I'm just scared.{!reset}
You don't look like you're unhappy to be what you are, but is there any way in which you're maybe a little jealous of humans...?
I'm sure you can do a lot of crazy stuff that we can't do, but is there anything humans can do that you wish you could? Like, uhh... Hmmm...
So do you always pretend to be an innocent, cutesy girl? Like, every day? Because that would be exhausting. Doing it every so often would be fun.
So that was all an act until now? Pretending to be a nice, cheerful girl? I couldn't live like that every day. Pretending to be someone else can be fun sometimes, but all the time? Nah.
What a cute little thing you are! If you were just a bit, uh, shorter I think you're a doll.
Awww, you're so adorable! I could confuse for one of those cute dolls, only you're taller... kinda.
Was that a lie, about you being thousands of years old? I imagine if you lived that long, you'd probably go a little cuckoo... sooo maybe it's not a lie.

Are you truly immortal? It's hard to believe. If you lived for thousands of years I'm sure everything would seem boring to you, and it might make you act a little crazy... Huh, maybe it's true after all.
I don't think I've ever met a pirate that didn't care about making a name for themselves... It's weird, but I respect it. There are more important things in life.
Are you sure you don't want us to know your name? Being a no-name pirate would make people mock you where I'm from. But not me, I think having a reputation is overrated.
I've always liked foxes. They're kinda like cats, they're smart and they're also very cute. But, uh, I don't know if that related to you or if you beyond your ears and your tail.

You know, cats are my favorite animals, but I also like foxes. They're so cute, but they're also smart enough to avoid danger... Do you have any special connection to them beyond your fox-like traits?
It's a good thing you can move that tail with so much ease. I imagine it'd get in the way a lot of times if you couldn't. Do you have any other special abilities?
That tail you have is huge, and yet you can control its shape so easily... What else can you do, Ahri? Do you have some sort of... animal instinct, or something?

I know what it feels like to have a horde of suitors after you. There are some that even keep my photo with them, ugh... I think I might be more direct in how I deal with them, using my fists if necessary. Too bad it doesn't always work.

I don't mean to brag, but I've had my fair share of suitors, each one more annoying than the last. I usually deal with them brushing them off, or punching them if they're too annoying. But your methods might be more effective...

I've met so many members of royalty that I have no preconceptions on them. Some are outright despots, others are more than willing to roll up their sleeves and help their citizens when they need it... What kind would you say you are?

In my travels I've seen so many kingdoms and I've come to understand that there are all kinds of rulers... Some are tyrants, and some are among the most kindhearted people I've met. I wonder which one you are.
Do you have any animal companion, Turandot? Almost every princess I've known had one. One had a giant duck, another one a giant shark... What about you? Even if it's not giant...
Most princesses I've met have an animal companion. Ducks, sharks... I've heard of an Empress that has a giant snake. Do you have any, Turandot?
I bet you don't have a lot of opportunities for girl talk, do you? So, uhh... what kind of guys do you like?
I somehow have a feeling you don't have a lot of chances to partake in girl talk, am I wrong? Well, now's your chance. You go first, tell me what do you like in a guy?
While I'd love the wealth side of being royalty, I know I'd hate being cooped up in a palace, no matter how fancy it is. What do you do when you need to unwind, Turandot?

I gotta admit I'm a little jealous of princesses and queens sometimes, with all that money they have... But at least I can go wherever I want, whenever I want. Do you ever feel like you gotta get away from everything?
What's your home region like, Gloria? Anything I should know if I ever visit?
I'd like to learn about where you come from, Gloria. Is there anything your regional culture is known for?
S-Sorry if I seem a little jumpy. I'm a little terrified of all things demonic... At least you seem nice. I'm sure you get this reaction all the time from people, am I wrong?

Th-This is my first time meeting a demon... The only reason I haven't ran away yet is because you seem kind. But I'm sure a lot of people judge you by your wings and horns, and I don't wanna be like that.
Are you really thousands of years old? Geez, I can't even imagine what that must be like. I'm sure it has its ups and downs.
I can't believe you're thousands of years old... Or maybe my mortal brain can't comprehend it. What is that like?
Seriously? You didn't know? Well, I guess if you want to back down now is the time.
Ugh... S-Sorry, that wasn't directed at you. I've just had bad experiences with women with horns and dinosaur features...
Oh, damn... N-Nice to meet you. It's just you aren't the first woman I've met who has horns and dinosaur-like features. It awakens some bad memories.
What a weird creature... Good thing Luffy isn't here, or he would ask her to join the crew.
What is that? The sea really is a vast place...
A fighter, huh? I'm sure you're no match for Luffy.
So you're a fighter. It's a good thing my crew mates are not here, or some of them would be eager to get into a fight with her for no reason.
You're a princess? You wouldn't happen to know Vivi, right? She's the princess of the Kingdom of Alabasta. I haven't talked to her in ages.
You're a princess, right? I've met a few, I know what they look like. No big deal.
Oh, a princess! I bet your kingdom is rich and powerful. Those clothes you're wearing look expensive...
You... look a little young to be here. If you're as young as you look, you should leave now.
Doesn't that uniform mean you're still in school? Then what do you think you're doing here?
I doubt anyone would have the nerve of saying I dress inappropriately with you standing next to me... That's still a cute outfit, though.
I don't see anything indecent about that outfit, but I also don't consider my own look inappropriate, and yet people are always bugging me about me. What do you think, ~player~?
Did I mention I really like your hair, ~name~. Heheh... I'm not biased, I swear.
I'm very happy that you're here, ~name~. People often say "It was the orange-haired woman that did it!". But this time, they won't know which one of us they meant.
You're fully into the Christmas spirit, huh? I understand, I also love holidays... especially ones that involve receiving expensive presents!
So, ~name~... What presents did you bring for us? You're clearly dressed for Christmas... Are you gonna tell me you didn't bring presents?

case.state: Very well! I'm on the right track here. You're up, ~name~.
How many more times do I have to win to get the money? As many as it takes, I guess.
You won't pose a challenge if you don't focus, ~name~. So... why don't you tell us about yourself?
Great! Another round won and zero losses so far!
I'm doing great! Aren't I? I think I'm doing perfect.
Hey, that seemed to work for me. I think I'm getting better and better.
Sorry, ~name~, but you were in my way. Next one is...
Look at me go! I'll have that prize in no time!
Winning in this game will never get old.
Oh, yeah! I'm unstoppable. Seriously, try to stop me.
Hey, don't feel bad. Maybe you won't lose the next round, but don't expect me to help you with that.
Looks like I win this time. Not too shabby for an amateur like me.
Yes! Let's keep on winning! I'm going for broke here.
Can we bet on what ~name~ is going to remove? It would be another chance to earn some money.
Aren't I great at this game? Seems that way! Even I didn't know.
Good job, everyone! Well, except for ~name~.
I can already feel that exciting treasure nearby... I mean, prize.
I'm much more than meets the eye... Oh, but you already know I'm a pirate.
I made it! Another one is in the bag.
Hehehe! I love winning! This would be fun even if there wasn't money involved.
Yes! I love it when things go right for me for a change.
I told you, I'm not messing around anymore. The stakes are higher than ever.
It's unfortunate. If you don't like this outcome, you're always free to rebel against this game, ~name~. I won't stand in your way.
Good, now I can relax. If only for a second... What should I do in the meantime?
Yay! Winning is the best feeling! No, wait... winning money is the best feeling!
Heheheh, big catch, big catch!
Sorry, but I can't afford to play around anymore. I'm way past my limit for having fun.
I knew ~name~ was gonna lose. How? I don't know... Woman's intuition?
Sweet victory, here I come! I'm gonna leave here with my dignity intact.
Even if I'm half naked, I'm not gonna give up... Especially because I'm half naked!
This victory is mine! Any complaints? No? Good!
Everything's okay for now! Now I just need to keep winning.
Sorry, but I'm not gonna lose just yet. There's so much more I still want to do... like winning!
Sucks to be you... But not as much as it sucks to be me right now.
Yes! I'm down, but I'm not defeated yet!
Hey, remember I had to take off everything. Now it's your turn.
No complaining, young lady. We all have to suffer in this game.
Someone has to lose, ~name~. You should know the game at this point.
Okay, ~name~! If you see me touching myself while I look at you it's because I have to do it... It's okay, right?
I never think about girls when I do this, but since the spotlight's on you... and you're very attractive...
Oh, right! You're still playing the game. But for how much longer? I wonder...
Loser! I guess I'm a bigger loser since I lost way earlier. But still, hahah!
My favorite part of losing the game, is making fun of the ones that are still playing.
Oh, man! The game is still going strong after I lost. It's kinda thrilling.
Ahhh... ~name~. Were you always glowing this much? Maybe it's the determination in your eyes that you have now...

state.text: Seriously? A tie? I didn't know that was a thing in this game. Well, no harm done.
A tie, huh? Does that mean there are two losers in this round? Oh, no one loses! That makes more sense.
Hey, stop flying around! You're bothering everyone and you're making me dizzy.
What are you doing?! Just stay in your spot! If you keep flying around like that you're gonna bump into someone.
You like those yakisoba pan, huh? I don't get the feeling they're very nutritional. You should eat something better, for your own good.
Really? Those yakisoba pan? Wouldn't you rather eat a nice dinner? Something more substantial that would give you more energy, at least.
A puzzle, huh? If I solve it, can I keep whatever's inside?
But then what's all that stuff for? It almost feels like a threat...
That's a relief... Then why do you carry all those weapons? Just for show?
The Koprulu sector? Where is that? I've never heard of it. But the name sounds so foreign...
In what sea is this Koprulu sector? I've never heard of that name, much less a war happening there. But how far away can it be?
Huh, so it's exactly what I thought it was. But... why? Is it like a macho thing to carry a rocket launcher with you?
I was just gonna say it looks like a rocket launcher boombox... Why do you need something like that? It seems overly macho to me.
Don't worry about it! Just don't turn around until you find a mirror.
Oh... Forget I said anything! Maybe it's not too bad... but you should probably check with a mirror before you turn around.
Woah woah woah...! Who said it was a "free" meal? I only use that word as in "freedom". I guess I can give you a friends discount though... Maybe 0.5%?
"F-Free"...?! A free meal? Who said that? Certainly not me, I never use that word with that meaning. But I suppose I can give you a special discount on the bill... How about 0.5%?
It is annoying! But if your determination didn't ruffle any feathers it wouldn't be noteworthy. Your opponents are probably jealous.
Exactly! Annoying is a perfect way to describe that tenacity. But who cares? That's what makes it impressive. I'm sure your opponents which they had that determination.
Oh, come on... I'm giving you the chance to brag about your great accomplishments. How could you waste it so easily?
Awww, don't be so modest. I'm sure you not trying to make a big deal, but I really wanna hear it. Pretty please?
I see... If you're just a cog in the machine then it's possible that you're not one of the bad guys.
Hmmm... If you have a low ranking position, then you might still be holding on to your ideals.
I get it. It gets your heart pounding, doesn't it? But personally I care more about the reward than the excitement. I take it you'd prefer a challenge over an easy score, huh?

I understand that it can be exciting, but for me that comes mostly from getting my hands on that beautiful treasure... If I have a chance to get it easily, I'll take it! What about you? Do you make things challenging for yourself on purpose?
Huh?
(How is he doing this?)
Yep, exactly like Franky.
Hmmm, now that I look at them, those wings are much bigger than the ones the Skypieans had. Are you from a different sky island?
What sky island are you from, Pit? Your wings seem bigger than the ones from the citizens of Skypiea.
That sash looks valuable! Mmmm, I miss that beautiful sky gold...
That golden sash must be expensive, right Pit? I still remember we got a lot of money from selling that sky gold.
You sure have a lot of weird artifacts. I have a friend who'd probably like to examine them.
I was wondering what that weird device is. Well, it doesn't matter if you're taking it off.
Warmblood? Oh, you're probably different from the Minks that live at Zou, so you have a different name for your race.
For a tough looking guy you sure wear a lot of accessories. What's up with that?
I somehow doubt that's actually gold. But I would still like to confirm it.
What's all this talk about booty? I sure not turning my back with you here.
Is that your weapon?
DAMMIT, BROCK!

case.state: WHAT DID I JUST SAY?!

state.text: Hmmm, I was just going to ask about those keys... Of course, they must open something very important, right? And there's so many of them...
I noticed those keys right away... May I ask what they open? Maybe a treasure chest... No, a lot of treasure chests?

case.state: Heh, I think I'd look good in a skin tight cat costume. What do you think, Cat Noir?
Mmmm, I bet you're not the only one who looks good in a cat costume, Cat Noir. I'm sure I'd look even cuter inside a skin tight feline suit.

state.text: Hey, where are you going? Come back here! She just left...
Where do you think you're going, Perona! Come back here, right now!
So adorable finding a guy who is shy about undressing in front of others! Adorable and refreshing.
Heheh, if you're shy about stripping, I bet you're also a gentleman... Just a feeling I have.

case.state: That's... pretty much what I would do. I can't blame you.
I knew you were going to go with your ~clothing~. Just a feeling...
Alright. If that's how you wanna play, I'll rise up to the challenge.
Oh, so that's how it's gonna be, huh? I see, I see...
What?! Hmph...
This is annoying. Just as annoying as when Luffy keeps asking me every 10 seconds when are we arriving to the next island... Okay, it's not that annoying.
Oh, you're taking that off? So I guess you don't really care if it gets "lost"...
Awww... I was hoping you'd keep your ~clothing~ until the end of the game? For me? No? Eh, it was worth a try.
Sigh... I guess you were gonna get around to your ~clothing~ eventually. Better sooner than later.
Still with the ~clothing~?! Grrr... You're pushing my temper to new limits...
Oh, come on! Aren't we past this point now? Like an hour ago?
I don't think I've ever felt so annoyed by a guy I just met. Well... maybe I have. There's a lot of competition.
Of course you're taking off your ~clothing~. Why are you this way?
Your ~clothing~... what a crappy move. I'm not mad, I'm just disappointed.
That's it? Is that seriously, it? I hope this isn't how you treat every girl you meet...
Why are men so insensitive...? Just when you think you've met someone nice...
Inconsiderate jerk! A gentleman wouldn't do something like this.
I swear, men make an even bigger deal than women about showing a little skin.
Figures you're trying to grasp every small opportunity you have to show less skin.
I know I shouldn't care about the game anymore, but something about this really pisses me off!
This is just sad. I don't look cute when I cry, you know? Now the only thing that can make me feel better is if you get naked too, ~name~.

Are you trying to make fun of me? I think you are... "Oh, I'm gonna remove ~clothing.ifPlural(these|this)~ ugly ~clothing~ so she feels even worse about being naked!" Yeah, that's what you sound like.
I, uh... don't think I know many men who wear accessories. Nothing wrong with it, it's just unusual for me.
Is it common for men to wear accessories where you're from, ~name~? I'm not very used to seeing it.
Do you know more men who wear accessories, ~name~? I don't think I do...
Awww... That's it? Why don't you take off something else too, ~name~? I'm just so eager to see more of your body... ♡

I'm gonna be honest, that's a little disappointing. I was just so excited that you had lost, ~name~. I guess I wanna see more of you... Oh, but you'd have to remove something else in addition to your ~clothing~. ♡

Oh, how terrible... The person I wanted to lose the most is only removing his measly ~clothing~. I was finally hoping I'd get to see more of his body... Ah, but he'd have to remove something else as well. ♡

state.text: Oh, well... I guess our Ghost Girl couldn't take the stress from this game, after all. I don't blame her.
It seems like Perona wasn't able to handle this game in the end, so she decided to leave. Don't think any less of her, please.
Of course you got dizzy! You were flying around like a cannonball. It doesn't seem like you're going to apologize, so I'll do it for you: She's sorry.
Do you feel better now? Sure, you're dizzy. What did you think would happen? At least you didn't hit your head.

case.state: I swear, if you bump your head somewhere I'm not gonna bother... Ah...!
If you keep flying like that, you're gonna bump into someone! You better don't cry when... Ah...!

state.text: You're kidding, right? You don't look like someone who comes from outside this planet. I-I just guess I'd expect them to have weirdly shaped heads, or something...
For real? Normally I wouldn't believe that, but I don't get the sense that you're lying... How could you even travel here from that far away?
B-Bio... weapons? I don't like the sound of that even one bit, and I have no idea what they are...
Did you say... bio-organic weapons? Not that there's any weapons that are good, but those sound particularly scary, for some reason...
I think I understood like 50% of that... Okay, more like 20%.
That's true... Although most people think my Clima-Tact is just a baton. They don't take me seriously until they see me in action.
Can't argue with that. But unlike your huge revolver, my Clima-Tact looks like a baton. People don't really fear me until I use it on them.
Ugh, now you sound like Luffy when he talks about meat. Eating vegetables is good for you, even if it's once in a while...
I'm sure I've heard Luffy say the same thing about meat. Eating a salad for once won't kill you, far from it.
Well, you do look very pitiful... Fiiiiine, you can eat for... ugh... for "free". But no seconds! Not unless there are leftovers.
Alright, alright... There's no need to beg. We won't bill you this time. But if you misbehave, I'm kicking you out without dessert... Be grateful that I'm a softie.
Okay... Maybe you're not so bad. I can at least give you the benefit of the doubt, Mr. Special Agent.
Heh, alright... I've decided to trust that you're not a bad guy, Leon... and I'll assume that's your real name too.
Your belts disappeared. Is that an ability? But how...?
(Is he stopping time or something? No, that would be too far-fetched and terrifying for a Devil Fruit ability.)
And I thought I'd have a chance to relax in this game without dealing with weird individuals.
Wow, a sky archipelago! I'd love to see it one day, but there's no way I'm going to the White Sea through the Knock Up Stream again.
A sky archipelago! That must be a sight to behold. But if I ever go above the clouds again, I hope it's through a different route. The Knock Up Stream almost killed us.
Don't worry, I have no intention of stealing it. No matter how expensive it looks.
I'm not gonna steal it from you. I'm just kidding. Ah... But I do miss looking for sky treasures.
That card isn't from this game, dummy. I have a feeling you won't last long.
You have nice eyes. Why would you want to hide them?
What kind of sword is that? It emits light. Zoro would probably be freaking out if he saw it.
How can you be so careless with that thing? It's a mystery to me how you're still alive.
This isn't the first time this has happened, is it? sigh

case.state: Some days my crew mates even forget to wear a shirt.
Yeah, I think I prefer a man of simple taste.
Or maybe you just wore that stuff for this game. I should see what you dress like on another day.
Ugh, it was worth a try... Let's just continue.
Yeah, i didn't think that would work. I don't know why I bothered trying.
Sigh... Of course that didn't work. But now I know you're not that dumb, ~name~... Or at least you don't think with your other head.

state.text: We could use a guy who's polite and more reserved in our crew. We could also use another girl... Anyone to balance things out, really.
I'm sure I can make you feel more secure and welcomed here. If there's anything I can do, you just need to ask. ♡

case.state: Well, as long as I haven't lost a round yet... I still feel like I'm winning.
It's no big deal. But if things go south for me later, this might come back to haunt me.
Next time I lose, I'm taking off my bracelet. I don't wanna hear any complaints then.
If I lose another round, I'll take off my bracelet. It's only fair, after all. An eye for an eye. Tit for tat.
Maybe next time you'll remove something bigger and stop wasting our time. Wouldn't that be special?
You seem to be determined to extend this game as much as you can. What's your deal, ~name~? Don't you have friends you'd rather be with?
Everyone seems to be conspiring to make this game as long as they can. I suppose it's up to me to finish it.
It's a good thing I'm used to dealing with weird guys. I bet you're no different, ~name~.
Alright, I don't really have to worry about what you take off. I'll just focus on making you lose enough times.
Okay, I guess I don't have to play fair if you won't. I'm a pirate after all, remember?
When I get my Clima-Tact back, I'm gonna summon a black cloud to follow you around all day long.
Great, now I'm in a bad mood. Only a good hand next round can switch things around.
You know, if you were a little nicer to other people, they might treat you better too.
You won't earn any points with me by acting like a jerk. I like to be treated nicely.
That's it, ~name~! I'm going to kick your ass! In the game, I mean. Unless you provoke me even more...
I hope your dream is becoming fish food, ~name~, because I'm gonna make it come true!
I'll kick your ass after the game! Hopefully you'll also be naked at that point, so it'll be your bare ass I will kick!
It's just your body. Are you really ashamed of it? I'm sure it's not too bad.
Whatever, it's not like I want to see more of you. I can just look at... the ~background.surface~.
Maybe I should steal all your clothes before I leave, and then give them to my male crew mates as a gift. That would be a fitting end for you, ~name~.
I bet you think you're so funny with your goofy ~clothing~. Oh, it's not a joke? Then forget I said anything.
I think it'd be very ironic if someone stole all your clothes except for your ~clothing~. Hey, you'd still have something to wear at least. Since accessories are soooo important...
Boooo...! Oh, come on, everyone! It's just cringe if I'm the only one booing.
Some days my crew mates even forget to wear a shirt.
Yeah, I think I prefer a man of simple taste.
Or maybe you just wore that stuff for this game. I should see what you dress like on another day.
Ugh, it was worth a try... Let's just continue.
Yeah, i didn't think that would work. I don't know why I bothered trying.
Sigh... Of course that didn't work. But now I know you're not that dumb, ~name~... Or at least you don't think with your other head.

state.text: We could use a guy who's polite and more reserved in our crew. We could also use another girl... Anyone to balance things out, really.
I'm sure I can make you feel more secure and welcomed here. If there's anything I can do, you just need to ask. ♡
Hey, stop flying around! You're bothering everyone and you're making me dizzy.
What are you doing?! Just stay in your spot! If you keep flying around like that you're gonna bump into someone.
Wow, that sounds awfully nice for an organization that wants to destroy the world, or something... Oh, sorry! You were going to explain that.
Huh, I wouldn't expect an evil organization to be so good to its employees. But maybe I'm misunderstanding. Please, explain what you're all about.
That's so cool! Personally, I love cats! They're so fluffy and warm. Everytime I see one, I wanna squeeze that cute little rascal!
I love it. So, ummm... Are there any talking animals among the ones you've met? There's one in my crew, a reindeer. I hope you don't think I'm crazy, or anything.
Seriously, I'm right here...

Not at all. Sure, it'd be nice to be stronger so I shouldn't have to rely on others so much. But I don't envy those who are, I'm a navigator. And if I was arguing with Robin all the time, we'd be just like the guys.

Nah, I'm definitely not jealous. If I were stronger I wouldn't have to rely on friends like Robin so much, so I guess that would be better... But if we were constantly trying to one-up each other, we'd be just like Zoro and Sanji.
Heheheh, come on... You know how weak I am to compliments. I think I can be satisfied just knowing that you think I'm prettier than you.
Oh, Robin, you... Just knowing that you think I'm cute is enough for me. It's not like I didn't know it already, but your opinion is worth the world to me.
Ufff... Umm, girls, it wasn't my intention to start anything between you two. Why don't we take a deep breath, and forget I ever said anything?
Y-You... googly-eyed freak! Flying around, and laughing with that stupid laugh... All you do is act creepy and weird!
Wh-What did you say, you flying creep?! You freak everybody with your weird eyes, and that stupid laugh... "Horohorohoro..." I'll make your ass "horo"!
What are you waiting for, ~player~? Help her.
Woah! What's happening? It suddenly got a little too cold in here.
Oh yeah?! What about that invisible creep that tried to get his hands on me and even force me to marry him?
How can you defend them?! Especially that invisible bastard that tried to force me to marry him!
He didn't just tell me, he bragged about it for days! It was kinda hard to get him to shut up about it.
Yeah, he talked about how he "kicked your butt" for a looong time. It was pretty obnoxious, to be honest.
Oh, are you guys... together? I guess it would make sense.
A man and a woman, living together in a castle... I take it you two are together, right?
Huh...?! Why would that be a concern of yours? Doesn't it take some of the pressure off losing the game?
B-But shouldn't it be the other way around? It should be easier to play the game with someone who has already seen you naked.
What the hell...? You work for them? You, a thief? I don't know where to begin... What can a thief even do to prevent a global crisis? Are you also an assassin, or something?

Huh?! So you're on the government's payroll? Man... I don't know why I'm surprised, they're involved in way shadier stuff, after all. But I doubt you work for them simply as a thief. Do they have you kill people too?
Yeah... Humans do a lot of crappy stuff. Damaging the oceans is just one more thing to add to the list.
Hmmm, equality... So far, so good.
Eh? Where did she go?
Hey, have a little respect. Not only for us, but for yourself too.
Ahhhhh!!! I hate bats!
Ah, my eyes!
Ah...! What is that light?!
Yeah... But the other Neptune is a king and a very nice guy too, so not really a bad person to share a name with. No matter how funny it is, heheh...
The Neptune I know is a king... Oh, but he's still a good guy. If you have to share a name with someone, he's not a bad match. It's still a little funny, though. Heheh...
Oh, I don't think he was named after you. I don't know his age, but he looked kind of old... I'd say at least 70.
Oh, but he wasn't young as you. He looked like he was in his 70s... Maybe his 80s? He has a big beard, so...
That place sounds awful! At least when he did the same thing to me later, he sent me to a better place. You probably made him angry.
Doesn't sound like an island I'd want to visit. Why didn't he have the courtesy of sending you to a better place? I don't think you annoyed him that much.
Good for you! The Florian Triangle is a horrible place... So terrifying, and gloomy.
Wherever you're living now, it's gotta be better than the Florian Triangle. If there's one place I don't want to visit again, it's that horrifying, dark sea.
Why would you be wearing a witch costume if you're not a girl playing around?
Oh, you're not a kid? I just thought, given your size and the witch costume...
Another world...?! But... Huh...? W-What's this world you're talking about like?
Did you say another world? But how...? Ummm... What kind of world are you from, Ringo?
Oh, so it's not blood. That's a relief... Wait, what do you mean red like your soul? Souls have colors?
A red soul? Souls have colors? I'm not sure what that means, but I'm glad it's not blood.
Oh, I wasn't referring to your height. More like your... Umm... Y-You're very pretty!
Hmm? Oh, yes. I guess you're tall too. But I was talking about your... A-About how pretty you are!

You don't need to get so defensive, I was just curious. There's nothing wrong with taking some time to yourself, especially when you spend every waking minute with others. But maybe you can make new friends here...

I did come here on my own to take some time away from my friends. That doesn't mean I don't love them, you just need some time to yourself every now and then. And this might be a good place for you to find new friendships, right?
A pink hedgehog? That's adorable! You'd think I'd find that unusual, but I'm already friends with a humanoid reindeer, heheh...
Oh, a hedgehog! I've never met a pink hedgehog before... or one who can talk. Are your friends part animal too, Amy?
It's great that you found your vocation at a young age! I'm sure you'll do great with that enthusiasm. So do you already have any plans for after you graduate?
I'm sure it makes a big difference to have a role model in that career. My mom was in the military, but she retired so she could raise my sister and me. It's a tough life.
Thanks! Not that I think I'd need your services! I'm just curious. Heheheh...
Great, thanks! Oh, but I'm an upstanding citizen! I doubt I'll ever be in need of a lawyer, heheh...
Are you worried someone at your workplace mind find out that you participated in this kind of activity, Mia? I'm not what you'd call a traditional woman, and I'm still a little worried...
What if a rumor starts circulating at your workplace about you playing this game, Mia? Would you just quit and move to another country? I'm not sure I'd blame you...
Well, that's good! So what do you spend most of your money on? It's never a bad idea to save some of it...
G-Great...! Uhhh... Did you say some of your bounties die? Does that mean you can't turn them it? But those posters do say "Dead or Alive"... I-I am not giving you any ideas, I hope!
Artificial wings? That's amazing! Did you build those yourself? I don't think I've ever heard of something like that existing.
Are you serious? You explain it so casually, but I'd never imagined that someone could build an actual pair of wings! Did you make them?
Let's see... There's Chopper, my crew's doctor. He's a reindeer. I also once met a doctor who lived inside a whale. Then there's Traffy, who can remove a person's heart without killing them...
That sounds impressive! Can you cure any type of wound? If I was fighting on your team, I wouldn't move from your side, heheh...
That's so unfair... Wait, so you still gotta work out? You can't, like... change your appearance at will? If you could, then maybe there would be a part of your body you'd want to change, am I wrong?
Hmmm... So being a goddess doesn't mean you can't change your appearance any way you want? Huh... If you could, would you like to change anything about your body?
A request? Heheh, sure... Should I tell you what I can do first? I don't want to disappoint you... Well, just tell me your request anyway, but keep your expectations low.
You have a request for me? Sure, you can ask... N-Now I'm a little nervous. What if I can't fulfill it? Well, I can hear it at least...
Creatures from the dark? I'm not sure I wanna hear about them, but I feel like I have to... If they even make you worry, then I should probably know about them.
Wh-What kind of creatures? You look strong, and you're still wary of them, so I feel like I should be too...
So Alola is an archipelago? I love warm regions, so I'd love to visit one day... Ummm, these beaches are not nudist beaches though, right?
So you really love your work, huh? Wait, did you say you went on strike? Why was that? Bad working conditions? Unfair compensations?
