Well, don't work yourself too hard, Wiki... Uh, did you say "strike"? Can I ask why that was? If you're so workaholic, it must've been something serious.
You must be quite wealthy... Am I right, Cynthia? Few things say fancy like a nice looking scarf.
That scarf looks expensive, Cynthia. Do you happen to be wealthy, by any chance?
I wasn't scared of statues at first, but then I saw one come to life in a haunted castle, and... Wait, it wasn't a statue. it was a painting. Maybe I'm just scared of art in general.
It's probably because one time, a living statue started chasing me... Or was it a painting? Ah, yes... I guess you could say I've had bad experiences with art coming to life.
1970's... Oh, come on. You're making it sound like some futuristic thing. So how do you play video games? Is it with chips? Ropes? Cards too?
Uhhh... I definitely haven't heard about them. And I know all the modern card and board games... Okay, I don't really know them. But how different can these video games be? How do you play them?
Oh, your face lit up when you mentioned your sister. She clearly means a lot to you. Do you think about her often?
Sharena? So you do have friends who care about you. I'm sure that's the case if she wants to see you smile more. What's she like?
Seriously? That doesn't sound very believable... How real is it? Can you feel pain there?
A world created through technology? That's crazy! But it can't be too close to reality, right? Like, can you experience pain there?
I do feel more relaxed seeing how sweet you two look together. It's nice to know that love isn't determined by how, ummm... "alive" both parts are.
You're really into each other, huh? That's heart-warming... I never knew that love could even transcend death, I guess.

case.state: Hang on there, I wasn't born yesterday... You weren't just pretending to be bad at poker so we'd go easy on you, right? Because if that's the case...
Are you trying to take advantage of my generosity? Nice try, lady! But if you're only putting on an act, we're gonna have a very different conversation.

state.text: Hey, if they're okay with me making it rain here, they should also be okay with their stuff getting a little wet. We all should, in fact.
I don't think I've heard of any of those places... Wait, do you come from the sky? But you don't have wings... Were you only raised up there?
Huh... None of those places ring a bell. But did you say you come from the sky? Although you don't have wings like the sky people. Were you born above the clouds?
Really? They're that strong? And you've never had any trouble with them following your commands?
They're friendly? So... you can pet a Pokémon without being worried that you'll lose your hand?

Ugh, I'm so jealous of your all-female crew. I guess most women are not interested in putting everything aside, and leave their homes so they can spend every day living in a ship, facing countless dangers...
Sometimes I wish my crew had only women... But I suppose not many normal girls are willing to leave a comfortable life to spend every day at sea. It's not an easy living, so I don't blame them.

case.state: Oh, well I don't care much about weapons, but I suppose they're important if they help you get stronger. Who was that guy you defeated? Was he strong?
Awww, that's sweet! Soooo... do you still have that piece of gold?
Oh, an orb! That sounds really valuable! Like something you'd find inside a cave full of traps. Did you sell it for a lot of money?

state.text: You're welcome! If we ever fight, I promise I'll use my strongest attack to knock you out immediately so you don't suffer.
Hey, don't sweat it. Now that we know each other, the least I can do is knock you out with my strongest attack if we ever fight. I'll make it quick and painless.
You don't have to tell me, I get it. I think you're super pretty... So do people make fun of your stature?
Hey, I understand. I like petite girls, especially when they're as cute as you, hahah... Umm, do you not like to be reminded of that?

case.state: Oh, sorry... I wasn't trying to say you were into something perverted. Only that superheroes are the kind of thing the boys in my crew are into. I didn't know women are also a part of this world.
N-No, I don't think wearing a mask is weird... Well, it is, but what I meant is that I didn't know there were female superheroes. It seems very much like a profession that only boys are into.

state.text: Really? You're into literature, ~player~? Who would've guessed...? So what kind of trouble did you have in the club, Monika? If you don't mind me asking.
I'm not really surprised to learn that you're into literature, Monika. But ~player~...? Well, what kind of issues have you guys encountered in your club?
A lumberjack? Then what is the machete for? You said it was for work...
Wait... If you're a lumberjack, then why do you need a machete? You can chop wood with that.
You study energy? That sounds like a very demanding field. I can't imagine many people specialize in that. Do you work by yourself?

I'm not gonna lie, that sounds very complicated... Wait, did you say "magic"? I thought you were a scientist... I just imagine some people might have a hard time taking you seriously if your studies involve magic.
Huh, it doesn't seem to me like you'd have trouble talking to people. Have you spent a lot of time alone?
That's smart, choosing a vice president that complements your weaknesses. She's not very good at the more administrative part of the work, I take it?
Awww, you're taking off your collar? I like it. It's just like one a cat would wear... Heheh, so cute.
Awww, I like that collar. It's so cute! It really ties all the cat look together.

It's certainly strange. In all the places I've visited people talk the same language, no matter if it's above the clouds or at the bottom of the sea. They are different writing systems, but the archeologist of my crew would know more about that.
Don't sell yourself short. I have no trouble understanding you, so you've clearly been doing great. I'm sure you must've had a good teacher.
I can't say I don't admire your determination... But if you found someone with all those qualities, would you still be loyal and supportive? Or would you just use them and abuse them?
Heh, sounds like you need to add chump to that list of yours... But how do you intend to treat this hypothetical spouse, assuming they're as perfect as you want?
I see... Do you drink a lot on the job too? That might be dangerous, considering your job is not exactly one in which you can take things easy.

I guess it's fine to drink here, since we're playing a game. But I hope you don't drink when you're working too. You're already putting your life in the line as a bounty hunter, you don't need to make the line even thinner.
So... the bad guys also dress up? And they expect to be taken seriously? I have no idea how that would be possible. Now I feel sorry for them.

Wait a second, so even the evil guys you're fighting dress up in silly costumes? You guys at least are good, but I have no idea how you can fear someone who dresses like an animal, no matter what evil scheme they have.
What...?! That's horri- Wait, you're joking aren't you? Hmph...! Now I'm even more convinced that your power is not very useful.
Oh my...! That's so... I-It's not true, is it? Don't joke about stuff like that! I take it that means your powers truly aren't very useful.
Wait, you're taking off your sunglasses? I thought it was supposed to be clothes...
Huh? Sunglasses count in a strip poker game? Are you sure that's in the rules, Robin?
You seem to be somewhat at home in this game, Robin... Have you ever played something like this before?
Robin, I hope you don't get offended, but, umm... Have you ever played a game like this one before? You just seem so familiar with it.

It must be a nice change of routine to spend the ~background.time~ playing a game instead of reading like always, huh Robin? What's the name of that book you've been reading these last few days? The big one?
At least your eyes can take a break from reading while we play this game. For these last few days you've been glued to that big book... what was its name?
This reminds me... Did Chopper get a pair of sunglasses just like yours? I saw him wearing them the other day.
By the way, did Chopper get a pair of sunglasses that look just like yours? He was wearing them the other day.

Those sound good! They're always fighting and racing anyway, except while causing all kinds of destruction around the ship. I think I'd feel better if they do it on a screen instead. People never cause trouble while playing these videogames, right?

I like that! If the guys are gonna fight and race each other, I'd prefer it if they do it on a screen than around the ship. I'm getting excited about the idea of introducing them to these videogames! Everybody always gets along peacefully while playing them, right?
My goodness! I'd never talk about my own sister that way! I'm sure most people wouldn't... Uhh, I'm sure she isn't that bad. Don't you have anything good to say about her?
I-Is that how you usually talk about your sister? That's so different from the relationship I have with mine. I'm sure yours isn't that bad, right? Isn't there anything about her you like?
Wait, where did you even pull that dessert from? Hmmm... Are you constantly boasting to your female friends about how lucky you are with your anatomy? They might not like that.
Is that so...? You're not worried that's gonna make you the target of jealousy from your female friends? Not everybody is so lucky with what they eat.
Oh, it did? I'm so sorry... I hope it wasn't anything too awful. I understand if you don't wanna walk about it.
I'm sorry... That was what I feared. I hope that experience didn't sour you, whatever it was.

Hmmm, I see the point of not holding back against an opponent to push them further... But how does your sister take it? Is it frustrating for her to lose over and over again? The point of games is to have fun, right?

It sure sounds like you take games very seriously. Is it important among your kind to be good at games? If those who aren't very good are looked down upon by the rest, then I can understand working hard to get better at them.

It's just I've never heard of women working with robotic enhancements... But you're right, I shouldn't make assumptions just because I didn't imagine you'd be an attractive woman... which is probably something you don't hear a lot, if you're always wearing that armor.

I probably have a bias against robots and stuff... It's just because I don't understand it, and the boys act like it's their own thing. That's why I wasn't expecting a woman, especially one so attractive. I wouldn't think you'd take care of your image cooped up in that armor.
Okaaay... Takes one to know one, I guess. But seriously, I don't think everyone here would make for a good target, like ~player~, for example. But I don't know if you have a moral compass, Rouge.
Uhhh, fair enough. Still, I've personally never felt good taking from people that don't deserve it. I don't know if you're the same... For instance, would you make ~player~ your target?
Heh, I get that... If you were to become the queen then you'd have more responsibility, right? I'd much rather be able to go where I want than having to sit on a throne ordering people around.
I understand that. I wouldn't give away my freedom, even to be a queen. It must be tough having all that responsibility on your shoulders.

case.state: For real?! Thank you, Trixie! Now I have another reason to win... Oh, but that would mean you'd lose. I don't know if I'd feel good about that...
Really?! You'd just give me it to me if I win? Thank you, Trixie! I love you... But wouldn't you then lose both your clothes and whatever's in the chest? That's... too cruel.

state.text: Ahhh, I love gold... I'm sure it was worth the effort. So what did you do with the money you got? I hope you and your friends didn't just spend it all at once.
I know what you mean. Sometimes the journey is just as fun as the reward. But I don't mind an easy score! So what did you and your friends do with all the money you got from the statue?
That just pisses me off... So where do goblins usually gather, if they're not allowed to in the big cities? They gotta have their own haven, right?

That's terrible, Trixie. I'm sorry humans are the worst... At least I'm glad you don't seem to be bitter about it, and you haven't grown to resent your race or others. Hatred born from hatred is never good.
Oh, I see... Wait, a Vision? Is that what you call a power you got after eating a weird fruit at one point, by any chance?
Huh, I've never heard of a Vision... {small}but people do have different names for Devil Fruit abilities in different parts of the world.{!reset}
The "City of Freedom", huh? That sounds very appealing... I hope it's still a peaceful city. I love freedom, but for some people that means they can do whatever they want, with no concern for others.

I noticed you said "guidance"... So there isn't a king, or some sort of ruler? It's amazing that the city can function solely based on faith and freedom. I once visited an island that was governed by a God, but the situation was very different.
Yeeeah, but you get used to the glances. As long as people are not gross, I don't mind. And if they are, I just put them in their place right away. Do you have a lot of suitors, Ganyu?

Well, it's unavoidable that you gather more attention when you look good. I find it flattering as long as they exercise some restraint, although it can get annoying to shoot down suitors over and over. Does that happen to you a lot, Ganyu?
Ahhh...! It talks! And it's surprisingly well-spoken... Your bird could even teach some of my crew mates how to speak better. Umm, where did it learn that?
That would be so disrespectful... Do people often hurl insults at you? Like what?

Shadow? Omega? Team Dark? I don't mean to judge, but those sound kind of... evil. On the other, I find it hard to believe that someone with such a silly name as Eggman could do anything bad. Don't tell me you and your pals are harassing this poor doctor?
You have a heist partner? Man, that makes me jealous... I can only count on my own friends to ruin my plans. What does Topaz do for you?

The Master Emerald... Geez, just the name is enough to make my heart pound. If I had a gem that size I'd fall asleep every night hugging it. Is that what you do? I assume it's in your possession, right?
Most of my crew mates are my same age, but they behave like children so I have to look after them... Nobody forces me to, it's simply for their own good. I don't want them getting into trouble.

It's embarrassing, but most of my crew mates are around my same age, but they act like kids a lot of the time. Sometimes I feel like I'm the only one keeping them from dying in the most stupid way. It's a burden, but I gotta accept it.
A hobby, huh? When I want to keep my mind occupied I just work on my maps, but of course that isn't always relaxing... Do you have any hobbies you can recommend?
Hmm, that's not a bad idea. While working on my maps keeps me occupied, it can't count as a hobby if it's work, right? Is there any hobbies you practice that you think I'd enjoy, Mari?
I'm sure your sister feels very lucky to have someone like you looking after her. Is there anything that she helps you with in return?
For a timid girl having an older sister as caring as you makes a big difference. Is there anything you rely on her for?

That's certainly personal, but I think I can answer... It was the first time I told my mom about my dream of drawing a map of the world. She was so supportive of me, and even though I was just a little girl she acted like I could definitely achieve it.

My dearest memory... It think it'd be when I told my mom what my dream was: drawing a map of the whole world. I was just a little brat, but she told me she was sure I could do it. I always think back to it whenever I doubt myself.
What the...? Your outfit...
Huh?! You clothes...
AHHHH!!! What is that on your back?!
That bag doesn't look expensive, but...
It is tight. And if I may say it, it's riding a little high on the back.
So that's your natural hair? Sorry, I didn't mean to imply it's weird, or anything. It's actually very normal and... pointy.
Oh, I have a friend who fights using kicks. (Look at those legs...)
That choker... It doesn't look very valuable. Does it have some special meaning to you?
I just need to make sure, but you have nothing to do with Buggy the clown, do you?
Wow. You look innocent and cute, but you're actually a pervert, aren't you?
Eh? What happened to you?
Not a Mink, huh? Then are you a Devil Fruit user...?
Oh, a ladybug! That's makes more sense. Wait, is that a yo-yo? I'm more confused now.
Oh, you're a ladybug! I don't know why I thought you were a strawberry... I still don't understand the yo-yo, though.
So... how come you can fly? Devil Fruit? Science? Some sort of illusion?
You clearly don't look like a conventional pirate, but you still have a sort of eye patch, heheh.
That's a very... unconventional outfit for a pirate. But hey, at least you're wearing an eyepatch. Kinda...
Nice beret. Maybe I should get myself one. Oh, but is it part of your uniform?
Yeah, very manly... I'm sure you're the envy of every man, Ping.
You're the picture of manliness, Ping. I'm sure you have a lot of... ummm... hair on your chest.
Those aren't emeralds, are they? There's so many...
I didn't mean to imply I have a problem with that. I just don't want to you get in trouble with your boss.
(She's wearing all these expensive looking accessories... But she's a goddess... But they look so valuable...)
(Look at that brooch...! It looks so expensive... B-But she's a goddess... But look at that brooch!)
This is why you brought your butler? Talk about spoiled...
He-hey, nice tattoo you have there, sister. I have one too, see? On my left shoulder?
Hi...! Revy, right? Ummm, that's a nice tattoo you have there. I have one too. We have something in common!
So... two guns, huh? Is one not enough?
Two guns seems like overkill to me. You only need one to kill people, right?
Oh, Luffy is my captain. He can also stretch his arms, since he's pretty much made of rubber.
Why is she on the floor taking off your shoes? I thought she was your friend, but she's acting more like a slave.
Mako!
You don't have any grenades in there, right? What if one goes off?
FIRE! Let me use my Clima-Tact to extinguish it!
Hey, that's your head!
It doesn't look like one of the ghost of that girl from Thriller Bark, but it has a knife...
This thing you call Quirk is your Devil Fruit ability, right? It must be a cultural difference, like how in Wano they call them sorcery.
Ohhh, very rich! That necklace looks expensive...
Your hairpins? But you're in your underwear! And...
Just the ribbon? Come on, you can do better than that.
You have a toy wand and all. That's kind of adorable.
So that's where all those fries are going...
You probably eat a lot of fries to get this... form.
Are you just using made up words to try to sound smarter?
Those gauntlets look really valuable. They must be made of silver, right?
It's a very pretty hat! Did your mom make it for you?
I honestly like your hat? Did you mom make it? My mom made clothes for me all the time when I was a kid.
That sun symbol on your armor... What does it mean? It reminds me of a similar symbol, but it's not exactly the same.
Oh, so your shoes are supposed to be of different color! I thought you'd made a mistake when you put them on, but I didn't want to say anything.
Those muscles might rival Zoro's.
So you're a video transmission, or something? But I don't see a Transponder Snail anywhere.
Oh, and more importantly: Can you make money with videogames?
Who's this LeChuck? Name doesn't ring a bell.
I know, taking off your shoes while wearing a skirt is the worst.
Magatama... So that's what that's called. I could swear I saw it glowing a little...
A Magatama? What a strange stone. Was it just my imagination, or did it glow a bit earlier?
Not that there is anything wrong with it. It's just that the guys are always thrilled over stuff like that, but I've never seen the appeal.
Right, you don't need a gun here.
I can't believe you'd rather show your whole body than take off your sunglasses first.
I've met so many people who can fly one way or another that it doesn't surprise me anymore.
Scarf and cleavage, asymmetrical socks... You have an interesting sense of fashion, Yang.
Oh, did that thing run out of batteries? Maybe it was defective.
Did that thing malfunction already? Oh boy... don't tell me you bought it at a flea market.
Are you gonna do it again?
Oh... Don't tell me you're... bald.
I can't believe even this establishment is putting limitations on your behavior. Just goes to show how much of a deviant you are.
Oh... I wonder how many times they've enforced this rule in this establishment. You're definitely a special case, so...
How many times is this going to repeat? I won't remind you next time. Maybe then you'll get kicked out...
Can we get someone else to take this girl's clothes off for her? Uhhh, any volunteers?
I can only imagine what sort of sick things you keep in that bag.
Take off your bag. Just please, for everything that is holy, don't show us what's in there.
A utility belt? Like you keep gadgets in there, and stuff?
You forgot you've been seeing orange the whole game?
V-vampires? What are you talking about? Vampires are not real...
Manni Katti? Is that the name of your sword?
#98? How many of these things have you made?
Hey, hats are important for some people.
That could've saved you some time of being exposed, but I don't think it'll make much of a difference in the end.
I'm sure I'd have been a good model.
Hey! I was just trying to be nice. If you want to look like you've been living inside your room for a year, fine by me!
I wasn't saying anything terrible! I was just concerned for you. You shouldn't spend every day inside your room, for your health.
Those are called crocs? Are they made of crocodile skin, or something?
Do I want to know what sort of dangerous stuff you keep in there?
So this Vault you're hunting... How much stuff does it contain? It must be very valuable if it's so rare to find, right?
Did you say key? For what? Could it be a secret treasure?
Franky looks way more robotic than you, and he's still more human than machine... I think.
I hope that's the only use you have for that knife.
Ah, you're using the knife to... cut your belt. Better than stabbing someone, I guess.
I didn't know what to expect when I came here, but it sure wasn't this.
What good is wearing that box if it doesn't even hide your panties?
Android, T-Doll... All of those sound like synonyms for "danger", in my opinion.
Okay... Is nobody else going to ask? Uhhh, what's with the four arms?
I... don't know what that is. But what's with the four arms?
Scarf and cleavage, asymmetrical socks... You have an interesting sense of fashion, Yang.
You're wearing an interesting outfit, Yang? Did you pick it yourself? Your socks don't match...

case.state: Was this friend also the one that convinced you that you're a wizard? Geez, some girls can be so mean...
Did this friend manipulate you into believing you're a wizard too? That's one of the meanest pranks I've ever heard of.

state.text: Yeah, I'm telling you. That's probably a Devil Fruit ability. You maybe didn't even realize that you ate one.
I know. I saw you do it earlier. That's gotta be because of a Devil Fruit. Don't you remember eating a weird fruit at one point?
Do you also have a hybrid form, Yuelia? Something that is halfway through between human and butterfly?
Zoan Devil Fruit users have hybrid forms. Do you have one, Yuelia? Something closer to your human form, but with the wings?
Ahahaha... (Gosh, now there's two of them...) Is there a reason why you enjoy making puns so much, Yang?
Haha...ha... (I haven't heard that one...) When did you start making puns, Yang? Was there a reason for it?

case.state: So it really is blood? Ummm... As long as it's not human blood, then maybe it's fine. I'm just glad you're taking it off.
Is it really blood, then? I'm not sure I want to know more about what it means... I'll just assume it's not human blood.

state.text: You probably don't keep anything valuable in that bag, right? Seeing as how you're taking it off first, without a second thought...
What do you keep in that bag? Supplies, food...? Nothing valuable, then.
Secrets...? You already seem to know about my... occupation. I hope that's what you meant, because I have no more secrets.
Me? Secrets? I guess you mean me being part of a crew of you-know-whats... I thank you for not mentioning it. But I don't have any more secrets, if that's what you're implying.
Secrets...? You all already know that I'm a pirate. I hope that's what you meant, because I have no more secrets.
Me? Secrets? I guess you mean me being part of pirate crew, but you already know that... I thank you for not mentioning it. I don't have any more secrets, if that's what you're implying.
Oh... Well, at least you can cover that scar with your bangs. Problem solved, right?
Your... name is Default? I-I'm sure your parents had their reasons.
I don't know why... Maybe you just seemed too friendly? That's not a bad thing, right?
Don't beat yourself up. Maybe you just give a very nice vibe that doesn't seem very deadly.
Don't call me greedy. I thought you'd be happy if we could both do something for each other. But maybe I can ask for something else... I guess a massage would be nice?
I thought that was how it works... Quid pro quo, and all that. But if I can't ask for riches, then... I'd like a massage. My shoulders are a little stiff.
Yea, yeah, yeah...! Put it down... slowly...
Th-That's it... Put down the machete... aaaaaaall the way over there...
Ahhhhhh...!!! A ghost...! Run away!
I-Is that a...?! That's a ghost!!! L-Let me out of here!!!
Missing a hand is not a big deal. There's a guy in my crew that's missing all his limbs... I think. Speaking of, if you had the option of getting like a robot hand, would you like that, Miki?

I like that you don't shy away from it, Miki... but if you had the opportunity to get like a robot hand, would you want that? There's someone in my crew that's more machine than man now, but if it was just a hand...
Oh, I thought you were gonna yell at me... But I get it. People often tell me I have violent outbursts... {small}which is an exaggeration.{!reset} I like to relax by taking a bath. What about you?

You don't gotta tell me. I struggle sometimes with anger too, although in my case it's directed at other people. But then I take a long bath to calm down and it works wonders. Do you have a method like that?
Hey, where are you going? Come back here! She just left...
Where do you think you're going, Perona! Come back here, right now!
Why didn't you take this off before showing your other parts? I don't understand.
Alright. You clearly don't care about what you show first.
If only you'd had this when you still weren't naked. Oh, wait, you did. Then...
Really? But why did you have to be naked before you remove your ~clothing~? You're weird.
Hey, Robin, do you think...? Oh, sorry. I didn't mean to interrupt your conversation.
I'm glad that Robin is feeling chatty today. Or at least a little more than usual.
Oh, that's good, ~name~. Take it one step at a time. No need to push yourself more than you have to.
Good choice, ~name~. You're doing well. Now I can appreciate that this game allows for players to remove accessories so they can start easy.
I had this dream last night... I don't if I should tell you, because it was a little arousing. Well, given the circumstances...
I don't usually have sexual dreams, but last night... Umm, should I tell you about it? Maybe... Okay, I will.
Do you guys think there's any reason to dreams of the... steamy kind. Because last night... Okay, I'll tell you about it, but don't go repeating it, okay?
I wonder what it's like to swim naked... I've never tried it before, believe it or not.
Has anyone here ever been skinny dipping? Well, the water's right there... And my clothes are already off...
I love swimming, but I've never done it without a swimsuit. I wonder what it's like...

case.state: I know what I'm going to do with your ~clothing~. I'll steal ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ and sell ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ to anyone at a very cheap price!
How would you feel if I steal your ~clothing~ and sell ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ to the first person who wants ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~?
Wouldn't it be fun if someone stole your ~clothing~ and sold ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~? If it was me, I wouldn't even ask more than a measly price for ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~.
I see you came prepared to lose a few rounds, ~name~. Smart.
Hey, I bet you wore that just in case you lost a few rounds, you clever girl.
Did everyone come overly accessorized in preparation for losing?
What's the smallest accessory that would still count in this game? I might have something in my pocket...
Your ~clothing~? You do what you can, sister. You gotta be smart when losing too.
Oh, your ~clothing~. I see what you're doing and I respect it... I don't know if I like it, though.
I bet you're going to remove your... ~clothing~! Ah, see? I was right.
What do you call that? Oh, right.. Your ~clothing~.
Your ~clothing~, huh? Okay, okay... I'm not gonna say anything. Just this once...
I know I removed my Log Pose last time, which is also small. But it's really important, so it balances out.
Are you waiting for me to complain about this even though I removed a small item last time too? I don't care, I'll still do it.
What are your favorite type of accessories? I like every kind of jewelry... Not necessarily wearing it, just looking at it and holding it in my hands is enough.
Just what are you up to, ~name~? Well, this move does make sense if you want to win.
You think I can't figure out your game, ~name~? Huh? Well... Umm...
Ugh... I can't help but feel this is my fault for not bringing more accessories. I could've worn a necklace, a hat, an ankle bracelet...
If only I'd been wearing more clothes. I should've expected my sense of fashion wouldn't help me in this game, unlike beauty contests.
Everybody thought about wearing accessories except for me. Well, I did have my Log Pose. And my belt... That feels like so long ago.
Why are you taking that off now? Are you mocking me? Even if it's not me personally, I do take it personal.
You think you can make fun of me by removing your ~clothing~ now?! Too bad my sense of humor doesn't involve being humiliated.
I'm not used to smacking women, but I'm considering making an exception, just this once...
I liked you when I first met you, ~name~. But you're really pushing it now!
If I'd come here covered in accessories, I would probably still be playing.
I'm a fashionable woman, and I still don't wear this many accessories.
Where did you buy that, ~name~? I would love to go there, buy 100 of them, come back here and win this stupid game!
Hmm, you sure held on to your ~clothing~ for a long time. ~clothing.ifPlural(They|It)~ must be valuable, huh?
I wasn't paying much attention to the items back when I was playing the game, but some of them look very valuable.
This place would be a perfect target for an skilled thief. Good thing there isn't one among us.
Grrrr... Dammit! I can't even say what I'm thinking without looking like a hypocrite.
Oh, of course... Why was I expecting anything different? Hahahaha...! Hahah...
I was hoping we could be friends, ~name~... I suppose this game isn't the best place for that.
I had this really weird dream last night. Let me see if I can remember it...
Ugh, you won't believe the weird dream I had last night. It was so weird...
I didn't sleep well last night. I'm still feeling a little tired. I think it's because I had the weirdest dream...
Sigh... I wonder what I'd be doing right now if I wasn't playing this game. I had other plans for today, originally...
Hmmm... There are so many different things I could be doing right now instead of playing this game. Not all of them as profitable, though.
You know, this isn't how I was planning on spending this day. I had other plans...

state.text: Oh, well... I guess our Ghost Girl couldn't take the stress from this game, after all. I don't blame her.
It seems like Perona wasn't able to handle this game in the end, so she decided to leave. Don't think any less of her, please.

case.state: I swear, if you bump your head somewhere I'm not gonna bother... Ah...!
If you keep flying like that, you're gonna bump into someone! You better don't cry when... Ah...!

state.text: Of course you got dizzy! You were flying around like a cannonball. It doesn't seem like you're going to apologize, so I'll do it for you: She's sorry.
Do you feel better now? Sure, you're dizzy. What did you think would happen? At least you didn't hit your head.
What didn't work? Weren't we talking about something else?
What are you mumbling to yourself, Ghost Girl? You're the one that asked a question.
Sorry, you're right... I, uhh, can tell you're very pretty too, Perona... Right, Robin?
Uhhh, that's true... Well, you're very beautiful too, Perona. Oh, sorry... You're very cute.
She started it, but... I'm sorry.
Sorry... I don't know what came over me.
So you're a Devil Fruit user who can control ice? But this isn't the first time I've met someone with that ability...
What the hell...?!
That bastard... I wish I could zap him again. Can you imagine me marrying someone like that? Or getting married at all? It's not for me.
Yeah... No way I'd ever marry a man like that. Or anyone really, at least for a loooong time.
Wait, wouldn't that make him vulnerable to your ability? That's gotta be the most selfish reason why someone would wish another person well.
Huh, that's nice of you... Wait, that would make him vulnerable to your ghosts! That's just selfish.
Well, very nice of him to let you live in his castle for no reason. He's probably a decent guy.
Oh, either way... It's very nice of him to let you live with him. If it was me, I'd at least make you pay rent.
That's amazing. I've only been to a couple of sky islands, but it sounds like there's so much more to see up there. So have you never seen the blue sea, Fina?
Wow, it seems like I've only seen a small portion of the world that's up there. So. if that's where you were raised, does that mean you have never seen the blue sea?

That's very outstanding of you, I'm impressed. What about clothes? If you lost your own would you take someone else's? 'Cause I have, and I didn't feel bad about it. It was either my decency lost or theirs after all.

Yeah, I also wouldn't take someone else's food unless I was starving. I have taken other people's clothes when I lost mine though... Not that I regret it. Would you do that? Well, clearly you don't have problems with nudity...
Uhhh, you know where I come from the sea already covers almost the entire planet. If we lost the bit of land we have left, we'd all have to live on boats.
So if I understand it correctly you're like an sea life protection organization, except for these Pokémon creatures... That's very nice of you. Their natural habitat should be protected.

case.state: You tried to run away?! That does it, I won't feel sorry for you anymore.

state.text: You're not very bright, are you? Kinda like a female Luffy...
A butterfly that transforms into a woman is easier for me to swallow than an actual talking butterfly, for some reason.
Ummm, so the butterfly was a woman... I'm okay with that. I'd have more questions if there was an actual talking butterfly.
That's a good goal, there can never be enough doctors. If it wasn't for Chopper, my crew's doctor, I'd have died a long time ago.
Maybe I should tell Luffy and the others about it. Becoming temporary Vault Hunters sounds like a fun and rewarding detour.
Hmmm, he'd probably see the humor in it... Honestly, I think the name Neptune suits you better. It sounds kinda girly.
He'd most likely laugh. I never thought about it until now, but Neptune does sound like a girl name. I think it suits you better than him.
Are you serious? You don't look much older than King Neptune's daughter... Is it okay to ask you how old you are?
For real? But you seem to be around the same age as King Neptune's daughter... C-can I ask you how old you are?
I see... There's no accounting for taste, I suppose.
Ah... okay. So maybe Kuma did you a favor by sending you to a place you'd like.
Stop! Why do you gotta be so weird? Talking about creepy stuff so casually...
Enough! I don't wanna hear about stuff like that. Why can't you be normal for once, and talk about nice things?
I've never heard of that place. Do you know on which sea it is? If you do, maybe I can find it in one of my maps.
I don't think I remember seeing that town in one of my maps, but if you know the sea, or the island it's on, I might be able to help you.
Uhhh, yeah. Sometimes. I guess it's normal when you're... ummm, "pretty".
Well... It's not uncommon. It's just natural for us... "pretty" girls.
That sounds awfully similar to Big Mom's ability to remove people's souls and put them into inanimate objects. I've had enough of that horror for a lifetime.
That reminds me of Big Mom's Soul Soul Fruit... Brrrr, just being able to manipulate human souls like that is terrifying.
How much does a Magatama go for these days? I've never heard of such a thing, so it must be rare... And expensive... W-Wait, did you say "ghost"?
It's gotta be valuable, right? A one-of-a-kind, maybe? That would mean it's very expensive... Uhhh... d-did I hear you right? You said "ghost"?
Upstanding citizens, huh...? What about people that might be criminals according to the law, but are actually really nice human beings... Would you defend them?

case.state: I see... What if the law says someone is guilty, but they're good people, who do good deeds? Would you help people like that, Mia?

state.text: What do you expect to gain from this game? If you're after the money too, you better give up. I'd say you have a better chance of making a new friend here than getting that cash.
I hope you're not expecting to earn the prize money, Ayano. That's already mine. But if there's anything else you're after, I wish you the best.
That's kinda sad. I know that members of the Mink race are very proud of their fur. I don't know what you looked like before, but I can assure you you're very cute now.
I'm sorry to hear that. I hope your friends don't treat you any different now, because you're crazy cute.
Even alligators? I don't remember seeing half human, half reptiles before... I hope you all get along, and you don't have the predators raising trouble.
Alligator people? I didn't know there's also a race of reptile humans somewhere... Hopefully you don't have conflicts among yourselves with all kinds of animal people living together.
I've never heard of Overwatch. I hope you guys use that technology for a good purpose, because in the wrong hands it could be terrifying.
Overwatch... So there's a group of people with access to this type of equipment. Thankfully, you guys use it for good... right? I don't want bad guys to have this power.
For real? If you're the healer of the group, it makes perfect sense to stay close to you. Aren't your teammates professionals? What other dumb stuff do they do?
Are you serious? I'm no soldier, but it just makes sense to me to stay close to you if you're the healer. Is that the only complaint you have about your teammates, Angela?

Actually, it looked surprisingly normal inside the whale. It took us a minute to realize we were swallowed. But the doctor was living there to treat the giant whale from the inside. He was a nice guy.
Haha, not at all! Chopper is actually the one that causes the least amount of trouble... which is very ironic, now that I think about it. He spends most time studying and taking care of his herbs.
It's his Devil Fruit ability, but I guess it takes a lot of skill to use it properly... He even once had me and my friends switch bodies. I'm still not sure if I've forgiven him for that experience.
I agree! I can't transform my body, or anything. But even if I could, I wouldn't. No matter how many times people mention how big my boobs are.
I feel the same way. People always tell me that my boobs are too big, but if I had a choice I still wouldn't change them. I like them, and that's what's important!
Well, even if you were filthy rich, I wouldn't steal from you. You seem nice... And I'm not a thief! Of course not...
Hmmm, no matter how rich you are, I still wouldn't steal from you... Or anyone! Because I'm not a thief, heheh...
Not at all. Now that I've talked to you, you seem to me like a very nice a soothing presence. I'm sorry again for screaming, especially if that's the way people usually react when they see you.
Oh, don't worry! I just feel bad for screaming. You seem a lot more pleasant than a lot of people I've met. Is it common for people to be afraid of you at first glance?

A rainbow is caused by the reflection and refraction of the light in raindrops. For it to happen twice... If it's at the right angle, a double rainbow should be visible. If we find an open area with lots of sunlight, I should be able to do it!
A double rainbow... It would depend on the angle, the area, the amount of sunlight, and the size of the water droplets... But yes! I should be able to create one. That's a relief.
Oh no... Nooo... I don't think I'm gonna be able to sleep tonight. How do you sleep at night, Lux? Is there a secret?
Oh, I immediately regret asking you... I don't know how I'm gonna sleep after hearing this. What do you do, Lux? Don't tell me you only sleep during the day...
Console...? Controls...? Oh, so you control something with buttons and stuff? Like a robot? I don't really know much about that sort of thing, but sounds like something the guys would be into.
I don't know what a PC is, but you mentioning controls reminds me of robots. If it's something like that, the guys would probably like to play these videogames.
I'm not sure I got that right, but you were protesting against an act to stop piracy? Uhhh... Well, piracy clearly didn't stop, so I guess you got what you wanted... right?

Wait... So you were protesting against people who wanted to stop piracy? Don't you think piracy is bad? I mean, not every pirate is terrible, but protesting in their defense seems more controversial than against them.
That doesn't sound like a great experience. Aren't games supposed to be fun? Why would you want to play something like that?
I don't think that's a game I'd like to play. Why are people drawn to it? Is it still fun for them?
Tojiko seems to be a very positive influence on you. I can't imagine what kind of hell raiser you'd be without her.
If you ask me, every immature person needs someone by their side who can keep them in check. I think Tojiko is doing a fine job.

case.state: Okay... I'll give you the benefit of the doubt. If you have any questions about how this works you can ask me. But don't expect me to lose for you.
I see. I'll assume you're telling the truth for now. As long as you don't ask me to lose again, I can answer any questions you have about the game.

state.text: Did you see a stain on the ~background.surface~ somewhere? Ewww...! Where is it? I don't wanna step on it. They should really clean here!
Oh, aren't you carrying your... Pokécreatures inside those Pokéballs? If not, where are they now?
Isn't that where you keep those Pokéthings? Inside your Pokéballs? Then you better don't lose them. It'd be like losing a pet, I imagine.
Oh, that's nice! I'd like to pet your Serperior too... as long as she doesn't have fangs, or crawls on the ground, or...
Sure sounds like you have the confidence to tame dangerous creatures. I'd like to see you compete in these battles some day. Do you often participate in tournaments?
Oh... I thought for a second you still had it on you. Well, selling that gold is probably what I would've done, so I don't blame you.
Ten thousand? That doesn't sound like a lot for such a well-guarded artifact. Unfortunately there are a lot of scummy appraisers out there. I've made quite a few of them pay... literally.
Ah, a battle for the fate of the world. That sure sounds like the kind of adventure my crew has. So I take it this Galcian guy is not around anymore?
I understand. When you have a large number of people working together there's bound to be some conflict. Probably only the smaller clubs don't have these sort of problem.
I imagine it must be quite stressful to deal with that. I'm sure only the smaller clubs are spared from interpersonal conflict. So how many members are there in yours?
OH MY GOSH...! OH MY GOOOOOOSH...!!! H-HER HEAD JUST...! S-Somebody do something...!
WH-WHAT THE HELL...?! HER HEAD...!!! WH-WH-WHAT'S HAPPENING?! Is my head gonna fall off too...?!
So you're the star of your field, huh? How does that feel? Do you like having people look up to you, or is it exhausting to be depended upon so much?

I'd be lying if I said it isn't strange. I've seen many unusual things in my travels, but almost all of them can be explained through science. The idea of real magic being studied is completely foreign to me.
Sorry, I didn't mean to imply you were weak... So how strong would you say you are? Do you fight a lot of tough people?
Oh, I wasn't trying to call you weak. It's just that... Well, I don't know how strong you are. How would you rank next to other strong opponents?
Heh, Spike is the perfect name for a dog, even a talking one. What's he like? Does he hate cats and mailmen?
I know, cats get all restless and tense when you hug them. Maybe they don't like feeling tied down, which is why I relate to them so much.
Oh, Sayori is your vice president? I see what you mean. She sure seems like she's good with people. Looks like you made the right choice picking her as your second in command, Monika.

That's nice to hear. Goes to show that just because you're in a leadership position it doesn't mean you can't learn during the process. What about you, Monika? I bet you've already come a long way in your people skills.
I can see how Sayori would be good at stopping conflicts. It seems like it'd be hard for people to stay mad at each other with someone like her around.
I understand what you mean, Monika. If my crew mates are having a stupid little squabble I can just knock some sense into them. But when things get serious for real, I don't always know what to do.
I see... And what if they lost all their money, and you had to support them? Not everybody is rich forever, after all.
That's nice. But if they had a streak of bad luck and lost all their money? Riches come and go very quickly, you know? And unpredictably.
I guess I didn't know that. I'm already grateful that you're here, Robin. I'll be counting on you.
Huh, I had no idea. It's good that you're here, Robin. There's less risk that I'll end up embarrassing myself. I hope you can help when I need it.
N-No, I didn't mean to imply you like stripping, or anything... You just seem to understand this game well from the beginning, and...
Uhhh, sorry for implying that... It's just I don't know much about your past before, and... B-But it's fine either way!

case.state: I-I see... Sounds... fun. Umm, maybe you can lend it to me some time.
That sounds... fun. Uhhh, maybe I can read it some time and then we can discuss it... right?

state.text: Oh, I see... He looked really cute running around with the sunglasses, trying to look all serious, didn't he? I couldn't stop smiling.
Well, that explains why he tried looking all serious, but all I could think about was how adorable he looked, just running around wearing sunglasses, heheh...
N-No... Well, I wasn't looking forward to taking my clothes off in front of him, but when I did his reaction was so cute... I'd never seen a man react that way to me. And that's all I'll say...
I... I don't remember. Okay, I do remember. But what I enjoyed the most wasn't the anticipation, it was his reaction after he saw me naked... It was so cute, heheh.

Well... Personally I've never gotten the appeal of robot stuff, so I thought it might be a tougher choice. But I also never considered how inventions like that might help people to live a normal life.
Maybe I owe Franky an apology for always dismissing his inventions just because I don't "get" robots... If stuff like that can help people, I think it's wonderful.
Awww, that's nice! I love a happy ending. I'm sure you're so sweet that nobody can be mean to you for very long. You probably have lots of friends.
That's so nice! Goes to show you never know who you can become friends with. I'm sure you have lots of friends who were drawn to you because of how sweet you are.
That's exactly how I feel. I wouldn't be traveling by myself, no matter how much I enjoy it. I'm not very strong, so I need others to protect me at times... I'm not ashamed of it.

I understand. I've seen plenty of countries that were facing their own share of conflicts. If there's one thing I've learned is that the bigger the problem, the more help you'll need to solve it. You can't do everything on your own.
You gotta admire her determination. But what you, Noire? How would you feel if your sister ends up being better than you?

I thought at first that your skill at games was more of a matter of prestige, but sounds like it goes beyond that. Is that how you decide your leaders too? Because that sounds like a very "fun" type of meritocracy.
Awesome! You're very generous, Trixie. But I hope you're not too generous. Lots of people out there love to take advantage of kind people... Not me, of course! But other people...
You're so kind, Trixie. I should do something for you in return... The least I can do is give you a big hug once the game is over. Get ready, 'cause I'm gonna squeeze you with my whole body!

A pack-elephant? As in an elephant that carries stuff? I guess that's not a bad investment... There's no point in having lots of riches if you can't take them all with you. That's how you get back problems.

Is a pack-elephant an elephant for carrying your stuff? That's not a terrible investment, I guess... You gotta be optimistic and assume you're gonna have more treasure to carry in the future. Besides, you gotta take care of your back.

That's true... Hatred only brings more hatred. You can't blame those goblins for disliking humans if that's how they're treated. The only way out is to break that cycle. I'm glad you're friends with humans, Trixie.
Awww, you're so sweet, Trixie! And well said... Heheh, you should be glad that you already have a crew, because if didn't I'd take you with me in a heartbeat.
Haha, that's ridiculous... Wait, is that a real guy? Can Kangaroo Man at least transform into a kangaroo? It'd be even worse if he couldn't.
Have you ever considered rebranding yourself and switching to a different insect? Like a... well, wasps are already pretty scary. When they get in your clothes, brrr...!
That is... even weirder. So can you also make yourself bigger, if you need to...?
Somehow, the thing about you laying eggs doesn't sound as bizarre anymore. So you can only shrink? You can't grow bigger than your normal size?
Hmm, well, I'm no therapist, but I get that lashing out your anger on something (or someone) can help. I do that myself, from time to time. I'm not sure what would make the violence "ultra" though...

I'm very familiar with violence, but not "ultraviolence"... And yet I understand how lashing out on someone might help. I have this one crew mate that's basically a giant rubber ball, so it feels very satisfying when I'm mad.
I wouldn't have believed it either if I didn't see it with my own eyes. What exactly did you do to earn your magic vision? Was it something mundane, or more extravagant?
I still think magical abilities are weird, regardless of where they come from. So what did you do exactly to earn your, uh, vision? Like community service, or something?

I see... But that still raises some questions. Like what if someone decided that their way of living freely is to walk around naked all the time. Would the Knights still interfere, even if they aren't endangering anyone?

Hmm, I still think there's some gray area if these Knights are only there to handle the serious stuff. Would they do anything if someone decided to not wear any clothes in public, because that's what being free means to them?
That's a Devil Fruit ability, right? Transforming clothes... It's kinda like Kin'emon's.
That's gotta be a Devil Fruit ability. To change clothes in an instant... It's a little like Kin'emon's ability, but probably better.
So you are a Devil Fruit user? A snake woman, or something?
How expensive would you say it is, exactly?
Fine! You know what? Your leotard is skimpy, and your ass is completely exposed. Happy?
If I did, would my legs become as... strong as yours?
Sentimental value is not something you can understand unless you feel it. I would never steal something that important to another person.
His red nose is real, can you believe that?. What a freak... I'm happy Luffy kicked his ass.
I don't know that many perverted women, and it's a little baffling to meet one that looks like she jumped out of a children's book.
Don't shoot right next to me, you crazy woman!
Hey! Don't just drop that, it's a loaded gun!
Not a Devil Fruit user either? Then... what are you?
I have nothing personal against your look, but I don't like bugs very much.
I think I preferred thinking you were a fruit. I'm not very fond of bugs in general...
Fair enough. I guess there isn't such a thing as a conventional pirate. Still, there's something different about you.
Good point. You'd think that after seeing pirate clowns, zombies and dinosaurs I would know better. But I feel that you're different from them in some way...
Where do you work, Misato? That's a cute uniform.
(I don't know why she's disguised herself, so I'm not gonna try to blow her cover.)
(I'm not gonna be the one to ruin her disguise. Maybe she has a good reason for it.)
I, uhh, have a question, Palutena. As a goddess, how would you punish a human for stealing?
Say, Palutena... Is stealing a sin, from your perspective? Or is it just ever so slightly frowned upon?
You have hands, don't you? You don't need someone else to undress you just because you're rich.
Y-Your tattoo is better than mine. I wasn't trying to compare mine with yours.
I... I wasn't trying to imply that my tattoo is as nice as yours! If anything, yours is better. Ye-yeah...
W-Well, one of my crew mates uses three swords, which is a lot weirder. So...
Uh... Zoro uses three swords. Three swords is even weirder than two guns, so I should probably keep my mouth shut.
Well, not only his arms. He can stretch anywhere. Wow, that sounded kinda dirty...
So your school still makes you wear a tie even though you can't take it off by yourself? That doesn't make sense.
Stripping together, huh? That's some friendship.
She's fine? That really scared me, I thought you hit her with the sword for a second.
You don't have any other weapons hidden, right? I mean, if you're going to be drinking...
What? You did that on purpose? Didn't you receive any burns?
Ghosts without knives are still scary...
I've met Devil Fruit users who can float before. Could it be your outfit that allows you to fly and you're just pretending it's you who's doing it?
Are you looking for new friends, Weiss? Me too! You can call me Big Sister Nami.
Well, if they're expensive hairpins, I guess I can forgive you. Your hair looks great, by the way!
Oh, you're actually removing something else too. I honestly didn't think you would.
I mean... what a nice wand! You must be able to do all kinds of magic with that! (She seems like a nice girl, I'll just play along with her fantasy.)

case.state: And that lasso is so shiny... Is it gold?

state.text: It would've been a little ironic for a model to put on different shoes by accident.
But Zoro is training whenever he isn't sleeping. How did you get like that?
I'm sorry, Alpha. But I understand half of the stuff you say.
I had enough creepy stuff for a lifetime back in Thriller Bark.
I should definitely look into it.
I don't recognize these names. I wonder what sea you come from... It's a big world out there.
Wow... Just when I thought we had something in common, Velma.
But who knows? Maybe if I learn more about it I'll like it too.
Just put your equipment down carefully. And far away.
Even Franky takes off his glasses every now and then, and he wears only briefs.
I still would like to try it once.
Oh, I'm not saying I don't like it. In fact, I might try a similar look later.
I don't see how that staff could be a weapon. But mine is even weirder, so I guess I have no right to say that.
I'm sorry, I just can't see how that staff could function as a weapon... but mine looks like a cheerleader's baton, so I shouldn't judge, heheh.
Whoa, you hat turned into butterflies! It's... beautiful.
They're so pretty... Can I touch one?
That's what you were hiding? Those ears are so cute! C-can I touch them?
Getting dropped on the head as a baby is a serious thing...
Can we call this girl's parents and ask them to come pick her up? It just feels like the right thing to do.
They should lock you up at the last level of Impel Down... Maybe even that wouldn't be enough.
You are the kind of person that should have a wanted poster... I think 3 billion beli would be a good bounty for you.
This is the first time I've met such a pervert girl. But even when it's guys, they can still keep it in their pants most of the time.
Guys who are perverts make me mad. I guess now I know that when it's a girl, I just feel sad for them...
I guess mine is no different. But I'm not a spy.
That suit really covers your whole body. It could be paint and we wouldn't even notice.
Don't scare me like that. Vampires don't exist. They don't exist...
I've never understood why people name their weapons. It's just a tool... Should I name my Clima-Tact?
As long as nothing explodes, I'm fine with them not working.
That's a cute hairstyle. Maybe I should try it sometime.
I saw that bow, but I just assumed it was too important for you to take it off.
I mean, still. I still could be a model, I'm not old.
You can't tell me not to worry and then say you have something called a Deathtrap! What even is that?

case.state: Umm... That's a... considerate employer you have.

state.text: (I wonder what she's thinking about...)
(What's going through her head right now?)
Your skirt fell off. So, going back to this key and treasure...
How do we know you don't have an infinite amount of items inside that box? If you mysteriously remove another tie, I'm personally unboxing you.
Scraping your legs from all the crawling around, hiding inside a box... Sounds more like something a snake would do.
I'm sure it would be practical to have four arms, but I just find it creepy. Probably because of my fear of spiders.
There's something so creepy about it... Maybe others will like that look, but for me they remind me of my crippling fear of insects... spiders, in particular.
Oh, I'm not saying I don't like it. In fact, I might try a similar look later.
Hahah, it must be nice to be so carefree... I like your style, but I have a feeling if I wore different shoes one day people would just think I wasn't paying attention to my clothes.

case.state: It's okay... Some people loving taking advantage of the more insecure just for entertainment.
I'm sorry... I don't appreciate bullying. Especially when it's against young, insecure, gullible girls.

state.text: Oh, you're so pretty! Seriously, that awful mask wasn't doing you any favors. If you have to hide your face, you can wear something better. But you shouldn't.
You're very cute! It's like day and night compared to that horrifying mask. Why would you hide such a pretty face?

case.state: Oh, I get it... This must be one of those "cosplaying" things. Okay, I'll humor you. Wow, you're an... Arc Wizard, or whatever! That's soooo amazing.

Oh, I think I understand. You must be one of those cosplayers I've heard about. I'll play along. What is it like being an... Arc Wizard? People from all over the world must bow down to your power, or something.

state.text: Hey, no need to feel embarrassed. Before long you're gonna miss the times when you mother made clothes for you to wear.

case.state: Don't be embarrassed, Megumin. I wish my mom was still around so she could make more clothes for me to wear.

state.text: Though I'm not sure what all the flashing and sparkles are all about. Probably just an effect of your ability?
I still don't understand where all those sparkles come from, or why you need to wave your rod. But I'm sure there's an explanation for that too.

case.state: Hey, if you can have a butt like that while stuffing your face with fries, I call that an absolute win!
Sorry, I wasn't trying to say anything bad. To be honest, I think you have a great butt. Sure, it's big, but it has a nice shape.

state.text: How would it attract...? I mean, it's not a terrible scar... But is someone actually into that?
Can't you talk... normal?
Well... Perhaps it's for the best that you don't look intimidating. Doesn't that make it easier for you to catch your target off guard?
Uhhh, okay... I'm sure you have an easier time infiltrating if you don't give off a deadly aura. Isn't that better?
Gold does make me very happy, but... I know there are more important things in life. It's just easier to focus on those that shine, and can be counted.
I know very well that there are better ways to be happy than being rich. Hell, I can never hold on to my treasure for long, and yet I'm still a happy girl most of the time.
(Patience, Nami...) Okay, I don't know your circumstances... I'm just saying it's important for a young girl like you to stay healthy.
(I shouldn't get mad at her...) All I was trying to say is that going outside more often can be good for you. You're a girl in the best time of your life. You should be enjoying it to the fullest.
Wish I could say that I feel safer now, but I don't... ~Player~, could you stand next to me for protection?
Hmmm, I still don't feel very safe... ~Player~, why don't you come stand over here? Between Jason and me would be perfect.
That's a relief... So what's with the mask? Ah, never mind. I believe you, you're a lumberjack... and that's all I wanna know about what you do.
I see... So lumberjacks wear masks too? N-Never mind. I'm not gonna pry into your business anymore. I think I know all I wanna know already.
You know, if you get rid of the sea then I'll be out of job. That would be quite unfortunate, heheh...
Oh, shoot... I guess I won't be able to continue being a navigator if there's no sea anymore. Wouldn't that be terrible?
That's exactly what I was talking about! At least it doesn't look like it's gonna hurt anyone...
I had a feeling something like that was gonna happen! Well, at long as it's friendly...

case.state: Nah, what am I saying? Don't take me seriously... I'll sell ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ at a good price, of course!
Hmmm, that's not true. I'll try to get as much out of ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ as I can. I'm an expert negotiator, after all.
Yeah, maybe 30,000 beli? No, 50,000! I know how to get the most out of my stuff.

state.text: After a while, you won't have any trouble taking off something bigger. But don't worry about that now!
Not so hard, right? You know, you can always quit if you think this game is too demanding. I'm sure no one here will stop you.

case.state: In my dream Sanji was smoking right next to me, and the smoke was really bothering me. So I turn around to tell him, and I see he has a lollipop instead of a cigarette... and everyone was acting like that was normal!

I was dreaming that I was in a fight with someone, and then they pulled out a knife and stabbed my hand! But when I looked down I noticed that it was actually a rubber knife. Like I said, weird dream.
I dreamed that my mom didn't actually die, but she was locked inside a dungeon somewhere and I just forgot about her all this time. I woke up with this horrible feeling, covered in cold sweat.
I wanted to go to a spa today, and get a full treatment so I can finally relax... But instead I'm here, building up even more stress.
I was thinking of going for a swim today. That's why I was wearing my bikini underneath. I miss it, and it always makes me feel better.
Today I was planning on working on my maps, taking advantage of the fact that it's quiet on the ship with most of the guys out. But instead I went out anyway, and I found my way here somehow.

state.text: ...and then, just as his hand was on my inner thigh, and he started kissing me below my neck, I woke up. First thing I noticed then was that I had my sleeping shirt completely pulled up. And I didn't even see his face...

So I dreamt that I was lying on a field, completely naked. And then I started sinking in something that looked like honey... It was sticky, but it didn't feel unpleasant on my skin. Not at all. I guess it wasn't a bad dream.

I dreamt that I was bathing in a river under a waterfall, and then I saw someone hiding in the bushes, looking at me. But instead of confronting them, I let them watch me... And it felt good. It felt really good.
Just a girl, splashing around in the water... In her most natural state. The idea is a little enticing, isn't it?
You know, swimming nude I wouldn't have to constantly worry about losing my bikini. I never thought about that, heheh...
I'm sure it must feel nice being in the water with no clothes. No swimsuit to get in the way of my skin and the comforting feeling of the water...
Delete what? Your shoes? What are you talking about?
Should I've brought my sunglasses with me too? But they don't match this outfit... Also, Robin's are way more cool.
You're so lucky that you don't need to wear glasses considering how much you read... Well, I don't need my reading glasses either. They just help.

case.state: But let's see if you can hold on to your accessories after losing over and over.
Just keep in mind that if you lose more and more, that won't make a difference.
I have a few accessories too, in case I lose once or twice. Looks like we had the same idea.
Can you really blame me for not coming here wearing more? I didn't wake up today and said "Today I'm gonna play strip poker!"
Hmmm, this is still kinda disappointing... Just because of how slow the game is going.
Alright, let's keep this going. No point in dilly-dallying. I'm sure we all have a place to return to.
Would anyone here complain if I count my earrings as accessories? Okay, just checking...
Earlier I would've found this amusing, but not anymore. I don't have any other accessories, so my choices are narrow.
This makes me feel a little uneasy... And I'm usually the patient one among my crew.
I'm just saying if we're gonna play the game like this, we should just switch to regular poker. It would be less of a hassle. Anyone? No?
How would you describe the value of your ~clothing~? Monetary value, I mean. I just like knowing the price of things.
The women I've met during my travels don't usually wear that many clothes or accessories... It's just better to dress lightly.
Is there any interesting story behind your ~clothing~? I don't know, I just feel like that would spice things up a little.
Hey, maybe I have something in...? Hmph, what am I thinking? I don't even have pockets anymore...
Now I have no choice but to give it my best shot. And if I lose, I lose... Uh, I shouldn't think like that.
Hey, I'm still wearing my earrings! Oh, they don't count? Shoot...
There's so little difference in clothes between wearing a bikini and being naked, and yet it feels completely different.
Do this again, and I'll make you physically unable to get dressed by yourself.
Pray that nobody finds your body at the bottom of the sea 100 years from now, ~name~.
Ugh... Why is everyone like this? Is this the reason I don't have that many friends outside of my crew?
I won't let this get to me. I'll prove it on the next round... but I won't forget.
You never really know a person, do you? You think they're nice, and then when you least expect it, the betrayal comes in full.
Okay, I'll just be the bigger person here and admire this move. Well played, ~name~... {small}yeah, right.{!reset}
(Hmmm, maybe I can snatch her ~clothing~ after the game is over and sell ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~. Wouldn't that serve her right?)
Eh, whatever. It's not worth it. Water under the bridge, as they say.
Say, where are the items we stripped kept until the game is over? No reason for asking, just curiosity.
Would I still be playing the game if I'd taken off my bracelet and my Log Pose separately? We'll never know.
I bet you're too scared to strip another time, ~name~. Boooo...
I don't blame you for not wanting to strip, but you gotta admit this is a little infuriating for me.
You're the kind that enjoys making new enemies, aren't you? Well, you're about to make a new one.
Now let's hope this doesn't come back to bite you in the ass. How, you ask? I wonder...

state.text: After a while, you won't have any trouble taking off something bigger. But don't worry about that now!
Not so hard, right? You know, you can always quit if you think this game is too demanding. I'm sure no one here will stop you.

case.state: In my dream Sanji was smoking right next to me, and the smoke was really bothering me. So I turn around to tell him, and I see he has a lollipop instead of a cigarette... and everyone was acting like that was normal!
I was dreaming that I was in a fight with someone, and then they pull out a knife and stab my hand! But when I look down I notice that it was actually a rubber knife. Like I said, weird dream.
I dreamed that my mom didn't actually die, but she was locked inside a dungeon somewhere and I just forgot about her all this time. I woke up with this horrible feeling, covered in cold sweat.
I wanted to go to a spa today, and get a full treatment so I can finally relax... But instead I'm here, building up even more stress.
I was thinking of going for a swim today. That's why I was wearing my bikini underneath. I miss it, and it always makes me feel better.
Today I was planning on working on my maps, taking advantage of the fact that it's quiet on the ship with most of the guys out. But instead I went out anyway, and I found my way here somehow.
Nah, what am I saying? Don't take me seriously... I'll sell ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ at a good price, of course!
Hmmm, that's not true. I'll try to get as much out of ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ as I can. I'm an expert negotiator, after all.
Yeah, maybe 30,000 beli? No, 50,000! I know how to get the most out of my stuff.

state.text: ...and then, just as his hand was on my inner thigh, and he started kissing me below my neck, I woke up. I didn't even see his face in my dream, but I had my shirt completely pulled up when I awoke.

So I dreamt that I was lying on a field, completely naked. And then I started sinking in something that looked like honey... It was sticky, but it didn't feel unpleasant on my skin. Not at all. I guess it wasn't a bad dream.

I dreamt that I was bathing in a river under a waterfall, and then I saw someone hiding in the bushes, looking at me. But instead of confronting them, I let them watch me... And it felt good. It felt really good.

case.state: Oh? This is definitely gonna get interesting. I may not be as experience at gambling as you, but I have a huge track record of taking money from swindlers. That's gotta count for something, right?
Heheh, we'll see... It's been a while since I took money from a swindler, but I doubt I've gotten rusty. And I don't think your gambling skills are gonna be of much use against me.

state.text: Are you flirting with me, Fate? Mmmm... Maybe if you win, you can ask me out for drink at a expensive bar. And maybe I'll say yes. Not like it would be much of an inconvenience if you get your hands on the prize, right?
Ahahahah... You got quite the charm, don't ya? It'd be hard to resist an invitation from such a delightful man. Especially if you also get your hands on the prize.

case.state: Is it really smart for a gambler to rely on luck so much? It's not like there's much you can do sometimes, but it's always better to have some control over the outcome.
Don't you feel helpless relying on good fortune so much? If you have honed your skills enough, maybe you wouldn't need to leave it up to luck. At least not all the time.
You can look if you want. If I'm enough to get your attention, then beating you should be a piece of cake.
Really? Do you see something you like? You can keep your eyes on me all you want, Fate. That just means you'll be looking at your cards less...

state.text: Oh, you're cute Plagg... Is there something you like besides cheese? Maybe I can give you something else.
Heheh, you're so cute, Plagg. Is cheese everything you care about? If you like something else, maybe I can help you.
Oh no... That sounds real! Aliens! Wh-What if they attack Earth? We gotta prepare! What's their weakness, Jim? Please, tell me it's something dumb like water...

Ah...! There are aliens out there?! They're gonna invade us, aren't they? W-We gotta start preparing right now! They can be killed, right? If they're weak against something that's everywhere, like water, I'll relax...
Don't make me laugh... What kind of girl would fall for such cheesy lines? If I'm blushing it's only because I'm embarrassed for you.
I have no idea on what kind of girl a cheesy line like that would work. Hearing them is an embarrassment, I'll give you that. I can't believe you can say them with a straight face.
Really? I find that hard to believe... A cute guy like you? I'd expect you to have girls swarming around you all the time... and boys too, probably.
Oh, I see... So you spend most of your time alone? What do you do, Ignatz?
Ohhh, you don't know Solitaire? That's one game I can beat you at then...! Oh, wait, it's a one-player game. Never mind...
Heheh, if you don't know Solitaire then we should play. I'll probably win... Oh. right. It's a one-player game.
Pieces of a... robot? That's it? I've never cared much for stuff like that. Did you sell them? I'd sell them.
Seriously? Just pieces of a robot? That sounds like junk. The guys in my crew go crazy over stuff like that, but I find it so boring. I would sell them, if I were you.
That cape is way too tacky for my taste, same as the glasses. I don't know why you saved it for last.
By any chance, that logo on your shirt isn't an emblem for some sort of organization, band, or... pirate crew, right?
What wrong with taking off the hat? It only covers your face. And if I may say it, it's not very stylish.
Please, vampires are not real. Heheheh...

case.state: Alright, if that's all you are capable of. But if you wanna prove me wrong...
Psst, just what I was expecting. I'm not calling you predictable, but...
Maybe you just want to feel more comfortable. That's why you're taking off your ~clothing~, right? I get it. It's better to feel good when bad things happen to you...
Sure, go ahead, get comfortable. I doubt you'll play better without your ~clothing~, but if you think you have a chance to win the game I'm not stopping you.
I'm so bored... I'll use this time to look around and see if there something I like.
Why is this game moving so slowly now? I'm not saying it's your fault, ~name~, but...
Your ~clothing~. huh? Is that your attempt to prolong your modesty, ~name~?
If that's your way to avoid getting naked, I understand. I like it when men show some modesty.
Your ~clothing~, huh? Is that where you keep your money by any chance?
Hmmm, I wonder if you could keep your wallet hidden inside your ~clothing~... What?
The odds are not in my favor anymore... I'm gonna have to fend for myself.
This is gonna be an uphill battle for me from now on. It sucks that you can't win your clothes back, doesn't it?
Okay, we get it. You're taking off your ~clothing~. Now hurry up and do it. Typical guy...
Good, you're taking off your ~clothing~. ~clothing.ifPlural(They don't|It doesn't)~ even look that good on you, anyway. I didn't want to say anything, but now it doesn't matter.
Oh, you're taking off your... ~clothing~. What a... smart move. This will be very... fun.
So you're taking off your ~clothing~? Okay, okay. I can take a second from looking at the background to focus on you.
Yes! Take that off, ~name~. You look good, as always... Uhh, kinda good.
Good, good. Time to strip, buddy! We've all done it before.
Nice ~name~, ~clothing~... I mean, nice ~clothing~, ~name~, hahaha...
I think some of the guys asked me to buy something for them... Dang it, I can't remember.
Now that I think about it... Was I supposed to buy something for the guys? I'm trying to remember, but it's driving me crazy.
I have this feeling that some of the guys asked me to buy something for them when I went out. Ugh, I knew I should've made a list.
Here's something I'm thinking... It's not unusual for a girl to be comfortable touching or being touched by her male friends, right? I don't mean in a sexual way, but in a friendly way.
You know... Even though I've never been in a relationship, I've never had a problem having physical contact with men. Especially my crew mates. That's not unusual, is it?
Hmmm... Is it common where you guys are from for girls to not get very close to their male friends? I mean, like, have physical contact... I've never been like that.

state.text: Are you sure you don't want a hug just so you can feel my breasts? Yeah, I know how men think.
No idea where it came from. I only know how to make items disappear...

case.state: Oh, I know that very well. That's why I'm taking this seriously. It will be hard to focus on the game, and making sure you don't cheat at the same time, but it has to be done.
Believe me, I'm very aware of that. Just make sure you don't cheat, huh? And if you, make sure you don't get caught by me. Or you might lose more than just your clothes.
Y-You've already seen more than you deserved... But I can still be the one who get the big prize in the end.
Y-You've gotten enough of eyeful to last you your whole life. But you still can lose more than I've had so far, and that's what I'll aim for.
This can go one of two ways, you know? Maybe I'll be the one looking at your naked body, though I would hardly call that a prize. But it's something...
Remember that you might lose your clothes before me, Fate. Then I'll be the one who gets the prize of seeing you naked, if you can call it that. But now I do feel a little curious...
I see... If it was that easy to seduce you, I wouldn't respect you as an opponent. This just makes things more interesting.
Sounds too much like superstition, if you ask me. Unless you're talking about cheating... Because I do believe in that, but I won't allow it!
I can't tell if you're just superstitious, or you're implying that you're cheating... Well, you did lose this round, so you can't be that good.

state.text: Weapons then... Cannons! Big cannons! These aliens can be blown up... right?
Then we're gonna need all the weapons we have! Could an alien withstand a cannonball? Definitely not two, right? Or three...?
Oh no... Where did they fall? I'll help you look for them.
Your glasses? Where could they have fallen? Nobody move so you don't step on them by accident.
