Ahahah... Okay, that's a little better. But even a good line will only get you so far with me. I prefer men of action to men of words.
Please... I'm not that easy that I'd fall for a line like that. Besides, I like real men... The ones that prove their worth with actions rather than words.
Hey, I draw too! Well, maps mostly, so not very artistic stuff... What do you like to draw, Ignatz?
Don't talk like that! Trust me when I say you're one of the cutest guys I've met. It's not often I want to let a man rest on my lap while I caress his hair... Sorry, too much information...
Geez, the fact that you don't even know how cute you are makes you even more adorable! And that's not something that I feel comfortable saying to other guys, but I think you need to hear it.
(I hope this guy never meets Luffy and the others. They'd get along immediately, and then annoy me to no end.)
See? You're a lot cuter without the hat. Garchu!
Well, I guess I've seen other creepy stuff, so...

case.state: Don't think making that creepy face is going to scare me. I'm only scared of bugs, ghosts, zombies, monsters...
I know Luffy asked me to buy more food, obviously. But we don't need more. We still have a good amount in the secret food reserve he doesn't know about. What? It's a life or death matter.
Robin was going to buy more sweets for Chopper. I don't know how they ran out already, because she had a lot in her bag. Maybe she pampers him too much.
I seem to remember that Usopp asked me to buy a bunch of weird stuff for his gadgets. I always get strange looks when I buy all those things in the same place.
Oh right! I was going to buy these new bath salts... Robin saw them in a magazine. We'll see if they have any special properties.

state.text: I just love my friends. I worry so much about them, and when I see that they're okay my first instinct is to give them a big hug. I don't care that I'm pressing my boobs against another man, heheh...

I don't think there's anything wrong with expressing my love for my friends in a physical, yet platonic way. I know them enough that I'm sure none of them would try groping me, or something. Not even Sanji.
They're the most important people in my life. I feel comfortable around them. When one of them is carrying me, or I hug them and my boob brushes up against them, I don't think anything about it.

case.state: I bet you aren't capable of taking off something bigger next time you lose. Heheh, we'll see...
Not gonna lie, this is a little boring. Let's just continue with the game.
I do feel lighter without my belt and my Clima-Tact, so I don't blame you.
Make yourself at home, ~name~. Before you lose again...
Oh, I know what I can do to entertain myself, I'm gonna think about all the stuff I'm gonna buy with the prize.
Maybe I should come up with a game to distract myself from the real game. Like counting the times ~player~ does something dumb. Hahah, it's just a joke! Relax.
How many days has it been since it last rained here? Hmmm... I think I can make a good approximation based on the air humidity.
This won't work, you know? But you can't know until you try. Who knows? Maybe a meteor will fall and kill us all before you lose.
You gotta do what you can, I suppose. Just be ready for getting naked before me.
I'm kidding, I'm kidding! I'm not here to steal. Unless... Nah, I'm kidding.
No, don't tell me. I'd rather guess. It's just a fun, innocent game I like to play when I meet new people.
You're not glancing at my chest again until you lose something bigger. You got that, ~name~?
It's gonna be hard to win after this, but dammit if I'm not gonna give it my best shot!
I feel like such an idiot watching you strip while I'm like this. I think I mentioned I don't like being naked in front of men.
This game is not helping my attitude in any way. It's too stressful. I'll have to take a three hour bath after this.
What if... you take off something else, ~name~? For me? The next time, I mean. Just remember it.
You're so cruel, ~name~. Do you even know what girls like?
Uhhh, this is so humiliating! I'm such an idiot...
So... how good is the security in this place? Hmmm...
(What would be the best route to escape from here after I take the money? I should figure that out now.)
How many security guards work here? Oh, it's just a question.
I know Luffy asked me to buy more food, obviously. But we don't need more. We still have a good amount in the secret food reserve he doesn't know about. What? It's a life or death matter.
Robin was going to buy more sweets for Chopper. I don't know how they ran out already, because she had a lot in her bag. Maybe she pampers him too much.
I seem to remember that Usopp asked me to buy a bunch of weird for his gadgets. I always get weird looks when I buy all that stuff in the same place.
Oh right! I was going to buy these new bath salts... Robin saw them in a magazine. We'll see if they have any special properties.

state.text: I just love my friends. I worry so much about them, and when I see that they're okay my first instinct is to give them a big hug. I don't care that I'm pressing my boobs against another man, heheh...

I don't think there's anything wrong with expressing my love for my friends in a physical, yet platonic way. I know them enough that I'm sure none of them would try groping me, or something. Not even Sanji.
They're the most important people in my life. I feel comfortable around them. When one of them is carrying me, or I hug them and my boob brushes up against them, I don't think anything about it.
Sorry, I didn't mean to offend you... I'm just naturally skeptical. Uhh, do you have any duties as a goddess?
Oh, sorry if I offended you. Meeting a nice goddess is new for me. Are there any responsibilities that come with your... position?
Are Robin and I too close to each other? Well, we do sleep in the same room, we share almost everything and we spend most of our time together...
Maybe you have a point... We do spend a lot of time together, don't we? Not to mention we sleep in the same room, we take baths together, and...
Hey, don't just throw your coat away! It looks like it's of high quality.
Ah!!! A bee! Someone get it out of here!
A crown that turns you into a monster if you put it on... Good thing I've never found anything like that. Only regular, golden crowns for me, please.
Oh, so you're the kind of girl that likes to return stolen goods. I can't say I relate. Finders, keepers, as they say.
Woah... What is this...? Where did Adora go?
The honor of... what? Huh...?!
Oh, really? I can't imagine ~player~ writing poetry, for some reason. What does ~human.ifMale(he|she)~ write about?
~Player~ is into poetry? Hahahah... Oh, sorry. What are ~human.ifMale(his|her)~ poems about, Yuri?
OH MY GOSH!!! HER HEAD...!!!

case.state: You really like ~player~, don't you? (I should be careful trying to seduce ~player~ into losing with her here...)

state.text: Are you gonna dance again...? Oh my... A monkey? Where did Shantae go?
How are you gonna take off your shoes while dancing? Huh? Where did this monkey come from?
Getting out of your comfort zone... I suppose there is nothing more uncomfortable than stripping in front of strangers, so you probably came to the right place.
That's a good reason. Sometimes you can fall into a rut if you do the same things every day. Not that I would know what that's like. My life is crazy.
I'm sorry, I'm afraid I haven't seen any of your movies. But if you have fans, then you must be very popular, huh? And rich?
Oh, I'm sorry, Jessie. I'm not into those movies. Not that there's anything wrong with them, I just prefer using my imagination. But you must make a lot of money out of them, right?
Oh no, I'm not saying it's wrong. It was just an observation.
Nothing wrong with that, I just found it curious. Relax, ~marker.nickname~.
I believe I've heard of that style. Aren't you worried the meaning of your poems might be lost to some people if you rely too much on metaphors?
I think I know what you're talking about. It doesn't sound like it would be easy for just anyone to comprehend your poetry. Are you concerned that their meaning might fly over people's heads?
Underground?! I've never been to an underground country. How could there be life in a place without sun? W-Wait, did you say monsters?
An underground kingdom... And filled with monsters?! That sounds like a nightmare. How could there be life down there without the sun?
Oh, so you're more like a sports legend. Is that the main purpose of these Pokémon creatures? To fight each other? Sounds to me like that would be a morally gray area.

Wow, I'd never heard of Pokémon trainers until today, but that sounds impressive. I had not considered that Pokémon are used for competing in battles. Is that all they're used for? If they're sentient creatures, that sounds a little questionable...
Wait... They're not directions to some ancient hidden treasure, right? Sh-Should I be writing them down?
Relax, Saki. I was trying to say how nice it is that you can be yourself, not being peer pressured to act girly because it's expected of you.
You're just proving my point, Saki. You're a tomboy even though you hang out with girls. I'm a refined, girly girl even though I hang out with boys... And that's perfectly fine.
Wow, you sound totally smitten with him! And he knows that you like him? Maybe he's more into the sexy type than the cute one. Have you tried a different style, Amy?
Oh, I see this isn't just a simple crush... If he doesn't respond to your advances, maybe the cute style isn't what he's into. Have you tried a different look Amy? Like a more sexy one?
Stuff that has been written... This might be a good opportunity to learn more about our goals. What can you tell me about the "One Piece"?
Oh, I see... I kinda wanna test your knowledge. What information do you have on me? "Nami". Or "Cat Burglar Nami", as some people call me. I'm not self-indulgent, I'm just curious.
You sound like the kinky one to me! So... you're actually into that kind of stuff? I-Is that how you died? Doing something like... what was it again? Auto erotic asphyxiation...?

Oh, so you're a pervert... That makes you less scary, I guess. So if you're still into that sort of stuff, does that mean your body is solid? Uhhh, if not there wouldn't be a lot you can do to have fun.
You never get embarrassed? Really? Not even when your towel accidentally falls off in a bath house full of strangers, and you're the only one with her body exposed there?
Have you never really gotten embarrassed? What if you're the only naked person in a room full of strangers because your towel accidentally fell off? That's just a hypothetical situation...
So they're not from a Devil Fruit, or something? Then how did you get your powers? You weren't born with them, right?
I guess your ice powers couldn't be from a Devil Fruit, since Aokiji has that ability. How did you obtain that ability, then? You did get it from somewhere, right?
So you're still a fairly small band, huh? That's okay. We all gotta start somewhere. If you keep playing, you'll probably reach the ears of someone who can help you get famous.
There's no shame in starting small. As long as you're persistent, I'm sure you'll hit the jackpot at one point.
Huh... Then how would you deal with someone who's trying to peek on you while you're taking a shower, or changing clothes? I just zap them, or punch them.
Even so, you gotta admit that there's something personal about your underwear. I don't mind if people look at me while I'm wearing a bikini, but I always wash my undergarments personally.
Why not? Picking an outfit is half of the fun of dressing up. It's just mean to not let you choose.
Huh? Who picks your outfit for you? If someone told me what to wear, I'd tell them to jump off a cliff.
Aqua and Magma... Are those some sort of criminal organizations? What do they do? Weapon trafficking, slave trading...?
Tell me more about this Mt. Chimney? It's not a volcano, right? Because I don't think there's anything in the world that would make me want to visit one...
What kind of people have you teamed up with? I get the feeling you have to be a little bit crazy to be a superhero... no offense.
You gotta have a little bit of crazy in you to put on a costume and go fight crime... Uh, let me rephrase that: What kind of interesting characters have you worked with, Gwen?
Oh, okay... Wait, what does that even mean? Did you find some sort of information we don't know? I hope that doesn't mean you can cheat...
I see, I see... Uhhh, I still don't understand what you're saying. It sounds to me like you found some way to cheat in this game. Is that it?
Heh, I think we have more in common than I thought. Did you ask the Air Pirates to rescue you, or did they do it for their own reasons?
So you're the scholar of your crew, huh? Robin is the calming presence in my crew that we turn to when we need information on the world. Do you like reading a lot, Fina?
Hmm, how do you do it? Sometimes I have no other way to keep my captain under control than by punching him. I'd much rather he ends up with a bump on his head than dead anyway.
Even those little dogs can be ferocious. You can tell some hate cats with a passion. I hope you don't get bitten playing with them.
I've seen small dogs that are so violent that they seem possessed. You can see the hatred in their eyes. I hope you're careful, Nadia. I don't wanna see one get a piece of you.
I get that. There's something special about simple traditions. Is there something that Brigid's culture is most known for?
I understand what you mean. I've seen lots of different cultures, but I still miss my hometown even if it was nothing too special about it. What's Brigid best known for?
Huh? But the islands being in the middle of nowhere must be only a figure of speech, right? Do the people that live there don't know how to travel to or from the islands? What about maps?
Who are these Magypsies? Are they the rules of these islands? Maybe some sort of historians...
I see... I think they did a great job raising you into a fine young woman. But you have other friends now, right? How do you fit among them?
Huh, I've also met a group of people that claim to have transcended gender. So they raised you... Is that a pendant a memento from them? Maybe it's valuable, huh?
That sounds serious! Have you thought about... getting help? I believe there are groups of people that meet every week. They're anonymous too.

Don't talk about that like it's not a big deal! You could've died! Uhhh, if you really have a problem with drinking there might be people who can help you. I think they usually meet weekly, and it's all anonymous and stuff.
Oh, really...? I didn't know you were rich. Hmmm, I take it if you have money to spend on costumes and such, you probably have money to spare, right? Right?
Wow, you're right...! I guess it makes sense. You must have a lot of money. Maybe even more than you know what to do with, if you're spending it on costumes and gadgets, right?

It was a silly drawing with a joke. I have no idea what it meant, but it must've been funny since the guys were laughing for an hour, which only got on my nerves even more. If it had been a treasure map, at least...

No, the bottle drifted away before we could get it. You don't think there could've been a map in there, right? Or a note asking for help, offering an amazing reward? Maybe I should've chased after it.
What...? N-No, I didn't mean to hit him that hard. I wasn't even that angry at him, I was just concerned. Do you really think it's serious? When was this?
A-Are you serious...? Maybe I should lay back with the punching a bit. But I don't know how else to teach him a lesson. I'm sure leaving him without food would be even more cruel.
Exactly! He caused a soda explosi--- wait, what was that about our laundry? Are you kidding me?! Grrrr, I'll have another word with him later...
Huh...?! I was thinking about the soda explosion. What did he do to our laundry?! Unbelievable! This isn't over...
Well, Chopper was busy tending to Luffy. Sigh... Sometimes I feel that Chopper is the one that actually pays the price when I hit Luffy.
I let Chopper take care of Luffy. I didn't want to give him more work. He wasn't the one that did something wrong.
Did I ever tell that I was terrified of your ability when I first met you? I'd see your arms pop up around the ship every now and then, and I'd have to remind myself that it was you doing it.
Your ability really scared me when you first joined the crew. I'd see these arms grow anywhere and I'd almost let out a scream every time.

I really admire your patience, Robin. You never seem to lose your composure. Like yesterday when Franky was building that thing and making a ruckus all day, you were reading as usual like nothing bothered you.
I wish I had a bit of your patience, Robin. I don't know how you didn't flip at Franky yesterday when he was working on his stuff all day a making so much noise right next to you reading your book.

Wait, for real? You don't age? So you could be like... a hundred, and it wouldn't even show. Uhh, but you don't need to say it if it's a sensible topic. It's always rude asking someone you just met their age.

R-Really...? What kind of ability is that? I didn't understand a lot of what you said, but not aging is very impressive by itself... Now I can't stop wondering if you're like a hundred years old... two hundred? Not three hundred, right?!
That does sound like what a normal girl would like. I suppose I have a hard time picturing this place you come from, with game-loving goddesses... Lastation, was it? Was it it like?
Heheh, I see... So you're just like any other girl. Is there anything you guys don't have in this place you live in? Like... a good shoe store... Uhh, or something more important.

case.state: I see... If you're gonna wear something like that, then it should at least be practical. But about you? You don't find it... awkward to wear something that so clearly shows the shape of your body?

So at the very least it's well designed. I've never worn a bodysuit, but I assume not anyone would be okay with putting on something that so clearly fits every part of your body... You don't have that problem, Samus?

state.text: I hope you're not chasing people to offer them a funeral. That'd be a... bizarre image.
But still, I doubt you offer special discounts to people and all that. Two funerals for the price of one, hahah... d-do you?
Why do you have so much work to do anyway? If it's too much for you alone, you could hire someone to work for you. Unless you're a perfectionist...
If I were you, I'd hire an employee to take some of the workload off me. But, you know... sometimes if you want something done right, you gotta do it yourself.
Ohhh, money is language I understand very well! Sounds like a nice place to visit as long as you don't have a pirate problem, because... well, you know.

Interesting...! I'm not a religious person, but if I were to pray to anyone, the god of wealth would be a good candidate. But I hope your city doesn't have pirates around... and especially law enforcement against pirates.
Wow... Umm, forgive my impertinent question, m'lady. Please... do not vanquish me.
Oh, okay... Umm, I must say I'm most humbled by your... thy presence, m'lady... So please forgive this humble mortal.
Do you have a lot of friends... other than your bird? It must be tough finding people who are as dramatic as you, but I'm sure there are other people with common interests.
So I take it you have more friends than your talking bird? Even if there's no one else with your taste for the theatrical, I'm sure there are other people who you have things in common with.
Ohhh, the drama club! I'm sure that's a good way of learning how to express yourself. Do you wanna become an actress, or do you like it more as a hobby?
That sounds nice! I've never tried acting on a play or anything, but it must be fun. Is that what you want to do with your life?
Oh, that's my usual method... Well, I'm more of a puncher myself. I didn't wanna say it because I'm worried other might judge me, but it's nice to know others think like me.
That's what I usually do. A solid punch is not a bad disciplining method, but some people are very judgmental. Feels good to know I'm not the only one that thinks like that.
Well, nobody's perfect. Least of all your friends, heheh... How did the two of you meet?

Being friends with somebody doesn't mean that they never annoy you. I know that very well. Loving them despite those flaws is what true friendship is. Besides, I don't think being a little vain is too bad.
That's so noble of you... I wasn't expecting it. If it wasn't for the sporadic outbursts, you'd be a regular hero who fights for peace.
Hmm, that's very nice. So underneath the not-so-hidden rage issues you have the heart of a hero who fights for love and peace.
Oh, you can fly too? S-so what?
I completely forgot you have prosthetic legs. That's why you kept your socks on, huh?
I forgot about your legs... Now I understand why you didn't take off your socks earlier.
I always thought I was young for a navigator, but you are even younger, Futaba. Though I have been drawing maps for as long as I can remember. But it's not a competition, right?
You seem so young for a navigator, Futaba. I've been drawing maps since I was little, but I was working under different circumstances then. You seem to be doing pretty good for yourself.
What's your crew like, Futaba? Since we have a few things in common, I'm guessing they might be a bunch of lovable morons too.
I'm interested to learn more about your crew, Futaba. Maybe you're also part of a group of lovable misfits. That would be another thing in common between us.
You're shaving off our wool? I guess you really aren't a mink. They're very proud of their hair, after all.
So you like red and black, huh? I prefer lighter colors.
I would like to see your ship. Judging by your outfit, I bet it has some interesting design for sailing.
I can't imagine what your ship looks like, Meia. Anything that matches that peculiar outfit you're wearing must be something else.
Ah... G-G-G-G-Ghoooost...!!! Everybody run!!!
AHHHH...!!! A ghost is behind you! It's going to strangle you!
You have so many jewels that I doubt you'd miss a few if they get lost, huh?
Do you keep a weapon or something there, or is it just for the look?
Still, I wouldn't wear an outfit like that. Not because I don't like it, but because I'm sure it would make the guys think I'm going to do all their chores for them.
Oh, she's your wrestling partner? I see... What else do you two do together?
Huh...?! You can fly...?
Y-You're flying...!
What's wrong, Sakura? Your skin... Is that a rare disease? I have a doctor in my crew, I'm sure he can help you...
Magic? Sure... But seriously, what is that thing?
I just wanna make sure you know what you're getting into. You look like a nice girl, if maybe a little... lost.
AH! What was that noise?!
Is that sweater as comfortable as it looks? It's also super cute.
Obsession with food is not good for you. At least Luffy doesn't get fat with all the meat that he eats.
It's not good for your health eating so much. I don't know how Luffy does it, but not everybody is like him.
I've met a few people who can fly through different means. How do you do it?
You're a musician, right? Does everybody who's into music got a screw loose?
Wearing a jacket like that... I'm not sure if it's fashion or just random. You're not making a statement or something, right?
That's not how you wear a jacket... It's not like it bothers me or something. It just feels... random.
What do you mean?
Stop being so damn mean and just take off your headband!
(Wow, that thing is short. It doesn't even qualify as a mini skirt.)
Oh, I'm so sorry. I had no idea...
Is that jacket as comfy as it looks?
That hat is probably the only cute thing about you. I wouldn't mind having one just like it.
If there's one compliment I can give you, is that that hat is very cute. I'd like to get one like it.
I bet. That's one of the reasons why I prefer dressing lightly.
That seems like the technology from Germa 66. Can you also shoot fire and stuff?
Feliz Na... What?
Dancing while stripping is kinda... Umm... You know what? Just do what you enjoy.
Are you taking off your tights...? Huh...?
Time for your tights, huh? Hmm...?
Can you really remove your crown? Are you worried you'll be treated any different now, Your Highness?
I guess there's no such thing as a stereotype. After all I know this one swordswoman who wears glasses, so...
I guess seeing the loser undress is not part of the rules...
I've never had a robot come onto me... I... don't know how to react.
Why not? It's just a hat, isn't it?
What's the big deal? It's a hat...
Oh, I'm sure they're quite convincing. That's why you're wearing a uniform and all... But magic is not real.
They pulled off a really convincing scam... Making kids think that magic is real. Sure, there's stuff that looks like magic, but it's not the same.
Oh, so they teach you science at school too? So it's not just fake magic stuff.
Ah, so you have a science class? It's a relief to know they don't just teach the students fake mumbo jumbo stuff.
Hmph, where does this seller of "wands" live? Maybe I'll pay them a visit, and relieve them of their income.
I wouldn't feel a bit of regret stealing from someone who sells sticks at a high price. Where can I find this fraud?
What the hell?! I definitely saw it this time. Where did you clothes go?
Are you telling me you're a character from a comic? I... normally wouldn't believe that, but given the circumstances...
So you're really gonna strip while dancing? I-Is that what you do for a living, Shantae? I'm not judging, it just seems... surprising.
Really? It's actually impressive that you can sneak around that easily. Do you have any advice for how to be more stealthy? It couldn't hurt to go by unnoticed every now and then.
Huh, that's kind of amazing... I don't think I'm bad at sneaking around, but I'm probably not on your level. Do you have any tips you can give me on how to get better at being stealthy?
(I hope she doesn't have a demon head, or something...)
(What if she has demon horns? Or horrible monstrous ears? I should try to avoid screaming...)
Heh... heheh... Boy, where did those hands come from? I don't know...
I was looking forward to you using your ability and see how people would react. It's not every day you see something like that, huh?
It's a big dress. There should be an easy way to take it off.
(Her panties are showing again. Is she doing this on purpose to try to entice ~player~?)

case.state: Okaaay, I'm making some progress here.
I was just going to ask you. Where did you get your ~clothing~?
Alright, not too shabby. Good effort, ~name~.
Seeing all these people wearing different clothes makes me want to go shopping. But I already went yesterday...
So many women wearing different clothes in this place. Should I increase my inventory?
With all these different clothes everybody's wearing, I'm thinking if my closet is too samey.
One of my favorite parts of this game is seeing all the clothes everyone wears.
It's so quiet here compared to my ship! It's feels nice for a change to be in a place where nobody is screaming or running around in circles.
I know this is my first time coming here, but I don't think I'm doing so bad, right? Then again, I don't know how the pros play.
Cute ~clothing~. But I bet ~clothing.ifPlural(they look|it looks)~ better when you're not wearing ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~.
Alright, everything is going well... For me, at least. You gotta look out for number one in this game, right?
Looking at the different clothes you all wear is one of the most interesting parts of this game.
Oh, your ~clothing~? For me? Ah, you're just taking ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ off. I was kidding, of course. I don't even want ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~.
I might have ~clothing.ifPlural(similar|a similar)~ ~clothing~ to yours in my closet. Wait, do I? I'm not sure anymore. I just love buying stuff, and I always get the best discounts.
Hmmm, ~clothing.ifPlural(those | that)~ ~clothing~... Classic ~name~ move.
Ha! I knew it. The ~clothing~ is coming off. I've gotten to know you a lot in this short amount of time, ~name~.
I won't say I'm happy with this, but it makes sense.And it's better to play against reasonable opponents.
This almost feels like... nothing. Welp, take ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~ off anyway.
So you're removing... nothing? Oh, sorry. You're taking off your ~clothing~. Well, it's kind of the same.
That's all? Why don't you save us all the time, and we just move on to the next round?
~clothing.ifPlural(Are|Is)~ your ~clothing~ comfortable? Okay... I'm sure ~clothing.ifPlural(they|it)~ feel nice to wear.
Oh, your ~clothing~. I never realized how pretty ~clothing.ifPlural(they were|it was)~. I miss my clothes.
I would've taken my time removing my clothes if I'd known I'd end up like this. Any extra second wearing something would've been worth it.
Ugh, some water got into my ear.
You still think you can win, ~name~? Want me to cheer for you? I'll do it for 30% of the prize if you win.
Ah, the ~clothing~. Of course you still had that. I lost so quickly, after all...
(Did I put the lock on the fridge so Luffy couldn't get into it...? Oh, yeah, I did.)
(Did Zoro walk out on his own this morning? How will he return to the ship, then?)
(Didn't Chopper ask me to buy something for him? Was it medical supplies or candy?)
I wonder where my crew mates are at this hour... There are not that many responsible people among us, so it's usually up to me to know where everyone is.
I hope my crew mates are doing well without me... I'm not saying they depend on me, but... Yeah, they do.
When was the last time I saw each of my crew mates? I hope nobody wandered off on their own... I can't help but worry, because someone has to.
Oh, hey...! I heard a funny joke the other day. Wanna hear it? Ummm, how did it go again...?
Hey, wanna hear a joke? I heard it the other day and it really made me laugh. Let me think how it started...
I heard a joke the other day, it was really funny. Can I tell it? I think we could lighten the mood here a little.

state.text: Hmmm... Oh, wanna hear a story? Something that happened to me once in one of my many adventures... Maybe something I've never told anyone...
Do you guys like adventures? Maybe I can entertain you with one of my stories while ~name~ undresses. Maybe one a little more intimate. Let's see...
I've had lots of adventures, you know? Would you like to hear about one of them? But which one...? I'm feeling a little more candid now, so maybe...

case.state: Hmmm... Oh, wanna hear a story? Something that happened to me once in one of my many adventures...
Do you guys like adventures? Maybe I can entertain you with one of my stories while ~name~ undresses. Let's see...
I've had lots of adventures, you know? Would you like to hear about one of them? But which one...?

state.text: Hmmm... I'm gonna take a moment to look down from this roof. I'm curious to see what this city is like.
You guys don't mind if I look down from the roof? I promise I won't get too close to the ledge.
Let's take a second to see what's down there on the street...

Ohhh, interesting... If I ever visit Lastation I'll make sure to bring as many clothes as I can find to sell them to all the girls there. It's not how I normally make money, but it sounds like a good opportunity... And don't worry, Noire. I'll give you a great discount!

case.state: You know what? You're right! And if anything, I'd be lucky to be Robin's significant other... I'm sure you can't do any better than her, heheh...
Awww, Robin... You're absolutely right. And if things were different, I'd be the luckiest girl in the world to be in a relationship with you, because you're a catch, heheh...

state.text: That sounds just like me! I guess every group of outlaws needs a big sister.
Looks can be deceiving, alright! That's always part of the strategy.
Oh, then he would fit perfectly in my own crew. We have a bunch of tough headed goofballs... no offense, Skull.
She sounds like Robin. Every team needs someone who can keep their composure in times of crisis.
Hahah, he couldn't be more different from my captain! Still, I wouldn't replace Luffy for anyone.
Mysterious... If a little scary, too.
I can already tell you have more smart people in your crew than mine. I wish I could share some of the responsibilities that fall on me all the time. I'm a little jealous.
Those names make them all sound so mysterious. I guess they're nicknames, since you're a group of thieves.

Wh-What the hell...?! That's so much information about me! You even know my dream, and my feelings...! A-And you said this information was available to everyone? Uhhh... Th-That's an invasion of privacy!

STOOOOP...!!! I-I didn't expect you actually had an answer... If Luffy doesn't want to know what the treasure is, neither should I! All I heard was something about "manga" and a guy named Oda. No idea what any of that means...
I'm not a great dancer. My friend Robin is way better than me. But maybe I can get better if I pay attention to your moves...
Oh, that's a relief... You just look too innocent to do something like that. I've been offered money before to do that kind of stuff, but I could never take it. I value my body too much.
Awww, that's such a sweet story. I like how you forgave that girl for stealing a little crown, and became friends with her. That's not a good reason to ostracize someone.
Thank you for telling me that story, it was very wholesome. I'm sure Sunset appreciates having a good friend like you.
Are you still... you? That wasn't some weird switcheroo? I'll take your word for it.
That was just a transformation, right? It sure caught me by surprise... but I don't think there's anything wrong with it.
I get your reaction, Florina. I also hate bugs. Especially the ones that destroy your clothes.
What a mess. Too bad I don't have a hair brush to loan you right now.
Shining Beauty? Should you really call yourself that?
Really? You think the face-painting will help you play better? This is just like Luffy with the afro...
I don't know how to play an instrument. I guess if I wanted to learn, I could ask Brook to teach me. I do enjoy music every now and then.
Well, I don't know about ~player~, but you clearly have a way with words. I'd gladly read a book written by you.
I believe you're a poet, Yuri. You don't speak like any schoolgirl I've ever met. I'd love to read a book written by you one day.
Haha, that doesn't sound bad at all! I know some that probably wouldn't mind becoming devout believers of a goddess like you.
Oh, that actually sounds pretty good to me! I was a bit worried you'd turn out to be like the Goddess of War, or Destruction... Even if you don't look like it.
I'd expect all of you adult movies people to be filthy, considering how many people are into that. I've stumbled upon Sanji's stash more than once. Hey, I'm sure he's your fan, Jessie.
Hmmm, I thought you'd be set for life. I have seen Sanji's collection, and it's huge. I'm sure he'd recognize nice you, Jessie. Ummm, I wonder if I should ask for your autograph for him...
What... is happening?
Huh? What's with you? I never said I didn't like them...
You like gambling, Cynthia? I've also been to a few casinos, but we only gambled with money. This here feels more high-stakes, don't you think?
Do you gamble, Cynthia? There must be at least one casino where you're from. I'm used to them too, but I've never bet something this valuable before.
Parallel worlds? As in... multiple worlds that are different from each other? I still have a long way to go to finish exploring this world, but that would be insane. Can you imagine that?
What...? I've seen a lot of crazy things, but they're all in this world. The idea of there being multiple worlds is just too crazy not to be funny, hahahah...
I'm afraid I also don't know what that thing you mentioned is... Maybe I should go to school. But at least I'm glad you're educating yourself, Hermione.
I understand, I also put an effort to learn new things, even if my peers don't. But I must admit I don't know what that thing you mentioned is... I suppose you can always learn more.

I'd never considered just how difficult writing poetry is. If it's too hard to write something that appeals to everyone, then you should probably focus on the people you want to get it. What about ~player~, Yuri?

Writing poetry is no joke... ~Player~, you've read Yuri's poems, right? Does ~human.ifMale(he|she)~ have a hard timing understanding them, Yuri? I think it'd just be easier to focus on writing for a specific type of people.

I see... These Pokémon must be a lot tougher than I thought then. But if they're so strong, then wouldn't there be a risk of people using them to attack other people? What if they have nothing to defend themselves with?

Oh, I get it. I thought they were like regular creatures, but they sound way stronger. If Pokémon are meant to fight, then wouldn't it be possible for someone to order one to attack another person? That has to be a risk, right?
An underground prison... Who put you in there? Even Impel Down, the world's biggest underwater prison, is meant to hold the worst criminals. What did these monsters do to deserve that?

The idea of an underground prison sounds awful. Even if they're monsters, maybe they didn't deserve it. I've heard stories of the world's greatest underwater prison, Impel Down. It's meant to hold the worst of the worst... What reason was there for such torture?

case.state: Keep talking! I'll be rich! What was the first one you said again? Was it left or down?
That's good, isn't it? Were your friends also outcasts in their own way before you found each other?
Then it's good that you met each other. If your friends were also alone before you found each other, I'm sure they're grateful to now have you in their lives.

state.text: Oh, I don't think asking him what he likes is the best idea. Some men are just shy, and others prefer women who take the initiative. If it's the latter, asking him would be the last thing you should do.
Really? Do you think he's just shy? If you want my opinion, don't ask him what he likes. Just take the initiative, and go after him. There's a good chance that's exactly what he's into.
Hmmm, I didn't think I'd say this, but you can probably gain something positive from this experience. At the very least, I think you should smile more.
Well, if there's someone here who could benefit from playing something like this game, it's probably you. If I see you smiling more often by the end of the game, I'd call it a win.
Your shoes came off on their own? Well... That is a little impressive, but I'm sure someone could make shoes that do that. I've seen crazier inventions.
You removed your shoes without touching them... That's not bad, but I'm not sure what waving that stick had to do with it. It can't be that hard to make shoes that do that.
They're very rare, but they can be anywhere. So that must be what happened to you... See, that's why you should never eat weird-looking things, even if they seem edible.
I'm sorry to say, but you probably ate a Devil Fruit without realizing. This is why I always tell my captain not to eat anything that looks even a little weird.
Hey, it's better to design them yourself so you can save some money. Are you good at drawing?
Well, are you good at drawing, so you can make your own flyers? Or are you only into music?
Hmmm, I punch my friends all the time... I'm not a violent person or anything, and I've tried using words before. It's more of punch of love, get it?
I know... Hell, I'd even say none of my underwear is as revealing as my bikinis. Still, I don't want anyone to see what type it is, or what color, or if it has a pattern on it...
Crazy? Me? Hahaha... Oh, only the top half? I guess it's fair if it covers your whole body.
I guess I deserve that... Hmmm, I'm not gonna complain that you only removed the top half. It's a bodysuit, so it seems fair to me.
There are more important things your parents can do for you than worry about what you wear, if you ask me... I hope that's the full extent of their control over your life.
But you're an adult... Sometimes you gotta be a little more of a rebel, especially if your parents are even controlling your wardrobe. What else do they force you to do?

I suppose that makes sense... Unless...! You've lost twice on purpose to make us underestimate you while you continue cheating! Hmmm... I think you're gonna have to lose a few more times to prove me wrong, Monika.

Suuure... But every cheater knows that it's easy to get caught if all you do is win. There's only one thing that will clear my doubts, and that's if you lose again. And then again. And another time, for safety.
You're not serious, right? I'm like 80% sure you're not serious.
Woah, it sure sounds like your islands have quite the history. I have friend who would love learn more about it, but I'm just happy to hear that you're living in peace now... right?
So you were raised by these powerful masters? That probably means there's a lot of responsibility and expectations set on you, am I wrong?

Nobody knows where they are, you say... It's impossible for me not to take that as a challenge. I wouldn't be able to call myself a navigator if I can't find this place and literally put it on the map.
Ohhh, so they aren't on any map yet? Until now, heheh... It'll be my pleasure to be the first one to add your islands to the world map, Kumatora.

You know what? Maybe you're right... It's a good thing I saved it. If it turns out to be something big I guess I'll have to apologize to Luffy... or buy him a stack of meat. I'm sure he'd prefer that.

It was a silly cartoon about a woman who's mad at everything, and yelling all the time. I don't know what was so funny about it, but the guys kept laughing and looking at me as if I couldn't hear them...
Of course not, it'd be a treasure map...! N-No, I guess that's not true. I was mad because he almost drowned. What if one day he falls into the sea and none of us is there to save him?
You're right, as always. Our captain sure has a talent for getting us into dangerous situations, after all. Maybe this was a case in which we got lucky.

Two days ago...? Oh, I know why that was! He was trying to steal my food, so I punched him and he bit his tongue! That's why he was talking weird! Uff, that's a relief... I didn't give him brain damage.
O-Of course I do... I only ever hit him because I care. Most of the time, at least. The rest are because he broke something, or because he invaded my privacy.
Ugh, that's not the metaphor I would've used, but yes. It's just like that. Perhaps we could think of a different punishment, like... putting a Sea Stone collar on him?
That's a good point... I guess we're back to square one, then. How else can we punish Luffy for misbehaving? Hmmm...
Sigh... I still can't believe how carefree he is. How do you even do it, Robin? You never get mad at him at all.
At least that was one disaster avoided, but not thanks to him. I wish I had a bit of your patience. I don't know how you never lose your composure with Luffy.
Alright, I promise I won't get mad at Luffy anymore... Uhh, I don't sound very convincing, do I?
Fine, then! I've decided from now on I won't get aggressive with Luffy anymore! Unless he does something really stupid... or not that stupid, but that still... Uhh, you don't believe me, do you?
Oh, yeah! Now I see arms, legs, even eyes around and I feel safe because I know that you're nearby, heheh.
I didn't think I'd get used to it, but I sure have. I think knowing that they're your body parts that you sprout feels more comfortable for me, as weird as that sounds.
I don't know what he was making. Some robot... thingy. I didn't really get it.
No idea what Franky was building. It looked like some robot thing as usual, but I couldn't bother to ask him.
That's great! Now I wonder what other cat-like qualities you have... Do you like fish? Do you purr when someone scratches your head? Heheh...
That's good. Cats do have an instinct for avoiding danger. Are there any other cat qualities you have? Do you like what they like? Oh, do you purr when people pet you?
Oh, that's very kind... But I don't think Chopper would be any more excited than me to learn about burials at sea. He tries his hardest so nobody dies on him.
That... makes me very sad. I don't know what I would do if any of my crew mates passed away. But thank you for the offer.
Living for that long must give you a very different perspective on life from us simple mortals. If there anything you don't like about it?
I can't even fathom what life must be like for someone who isn't affected by the passing of time. But are there any downsides to it? Seeing the world change around you must not always be easy.

It sounds like a modern wonder. So there aren't any problems compatibilizing the industrial side of the city with the natural landscape, such as contamination? You wouldn't believe the places I've seen that have been destroyed by factories and such.
I know, right? Who needs money? You could probably donate it to your friends, and continue living happily... right, girlfriend?
Yeah! Money, schmoney... You should get rid of it, and donate it to the most needy. Or your friends. I mean, you already do enough for needy people, so friends sounds good. Right, Janey?
Crouch-walking... Man, that must've been torture on your hinder parts. I'm sure it makes them look good though... I'm more of a crawler myself.

Interesting... Crouch-walking sounds like it would be good exercising too, even if your butt and legs must suffer horribly. I'm sure it makes them look good though... and it would be nice to not have to crawl anymore.
(Why the hell am I trying to pick a fight with her? I'm the smart one, and Luffy isn't here.)
You know, maybe Franky could make you some better legs. He's the shipwright of our crew, and like half of his body is machine. It would probably take him like five minutes.

You know what? If you want a better set of legs, I could ask Franky to make some for you. Although they'd probably be a little extreme, like allowing you to fly, or something... That's just his style.
I'm 20. I know, I don't look a day over 18. It's strange that nobody asked my age at the entrance.

case.state: Oh, I'm actually 20. I wouldn't blame you for thinking I'm younger, considering how cute I am.

state.text: Well, whatever you are, it's a fact you're super cute!
Uh... I don't know that much about how ships are built, but I didn't understand a word of that. Maybe Franky, the shipwright of our ship, could. Though it might be too outlandish, even for him.
Uh... The Sunny can do amazing stuff using cola as a fuel. I don't know what a... energy fusion core is. I'm not sure Franky does either.
Oh, y-you know her? I'm still shaking... I've never seen an actual ghost before. Though there have been a lot of times in which I thought I saw one. Too many.
Oh, I see... So you recognize her? If I'd known that I probably wouldn't have screamed... No, I definitely would've.
Either way, I don't care. It looks valuable, that's all that matters.
O-okay, you don't have to give me that much detail. I'm perfectly fine with it, but I think that's too much information.
Please, don't curse me. I was just kidding earlier... Haha... ha...
Y-You didn't take what I said earlier seriously, right? You're actually scary... Unless you don't want to be scary, in which case... I'll just keep my mouth shut.
Gahhh!!! A zombie! I didn't think I'd have to deal with them after Thriller Bark!
Why did you do that? You almost killed me! Just when I was okay with you being a zombie.
I bet it's a rare, expensive jewel. Don't worry, I'm not gonna steal it. I'll just admire it for a while...
When I see an airhead girl, my maternal instincts naturally kick in. I can't help it.
Explosions now? Are you insane?
Huh, so sweaters are good for concealing the size of your breasts... I should remember that the next time I need to avoid drawing attention to myself.
You could always buy new clothes that fit you better. But that's so painful...
Going shopping because your old clothes no longer fit you must be so painful...
I have no idea what that symbol means. It looks like a bat, I guess. Am I missing something?
I apologize for coming to the wrong conclusion. I guess I wouldn't be a good detective.
Winter clothing can be so cozy... Though I still prefer the warmer weather.
I can't believe this type of game is too soft for someone...
I'm sure if it was up to you, the rules of this game would be drastically different.
Oh... What's that you were hiding under your armor? It looks shiny.
Hey, careful! You almost kicked me in the face.
Not really, but it's pretty obvious.
That skull doesn't mean you're a pirate, right? I mean, I don't think it does. But I'm sure a moron would make that mistake.
That definitely surprised me. So you can turn into a monkey... As far as Devil Fruits go, that's very cute.
Oh, you have a Devil Fruit power! A monkey, huh? I'm not sure how powerful that ability would be, but it's really cute.
(It seemed like she was going to remove her tights, but then she stopped. Maybe she remembered she didn't shave her legs...)
(What happened there? She stopped, as if she remembered something embarrassing... I probably shouldn't pry.)
But it is a nice... crown... Oh, sorry!

case.state: Yeah, take it all off at once to get it out of the way! Mmph, dammit...

state.text: Those spats are so tight they could be painted. Hmmm... Oh, I guess they're not.
You took that bra off surprisingly fast, even with that thing over your head. People have the weirdest talents...
You're a real piece of work, aren't you?
Take this game seriously, please...
W-What's that? Did someone do that to you? Or did you...? Either way, it's not good.
Those scars... I guess they could be an accident, so I won't pry.

case.state: Azami...! There's something on your head. It looks like... a spiral.

state.text: I don't know what that was, and I don't think you can explain it to me... So I'm gonna assume it's something with a very normal and reasonable explanation.
Oh, hello there... Does it talk, or can it only make chirping sounds?
Hi... I-I don't know why I'm saying hi. It doesn't seem like it can communicate...
Hey, you're cute! I mean, your face is normal... B-But why wouldn't it be normal, right?
Ahhhhh...!!! Oh, your face is normal... Hahaha, you're actually kinda cute. I-I don't know why I screamed...

case.state: Luffy went off on his own as soon as we docked here. He always does that. As long as we don't hear any explosions in the distance, he shouldn't be in any trouble.
I think Zoro takes a nap at this hour. It's better if he's sleeping, because if he wakes up he'll wandered off somewhere and won't be able to find his way back on his own.
I have no idea where Sanji is... Oh, gosh, I hope he's chasing after some other girl and not looking for me. That's the last thing I'd need right now.
Robin should be on the ship, reading... I asked her if she wanted to come with me... If she did, I probably wouldn't have ended up here. That would be awkward.
I believe Usopp stayed on our ship. He keeps saying he's not as much of a coward anymore, but he'd still rather be where he's safe... or maybe he's just working on his gadgets.

Chopper went shopping with Franky... Even though he's gotten a lot stronger, I still feel better when he's not by himself. Maybe I just feel more protective towards him because he's the youngest of our crew.
I gave Franky some money so he could buy more Cola. I swear, that stuff runs out so fast... That's what happens when he makes all his inventions run on it.
Brook stayed behind to guard the ship. I don't think I gotta worry about him, since he's not the one that usually causes trouble. I guess he's just immature in a different way.
Oh, that's right... Jinbei stayed behind to look after the ship. It sure is a relief to have another responsible adult in the crew.
...and then the mermaid says "Do you have any in fish flavor?". Haha...! Hah... I-I guess it isn't that funny.

So a human, a giant, a fish-man and a mink walk into a bar, and... Oh, I hadn't thought about it, but that joke is a little offensive to minks. I shouldn't tell it... Don't worry, it wasn't even that funny.
... and then the guy that's wearing the hat says... Wait, I wasn't supposed to say he's wearing a hat yet. Dammit, I ruined the joke... I should probably leave comedy to the professionals.
This one time I managed to navigate our ship on a giant stream of water that was shooting upwards to the sky. And not to brag, but... I didn't scream that much.

Oh, I know! I'll tell you about this time we fought the Kraken. We were sailing underwater, and that humongous creature appeared... And we kicked its butt! Well, I didn't fight it personally, but I gave my encouragement.

You know one time we found a ghost ship? Well, it wasn't a ghost ship really, there was somebody aboard who later became our crew mate... Oh, but he was dead. Well, he still is dead, since he's a skeleton... This doesn't make any sense, does it?

state.text: Once I was swimming in a lake by myself, and bikini bottoms came loose, and then this really scary-looking fish ate them... I had to go back to my ship bottomless. Thankfully, nobody saw me.

A long time ago, before I joined my crew, I was alone on this island and I was really hungry. All I had were these berries... Later I learned they were the biggest aphrodisiac in the East Blue. Let's just say I learned a lot about my body that day...

Once we found an island with big turtles that were fast like horses. I rode one, and their shells would, ummm... vibrate quite a lot, which made for an interesting experience. But I had to change my clothes later...
Hey, a guy stole an old lady's purse! You scumbag...! Dammit, there's nothing I can do from up here...
Woah, there are so many vehicles down there... This seems to be a very technologically advanced city.
Oh, man... There's a 10.000 beli bill, right there on the street! Uhhh, you guys mind if I go pick it up real quick? Dammit... I hope it's still there after the game is over.
You could at least be a little scared of Robin's power, ~player~. I was very scared of it for a while... and that's a perfectly normal reaction!
Taking off your shoes seems like such a mundane way to use your ability after I've seen you break people's spines.

case.state: Leave your ~clothing~ over there... Don't worry, nobody here is gonna steal ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~.
I will claim victory one small step at a time, and before you know it, I'll be the clear winner. You'll see.
I will make you lose the number of times it takes to beat you, ~name~. Which judging by your remaining clothes, would be...
By the way, where did you get your ~clothing~, ~name~? A store nearby?
Hmmm, I wonder if your ~clothing~ would fit me... Probably not.
I am forced to dress depending on the weather of the islands we go to, anyway. I need to have a wide wardrobe.
Different types of people with different fashion styles. But they all have to undress all the same... And then they'll have the same style in the end.
I hope Sanji and Brook aren't hiding somewhere, waiting for me to lose again... I guess it's worth checking.
Did you guys tell anyone that you were gonna be playing this game? I didn't... B-But don't think that they wouldn't look for me if anything bad happens!
Isn't this a nice day? And it seems to get nicer the more I win. It's almost like magic.
Normally I'd be glad that there's not much control in this game, but who's going to make sure there aren't any cheaters playing?
So how much did your ~clothing~ cost? Oh, is that a tasteless question? I think we're past that point.
Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ not for sale, right? I had to ask... I'm not carrying money, anyway.
What would you say is your size? Oh, sorry. We'll talk about that later.
Even in my current position, I respect this. Girls need brains to survive, after all.
Game recognize game. But let's keep going... I'm getting a little impatient.
A most noble effort, fellow player. Are we waiting for something? Then let's continue!
Uh, sorry, ~name~. I think this game is making me a little jaded. I hope it doesn't last.
I still remember when I wasn't topless. Feels like a year ago.
Now's not the time to worry. I still can win, and that's what I'm gonna do!
I wish I could take your ~clothing~ to cover myself with. If there's one good thing to come out of this game, is that I'll value clothes a lot more from now on.
Ah, clothes... I wish I'd valued them more when I still had them.
Aren't clothes the best? They make feel nice to wear, they give you style. They save you from being naked in front of others, like a weirdo...
(I pity whoever wins this game. I hope they don't get too attached to that prize.)
Watch where you put your ~clothing~, ~name~. It might get wet.
Be careful you don't trip, ~name~. After all, It's slippery, heheh...
Oh, were you stripping, ~name~? I didn't even notice. My head was somewhere else.
Oh, I guess I wasn't paying attention to you, ~name~. I was thinking about what my friends are up to.
I was thinking about something else. Did you strip? Good. You look... different.
...and then the mermaid says "Do you have any in fish flavor?". Haha...! Hah... I-I guess it isn't that funny.

So a human, a giant, a fish-man and a mink walk into a bar, and... Oh, I hadn't thought about it, but that joke is a little offensive to minks. I shouldn't tell it... Don't worry, it wasn't even that funny.
... and then the guy that's wearing the hat says... Wait, I wasn't supposed to say he's wearing a hat yet. Dammit, I ruined the joke... I should probably leave comedy to the professionals.
This one time I managed to navigate our ship on a giant stream of water that was shooting upwards to the sky. And not to brag, but... I didn't scream that much.

Oh, I know! I'll tell you about this time we fought the Kraken. We were sailing underwater, and that humongous creature appeared... And we kicked its butt! Well, I didn't fight it personally, but I gave my encouragement.

You know one time we found a ghost ship? Well, it wasn't a ghost ship really, there was somebody aboard who later became our crew mate... Oh, but he was dead. Well, he still is dead, since he's a skeleton... This doesn't make any sense, does it?
Once I was swimming in a lake by myself, and bikini bottoms came loose, and then this really scary-looking fish ate them... I had to go back to my ship bottomless. Thankfully, nobody saw me.

A long time ago, before I joined my crew, I was alone on this island and I was really hungry. All I had were these berries... Later I learned they were the biggest aphrodisiac in the East Blue. Let's just say I learned a lot about my body that day...

Once we found an island with big turtles that were fast like horses. I rode one, and their shells would, ummm... vibrate quite a lot, which made for an interesting experience. But I had to change my clothes later...

state.text: Just a girl, splashing around in the water... In her most natural state. The idea is a little enticing, isn't it?
You know, swimming nude I wouldn't have to constantly worry about losing my bikini. I never thought about that, heheh...
I'm sure it must feel nice being in the water with no clothes. No swimsuit to get in the way of my skin and the comforting feeling of the water...
Hey, a guy stole an old lady's purse! You scumbag...! Dammit, there's nothing I can do from up here...
Woah, there are so many vehicles down there... This seems to be a very technologically advanced city.
Oh, man... There's a 10.000 beli bill, right there on the street! Uhhh, you guys mind if I go pick it up real quick? Dammit... I hope it's still there after the game is over.
Ah...! Your outfit is...disintegrating?
W-what's happening? Your outfit is...

case.state: Huh, I guess I underestimated you, ~name~. You have more guts than I expected.
That's a fair choice, ~name~. Very fair. No complaints.
Now this is feeling more like a strip poker game.
You really know how to put the "strip" in "poker".
Why are you taking off your ~clothing~ now, ~name~? Are you trying to get me to take off something big too? Good thing I'm not an idiot.
Is that supposed to impress me, ~name~? Nice try! Now if you decided to take everything off at once...
That's what you're taking off? My, my... Is the temperature rising?
Oh, look who's one big step closer to being naked. You're gonna make me blush if you keep going.
Hey, I expected nothing less now that I'm showing this much. Maybe it's not everyday you get to see a girl in a bikini.
Who's a good boy, ~name~? You, of course! You're making me proud.
Your ~clothing~, huh? I see you want to die...
Oh, so it's your ~clothing~. I know who I'm zapping first with my Clima-Tact after the game ends.
Heheh, time to gloat! Are you worried about losing yet, ~name~? Get ready for it.
Didn't you enjoy seeing me lose all my clothes? Now I'm gonna do the same to you, and I hope you like it as much as I did.
Oh... Finally living up to my expectations of you, ~name~.
This makes me happy, but I don't know why. After all, I'm not playing anymore. I can't explain it...
The ~clothing~ it is, then. Let's see what you have to offer. Give us a good show!
Oh, that's what you're taking off, huh? You don't mind if I look, do you?
Heheheh... Let's see what you have under there! I've been curious for a while.

state.text: Hey! I have a pair that looks just like that one, heheh...

Is there a name for wanting to see a man naked not because you're interested in him, but because you want to see him humiliated? No, it's not resentment.

state.text: Perona, don't...! Dammit, now those things are gonna start flying everywhere... Huh?
No, Perona...! Ugh, I hate those things... If you're gonna start sending them around... Huh?
The water looks nice... Robin, do you ever wish you were able to swim? Just once?

Hmmm... I remember one time you told me a scary story at night, right before I was going to bed. Remember, Robin? The one about the... the swimming, demon b-babies... I'm still not completely over it.
The angriest I've ever been at Robin... There was that one time I lent her some money and she said she would pay me back in a couple of days, but then she didn't... I wasn't that angry, but still...
Oh... Sorry, Perona. Wait, do you know my name? Huh?

Nayru! What...?!
I have no idea who your target is. I'm just glad it's not me.
RPGs...? Platformers...? What kind of games are those? I thought you were gonna name another card game, or something.
What are those? I've never heard of RPGs or platformers... Do I not know about modern games? I thought you were gonna name a different card game...
One more fight? What kind of fights do you partake in... with your red knife?
What do you mean this is one fight of many? Against who do you fight... and why?
See?! That right there! The eyes going blank and all. It's like you're... empty. I've never met another person like this.
That, right there! The empty eyes, like looking into an abyss... I've never met anyone like you. So... empty.
A planet full of women... Wait, then how do you survive? Don't tell me you have male slaves only for procreating, or something. That would be awful...
If that's true, then how can your population survive only with women? Do you procreate with... male slaves, or something? With all the awful things I've seen, that wouldn't surprise me...
Sounds like a nice guy. So he doesn't mind that you have trouble talking? Or are you comfortable enough to talk to him directly?

I'm happy that you found such a good friend. Do you feel close enough to him so as to talk directly? Seems to me that if there's one person who can help you overcome your trouble, it would be that closest to you.
I know, I need support too. To help with the, ummm... bouncing.

That's it? Geez, you're lucky... Do you at least wear shorts or a mini skirt when you're out of your school uniform? If you're fortunate enough to have such gorgeous legs, there's no reason to hide them.
Nothing more than that? I'm a little jealous... But are you used to showing your legs, Yuri? You don't strike me as the kind who wears mini skirts or shorts when dressing casually.
That must feel lonely... But even if there are no more like you, you can still find your own family. You just need others who accept you the way you are.
I see... Though you don't really need others who are exactly like you to form a family. Sometimes all it takes is a group of people who accept each other for who they are.
Oh, do you wish you had more people to talk to? Maybe at work? I'm assuming it can be lonely if you're the only one with your position.
Do you not have a lot of people to talk with, Wiki? Like family, or friends? Neighbors...?
I get what you mean. While it's natural to feel nervous when people stare at you, you can also see that as empowering. I assure you, people don't stare at you because they think you're ugly.

Heheh, it can be scary, I know. The way I've dealt with it is by understanding that people only stare at you because they think you're attractive. The attention is not a critique, but a confidence boost.
R-Really...? What if there was someone that you know for a fact is innocent, but they had a big bounty on their head... would you still capture them?

This Koala again... She must be very special if you keep mentioning her. But I haven't met her, so I don't know.
Hmph, Koala... No idea what she's like, since I haven't met her personally. But if you talk about her so much I'm sure she must be great... Just great.
Considering I know your body, at least I'm sure there won't be any hidden tattoos or scars under your clothes, right?
Regardless of in what order you undress, I know there's nothing that can shock me, because I've seen everything... So no tattoos or scars, or anything.
Hey, Robin... I just wanna say thank you. I don't think I say it enough.
Robin, ummm... thank you.
So you wanted this career? It wasn't just something that you had to do because you needed money, or something?
Oh, so you were already interested in working in this industry. I thought you would've been drawn to it because of money problems, or because it seemed easy...
I see... That makes sense. If I'm having sex with a guy it'd be because I care about him, so of course I wouldn't want to hurt his feelings. But what about the physical part? Any tips there?
Oh, you're right... I'm sure sex is not only physical, but emotional. I should keep that in mind... Is there anything else I should consider? What about the more physical side?
What stupid rules do they enforce in your school that you like to break? Not that I doubt they have them.
I see... What stupid rules do you not like to follow? Don't run in the corridors? Singing the school hymn every day?
Ahhh! What's happening?!
(I wonder if she's wearing panties underneath.)

No kidding. You really are a terrifying opponent in this game.

It's okay, Hanako. You're doing great.
Gah! The psycho woman is back.

The skirt already?
WHAT IS HAPPENING?!

Hah! I had a feeling you were lying! And you know what? You're not even that good at it, because I saw through your act.
Oh, I see... Sometimes I also wish men didn't exist and there were only women. But not all men are bad. Maybe you need to meet a decent one to change your mind.
Well, sure... Men in general are not as clean as women, but that sounds like an over-exaggeration. Have you ever given yourself the opportunity to get to know a man better? A good one?

case.state: They vandalized your property with obscene messages? That's not okay! You should give them a good scolding, and then force them to clean it up.

Me? Jealous? Please... It's just... when I think about it you've spent more time with this girl than with me, and that makes me feel a tiny, little bit left out, I guess.

What...? You wanna get a tattoo, Robin? I think I like you the way you are, but... what would you get?

Just for... everything. I never had trouble being around guys, but it was only until later that I realized that I probably would've gone crazy without you around. So that's what I wanted to say... Sorry for getting all sappy.

Thank you for... you know, everything. For being a part of the crew. I love the guys, but if it was just them and me I think I'd feel very lonely at times... With another girl like you around, things feel so much easier for me... Aaaand that's enough sappiness for one day.

I'm glad you at least have the common sense to never jump in the water, unlike our other Devil Fruit users friends... But I suppose that's nothing too special. Just using your brain a little is enough.
I wish you were able to try it at least once... But drowning is not pretty, as our other Devil Fruit user friends can testify in full detail, I'm sure.
You have a daughter? Is she planning on following her mother's career, haha..? Sorry, th-that wasn't funny.
Your daughter? I can't imagine she wants to be a pornstar too, right...? Uhh, I hope that isn't a touchy subject.
Oh, I wouldn't want that... Sounds like it'd be safer to let the man do most of the work. But I still think I'd like to do it the other way...
I'm sure that'd be very painful... If I let the man be on top I suppose that wouldn't be a risk, right? I think I'd like to be the one on top at least once though...
C-Creepy... I prefer angel wings. They looked way more fluffy.
Th-They look so much like bat wings... You're a vampire for sure. No offense, but I prefer the wings the sky people have.
Hey, that's a cute pair of underwear. Wait, are those... strawberries? I had a similar pair when I was younger, but with a different fruit.
A strawberry pattern, heheh... Don't worry, I also wore underwear with fruit on it until a couple of years ago. Ahhh, to be 18 again...
So much light... I thought Kizaru showed up for a second, I almost had a heart attack.
Those legs look even thicker when they're exposed... Oh, sorry Chun-Li. I didn't mean to say that out loud.
I see... Wearing a shirt with my crew's flag would be a terrible idea. Gosh, I hope Luffy doesn't get that idea.
Hmmm, having a shirt with your flag sounds like one particularly stupid idea... which is why I hope Luffy never thinks of it.
Oh, I thought the scars were only on your face. That must have hurt so much...
Oh, I guess that would make you uncomfortable. But for what it's worth, I think you're beautiful.
(No way I'm telling her where the gun is. Wait, where is the gun?)
Oh, hello. That's an interesting technology, even if it's a little flashy... Huh? Did I just see a bug on your shoulder?
Oh, that's an interesting way of changing clothes. W-wait... I think I saw bug or something behind you.

Huh?! You're actually a woman? That such a surprise, and... Bah, why pretend?

Too bad you're playing a strip poker game, there's not much you can do it with here.

Uh... That uniform is a little... lighter than I was expecting.

Look at the size of those big ones there on your...
