Thank you, ~name~. ~player~, if you want to lose the next round, I'd still appreciate it.
Oh, ~name~ lost! Then I guess we can cancel that thing I was going to give you, ~player~. What a pity...
Hey, I made it! Eh... about what I said, ~player~? Let's discuss it after the game. There's too many people here...
Yes! Oh, ~player~... You're busy stripping now, so why don't we leave the thing for later? Hm?
I did it? Yeah! ~player~? About what I said... let's do it after the game. You'd like to have more privacy too, right?
Oh, thank you so much, ~player~! You're a kind person. I'm sure you'd have done the same thing even if I was... lying.
Thank you, ~player~! I knew I could trust in you. It doesn't matter if what I said isn't true, right?
Oh, what a relief! I feel much better now. Thank you, ~player~. Now I can tell you I... exaggerated a little.
Hey, ~name~ lost! Not ~player~, or me. That's nice.
Oh! This is the best case scenario, heheh. I guess I didn't need your help, ~player~.
Hey, I'm saved! In more than one way...
Oh, I'm safe! Thank you anyway, ~player~. You were still going to help me, right?
Heheh, I made it! It was thanks to, ~name~. Still, thank you, ~player~.
Ah, I didn't lose! Thank you, ~name~. You didn't happen to hear what I told ~player~, huh?
Yay! Oh, yeah... I'll lose the next round, ~player~. I just hope I don't accidentally get a really good hand.
Heheh, nice, ~player~! Oh, I agreed to lose the next round, didn't I? How about I lose the round after the next one instead? I'm just a little tired.
Thank you, ~player~! You're very nice. Lose the next round? Oh, I did say that, didn't I? Well, let's see what cards I get first.
Alright! Smart move, ~player~. You've earned your 5% of the prize. Now I just have to win it.
Good, ~player~. You don't want it in writing that I'm giving you 5% of the prize, right? I mean, you can trust me!
Excellent choice, ~player~! Now how do you want your 5% of the prize? I can give it to you in cash, but maybe...
Oh, I see ~name~ lost this round. Was I saying something before? Heheh...
~name~ lost? ~player~, that thing I just said? Let's save it for later.
Nice, I didn't lose! I'd hate it if I had to get naked now. Eh...
Hey, ~name~ lost instead of ~player~! That means I don't owe you anything, heheh.
Oh, ~name~, lost! So consider my offer withdrawn, ~player~. That means the prize is still all mine, heheh...
Haha, ~name~ lost! So I don't have to give you that 10%, ~player~! What a relief.
Yes, I didn't lose! So, who loses this round? Oh, ~player~. I see.
Oh, yeah! That prize is going to be mine! Who has to strip, then? ~player~? Cool.
Heheh, what about that? I'm safe. Hmmm, looks like it's your turn to strip, ~player~. Chop, chop.
Oh, that worked! I mean, well done, ~player~. You're safe for now.
Heh, nice to see you're complying, ~player~. Your life has been forgiven... for now.
Oh, you actually lost, ~player~. My captain's wrath has been placated for now. But if you do anything to upset us...
Nice, ~name~ lost. Too bad it wasn't ~player~, but what can you do?
Hey, it's your turn, ~name~. Oh, I'm so sad it's not ~player~. 'Cause I'm so crazy about ~player~. Yep.
Yay, it's not me! Or ~player~, which is too bad. Because of... what I said.
Oh, ~name~ lost. You're safe for now, ~player~. But you're on very thin ice.
Hmmm, I guess you have to thank ~name~ for saving your life, ~player~. But remember you're on the Straw Hats' sight.
~name~ lost this round, which means you can live a little longer, ~player~. But the Straw Hat Pirates are watching you...
Hmm, did I just promise something? Oh, cool! I didn't lose.
Thank you, ~player~! You're so nice. I'll give you that kiss after the game. We have to stay focused, after all.
Yes! Oh, I did say I would give you a kiss, ~player~. But I have to put my lipstick on first. Now where did I leave it...?
Yes! You actually have a good heart, ~player~. You're... not bad.
Excellent! I can't wait to get that money... S-so I can share it, of course.
Oh, thank you, ~player~! The orphanage will not forget your kindness. Or was it the hospital? Well, whatever I just said.
Hey, ~name~ lost! I only promised to kiss you if you lost, ~player~. So I guess I don't owe you anything, heheh.
Nice, I'm saved! Too bad it wasn't you who lost, ~player~. You would've earned a nice kiss from me.
Oh, ~name~ lost. And I was so looking forward to kissing ~player~. But it wasn't you who lost, so...
Oh, I didn't lose. But I have ~name~ to thank for that. Not you, ~player~.
Hey, I made it! But it seems ~name~ is the one I have to thank for that. Not you, ~player~.
Oh, thank you, ~name~! I'll let the hospital know it was you who helped me win the money for them, not ~player~. Wait, was it a hospital I said I'd give my money to?
I'm one step closer to victory! Oh, yeah, yeah... You can strip, ~player~,
Heheheh, it worked!
Oh, thank you, ~player~! You're a delight.
Oh, wait... I think you're okay, ~player~. It seems my eyesight is not that great, heheh.
Hmmm, looks like I was wrong. Sorry for making you lose, ~player~.
Oh, actually it was nothing, ~player~. What a relief, right?
Hey, ~name~ lost! Forget I said anything, ~player~.
Oh, ~name~ lost this round. Thank you anyway, ~player~.
Hey, ~name~ lost. What are you looking at me for, ~player~? You're fine.
~name~ lost this round? Okay. By the way, there's nothing wrong with you, ~player~.
~name~ lost? Alright. I guess I didn't need to scare ~player~ for no reason. Eh, I mean... I was wrong.
Thank you, ~player~! You're very kind.
You're so nice, ~player~! I like you even more now.
See? I knew you lose like a champion, ~player~.
Whaaaat? That didn't work? Are you sure you did it right, ~player~? Try it again next round.
Oh, I can't believe that didn't work, ~player~! Are you sure you heard me right? Let me explain it to you again...
Oh, I'm sorry my tip didn't help you, ~player~. It actually works 2 out of 3 times. If you try it again, I'm sure it will work!
Oh. Never mind, ~player~.
Ah. Forget I said anything, ~player~.
D-did I say something? Hahaha...
S-see? It helped you, ~player~! And now ~name~ is the one that has to strip, hahah...
Hey, you didn't lose! You're welcome, ~player~. Now if only ~name~ knew about what I taught you...
Sorry, ~player~... Oh, wait! You didn't lose, it was ~name~. O-of course! With that tip I gave you, you're definitely going to win...

state.text: Your name is... Arlong? It must be a coincidence, but... I'm sorry, I cannot call you that and enjoy myself. I'll call you Arly, if you don't mind.
Big Mom...?! Why do you call yourself that? You almost gave me a heart attack! How about I call you... Big Sister instead?
Kaido...?! That's a terrible coincidence... I hope you don't run into a lot of trouble with that name. I think I'll call you... Kaikai.
I'm not calling anyone "Master", even if that's your birth name. I think I'll call you Guy instead.
So why can't you take off your own clothes, ~name~? I'm just curious.
You seem perfectly capable of undressing yourself, ~name~. That's just my opinion.
Doesn't it take longer to have someone else remove your clothes for you?
I assume your partner knows everything you're wearing, huh?
This is one way to have your friend participate without playing the game, I suppose.
Oh, interesting... So the more places you visit, the more usage you can get out of your teleporting ability. It's a great excuse for traveling all around the globe, huh?
Hmmm, being able to instantly go to every place you've been to is a crazy power. You must travel a lot, right? So you can get the most out of this ability.
Sounds like you have a tough life... But is there anyone you wish could see you more as a woman? If you know what I mean.

That makes sense. I guess it must be difficult to have others see you as a woman and not as a soldier when you have a duty to perform. Especially if there's someone special who you wish could see you differently.
Seems like a perfect ability for making an emergency escape. I'm a little jealous.
I'm rarely jealous of other people's abilities, but that one would be really useful for running away.
Oh, at least we won't have to wait for the reveal. Whatever it is...
Oh, okay... I admit I feel better about meeting new people if I can see their faces.
You're taking off your gloves, but you're still holding on to your sword. Hmmm... it must be important.
Does that sword have any special meaning, Lucina? You don't seem very willing to part with it just yet.
AHHHHH!!! I'VE BEEN HIT! Oh, not really...
SOMEBODY JUMP IN FRONT OF ME!
I'M GONNA DIEEEEEE....!!!
BULLETS ARE EVERYWHERE!!!
What if I take one of your wheels? Would that count as "stripping"?
Are we supposed to assume you're stripping in there? Cool, except we can't see it...
I... I thought this was a serious game.
Y-You don't have to...

case.state: I don't wanna look at this ugly creature...

state.text: I wish this thing stopped talking... I'm only interested in what's inside.
What the hell is Duel Monsters?
I bet there's gold inside... Maybe jewels, diamonds... More gold.
You don't... Ummm... You don't have a...? I mean...
Gggggh...!
Uhhhh...
So your friend will help you getting naked? Okaaay...
I see. So so you'll get help undressing...?
What's wrong? Mika, it's just a mask. You were already showing everything.

case.state: Those are some nice boots. I used to wear mine a lot before I... joined my current crew.
Nice boots. I still have a pair or two, even though I don't wear them that much.

state.text: Wearing armor must be the worst. You can barely move, and it's so heavy... Plus, most of them don't even look fashionable.
How uncomfortable is it to wear armor? Sure, it can save your life, but is it really worth it?
Cool belt. Not as cool as mine, but it's still nice.
Hmmm, where did you get that belt? Want me to tell you where I got mine so you can get a better looking one?
Do those bracelets have any significant value to you, ~name~? My own bracelet has a lot of sentimental value. It's from my sister, Nojiko.
Are those bracelets important to you, ~name~? Mine sure is. My sister, Nojiko, gave it to me.
I can't say I understand the point in wearing a cape. It must be so difficult to fight with that. What if it gets stuck in something?
Why do you even wear a cape? Does it allow you to fly or something? I think it's a little too much.
Now why would you wear gloves to a game of poker? Oh, because you knew you'd have to strip at one point and needed something extra to remove. I... answered my own question.
Gloves would be the perfect piece of clothing to hide more cards in a game of poker. You just slip them right into your hand.
My Captain has a hat. Do you also get super intense when someone takes it?
If you're taking it off, I suppose that hat isn't very important for you, like my captain's hat.
That necklace... Is it valuable? I mean, real value. Not the sentimental kind.
Pretty necklace. And... expensive looking.
I like scarves. Too bad I only get to wear one when I go to a winter island, or I'd look out of place.
Nice scarf, ~name~. I should get myself a similar one for the next time we sail to a winter island.
No luck, no shoes, no prize! I'm joking, even without your shoes you can still win. But you won't!
Be careful where you step now, ~name~. Because you're taking off your shoes, of course. I wasn't trying to threaten you, or something.
Aren't stockings nice? The perfect mix of sexy and cute.
Stockings are cute. Ah, so many adorable kinds of clothing I could've worn for this game.
Only one sword? I guess that's normal. Because of Zoro, I'm now used to people carrying around three swords.
Those are some nice boots. I used to wear mine a lot in my pre pirate days.
Nice boots. I still have a pair or two, even though I don't wear them that much.
If Brook was here, he would be losing it now. Although his deal is seeing panties, not what's under them, isn't it? I really don't get it. Either way, he is a pervert.
Panties are all Brook ever talks about. If he was here, would he be trying to steal them, or does he just want to see them?
How many times have I punched Brook after he asks to see a girl's panties? I don't remember, but my knuckles hurt now.
If you ask me, that bulge doesn't do any justice to the real thing that's in there. Even if it's still quite big...
If you think that bulge is big, wait till you see it directly. Soon we'll see it, ~player~. ♡
Would it be too much to say that... my heart is beating faster now? I'm getting close to seeing you naked again, ~player~.
I wonder what kind of underwear you were wearing the last time we met. It disappeared, so... Well, I don't really care as much about that as seeing what's in there again.
Even if it doesn't look right now like there's something big hiding in there, nobody here knows better than me how great it really is. ♡
Now I know better than ever that good things can also come in small packages, if you know what I mean...
Heheh, now that thin fabric is all that's concealing your little guy. Well, it's not that little. You can clearly see the contour, and the size... Ah, sorry.
Huh, I wasn't expecting your parts down there to be so visible without your ~clothing~. That bulge is very telling... What? You've been looking at my chest all ~background.time~. It's only fair.
With those legs of yours, would you get tired if I sat on your lap, ~player~? Only one way to find out... Heheh, I'm just teasing you.
You've been standing for a while, ~player~. Are your legs tired? I could massage them for you, if you want... Heheh, I'm just kidding.
Oh, I can now see the, ummm, bulge there. I-It doesn't look very big, does it? I guess it's better to know that sooner than later...
Huh... Either your underwear is very tight, or there isn't something particularly big in there... N-Not that there's anything wrong with that!
Uhhh... ~Player~, do you maybe use your underwear as a pocket? That would be one explanation for the size of that bulge you got there.
Woah... Y-Your ~clothing~ was hiding the bulge you got there very well. And it's big... Very big.
Nice muscles, ~player~. Someone here sure isn't slacking off and skipping leg day.
Those look like some strong legs. It's nice to see that you workout your entire body.
Do you wear that hat just to hide that you're bald? Oh, I'm sorry! I hope I didn't touch on a sensitive subject.
You know... being bald is not that bad. I mean, you don't have to wear a hat to hide it. You know what I mean, ~player~?
Do you really need to wear a belt, ~player~? I doubt your pants would just fall off considering your... figure.
Why do you wear that belt, ~player~? I don't think your pants would fall off if you don't, unless you lost a little... Never mind.
Nice jacket, ~name~. Oh, that reminds me! Luffy never paid me for destroying my jacket that one time, heheh.
I like that jacket. I should get one for myself when we go to another winter island.
Thank you for reminding me I have to ask Luffy to pay me for my jacket he destroyed that one time. The interest has accumulated quite a lot...
That looks like a guy's belt... I'm not judging. Sometimes you just gotta wear what you have around.
I always wear tight jeans, so I don't need a belt to keep my pants from falling. And it's not like I've gotten skinnier... Can we move on, please?
I love that jacket! How many pockets does it have? Eh, it doesn't matter. I keep the most important stuff in my top anyway.
That's a nice-looking jacket. It doesn't look like it'd keep you warm, but still... Sometimes you just wear clothes because they make you look good.
I can't wait to see that chest again... But what I really want is to run my fingers over it, feeling your heartbeat get stronger and stronger.
Have you been working out, ~player~? That's good, but you shouldn't do it for me. I like you just the way you are.
Ummm, it's okay with me if you want to keep your glasses, ~name~. I mean, if you'd rather show your penis than take them off, you must really need them.
Those glasses must be important for you if you saved them for after exposing yourself. You can keep them if you want. How will you be able to admire my beauty if you can't see?
So you wear a skirt... Are you an okama, ~player~?
I don't think I've seen a man wearing a skirt before. Well, unless you count the okama.
You must be a confident guy to wear a skirt. I mean, you must be proud of your legs.
I love wearing skirts. Feeling the sea breeze blow on your bare legs is a sensation like no other.
My favorite part of wearing skirts is when the wind softly blows, and you feel it on your legs... You just have to be careful that it doesn't blow too hard.
Do you ever... not wear anything under your skirt, ~player~? I'd never do that, but maybe there is some sort of excitement that comes out of it.
I think my jeans feel a little tighter lately. I doubt I'm gaining weight, since Sanji takes good care of my diet. Maybe I'm still growing?
It's always stressing going shopping for new pants, isn't it?
It's so hard sometimes to find that perfect pair of pants that makes your ass look good without making you look fat.
Not just that! I imagine it can be very easy to infiltrate certain restricted areas you can stea... I mean... Help people.
Oh, I get it. I get captured a lot too. But it would also be a incredibly useful ability for stealing... e-everyone's breath away, because it's so cool!
But I doubt this is the worst place you've ever teleported to at random, right? What if you appeared above a volcano... Or inside a giant sea monster?!
Overall, this isn't a terrible place to teleport to randomly. Couldn't you've appeared in the center of a volcano? Or inside a giant creature's belly?!
A guy in your army, huh? I'm sure you have more important things to worry about than romance. I hope you can live in peace soon, Lucina.
I understand. A battlefield is not the right place to be concerned with love affairs. I hope you can end your war and live in peace, Lucina.
So you're a woman, huh? And you have such a beautiful face... That mask wasn't doing you any favors.
You're beautiful... and a woman? Oh, I didn't really know. Well, that mask clearly wasn't doing anything for your image.
Normally I'd be worried about something like that, but you don't seem like the kind of woman who'd use that sword unless there's a reason.
I don't usually feel comfortable around people I've just met carrying weapons... but I get the feeling that you don't have any ill intentions.
If you do that again I swear I'll call the Marines myself!

case.state: Ah... You might be a better shooter than Usopp. I'll give you that.
So this is it, huh? This is the day I die...
Come on, people! If we all attack together I'm sure we can take her gun from her.

state.text: Don't just ignore me! Get out here so I can kick your ass!
I've never done it before, but I'm sure I could turn a car into a little cube if I try...
If I see a camera poke out from inside there, I swear I'll trash your car and sell it for parts...
Ohhhh, what's wrong? Did you run out of music? Good, we could all use some silence for a change.
What the hell...?!
I don't understand what this thing is, but it's so annoying...
I think I liked it better with the shirt on.
Ooookay... Let's keep going.
Umm, shall we continue?
You guys okay? Uhhh, let's keep going.

case.state: I don't know who that Bandicoot is, but wearing those does make you a little bit less scary.

state.text: I'm gonna need a ladder...
Maybe I can tip it over? But then the treasure will fall everywhere...
I called dibs on this pot, okay? I saw it first.
This pot doesn't belong to anyone, right? It's here by itself, so I can safely claim it for me.
Of course, not. You're a skeleton. It would've been weirder if there was something there...
I pray that this talking toilet idea doesn't catch on...
If my toilet started talking, I'd break it into tiny pieces and then never use one ever again.
What kind of twisted, perverted mind came up with this idea?
Of all the things that could possibly start talking...
That's a boring belt; it doesn't even work as a holster. Relax, I'm just kidding.
Be careful your pants don't fall down without your belt.
That belt came off very easy. Have you lost weight worrying about the game, ~player~?
Some belts are quite expensive. Have you noticed? You could buy like two new pairs of pants for that same price.
Will you be able to see the cards without your glasses? Or that I'm cheating? Hahah, that's a joke, I'm not cheating. Not that you'll be able to tell without glasses.
Are those glasses necessary for your eyes, or just for show? You didn't seem to have much of a problem with taking them off.
Without glasses I can see you have nice eyes, ~player~.
Who wears gloves to a poker game? Sketchy people, that's who.
Why wear gloves to this game? Do you bite your nails and you didn't want us to see?
Do you bite your nails, ~player~? You have reason to be nervous, so it makes sense.
Your hair got all messy when you removed your hat. Do you want a comb, ~player~?
Awww, I was kinda hoping you kept something hidden under your hat. Like your money...
If Luffy was playing strip poker, would he take off his hat? Eh... I don't know why that thought entered my head.
You weren't listening to music with those headphones, right? It would mean you've been ignoring everything I've been saying this whole time.
Nice headphones. What kind of music do you listen to, ~player~?
You've not been using those headphones for cheating, have you? Like for getting tips from a friend, or something? Hmmm...
That necklace looks valuable. How expensive is it, ~player~? Eh... I just would like to buy one.
Is that stone on your necklace real, ~player~? It looks big.
Is that necklace a family jewel or something, ~player~? 'Cause if it doesn't have sentimental value...
Look at you, Big Shot. Taking off your tie. Now you're just an average player.
Are you thinking you'll look less professional without your tie?
Oh, I liked the tie. It really made you look like you knew what you were doing.
Leave that pair of socks over there, please. Oh, I'm not saying that they smell. Just... leave them over there.
Socks are cute, aren't they? I hope your feet don't get cold now, ~player~.
When was the last time you got a pedicure, ~player~? You have gotten one, right?
That's a cute bracelet, ~player~. Does it mean anything to you? My sister gave me mine when I left my hometown.
Don't worry, ~player~. I'm not gonna steal your bracelet. It doesn't look expensive...
What's the story behind that bracelet, ~player~? I hope it's good.
Stockings can be so provocative, am I right? Robin likes wearing them more than me, and when she does she looks very sexy.
I wonder if I should buy myself a sexy outfit... semi transparent, stockings, the whole pack. I don't planning on wearing it for someone, but... you never know.
Those stockings look super cozy. I could totally sleep with a pair of those when it's cold.
Do your feet look smaller without shoes? Maybe it's just my idea.
One time I stepped on one of Chopper's tools while walking on the deck of the Sunny barefoot. I still don't wear shoes sometimes, but now I pay a lot more attention where I walk.
I love buying new shoes! I already have a good collection, but... you always find a new pair that you like!
You... took off your boxers from under your clothes? How...? You know what? I don't wanna know.
How did you do that? Taking off your boxers without removing your... You didn't just have them in your pocket, right?
~Player~! Those are your panties! Why would you take them off without removing the rest of your clothes first?
Wh-Why did you do that? Those are your panties right? And you were wearing them? And you took them off without first removing your...
~Player~! You took off your bra before what you're wearing on top. That's... very suggestive. And kind of impressive, too.
Y-You can do that? Taking off your bra under your clothes? That's an unusual talent. Just... be careful your nipples don't show through your clothes.
Can we just continue and... forget about this?
I hope I can forget this thing ever existed.
If I have any nightmares tonight, I'm blaming you...
Let's move on, shall we?
Then you can't take off your own clothes? I've no problem with this, it just seems unnecessary.
This doesn't bother me, but I can't say I understand it.
Where the hell did your clothes go...?! Tell me you're not gonna do that to other people... unless you have a death wish!
I look away for a second and your clothes disappear...? Have you ever worked as a magician at a strip club, or something?
Wow. I guess you never really know a person's weakness until you see it.
But he does let me hold on to it every now and then. I guess he trusts me.
And then when something happens to it, he comes crying to me to fix it. It's kind of adorable, I'll admit.
Oh, not in your case, ~name~. Your armor looks great on you.
Oh, but I'm not talking about your armor, ~name~. This one looks so good that it's a shame to see it go.
And my belt doubles as a holster for my Clima-Tact too. Now that's really cool.
I can also keep my Clima-Tact in my belt. What about yours, ~name~?
Now I only have to wear boots when I go to a winter island, especially if it's winter there too. The rest of the time, it's not that cold.
We don't sail to that many cold islands, so I can wear sandals most of the time.
I hope the staff here knows how to save our valuable items. Because if anything happens to my possessions I'll make them pay.
Who's in charge of protecting the items we remove while we continue playing? They better be qualified.
I suppose they look cool, but I've never cared for that. Only the guys freak out over stuff like that.
The guys in my crew always freak out over stuff that looks cool, but is kind of pointless. Like capes.
From now on, I'm gonna be watching your hands, ~name~. I mean your actual hands, not your cards.
If your hands get cold, you're gonna regret taking off your gloves.
Stealing a necklace is not that hard... Eh? Who said that?
You better hope your necklace is not too expensive. For no reason...
But they really are fashionable, aren't they?
But still, scarves are cute.
I've really gotten in the habit of wearing open-toed shoes recently. Maybe I should go shopping for new shoes soon...
Now I always wear sandals or open-toed shoes. Too bad it always attracts the feet guys. I've never understood that fixation.
I doubt any men can resist a woman wearing stockings.
Stockings are irresistible. I should wear them more.

case.state: (What's on Robin's mind? Did she notice something important?)
(Robin looks so focused... I wonder what she's thinking.)
(I wonder what's on Robin's mind right now. She looks like she's thinking about something important.)

state.text: Oh, how the mighty have fallen. I don't mean to gloat. But if you lost your advantage, you must have done something wrong, ~name~.

case.state: Part of me was hoping the "getting naked" part of this game was just a bluff.
Suddenly, this game feels a lot more real.
Looks like the scales are balanced for us now, ~name~. Are you scared? I won't hold back.
(Hmmm, so ~player~ is now fully naked. Which means she only has to lose once more to be out. How am I going to do this?)
(One more loss for ~player~, and she'll be out. Maybe I can "help" her with that. I don't want to do this to a woman, but this is about survival.)
(Hmmm, so ~player~ is now fully naked. Which means he only has to lose once more to be out. How am I going to do this?)
(One more loss for ~player~, and he'll be out. Maybe I can "help" him with that. I'm not happy about it, but it's my only choice.)
Now you're completely naked, ~player~. If you were to lose one more time...
(One more loss, and ~player~ will be out of the game. I can do this.)

state.text: Hey, where are you going? Huh?
Come on, this isn't a big deal. I'm sure you've faced more dire situations than this one.
If you've fought many times with your life on the line, this shouldn't feel like such a big deal, right?
Hey, you can't replace yourself with... whatever that device is. It clearly isn't a Transponder Snail. Either way, that's against the rules.
Well, if you're a warrior, bigger breasts probably wouldn't help you at all.
Are you unhappy with your figure, Lucina? But if your breasts were bigger, they might get in the way while fighting...
You don't have flashlights on your nipples, right? Ugh, sorry for asking you that. Franky messed up my idea of what robots can do.
Do you have flashlights on your nipples...? Uh, never mind... I don't really know what robots are supposed to do, and knowing Franky didn't help with that.
I understand you're scared, but don't run away again, okay?
Do you actually want to be naked? I don't get it.
Why do you want to show your body so much? And why do you assume we want to see it?
Don't be so scared, ~name~. I wish I could do something for you, but...
I feel so bad for ~name~. This is not something one should be forced to do unless you want to.
You're confronting your fear, ~name~. I believe in you.
This is the moment your confidence is really put to the test, ~name~.
You seem pretty confident, ~name~. But still...

Did you take a picture of me, Mahiru? Delete it right now! But... do I look good?
Y-You took a picture of me, didn't you Mahiru! You can't keep that! Delete it...! But... let me take a look at it first...
Th-That wasn't me! That was the water, I swear.
I don't understand what you're talking about, Cynthia, but I didn't do anything! I swear...
Th-That was all water, okay? I didn't squirt or anything. And that had nothing to do with me making it rain! My hair is still wet, I'll tie it up for now.
D-Did the rain stop before I... finished? Then you all saw... I don't know what you think you saw, but it definitely wasn't me squirting. I'm just gonna tie my hair...
I don't know what you think you saw, but it definitely wasn't me squirting! Th-That much wouldn't be normal, right? It was just the water.

This was the first time that I've had an orgasm while thinking of other women... I think this is because of you, ~player~. I feel like I need to reexamine my preferences. It's intimidating, but also exciting...
When I pleasure myself, I always picture men. But today, I was thinking about women... What was different? Was it you, ~player~? Maybe trying to seduce you awakened something in me...
I can't believe I pictured myself with other women while I was touching myself... My friends, nonetheless! How can I look at their faces now? M-Maybe it will be harder to look only at their faces...

I'm embarrassed that I masturbated while thinking of my female friends... And I've never thought of women that way before. Perhaps I should try it again, to see if it wasn't just a thing of the moment.
Awww, where did that little pig come from? It's so cute! I wanna eat it! Not literally, heheh...

state.text: Perona, are you okay? You seem a little more quiet than usual... A lot more quiet.
Perona, are you feeling alright? You seem to be so quiet all of a sudden. It's unlike you.

case.state: I-I'm not gonna get a towel just for that! But... I appreciate how considerate you are, Robin. I'm very fortunate to have a friend like you.
~Player~, I have a confession. You know when I tried to seduce you earlier? I was just lying so you'd let me win. I'm sorry. Although now that I look at you, I do find you kind of cute.
I'm sorry I tried seducing you earlier, ~player~. I assume you knew I was faking, and that's why it didn't work. I do find you cute, though. I'm serious, I have no reason to lie anymore.
~Player~... You realized that me trying to seduce you was an act, right? I'm sorry... For what's worth, I do think you're cute. And weirdly, I feel comfortable around you. Even naked.

I'm very sorry that I tried flirting with you to get you to lose, ~player~. To be honest, I do think you're cute. Normally, I'd never feel comfortable naked around a man. But with you... I don't really care.
(I was planning on stealing their possessions after the game, but they're not bad people. I could still play a trick on them, though.)
(Change of plans, since there aren't bad people here, I won't take their stuff. But it would be funny if I make them think I did.)
I don't think I feel that embarrassed about squirting anymore. It's just who I am... You don't mind, right ~player~?
Hmm? Yeah, I squirted earlier. I used to be embarrassed about that, but now I think I'm more okay with it. It's just the natural way my body reacts. Right, ~player~?

It was relief for me that you never thought me squirting was weird, ~player~. I was always a little worried about what my partner would think about that when we got intimate. Now I'm not as embarrassed about it as I used to be.
I take care of my body, and I'm very happy with the results. But don't just take my word for it...
My body is all clean after that shower. I still should take another one when I go back to the Sunny, though.
I dried my whole body, didn't I? Mind taking a look, ~player~?
Okay, okay...! I squirted before, alright? I always squirt a lot when I masturbate... I don't know why, but I'm embarrassed by that. My body just responds very easily to stimulation, I suppose.
I... I did squirt before when I finished, okay? It's not something I'm proud to announce, but I always do when I cum. It's another one of the reasons why I masturbate in the bathroom...

~Player~, when I left before... It was only because... Staying in one place isn't for me. I have a dream to fulfill, adventures to go on, and a crew that needs me. It's too early for me to settle down... But when it's time, I hope I find someone like you.

I'm still sorry that I left you only a letter, ~player~... It's just... It would've been harder to say goodbye face to face. I can't stay attached to one person when my journey still isn't over. But when it's time, I hope I can settle down and have a quiet, normal life...
~Player~, if you understand that I can't stay with you, would you mind if we spend what time we have together? I hope you don't mind a lady asking you out, heheh... What do you say?
~Player~, even if we can't be together for now, would you still like to go out with me for however long we have? As long as you're not one of those guys that think they have to ask the girl out...
(Am I still wet down there? I should've dried myself better...)
♪ Going to deliver Binks' Sake! Following the sea breeze! Riding on the waves! ♪ Oh, sorry.
I wonder if Robin would like to play this game some other time. She's a lot more daring than you'd think.
I should go buy drawing supplies before I return to the ship. I'm running out of paper for drawing my maps.
Why are you still looking at me? I'm not doing anything anymore. Is it just because you find me cute?
You have no idea how tired I am, but I suppose I can stay until the game is over.
You'd think that for a navigator on a pirate crew, weird activities like these are normal for me. And you're not wrong, but this was still one of the weirdest.
Now that I think about it, I could've used my Mirage Tempo to escape before having to do the forfeit. So why didn't I? Just because I was having fun? Maybe...
If any of you talk to anyone about what you saw here today, I'll track you down and kick your ass. I'm serious!
What if while I was here my crew mates spent all the money we have on useless crap? Just the thought makes me so angry!
Despite everything I've said before, money isn't the most important thing in the world. But it's pretty close.
(By my estimations, all the valuables gathered here should amount to a total of at least 5 million beli. That's not bad at all.)
Do you think I look better with a ponytail or with my hair loose, ~player~? I'm always changing my hairstyle.
Oh, I got a good idea! I should play poker with my crew. Most of them are morons, so I'm sure I can clean them out.
This is by far the most degrading thing I've done for money. (I just hope it'll be worth it.)
I know I might seem too greedy at times. But you never know the true value of money until you have nothing.
I bet you'd never played strip poker with a girl as cute as me. Too bad it'll never happen again. Well, unless I feel like it.
The guys would've died of a heart attack if they'd seen the show I performed for you today. I almost feel bad for them for missing it.
It sure would've been awkward if I'd ran into a Marine or a member of the World Government here. Though I doubt any of them frequent this place.
I hope my crew mates haven't burned down the ship while I've been here. They're hopeless without me.
W-What if there's was a photographer of the newspaper here, they took my picture, and it shows up in the next publication? Or in my wanted poster? I'd rather die...
Wait, where did I put Luffy's Vivre card? Was it in my top? Oh, shoot! I hope I didn't lose it.
Were you all surprised that a pirate girl like me can be so easygoing and harmless? Too bad not every pirate is like that.
I'm sure you all think I'm a loser in this game, but we'll see who wins in the end. (Oops, I almost said too much.)
Can you guys play a little faster? You know, it's kinda boring here now.
What is it about this place that makes the players follow the rules? It's not like the security is that good.
(I usually stop feeling horny after I cum... What's different this time?)
I'll have to take another shower after we're done here. Just a shower, though. I mean, I just finished doing that. It would be weird if I did it again... right?
I wonder if we could make the bath of the Sunny soundproof. I'm sure I can convince Franky to do it, as long as I don't have to give him a reason.
I don't know what I was worrying about. You'll probably forget what you saw me do by tomorrow, right? Right...?
Now that I couldn't win the prize, I'll have to spend the money from our budget to get supplies. I hope you're happy.
No one will ask me to pay for any damages the water did to the floor, right? I mean, I don't have that kind of money.
The floor didn't get any water damage, see? It's perfectly fine! So... don't ask me to pay for anything, okay?
Heheh...! I win! And you were so close to beating me again, ~player~, you poor thing... But we can still have some more fun to~background.time~. You'll just have to catch me first. ♡
Awww, ~player~... I bet you wanted to see me play with myself like before. Still, I have a consolation prize for you that's even better. You'll just have to come and get it. ♡
I did it! I finally won! Second time's the charm, I guess. ~Player~, how about we go out tonight and have some fun? I can easily spend some of the prize. And then after...
I won! I knew I could get that prize if I only tried again! I know what I'm going to spend it on first... ~Player~, go out with me tonight. I wanna do so many things with you, including...
Thank you, Perona! I was going to pay you back with the money I just won, but... You already said you forgive me!
Oh, thank you, Perona! This is great, I was going to pay you back with the prize money, but now I don't have to!
Thanks, Shantae! It was great meeting you. Let's get together again another time.
Yes! Thank you, Shantae! You should let me teach you how to play properly, and then we can have a rematch another time.
Yes! I won! That was easy. Robin, aren't you happy we get to take the prize back to the ship?
I win! This was a breeze! Sorry, Robin... But we get to keep the prize, isn't that great?
I did it! It got a little dicey, but I still made it with my dignity intact. I wish I could say the same for you, Robin...
I won! That was that bad... Well, if only Robin didn't lose this would've been perfect.
Heheh, look who won! That's one game I've bested you at, Robin... but I do feel bad.
I win, heheh...! That was very tough, but still... Thank you for being here with me, Robin. I'm sure I couldn't have done it without you.
I won! I really won! I wanna thank my friend Robin for this honor. I'm sure I couldn't have made it if she wasn't here with me.
I win! Give me that money. ~Player~, I'm still sorry about what I did to you, so I'll give you a part of the prize. No hard feelings, okay?
Where's my money? Alright! ~Player~, I'm sorry again for using you. I'll give you a part of the prize, and I hope you can forgive me.
Yay, I won! Easiest money I've ever made!
Did I really win without losing once? Have I discovered a new hidden talent of mine?
I knew I was gonna win. Too bad you didn't get to see me strip even once, but that's how life is. Now where's my prize?
That was so easy! Let's play another game!
I'm great at this game! Let's play again, I can still earn more.
Yay! Now where's my money?
Now that this is over, I'll take the prize. Thank you very much!
Finally! The prize is mine! Good game, everyone!
The game is over! All that's left now is...money!
I did it! That could've gone a lot worse for me.
Man, that was close... I'm just glad I got away with it.
Yeah, I won! Give me the money, and I'll be on my way. Oh, right, I'm naked...
I really won! I wish I'd done it before losing all my clothes, but at least I didn't lose everything.
~blank~
~blank~
~Player~, if you have the day free, do you want to spend some time together? We can go take a walk, or go eat something... Or we can just go to a hotel, and...
You have today free, don't you ~player~? If so, we gotta spend some time together. Do everything we left unfinished last time... Everything.
This is so humiliating...! I won't forget this, Ghost Girl!
D-Don't make fun of me... Don't you know how a good winner acts? Dammit...
Oh, good for you, Perona. I think you've really grown as a person. Congratulations!
Huh, you're acting like a proper adult, Perona. I'm proud of you. Congratulations!
Oh, so you don't hate me anymore? That's good. I also don't find you as annoying now. It was worth it coming here, even if ~player~ is taking the prize home.
So we've buried the hatchet, huh? I'm happy we can get along now, Perona. I'm not even mad that ~player~ won. You could come by the Sunny later if you want to see some familiar faces again.
Sigh... I'm happy for you, Robin, but I can't believe I couldn't even make you lose once... How are you so good?
Congratulations, Robin... I'm sorry if I feel a little salty. I just can't believe you didn't lose once. That was the most humiliating part of this whole game.
I was bummed that I lost at first, but then I remembered the prize! Isn't it great that it's staying within the crew, Robin?
I happy you won, Robin. This means that we're still taking the prize money with us! Isn't that great?
Is it okay if I still gloat, even if I didn't win? Haha! Too bad, ~player~! Robin and I are taking that prize money with us.
Mmmgh, I almost got you, Robin! I won't forget this. I'll keep practicing and next time you'll be the loser!
Okay, so you win this one, Robin... But I did cross a lot of ground to catch you, huh? Next time the outcome will be different.
Fine, a deal is a deal, Mae. Let me grab my clothes and I'll tell you what you want to know.
Uh... Time to get out of here!
You know what, Fate? I like this hat! I think I'm gonna keep it as a souvenir, heheh...
Bye, everyone! It was a pleasure to meet you! Especially Rouge... I sure love this loot you got, heheh... Oh, crap! I forgot to put my clothes back on!
Bye-bye, guys! Bye, Rouge! Thank you for gathering all this loot for me! It sure made things easier, heheh... Wait, am I forgetting something?
I can't believe you beat us all considering you started the game wearing only that! I'm impressed, ~player~.
Wow, you're a true winner, ~player~! You weren't even wearing that much, yet you still won!

This was the first time that I've had an orgasm while thinking of other women... I think this is because of you, ~player~. I feel like I need to reexamine my preferences. It's intimidating, but also exciting...
When I pleasure myself, I always picture men. But today, I was thinking about women... What was different? Was it you, ~player~? Maybe trying to seduce you awakened something in me...
I can't believe I pictured myself with other women while I was touching myself... My friends, nonetheless! How can I look at their faces now? M-Maybe it will be harder to look only at their faces...

I'm embarrassed that I masturbated while thinking of my female friends... And I've never thought of women that way before. Perhaps I should try it again, to see if it wasn't just a thing of the moment.
I'm just taking all your stuff. We're friends, Chun-Li! That's why I made an exception for you. Take care!
Friends?! What kind of bull crap is that?! That's not real treasure! Gosh, I hope the One Piece is an actual treasure...
Congratulations, Shantae! And thank you again for the dancing lesson. I'll make sure to remember what you taught me so I can put it in practice one day.
I'm happy for you, Shantae! Thank you for teaching me how to dance. I think I'll continue practicing in private... and fully clothed.
Congratulations, ~player~! I'm happy at least a girl won the game. But next time I'll get you!
Congratulations, ~player~! Sorry for thinking you were naive enough to fall for my tricks earlier. At least you proved me wrong!
You just came here like nothing and kicked our ass, ~player~! But next time it'll be me who wins!
Congratulations, ~name~! You were shrewd enough to see through my clever tactics, so I'll say you've earned this...
Well, well... How did this guy end up on top? Heheh, I'm kidding! Well played, ~player~. Maybe next time I'll play against someone who will be gullible enough to believe my lies.
Hey, you won, ~player~! Didn't you have a good time? You don't even care about the prize, don't you?
Congratulations, ~player~. Consider what you saw today your reward for winning this game. (The only one you'll have...)
I still can't believe how close I was to winning. But no hard feelings, ~name~. None at all...
Friends?! What kind of bull crap is that?! That's not real treasure! Gosh, I hope the One Piece is an actual treasure...
Shantae, do you mind giving me another dancing lesson some time? I think I took a liking to it that I wasn't expecting.
Yeah, that was something, wasn't it? I'm sure you being here with me softed the blow of losing, Robin.
Oh, right... I came here because I wanted to win the prize, heheh... Meh, whatever. We still had a good time, Robin. Now time to get dressed!
I gotta admit, that wasn't too bad... I even forgot about the prize. Can you believe that, Robin? Well... Maybe I can still grab something on my way out...
Congratulations, ~name~. I still finished second, so that's enough reason to try again. That prize will be mine!
I have good news and bad news. The good is that I won't steal the prize, the bad is that I'm taking your stuff instead. But I left your underwear. Oh, shoot! I forgot to get dressed first.

Bye, everyone! Nice to meet you all! Oh, this? I'm just taking your valuables. Since I lost, I don't want to leave empty-handed. But I like you, so I'm leaving your underwear. Damn, I forgot my own clothes!

You remember when I said you didn't have to worry about me being a pirate? I guess I exaggerated, 'cause I'm taking your stuff. Minus your underwear, of course. But I feel like I'm forgetting something...
Congratulations, ~name~! Well played. (Time for me to steal that prize and get out of here!)
Well done, ~name~. This was all part of my plan... losing so you could win. No need to say thanks. I'm a pirate, if you want to thank me, you'll have to do it with valuables.
This was quite the adventure! But now it's time to return to my own adventure. Bye bye, everyone! (There's the prize! Showtime...)

state.text: A-Are you sure, Perona? You want me to give you advice? O-Okay... That Pokémon thing must've put you in a good mood.
Really, Perona? You're asking me for help? Ummm, okay. Are you feeling more confident now that you're getting a Pokémon?
Woah... It came out of that little ball. So that's a Pokémon? It's not what I was expecting...
Huh...? That thing came out of that tiny ball. How...? And what an usual creature... I have never seen anything like it. So that's a Pokémon...
Did you really name him after Moria? I would've named him Smiley... He seems to be very clingy to you already.
Your Pokémon is very... unusual, Perona. I wonder if there's one I would like... Maybe one that resembles a cat, and likes money? But I doubt there's a Pokémon like that.
Ummm, y-yeah. We did kiss... {small}among other things.{!reset}
W-Well, kissing wasn't the only thing we did. But we did do that too.
You're welcome... and please, don't.
I didn't do anything! Seriously! No need to remember any of this ever happened...
I'm not gonna lower myself to your level, Revy. Beating each other senseless doesn't prove anything. And Meia, I expected better from you.
Nobody should steep as low as you, Revy. Including you, Meia. Even if men beat each other up for stupid reasons, we women should know better.
Mary, are you okay?
You're wrong, Perona! I'm confident in my body both from the front and back... I don't mind showing you again, see?
I disagree, Perona! I know I have an attractive body. S-So what if I'm not perfect? I still like how my butt looks when I look in the mirror.
I'm serious, Perona! Look how gorgeous your figure is. Maybe you think your butt looks big because you have a small waist. And your skin looks so soft...

I absolutely meant it, Perona. You said my body is attractive, but yours doesn't look that different to me! And guys like girls with more generous proportions. Especially if their skin is as smooth as yours.
The cutest thing I've seen? Well, my sense of cuteness is not as peculiar as yours... But I once saw Chopper and Carrot taking a nap together after they got tired of playing around.
I doubt anyone here shares of idea of what is "cute"... For me, I'd have to say it was when Chopper and Carrot were head patting each other.
Perona! You have a gorgeous figure. Don't doubt yourself too much. I'd even say that your butt is... cute.
You have a beautiful shape, Perona! We all feel a bit insecure sometimes, but remember this when you doubt yourself: You have a cute butt.

I'd never fight another girl unless I had a serious reason. If I had a problem with one of my female friends, we'd just talk it over. I don't think being pirates means we have to solve our disagreements with our fists.

Do you really want to hear my advice, Neptune? I already lost, so my way clearly isn't flawless. But if you really want some help, I'd say don't take too many risks. You just gotta beat one person, right?

epilogue.hint: Win a game against Nami as a male player
epilogue.title: Adventure in Vortex Island: Director's Cut

scene.name: Intro
scene.directive: ------WARNING------ This epilogue is considered loooong (approximately 30 minutes). Only watch it if you have the time to spare. Epilogues can be viewed from the Gallery any time after they've been unlocked.
On an island, somewhere in the Grand Line...
This seems to be a lovely town.
Families are shopping at the market, and everybody is having a good time.
But all of a sudden the atmosphere changes drastically.
Everyone on the street goes quiet and starts moving to the side as a woman walks by.
She's followed by two big men. As she looks around the faces of the townsfolk, they avert their eyes.
Finally, she sets her eyes on you.
You, sugar... Are you new in town?
Usually I don't like new faces in my territory. It's just my nature I suppose...
...But I guess I can make an exception for such a pretty face.
I just have one question: Do you know a woman with orange hair?
You see... she was very rude to me, and took something that doesn't belong to her. So naturally, I have to punish her.
I see... She doesn't seem like your type anyway.
Well, enjoy your stay, sugar.
The woman and the two men go. As they get farther away, the people on the street relax and return to their usual bantering.
Wait... did she say she was looking for an orange haired woman? Could it be...?
You overhear a conversation between two old men.
Sinclair seems to be in a bad mood today. That can't be good for us.
Didn't you hear? It looks like the Straw Hat pirates are on this island.
Straw Hat? I thought she was in a bad mood because of the Marine ship that arrived yesterday. They've settled at the abandoned base on the edge of town.
Either way, this is going to get ugly.
While you're distracted, you feel something pressed against your back.
A woman behind you whispers in your ear.
Don't make any sudden moves, or I'll kill you. Now walk.

scene.name: Alley
scene.directive: The woman leads you to an alley.
You feel the object behind you let go, and the woman walks in front of you.
~Player~... What are you doing here? Are you here for revenge because I took the prize you won at the poker game?
That was only fair after what you saw me do! I earned that money. Either way, I spent it already, I can't give it back.
More importantly, I saw you talking to Sinclair!
If you two are working together, that means you're my enemy too.
You explain to Nami that you have no idea what she's talking about.
What? So we really ran into each other by accident. Talk about a coincidence!
You probably shouldn't be near me. They're looking for me, you know?
That woman you talked to is "Black Rose" Sinclair. She's a powerful pirate, and has made this island her base of operations.
When my crew reached this island she stole my Log Pose, so we came here to get it back.
And I did, only I also took something else as compensation: a key. From what I heard, it opens up a secret door to Sinclair's treasure, so I'm gonna take it!
Anyway... because of that, Sinclair is now looking for me.
Funny how we keep meeting in these weird circumstances, huh?
Oh, did you hear that? I think someone is near.
Hmmm, maybe it was just my imagi-
AHH!!!
Two men grab your arms from behind. And...
Well, well... Seems like I was wrong about you, boy. You do like the sleazy type after all.
Ugh! My Clima-Tact!
Don't let him go, men. I'll have to take care of him too later.
N-no...
As for you,"Cat Burglar"...
You stole from me first!
I was just going to kill you and take back my key... But I still have a score to settle with your captain.
I know I wouldn't win in a fair fight against Straw Hat Luffy. However, if I use you as bait... perhaps I can even the odds.
Heh, as if! You're severely underestimating Luffy, but you haven't realized it yet.
Oh, I'm not. Trust me.
But for now, I'll just get back what you took from me. Now where are you hiding my key?
Whatever, I don't have to bother searching you. I have something better.
What...?
My... my clothes!
This is the ability of the Strip Strip fruit. When I touch someone I can remove all their clothing in an instant.
I know, very useless compared to most Devil Fruits. But it does come in handy sometimes. Now where's my key?
Nami gives you a suspicious look. You notice a weight in your front pocket. When did she...?
I can't believe those breasts are real... Wait, you don't have my key? I'm sure you took it. Unless...
Men! Bring him over here.
Didn't you hear me? I said bring him here!
Sinclair's men are looking at Nami.
T-that body...
So hot...
Stop looking at me!
Idiots! Have you never seen a naked woman? Now...
Before Sinclair can finish her sentence, her men pass out with a stupid smile on their faces.
Those useless morons!
Quick, ~player~! Grab my Clima-Tact!
You pick up Nami's weapon. As soon as you grab it, the pole extends and...
Ugh!
Son of a...
Good job, ~player~! We need to get out of here! Come on!
Nami holds your hand as you run down the alley. Did she forget she's naked?

scene.name: Escape
scene.directive: Crap! I forgot I'm naked.
I can't run in public like this! Come on, let's take a detour.
You continue running through the back alleys of the city until you arrive at the end of town.
Running like this is way too exhausting.
Did we lose her? Give me my Clima-Tact.
Oh, you're kidding me! She's coming this way.
I can't keep running like this. This vent is loose. Quick, let's hide in here.

scene.name: Vent
scene.directive: I didn't know it would be this narrow in here.
Why didn't you go first? Well, it's too late now...
Don't you dare look forward, or I'll make you pay me 300.000 beli.
Let's just keep going. Maybe I can find some new clothes to wear in this building.
Oh, I think I found an exit!
Ahhh! Hey!
W-what the hell?!
Well, I did tell you not to look forward, so I guess it was my fault.
Let's just get out of here.

scene.name: Base
scene.directive: A storage room? At least the air duct didn't lead to a lobby, or something.
But we don't even know what kind of building this is.
~Player~, why don't you go see if you can find any clothes for me. I'll examine this room.
You exit the storage room.
There's no one around. You decide to look for a closet or a locker room.
Recruit! Hold it right there!
You hear a woman's voice coming from down the hall.
What are you doing here? Why aren't you in uniform?
Hmmm, I don't think I recognize you. Are you new? I'm sorry, I'm afraid I forgot your face.
Captain Tashigi! We've received information about Sinclair. She has been seen around town.
Excuse me, I must go. The unifoms are in that closet behind you.
The woman leaves around the corner.
You go into the closet, pick up two uniforms, and return to Nami.
Oh, good. It's you.
Did you find clothes for me?
Wait, this is a Marine uniform. Is this a Marine base?!
That's not good for me. At least we can be sure Sinclair won't follow us in here. Let's change.
You both put on the uniforms.
Ah, clothes... I'll never take you for granted again. This uniform is a little tight around the chest, but I think it'll do.
For a Marine base they really need better security.
You still have Sinclair's key, right?
Good thing I put it in your pocket before she ambushed us. You hold on to it for now.
By the way, while you were looking for clothes I found this...
It's a map of this island. Why don't you keep it too? It might come in handy later.
Now let's get out of here.
Let's just walk slowly, not make eye contact, and...
Nami sees Captain Tashigi approaching from down the hall.
Crap! She is here?! She knows who I am. ~Player~, just don't talk and maybe she won't recognize me.
Ah, I see you've put on your uniform.
Is this also a new recruit? You seem a little familiar, though.
I-I brought you coffee earlier... ma'am.
Ah, that must be why.
purururu purururu
gacha
This is Tashigi.
Captain! Sinclair is right outside the base!
She came to us? I don't like this. Tell the men to stand down, I'll take care of her.
You two come with me. I might need someone to call for backup.
Yes, ma'am...
(Uh-oh...)

scene.name: Outside
scene.directive: Finally. I was just about to leave.
Sinclair! I'm here under orders from Marine HQ. We've received information of your criminal activities on this island.
Surrender now, or I'll capture you by force.
Really? You're here to fight against a pirate when you're siding with one at the same time? Isn't that a double standard?
What are you talking about?
You're either a moron or you should get better glasses, sugar.
Oh no...
Rose flash!
Dammit! I just put those clothes on.
The Straw Hat girl?! You were right under my nose! Are you here to steal our uniforms?
Why would I want to steal Marine uniforms?
No, she's only stealing from me.
Listen, Marine lady, I only have business with her. If you look the other way I'll forget about you. What do you say?
Of course I won't! My duty is to capture you. But I can't just ignore the Straw Hats... I'll take you both!
You can't be serious! You know she's way worse than us.
I know, but...
I don't have time for this...
~Player~, stay close to me!
Shit! I can't see!
My glasses got foggy!
Run, ~player~!
I won't let you escape again, thief!
You're the one that's not getting away, Sinclair!
Damn!

scene.name: Forest
scene.directive: I don't think they followed us. Hmph, I can't believe I'm naked again. But at least we got out of the town.
~Player~, do you still have that map I gave you? Now is a good moment to look at it.
So the town where we met is here.
Now we've entered the forest, so we're currently here.
According to what I heard, Sinclair's treasure is at the center of the island, in this small piece of land in the middle of a lake. It's right at the top of the mountain.
Now the only bridge to get there is this one, but it's on the other side of the island.
Also, most likely it's surrounded by Sinclair's men.
That's why I think it would be easier to find a way to cross the lake from this side.
So we need to get to the shore first.
~Player~... I know you got dragged into all of this, and it's partly my fault.
If you want to step down, now's the time. Sinclair will continue chasing me, so you'll be able to get away.
Do you want to come with me?
Heh, I was hoping you'd say that.
I promise you'll get your part of the treasure.
Give me Sinclair's key. I'll hold on to it. If she catches up to us, she won't search me again.
Let's go, then!
Nami gets up and starts running.
You're going to follow her when you realize you can't move.
You see two hands growing from the ground are grabbing your legs.
Two more hands appear on your shoulders and start choking you.
What have you done to Nami?!
Robin, wait! He's not an enemy.
Are you okay, Nami?
Yes, he's a friend. He's been helping me.
The hands grabbing your neck and legs disappear.
Sorry about that. I thought you were chasing Nami, and with that uniform...
He's not a Marine. He's just wearing the uniform.
And what happened to your clothes?
Sinclair destroyed them with her ability.
I see. I apologize for misunderstanding the situation, ~player~. Do you want me to give you my clothes, Nami?
Thanks, but I think I'll manage. I'm glad I ran into you, Robin. Where are the guys?
They've been busy fighting Sinclair's men and looking for you. We had to move the Sunny because the Marines arrived.
Good. I'll just go and take Sinclair's treasure. ~Player~ has been a big help so far.
Oh yeah?
He's also kinda cute. Isn't he, Nami?
I-I guess. I haven't really noticed.
Anyway, tell the others I'll be back soon. We have to go.
I won't let you!
Nico Robin, so you're here too. I lost sight of Sinclair, but I can still capture you two.
Don't you ever give up?
Is it a good idea to fight us? You're outnumbered.
That doesn't matter! You kidnapped one of my men!
You mean him? I didn't kidnap him! He isn't even a Marine.
And your indecent exposure? Running around the island completely naked?
There's nothing I can do about that! You think I want to go around naked?
Nami, it seems there's no point in reasoning with her now. You go, I'll handle her.
Thank you, Robin. Come on, ~player~!

scene.name: Whirlpool
scene.directive: You follow Nami into the trees. Behind you, you hear Robin and Tashigi start fighting.
After running for a while, Nami stops.
I think we're out of the forest.
That means we must be close to the... lake?
Wow...
So this is why it's called Vortex Island...
There is no way we can swim through this whirlpool.
~Player~, I'm going to create a bridge of clouds with my Clima-Tact.
You keep your eyes open in the meantime.
While Nami is making a bridge, you hear rustling coming from the trees.
It's Tashigi and Robin who are still fighting.
This isn't gonna go like in Alabasta. I'm stronger now.
So am I.
Damn. I can't fight until I'm done with this.
Aren't you getting tired of this?
N-no... I need to finish this fast so I can go after Sinclair.
Did you call, sugar?
Huh?
Huh?
Oh my...
What the hell...?!
Ugh, this is bad...
I thought y'all forgot about me.
You're the other woman in Straw Hat's crew, aren't you? I'll have to get rid of you too.
Being naked won't be enough to stop me. I've fought in worse conditions.
M-me too, probably... I have no choice but to focus on you now.
A pirate and a Marine joining forces against me, how troublesome..
Fortunately, I don't care much for playing fair.
Sinclair quickly moves behind you and puts her sword to your neck.
~Player~!
I'm sure none of you would be fine with me killing this poor man, right?
I barely know him. Do whatever you want.
No! He's innocent, don't kill him!
I was trying to bluff so she would lower her guard.
Oh...
Now let's see where you're hiding my key...
Sinclair touches you and makes your clothes disappear.
Where's my key?! You had it, didn't you?
All I see is your... Mmm...
She's distracted! Now!
Right!
Robin uses her ability to separate you from Sinclair. And...
Tashigi attacks Sinclair and sends her flying against the trees.
Ugh, dammit!
Are you alright, ~player~?
I'm glad she didn't hurt you.
But you should cover yourself now. Well, we all should.
I can use my ability to cover myself.
Do you want me to help you too?
I... don't think so.
Thank you both for saving him!
~Player~, ehm... the bridge is finished. We should go.
You start crossing the bridge of clouds with Nami.
No...
You won't...
...get away!
Sinclair manages to free one of her arms, picks up her sword, and throws it.
The sword hits the base of Nami's cloud bridge.
Huh?!
The bridge...! Nami!
Watch out!
Ahhhh!!!
Right before you're dragged by the unrelenting force of the whirlpool, you manage to grab Nami's hand.
Then, everything fades to black.

scene.name: Dream
scene.directive: What's this place?
You hear voices calling your name.
~name~!
Were you just going to leave without doing anything to me?
Hmmm, I love how these hands make me feel.
But I'd rather have your hands all over me. Why don't you come closer?
Mmmm, why have I never done this before?
I'll need to train so I can get better at it.
But I don't think I'm doing that bad. What do you think, ~name~?
Hey, don't listen to them. You know I'm the one you want.
You can't abandon me now, ~name~. We still haven't done that.
Just listen how wet I am just thinking about it.
~Name~ ♡
Oh, ~name~...
~Name~!

scene.name: Night
scene.directive: ~Player~!
~Player~! Wake up!
Oh, good. You're alive.
You looked so peaceful and blissful that I thought you were dead.
I don't know where we are, but at least we're not hurt. This whirlpool is incredibly strong.
Good thing I didn't lose Sinclair's key. But first we need to figure out our location.
I can't believe I've spent almost the entire day naked.
You, uh... are probably more used to being naked in public since you like playing that strip poker game.
Brrr... This forest is scary at night. If you want to stay closer to me, I don't mind.
We still don't know if we are on the center of the island or not.
I doubt Sinclair would be able to defeat Robin and that Marine woman, but maybe she got away and is still following us. That's the worst case scenario.
Right after Nami said that, you hear something rustle in the trees.
Why do I always have to be right?
Quick, let's hide! Behind that rock.
You hide with Nami in a tight spot between a rock and a tree.
(Shh... don't make any noise and don't move.)
Because of how narrow this spot is, Nami's body is very close to yours.
You can hear her heartbeat, feel the warmth coming off her body, and the soft fruity smell of her hair.
(Hey... Is that what I think it is? Let me turn around.)
(Oh boy... I know you can't control it, but now's not the time.)
(Ummm, how do I get it to go down?)
(We shouldn't do this now...)
(I mean, this isn't how I thought we would...)
I know you two are there! Come out!
(Crap! She found us!)
(There's no point in staying here. Let's go out.)
You made it way too easy for me to find you this time.
Huh? Who are you?
Oh, I'm sorry!
I was playing hide and seek with my daughters and I thought I'd found them.
I didn't know it was two lovebirds. Forgive me for interrupting you.
No, we're not...
Wait, maybe you can help us. Can you tell us where we are?
You mean you don't know? We're near the mountain at the center of the island.
The center! Then we're close to our goal, ~player~. We were washed by the whirlpool and ended up here.
You really fell in the whirlpool? It's a miracle you survived without any injuries.
This is called Vortex Island because of the whirlpool at the center of it.
And then, at the center of the whirlpool, there's this smaller island.
Because of how strong the whirlpool that separates both islands is, it's almost impossible to cross from one side to the other unless you go through the bridge.
But ever since Sinclair made this island her territory five years ago, only she has control over who uses the bridge.
Ugh, that Sinclair really is the worst! I'll make her pay me back for my clothes.
Ah, so that's what happened.
Mom! Why did you stop looking for us? We got bored.
Are you tired, mom?
Sorry, girls. It seems we have two guests for tonight.
Eh? Can we see them?
We're really, really sorry...
Don't worry. I'm Debra by the way. These are Peg and Meg.
We don't have much, but at least we can give you a roof and some clothes to wear.
Thank you. I'm Nami, and his name is ~player~.

scene.name: House
scene.directive: She wasn't exaggerating. This house isn't in very good condition.
But I'm not complaining, it's much better than having to sleep outside naked.
Hey, about what happened earlier in the forest...
No this isn't the time for that. We have more important stuff to worry about now.
Knock, knock!
Yes?
Umm, excuse me...
My mom sent me to ask if you're both comfortable.
Oh, thank you! We're great. Tell your mom we're grateful.
Okay...
Ehmm... are you an adventurer?
Uhh... yes. I guess you could say that.
I bet you've seen lots of amazing places.
I wanna travel the world someday, but all I've seen is this island.
You're very young, you'll have the chance to travel.
And at least this island has lots of places to explore, and a nice town...
A town? Oh, I've never been there. We can't cross the bridge because we can't pay the toll.
The toll?
You don't know? The lady with the red glasses asks for money to cross the bridge to the other part of the island.
But we don't have money, so we can't leave. We're the only family that still lives here.
You mean you've never been outside this area? But what about food and supplies?
The whirlpool brings new things every now and then. It's fun to look for new stuff. Last week I found a mirror.
But we never see other people.
It was nice talking with you. I gotta go sleep. Have a good night!
Good night, Meg...
They're prisoners here because Sinclair doesn't let them cross the bridge.
All because they're poor. These clothes they gave us are probably the best they have.
We should get some rest, ~player~.
Tomorrow we'll head straight for Sinclair's treasure.

scene.name: Summit
scene.directive: Come on, ~player~! Just a little more! How can you be tired already?
Nami's eyes look weird.
Finally we've arrived!
This felt like such a long journey, but now-
Now what? Now it's over?
Not so fast, thieves.
I had a feeling falling on the whirlpool wouldn't be enough to get rid of you, you filthy cat.
Then I figured instead of chasing you, I'd just wait for you here.
Getting away from your friends wasn't easy, but fortunately nobody knows this island like me.
I suppose having access to the bridge helps. Unlike those who can't pay...
That's the way the world works, naive girl.
The strong take their place at the top, and the weak have no choice but to submit.
Let me show you what I...
...mean!
Mgh...!
Heh, I knew you were weak.
Hard to believe that someone like you has made it to the Grand Line.
You gotta help Nami! You run towards Sinclair.
But before you can do anything to her, Sinclair grabs your neck.
And you...
You're even weaker, sugar. You can't do anything to me.
Leave him out of this!
Sinclair throws you away. Nami uses the opportunity to back away.
What... is this?
Mirage tempo!
Don't think we're done yet.
Do you really think this cheap trick will work on me?
How stupid do you think I am?!
Sinclair attacks Nami's copies, but as they vanish she keeps making more.
Annoying. I have a better way to find the real one.
Take this!
Sinclair shoots her beam at Nami's copies. However...
What?! My beam bounced back! What did you do?!
Heheheh...
I knew borrowing this mirror would be a good idea.
Let's see if you're used to fighting naked now that the tables have turned.
All this humiliation... I won't rest until I've made you pay for all of this!
Sinclair explodes in a flash of pink light. You feel a strong wave of energy pushing you back. Pink light covers the hill.
When you can open your eyes again you see Nami has been cornered by Sinclair.
Now it's really over. I'm going to enjoy this.
You're right, it's over. And I've won.
What...?
I knew a simple attack wouldn't be enough to defeat you, so I've been creating these clouds since I saw you here.
Too bad you were too distracted to notice.
You should always pay attention to the weather, you know?
Thunderbolt Tempo!
Ahhhhh!!!
Ahhh...
Who's the weak one now, huh?
Have a safe landing.
Gust Sword!
Gahhhh...!!! Damn you!!!
Nami falls to the ground. You quickly run to her.
Phew, that was close...
I'm okay, don't worry about me.
More importantly, now it's finally time to check the treasure.
Hmmm, where did Sinclair hide her treasure? There's nothing here...
Maybe... under that rock? Help me move it, ~player~.
Yes! This has gotta be it. I have the key right here.
Under the trap door there are stairs that lead to a room. And inside is...

scene.name: Treasure
scene.directive: Ohhh...! This is so much better than what I imagined!
Treasure!
So much...!
...treasure!
Nami wanders around the room in excitement.
After a while, she gets tired and walks over to you.
~Player~, I only made it this far with your help. Thank you.
A promise is a promise, I'll pay back what I owe you.
Buuut... I was thinking... Since we're here maybe I can give you another reward too.
Okay, maybe it's also a reward for me. But I want it...
Nami leans close, puts her arms around, and kisses you.
The unexpected gesture catches you by surprise at first, but you return her advances nonetheless.
After all that has happened between us, we should've started with that. Too bad it took so long.
But I don't want to stop here. Let's take this to the bed.
We've seen a lot of each other's bodies by now.
I hope you're not tired of looking at me yet. I know I still enjoy looking at you.
Hey there. I don't like how we left things back at the forest.
Have you caught me sneaking a peek every now and then, ~name~? I thought I was being subtle, but maybe not so much.
Mwah!
What? I just wanted to kiss you there too.
But also...
M-mmmh...
Nami's movements are clumsy at first. But soon she starts moving her tongue around the tip.
Mmmmh...
It doesn't seem like you'll be able to last much longer.
You tell Nami, but she doesn't stop.
Mmmm...?
gulp
It doesn't taste like I was expecting. And it was so much...
It's only fair that you return the favor now, don't you think?
I'll just let you take the lead.
It's true that I'm good at seducing and teasing men, but when it comes to actually sealing the deal, I'm... a little less confident.
This is the closest you've ever been to me, so it's still embarrassing.
Normally I'd punch anyone for even trying to see me like this. But not you...
Mmm, my breasts? I've noticed you're always looking at them...
So I figured you'd want to touch them. So predictable...
Ah!
You're an idiot...
What else do you think I might like?
Mmmmh...!
Don't act so surprised...
You already know I get wet easy, don't you?
Okay, I feel more relaxed now. Let's do it.
Ngh... Slowly, please...
Mmmm...
This is not bad...
~Player~...
Don't let me go, okay?
I can barely stand like this.
As the day goes on, you spend it exploring Nami's body in different ways.
Mmh... This position...
It feels really good too...!
But I want to look at you while we're doing it.
Can we switch?
If you say anything about me being too heavy, we'll stop right here.
I still can't believe how good this feels...!
Finish inside me, ~player~!
Kyaaaahhh!!!
You were amazing, ~player~.
I hope I didn't disappoint you either.
Let me rest like this for a while.
It's so comfortable. And I'm so tired...

scene.name: Ending
scene.directive: You wake up. Seems like you've been sleeping for a while.
Where's Nami? Most of the treasure is gone too.
On top of the chest there's a letter. It's from her.
Dear ~player~. I'm sorry for leaving like this again.
I've never been good at saying goodbye.
You'd have noticed most of the treasure is gone. I didn't want to wake you up. You look so cute when you're sleeping. So I took it, though I left more than enough to pay you back for what I owe you.
But the thing is... I don't think I can carry all that treasure by myself...

So I decided to leave it with Deb and the girls. It's not out of generosity or anything! It would just be too much of a pain to carry all of that back to the ship and... well, they need it more than you or me. I'm sure you'll understand.
With Sinclair gone, they'll finally be able to have the life they deserve.

If Sinclair survived our fight, I'm sure she has been captured by the Marines by now. I don't think that swordswoman would come for my crew after all this. She takes her job seriously, but I still feel we have a sort of understanding.
As for me, it's funny to think that I'm leaving this island with less material possesions than I had when I arrived.

But even so, I don't feel like I've lost anything. On the contrary, our little adventure was so much fun... It just goes to show what I already knew: that there are more valuable things in life than money. I have my friends, and now also my memory of you. And even if a part of me wanted to stay with you in that room, my journey must continue.
Nami, we're about to set sail.
Okay! Let's go.
This sea is a vast place, but even so I'm sure we'll meet again by accident. After all, it wouldn't be the first time, right?
So... until we see each other again, ~player~.
THE END
